item.text: bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo
snying gzer nag po'i rgyud chen po bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ ki kang krag tsa ne nal tshab tu seb ling// shan pa pra ling sad rag sha sen sen sa ri ling gu h+ya ta na rA dza tsit+ta ha la ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ bdud bya rog
mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo snying gzer nag po'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'og min gyi mtha' dang dbus med
pa/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa las/ thugs zhi bas mi thul ba'i gdug pa can dang/ ya ma dam sri la sogs pa log 'dren can
rnams dang/ 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das nyid gdug pa spa bkong mi bsgrungs kun 'dus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhugs
ma thag tu 'jigs byed khrag 'thung gi sku/ rdo stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro ltar nag la 'tsher zhing rngam brjid ldan pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis bklubs shing/ gdug pa'i
mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhabs gnyis na rag dmyal ba'i bstan pa gzir zhing/ snang srid khong stong na 'phyo ba zhig dbyings las mngon du shar te/ gnas tshad dang dpag pa

las 'das shing/ rtse mo kun tu ma chad pa/ dur khrod kyi long long 'phyo ba na/ 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal thebs dang/ rgyal phran dang/ nang blon dang/ phyi blon la
sogs pa re re'i 'khor na yang/ nad gtong ba dang khram 'debs mi bsgrungs pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dang/ gzhan yang 'dod pa'i gtso mo'i tshogs/ rgyal mo dang/ rgyal mo'i rgyal mo dang/

rgyal thebs mo dang blon mo dang/ bran mo dang/ g.yog mo'i tshogs re re'i 'khor na yang/ 'du ba rnam bzhi nad kyi bdag mo dang/ bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad gtong ba'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ thabs
cig tu bzhugs so// yum bai tA li dang/ e ka dza Tis kyang mdun gyis bltas nas/ sku la rnam par 'khril te gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ 'od zer sna lnga dug lnga kun sdud
ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu yum bai tA lis a ho zhes smin mtshams glog 'gyu ba'i brda gcig mdzad pas/ 'jigs byed chen pos kyang bskul ba de thugs su chud nas/
a ho su kha zhes bya ba byang chub sems kyi char yum gyi mkha' la mngon par bab nas rol pa mdzad pas 'khor rnams dang dgyes pa'i ro dus gcig tu bstar te/ 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
spros pas/ sems can thams cad la byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas bde ba la bkod de/ 'od zer de dag gis khams gsum gyi gdug pa can dang/ phyin ci log gi dug lnga dang/ mi dge
ba bcu la sogs pa'i bcud thams cad bsdus nas nyid kyi sku la thim par mdzad do// de nas gnyis su med pa'i rol pa las zhe sdang gi 'od zer nag po dang/ nga rgyal gyi 'od zer ser po dang/ phrag dog gi

'od zer ljang gu la sogs pa/ ri rab kyi rtse la g.yung drung gi gnas su 'phro ba las srin po yag sha dz+wa la 'bar bar gyur te/ ri rab kyi rtse na zhe sdang gi me 'bar zhing gnas so// 'dod chags kyi 'od zer dmar

po dang/ gti mug gi 'od zer dud ka rgya mtsho'i gting du 'phros pa las/ 'bras bu klu mo yag sha mor gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i gting na 'dod chags kyi khrag mtsho khol zhing gnas pa las/ yum bai ta lIs 'dzum pa'i

mdangs kyis/ klu mo rdo rje yag sha mo la gzigs nas/ 'dod chags kyi zil pa dang bcas pa'i ljags kyis brda zhig mdzad pas/ klu mo rdo rje yag sha mo yang yid g.yo ba'i 'dod chags drag po skyes te/ k+hi k+hi

zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags kyi skad drag po 'brug stong dus gcig tu ldir ba tsam byung ngo// byung ma thag tu ri rab kyi rtse la gnas pa'i srin po yag sha 'bar ba yang/ yid g.yo ba'i 'dod chags drag po rab tu skyes

nas/ k+ha k+ha zhes bya ba'i sgra skad chen po 'brug stong dus gcig ldir ba tsam byung ngo// byung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum dus gcig tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ chem rab tu
chem/ kun tu rab tu chem/ 'ur rab tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ shig rab tu shig/ kun tu rab tu shig/ mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'

bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yi dwags dang/
sha za dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ skem byed dang/ brjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ grib gnon dang/ gnon po dang/ nam gru la sogs pa'i mi bsgrungs pa'i
tshogs thams cad sngangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// 'phags pa'i nang nas 'phags pa gshin rje'i gshed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med 'od zer

gyis// snang srid dug lnga bsdus pa'i byin rlabs ni// ki kang sgra skad 'brug stong ldir tsam na// stong gsum dus gcig g.yos pa ngo mtshar che// bdag cag rnams la thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol// zhes glengs

nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dengs so// de nas srin po yag sha dz+wa la ri rab kyi rtse la zhe sdang gi me 'bar ba dang/ klu mo rdo rje yag sha mo rgya mtsho'i gting nas 'dod chags khrag mtshor 'khyil ba

gnyis lus ma phrad par king kang gi sgras bskul te yid kyis bshos pa las/ bu ming srid lnga mtshe mar skyes so// bu mo spun bzhi mong po dang lnga'o// ming po ki kang phud byed chen po dang/ srin mo ki kang mgo
brnyan ma bzhir gyur nas/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad za zhing 'cha' ste/ 'jig rten phung ba la thug par gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed pos 'khor lo gcig ming

po la brgyab pas lus dum bu brgyad du gtubs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dpag pa las 'das pa'i khong stong du snang srid bcug nas thugs rin po che'i yang rang bzhin gyi khong seng/ kun rig gi ga'u na rin
po che gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa gcig bton pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho chen po bzhi dang/ rol mtsho bdun gyis ni bskor/ gser gyi ri bdun gyis 'khor bar bcad/ de ltar byas pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams
brgyad du/ ki kang chen po gzir te/ mgo lho nub byung ste dgod/ shar lho lag pa g.yas pa dgod/ byang nub tu lag pa g.yon pa dgod/ byang shar du rkang pa gnyis dgod/ shar du mjug ma dgod/ lho ru dpung

pa g.yas dgod/ nub tu dpung pa g.yon dgod/ byang du chu so dgod/ rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du mig dang mche ba snying gsum dgod/ ri rab kyi grwa mtshams su sring mo bzhi dgod do// de ltar bkram zhing sbas pa

las sba ru ma btub ste/ lus de dum bu re re las/ ki kang re re byung ste/ shin tu yang 'jig rten g.yos so// sring mo yang sba ru ma btub ste/ grwa bzhi nas langs nas/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can la shin tu yang
dus dang rnam pa med par za zhing 'cha' ba dang/ sbyor ba ngan pa gtong ba las/ yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos khams gsum dbang du bsdus/ srid gsum zil gyis mnan/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun nag bzhin du gtibs te/ thugs ye shes kyi nyi zer gyi rtse la/ lcags kyu'i tshogs dang/ zhags pa'i tshogs dang/ lcags sgrog gi tshogs dang/ dril bu'i tshogs

bsam gyis mi khyab par spros te/ hUM hUM phaT/ ha la ha la dzaHhUM hoH// e a ral+li hring dza dza/ zhes 'brug stong dus gcig ldir ba tsam gyi sgra bsgrags nas dbang du bsdus pas/ ki kang ming po dang/ sring mor
bcas pa/ bred rab tu bred/ kun tu rab tu bred/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar/ sngags rab tu sngangs/ kun tu rab tu sngangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad
ces gsol to// e ma ho 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag ki kang ming sring rnams// pha la gdug pa'i bu lags pas// snang srid srog chags ma lus kun// su 'phrad khyur mid 'cha' ba
dang// sbyor ba ngan pa gtong ba dang// lo tog 'joms pa'i las 'di dag/ bdag cag rnams kyi rang las na// dpa' bo chen po ci la bkyon// sngar yang dpa' bo chen po yis// bdag gi lus gtubs phyogs

bcur sbas// 'di yang shin tu ma legs so// thugs rje 'breng yang mi mnga' 'am// gtso bo chen po khyod nyid ni// thugs rje byams pa'i mnga' bdag na// 'di lta'i cho 'phrul ci la ston// gdug pa'i gsung sgra ci
la sgrogs// thugs kyi sprul pa ci la 'gyed// dpa' bo chen po bdag cag la// bka' bab mi 'tshal 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ ces gsol to// spyi sdom srog snying 'di mdongs gsol

du phul lo// a ya ma du ru tsa sha na la badzra ma ma ting la bo a tra badzra li phi ma ro tri dz+wa/ bdag cag rnams kyi srog tig ste// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ 'jigs byed chen
pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so ki kang chen po dag/ de ltar dus dus thams cad du// sems can rnams la sbyor ngan ma gtong bar/ kong tser 'jug pa'i tshes grangs dang// ki kang rgyu ba'i tshes
grangs dang// dus dang dus tshod rgyu phyogs dang// so so'i ming re dpon sna re bsko yis// nga yi dam las ma 'da' zhig/ 'on kyang sems can bde ba las// khyod kyang yid bde bar ni 'gyur// de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ ki kang rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// 'jigs byed chen po bka' stsol cig/ byams mgon chen po bka' stsol cig/ kong tser 'jug pa'i tshes grangs gang// ki kang

rgyu+u ba'i tshes grangs gang// rgyu ba'i dus ni gang la bgyi// dus kyi tshod ni gang la bgyi// phyogs kyi gang nas gang la rgyu// bdag cag ming sring 'di rnams kyi// ming gi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// dpon sna bgyi
na ji ltar bgyi// bdag cag dam las mi 'da' yis// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po dgyes te/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to// kwa ye ki kang ming srid rnams// nyon cig khyod rnams gus pas nyon// ngas gsung pa la sems thud cig/ kong tser 'jug pa'i tshes grangs ni// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco

lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu/ de la kong tser 'jug par byed// ki kang rgyu ba'i tshes grangs ni// lnga dang dgu dang bcu gnyis dang// bcu drug bcu dgu nyi shu gsum// nyi shu drug dang gnam

stong la// ki kang rgyu ba shes par byos// rgyu ba'i dus rnams ston pa ni// phyogs bzhi mtshan mo rgyu ba dang// mtshan bzhi nyin mo rgyu ba ni// rgyu ba'i dus su shes par bya// dus kyi tshod rnams bstan pa

ni// srod dang snga dro dang po dang// nam gyi phyi dbyings kyang dang nyi ma phyed// nam phyed nyi ma myur chen dang// skya rengs shar dang myur chud rnams// dus kyi tshod du shes par bya// de nas rgyu ba'i phyogs bstan

te// nub nas shar du rgyu ba dang// shar lho mtshams nas nub byang du'o// byang nas lho ru rgyu ba dang// lho nub mtshams nas byang shar du'o// shar nas nub tu rgyu ba dang// nub byang mtshams nas lho shar du'o// lho

nas byang du rgyu ba dang// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub tu'o// rgyu ba'i phyogs ni de ltar byos// de nas ming yang ngas gdags kyi// mgo las sprul pa chen po ni// bi tra bi tra bya ba ste// bya rog mgo can bya bar
gdags// lag pa g.yas las sprul pa ni// drang srong rA hu la zhes gdags// mig dang mche ba snying gsum las// sprul pa sgra gcan 'dzin du gdags// lag pa g.yon las sprul pa ni// du ba mjug ring bya
bar gdags// dpung pa g.yas las sprul pa ni// khyab 'jug chen po bya bar gdags// mjug ma las sprul chen po ni// biSh+Na ra tsa bya bar gdags// chu so las sprul chen po ni// tsa ra ka zhes bya bar
gdags// dpung pa g.yon las sprul pa ni// ljang sngon drag po bya bar gdags// shar lho mtshams kyi srin mo la// stag srin zor gdong bya bar gdags// lho nub mtshams kyi srin mo la// bam srin dred gdong
bya bar gdags// nub byang mtshams kyi srin mo la// kong srin ban gdong bya bar gdags// byang shar mtshams kyi srin mo la// 'brog srin chu srin gdong du gdags// de nas dpon sna bsko bya ba// nub kyi

phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srid pa'i ma mo'i dpon snar bsko// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dgra bla'i rgyal mo'i dpon snar bsko// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud kyi dmag tshogs dpon
snar bsko// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po 'bum gyi dpon snar bsko// shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud yongs kyi dpon snar bsko// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod pa'i

tshe// gshin rje yongs kyi dpon snar bsko// lho yi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// klu btsan dgra bla'i dpon snar bsko// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bi nA ya ka dpon snar bsko// de ltar nga yi bka'

phab pa// rtag tu yid la dran par byos// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ ki kang ming sring rnams dga' mgu yi rangs te// ha ha hi hi zhes pa'i sgra dus gcig tu phyung nas/ yang dpa' bo chen po la 'di skad ces
gsol to// kye ma dpa' bo chen po lags// 'jug dang rgyu ba'i tshes grangs dang// dus dang dus kyi tshod rnams dang// rgyu ba'i phyogs dang ming rnams dang// dpon sna bsko ba'i sdug las
rnams// bka' stsal bzhin du gnyer len na// bdag cag rnams kyi mthun rdzas dang// 'tshal ba'i zas skal gang gis bgyi// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang/ yang bcom ldan 'das
'jigs byed chen pos dgyes pa chen po'i gsung phyung nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ki kang drang srong chen po rnams// de skad gsungs pa shin tu legs// ngas gsungs pa las sems thud cig/ khyod kyi

pha ni srin yin pas// sha rul khrag rul nya rul dang// btsos dang rjen sha sna tshogs dang// ra mchin la sogs mar chen rnams// pha zas bu la dbog par bya// khyod kyi ma ni klu yin pas// dkar gsum mngar

gsum klu sman dang// la sman rtsi sman sna tshogs dang// dri yi rgyal po ga pur rnams// ma zas bu la dbog par bya// de ltar mthun pa'i rdzas bstan nas// khyod kyi zas skal bstan pa ni// gsang sngags gnyan gyi
bstan pa la// 'byol cig sdang sems ldan pa dang// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la// gdug cing rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang// dam tshig nyams dang dam las ldog/ 'di dag khyod kyi zas skal lo// zhu blag
med par myur du sgrol// sgrol ba'i bdag por ngas dbang bskur// srog dang dbugs la dbang bskur ro// gsod cing gso bar dbang bskur ro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa dang// bstan pa gnyan po 'dzin
pa dang// bka' bzhin spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// bka' las mi 'da' dam las mi 'da' bar// de yi dgongs pa myur du sgrubs// nyon cig ki kang chen po rnams// nga yi bka' las khyod ma 'da'// gal te

bka' las 'das gyur na// mgo lus dum bu stong du 'gyur// rul myags tshigs nas dmyal bar 'gro// sa ma ya tsit+ta na ra kan/ zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas/ mi g.yo zhing mi 'khu bar byas te/ dam la stsal zhing
dbang bskur nas/ 'jig rten bde ba la bkod de/ zas su ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig pa dang/ dmyal ba'i grong rten byed pa dang/ dam las zlog pa'i srog dang dbugs la dbang bskur te/ dbang lha ma

srin sde rgyad dam la btags nas dbang bskur ro// rog ti nag po de yang lus srin po la/ mgo bya rog gis brtsegs pa de/ lha ma srin sde brgyad du gyur nas dus tshod dang tshes grangs la 'jug cig rgyu ba dang/
ki kang dang gshed bzhis bskyod 'gul gyis/ srog dang dbugs la dbang byed par gyur pas/ ke kang ming sring rnams rjes su yi rangs te/ 'jigs byed chen po la g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas
nas/ pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la ho/ 'jigs byed chen pos bdag cag rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ bdag cag rang rang gi spyod pa las dang
mthun par bka' stsal pa ngo mtshar che'o// bdag cag ming sring ji ltar bka' stsal pa las mi 'da' zhing/ gnyer du gtad pa'i las rnams gdon mi za bar bgyid do zhes gsol zhing dam bcas nas/ rang rang
gi gnas ga la ba der dong ngo// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po nyid kyang/ sku rtag pa chen po'i klong na dus gsum du 'du 'bral med par bzhugs so// bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs rog ti nag po gsang ba

sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rak+sha snying gzer drag po'i rgyud las/ bcas ka gleng gzhi'i le'u dang po'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje'i gshed po la/ 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa rdo rje 'dzin pa

chen po dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis g.yas phyogs nas lan brgya stong bskor ba byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa chen po dag gis rnam
par mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan mgon po bdag cag rnams// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang// khams gsum sgrol byed khyod nyid la// skyabs su mchis kyis bka' stsol cig/ rab
tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i sku// gzi brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab nas// khams gsum ma lus 'khrug mdzad pa// khyod kyi gzi brjid mchog 'tshal gyis// log sred gdul ba'i stobs 'tshal bas// ji lta bus

ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji lta bus ni mnyes par bgyi// ji lta bus ni grub par bgyi// ji lta bus ni dang bar 'gyur// bdag cag the tshom chen po skyes// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi
bstan pa la// 'byol cing sdang sems ldan pa dang// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la// gdug cing rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang// dam tshig nyams dang ldog pa dang// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// dregs
pa mi bsgrungs pho mo yi// ki kang dbab dang gshed bzhi yis// gso bsad las rnams rtog pa'i mchog/ dpal bos rgyas par bka' stsol cig/ bstan pa bsrung phyir bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/
'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed pos dgyes pa'i gsung phyung nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa lam par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams la/ zhu don rtogs pa'i 'khor lo 'di rgyas par bka' stsal pa/ nga ni dus gsum

sngon du byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon du byung// nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung// nga ni lnga brgya tha ma'i tshe// nga yi bstan pa 'byung bar byed// bstan pa thams cad nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa

'byung// las ngan mtshams med byed pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// gos ngan dug rul gyon pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa

'byung// gnas ngan mkhar spai'u brtsig pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// gnyen ngan nye ba 'thab pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dam tshig nyams pa mang po'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// nga

ni dus gsum 'byung ba'i sku// rU tra dar ba'i dus ngan la// rog ti nag po'i rgyud byung ste// rnal 'byor gang gis bslab pa las// de la rtag tu thugs brtse'o// dam tshig nyams pa mang po la// nga yi king kang
'bebs byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i nang nas 'jam dpal nyid// lha mo'i nang nas 'od zer can// 'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan// rig 'dzin kun kyang dngos grub yal// nga yi lto nas srid gsum

'byin// ji lta bus ni zhi gyur yang// thams cad zhi ba nga yi sku// ji lta bus ni khros gyur yang// thams cad khros pa nga yi sku// rdo rje 'dzin sogs khyod nyon cig/ nga la gus gyur khyod rnams kun// nga yi gzi
brjid mchog 'dod na// mi zad nga yi sku gsung thugs// rtag tu yid la gnas par gyis// nga yi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po sa ma ya'o// dkon mchog gsum ni gnas pa dang// de yi
bka' yang bskyang ba dang// sems can kun la snying brtse dang// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// rA hu la yi lung las 'di// gza' bdud gdug pa'i drag sngags

'di// ki kang dbab dang gshed bzhi yis// 'jig rten khams kun khyab gyur te// gsad dang gso ba'i las byed pa// khyab byed chen po rA hu la'i// drag po sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phung byed chen po'i dam

tshig ni// slob dpon gnyan par mi 'gyur zhing// sems can thams cad srog la 'bebs// ma 'das mi 'da' 'da' mi 'gyur// phung byed chen po sa ma ya// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan
gyi bstan pa la// 'byol zhing sdang sems ldan pa dang// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la// gdug cing rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang// dam tshig nyams dang dam log pa'i// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i

phyir// sngags pas thog ma nyid du ni// sa ni yang dag brtag bya ste// ri mtho rtse dang g.yang sa dang// dur khrod ro khang ya ga can// 'thabs pa stong pa la sogs par// blang sbyang gzung dang bsrung ba dang// byin
brlabs mtshams bcad rdzogs byas nas// bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas bsham pa ni// bse gab kha sbyar gyi nang du// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// la sman rtsi sman la sogs pa// dri yi rgyal po ga bur

dang// 'di rnams bse gab nang du bstsal// de nas b+han+d+ha'i klad phor du// sha sna sna tshogs dag dang ni// ske tshe shang tshe nyung nag til// thal chen gsur chen khrag chen rnams// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar

bstsal// gzhan yang gu gul nag po dang// 'bras dang chan dang sgrub sman rnams// chang dang sbyar la bstsal bar bya'o// de nas 'gal byed dam sri'i gzugs// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa la// ming rus bla dwags

gzugs bris te// b+han+d+ha kha sbyar nang du'o// tsa ra rog po 'gal kha la// rwa la rog ti'i snying po bri'o// ske ru gang dmigs bris la gdags// dmigs pa de la bcas pa dang// de yi drung du bzhag pa ni// gdong

kha bzhi ru sdom nas su// yugs sa mo yi klad phor du// stag dom ban glang nya yi snying// sha rul khrag rul ra mchin bzhag/ mdzo mo'i 'o ma la sogs dang// sems can sna tshogs sha rnams dag/ klad phor nang

du bstsal bar bya// khrag sna dag dang sbyar bar bya// bdud bya rog nag po mgo brtsegs pa'i rog ti nag po gsang ba sgrol byed kyi ki kang rak+sha'i mdo snying gzer drag po chen po'i rgyud las/ mthun rdzas ling+ga
bca' thabs gal chen gnad kyi le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo gshed chen gyis// snyigs ma dus kyi tha ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// gso

gsad mchod tshul bstan pa la// dang la rgyu 'jug bshad bya ste// bzhi la kong tsher 'jug byed cing// lnga yi srod la ki kang rgyu// brgyad la kong tser 'jug byed cing// dgu yi snga dro ki kang rgyu// bcu gcig kong

tser 'jug byed cing// bcu gnyis byang la ki kang rgyu// bco lnga kong tser 'jug byed cing// bcu drug nyin gung ki kang rgyu// bco brgyad kong tser 'jug byed cing// bcu dgu'i nam phyed ki kang rgyu// nyi shu gnyis

la kong tser 'jug/ rtsa gsum myur chen ki kang rgyu// nyi shu lnga la kong tser 'jug/ rtsa drug tho rangs ki kang rgyu// nyi shu dgu la kong tser 'jug/ gnam stong myur chung ki kang rgyu// kong tser 'jug pa gso bya ba// ki

kang rgyu ba bsad pa'i las// las kyi bye brag de dag kyang// gso ba'i las ni 'di lta ste// ma nor tshes grangs shin tu gces// tshes grangs bzhi yi mtshan mo dag/ nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// mngar gsum

klu sman sna tshogs kyis// mchod cing kong tse zhi bar bsam// bsad na sha khrag dmar gyis mchod// ki kang gtum khro drag por dmigs// tshes grangs brgyad kyi nyin par dag/ shar lho mtshams su kha bltas

la// mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs kyis// gser phye dag ni mchod bya zhing// drang srong kong tshe zhi bar bsam// sha khrag dmar gyi dam rdzas dang// bya rgod dag gi shas mchod cing// drang srong ki kang gtum rngam
bskul// tshes grangs bcu gcig mtshan mo dag/ byang gi phyaugs su kha bltas la// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman gyis// mchod cing kong tse zhi bar bsam// sha khrag dmar dang nyung nag
dang// nas dang til gyis mchod bya zhing// ki kang gtum khro drag por bskul// tshes grangs bco lnga'i nyin par dag/ lho nub mtshams su kha bltas la// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman gyis// mchod cing

kong tse zhi bar bsam// sha rul khrag rul nya rul dang// btsos dang rjen sha sna tshogs kyis// mchod cing ki kang gtum khror bskul// tshes grangs bco brgyad mtshan mo la// shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas

la// dkar gsum sman gyis mchod bya zhing// kong tse zhi ba chen por bsam// sha khrag dmar gyi dam rdzas dang// nas gro til gyis mchod bya zhing// ki kang gtum khro drag por bskul// nyi shu gnyis kyi nyin par

ni// nub byang mtshams su kha bltas nas// dkar gsum klu sman sna tshogs kyis// mchod cing kong tse zhi bar bsam// sha rul khrag rul dam rdzas kyis// mchod cing ki kang gtum khror bskul// nyi shu lnga yi tho

rangs dag/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// dkar gsum klu sman sna tshogs kyis// mchod cing ki kang zhi bar bsam// sha khrag btsos rjen sna tshogs kyis// mchod cing ki kang gtum khror bskul// nyi shu dgu yi

nyin par dag/ byang shar mtshams su kha bltas la// dkar gsum klu sman mchod bya zhing// kong tse zhi ba chen por bsam// sha rul khrag rul snying khrag dang// ra mchin dmar gyis mchod bya zhing// ki kang

gtum khro drag por bskul// las kyi bye brag de dag kyang// bsad pa'i las dag mi brtson na// dkar gsum mngar gyi mchod bya zhing// bden bdar zhi ba chen por bsam// shAn+ting ku ru'i sgra yang brjod// gso
ba'i las ni de ltar ro// phung byed gsod pa'i las rtsom na// sha khrag dmar gyis gong bzhin mchod// ki kang gtum khro drag por bskul// khams gsum phung byed sgrol bdag ste// srog ser las kyi bdag po

yin// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// rtag tu mchod bskul sus byed pa// srog ser las rnams gdon mi za'o// bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs rog ti nag po gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rak+sha'i mdo/
snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ gso gsad mchod tshul rtog pa gnad kyi le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo gtso chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa
la// 'tshe byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir/ phung byed mdo bskul chen po ni// gza' bdud 'jug cing ki kang 'bebs byed pa'i// gza' bdud chen po mi srun pa// khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu// 'jigs byed
rog ti sprul pa'i sku// lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis gang// ro stod mi la ro smad sbrul// lus ni brjid pa dud ka'o// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// ba ni srin

la ma ni klu// klu srin tshogs pa'i mthu bo che// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs te// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du rgyu// nyi ma'i rjes gcod nub tu rgyu// nyin mo rgyu bas mtshams bzhi 'joms// mtshan mo rgyu zhing

phyogs bzhi 'joms// bar snang khams la rgyu tsam na// 'jig rten khams kun sreg par byed// lo nyes 'khrug pa rims nad gtong// nyi ma zla ba lto ru za// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun

kyang dkrug cing slong// thog dang ser ba sa g.yos gtong// 'jigs byed chen po mi bsgrungs pa// ming brgya po la mkhan stong po/ yang/ mig brgya po la kha stong po// dus tshod tshes grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi

nang byan mkhan// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan ni rnam pa dgu ru grags// steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun du yang// rgyu zhing ki kang 'bebs par byed// lho nub

mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// srin po rag sha pa ti bya// ki kang ba ta chen po bya// srin po'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// drang srong chen po rA hu la// drang srong gi ni ki kang

mchog/ ki kang bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// 'jigs byed rA tsa sgra gcan 'dzin// bi nA ya ga pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang dbab pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas

bskyod tsam na// du ba mjug ring chen po ste// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i mthu bo che// 'jig rten g.yo 'gul byed pa'i bdag/ lho yi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// khyab 'jug chen po bya ba ste// dus tshod tshes grangs

kun du rgyu// sprul pa'i sku ni ki kang 'bebs// shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdag chen po ha li ka/ bi nu rA tsa'i ki kang bdag/ dmu yi ki kang 'bebs par byed// byang gi phyogs nas bskyod tsam
na// bdud po rog ti 'bar ba'i gzugs// bdud kyi ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki kang 'bar ba tsa ra ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod tsam na// srid pa'i ma mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ki kang kun gyi

bdag/ ljang sngon chen po'i ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsam na// rog ti bya rog mgo brtsegs te// skar chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// sngon du su 'phrad khyur mid za// khyod ni khro chen sprul pa

ste// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmag dpon byed// nub nas shar du bskyod tsam na// srid pa'i ma mo'i dmag dpon byed// nad ngan sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// lho shar mtshams
nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dgra bla rgyal pos ma'i yang dmag dpon byed// thog dang bu yug ki kang ni// dam sri gdug pa'i snying la 'bebs// byang nas lho ru bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud dmag kun gyi dmag
dpon byed// bdud kyi ki kang dgra la ya// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po 'bum gyi dmag dpon byed// srin po'i ki kang dgra la 'bebs// gri thabs sna tshogs ki kang ya// shar nas nub tu
bskyod tsam na// dmu bdud yongs kyi dmag dpon byed// dmu rdo 'bebs pa'i las byed cing// gar rbad dmu yi ki kang gtong// nub byang mtshams nas sku skyod nas// gshin rje yongs kyi dmag dpon

byed// skye 'gro yongs kyi bla tshe sdud// gshin rje'i ki kang dbang med 'bebs// lho nas byang du bskyod tsam na// klu btsan dgra bla'i dmag dpon byed// thog dang ser ba'i sna 'dren cing// thog ser mdze nad ki
kang 'bebs// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// 'thibs grir gsod pa'i ki kang 'bebs// mdun du gang byung khyur mid byed// gza' bdud chen po khyod bskul gyis// dam tshig bdag po sa ma ya// bi

tri pa tra'i dus la bab// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi dus la bab// du ba mjug rings dus la bab// khyab 'jug chen po'i dus la bab// bi nu rA tsa'i dus la bab// tsa ra ka yi dus la bab// ljang sngon drag po'i dus la

bab// bya rog mgo brtsegs dus la bab// bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs rog ti nag po gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rak+sha'i mdo snying gzer drag po'i rgyud las/ phung byed mdo bskul drag po'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// tshes grangs dus la bab pa'i tshe// drag

sngags thun gzer dbab bya ba// 'jug dang rgyu ba'i dus shes nas// mchod dang drag po'i thun gzer dbab// de la 'jug pa'i tshes grangs ni// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu

gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang nyi shu dgu// de rnams dag la 'jug byed cing// rgyu ba'i dus ni 'di lta ste// lnga dang dgu dang bcu gnyis dang// bcu drug bcu dgu nyi shu gsum// nyi shu drug dang gnam stong la// ki kang
drag po rgyu bar byed// bzhi la zhugs nas lnga la gdon// brgyad la zhugs nas dgu la gdon// bcu gcig zhugs nas bcu gnyis gdon// bco lnga zhugs nas bcu drug gdon// bco brgyad zhugs nas bcu

dgu gdon// nyi shu gnyis 'jug gsum la gdon// nyi shu lnga 'jug rtsa drug gdon// nyi shu dgu la zhugs byas la// gnam stong drag po'i thun zar dbab// bzhi la kong tse mchod byas la// lnga la ki kang dbab
par bya// tshes grangs lnga yi srod dag la// dpung pa g.yon pa ma mor sprul// nub nas shar du rgyu bar byed// ling+ga shar du bzhag nas kyang// nub nas ma mo'i drag sngags brdeg/ ma mo 'phel ba
bzhi gtong ste// gdon mi za bar las 'grub po// ma mo'i las rnams grub pa'i rtags// sprin yang kham nag 'phang bstod nas// 'khrug cing ser ba dum bur 'ong// 'tshub nag chen po g.yo bar byed// gang

dmigs rten la brdeg pa'i sngags// A+oM trag rak+sha snying kha rag/ trag ma ma rag mo hril/ yam shag rbad/ hril shar b+h+yo/ nr-i mA ra ya hUM/ phung byed las 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ srid pa sbub par the tshom

med// dmar zor mtshon cha sna lnga dang// nyi shu rtsa lngas ling+ga brab// log sred gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// sdang mig blta zhing sdigs mdzub bsgreng// byas pa tsam gyis phung bar byed// brgyad la kong tse mchod

byas la// dgu la ki kang dbab par bya// tshes grangs dgu yi snga dro la// lag g.yas dgra bla'i rgyal mor sprul// shar lho mtshams nas nub byang du// drang srong ki kang rgyu byed pas// ling+ga ming rus bla dgas

la// bya rgod sha dang dmar chen du// sbyar la nub byang mtshams su bzhag/ nyung dkar bya rog gshog phur dang// gser phye dag la drag sngags bzlas// shar lho mtshams nas brdeg par bya// A+oM trag rag sha a

sa me ru ru ma ma ru lu ru lu hur thum/ ma ma trag rag sha hril shar phrom ni/ mA ra ya b+h+yo rbad/ 'di bsad las grub rtags rnams kyang// nam mkha' dbal skya thabs mtha' yang sangs nas// sprin yang lug gi lto

tshil 'dra// ser ba nya mig tu 'ong zhing// thog ser bu yug myur du 'bab// brtsam pa tsam gyis las grub pas// sum cu rtsa gcig sngags rgod la// nam yang the tshom mi bya'o// bcu gcig kong tse mchod byas

nas// bcu gnyis ki kang dbab par bya// tshes grangs bcu gnyis nam 'jing la// chu so bdud du sprul nas kyang// byang nas lho ru rgyu byed pas// ling+ga lhor bzhag dmar dang sbrag/ byang nas lcags phur blang

drag dang// nyung nag ske tse shang tshe dang// phung byed bdud kyi drag sngags bzlas// oM pa sha mi ki yag sha phur pa du ka la/ rA hu la hur thum shar hril rbad su/ ru ru pra pra thums thums/ nr-i mA ra ya rbad ya/
phud byed dmod mo 'di grub rtags// sprin yang shing lo gshib 'dra dang// mthing nag sems can gzugs rbad dang// ser ba kham nag zur gsum dbyibs// drag tu dbab cing rlung tshubs
ldang// lcags thog 'bar bas myur du 'joms// phung byed drag sngags 'di btab nas// ri rab chen po'i 'jig 'gyur na// thog zer las la smos ci dgos// bco lnga kong tse mchod byas nas// bcu drug ki
kang dbab par bya// tshes grangs bcu drug nyin phyed na// mgo bo srin por sprul byas nas// lho nub mtshams nas byang shar du// srin po'i ki kang rgyu byed pas// ling+ga byang shar mtshams dag

tu// btsos dang rjen sha sbyar la bzhag/ lho nub srin po'i phyogs dag na// sha rul khrag rul nya rul dang// gze ma rag sha'i thun dag gis// shul rings dag tu brdeg par bya// A+oM sen sen rak+sha yak+sha khrag la

hur thums/ mu sha tsa thun/ du ma rngub nr-i mA ra ya rbad a/ rag+sha'i sngags rgod 'di 'grub rtags// sprin pa kham nag kun tu 'khrigs// g.yag dang mdung shing shar ba 'dra// rlung dmar thog dang ser ba

yang// btsan dmar rbad kham mchongs shing 'ong// nyi shu rtsa gsum drag sngags 'di// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// brgya byin nyid kyang rlag par byed// bco brgyad kong tse mchod byas nas/ bcu dgu
ki kang dbab bar bya// tshes grangs bcu dgu'i nam phyed na// mjug ma dmu bdud chen por sprul// shar nas nub tu rgyu byed pas// ling+ga dmar bcas nub tu bzhag/ shar nas gro dang til dkar dang// nas

sngon rma bya'i snying khrag dang// dmu bdud rol pa'i drag sngags bzlas// A+oM traM traM shi grin rA tsa dun te/ rA tsa dun te ba shag dril hrIl/ rbad su ri shar ha li nan b+h+yo// nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ dmu bdud sngags bzlas grub

rtags ni// sprin yang phying pa brkyang 'dra la// kham nag lan 'ga' 'khrug cing 'ong// ser ba gong gsum gcod byed cing// bya 'phur 'dra zhing gong gsum gcod// lce 'bebs rgya mtsho 'khrug par byed// tshangs
pa'i gnas kyang 'jig par 'gyur// sa g.yos dmu rdo kun tu 'bebs// nyi shu gnyis la kong tse mchod// nyi shu gsum la ki kang dbab// nyi shu gsum gyi snur chen la// lag pa gshin rjer sprul pa yis// nub

byang mtshams nas lho shar rgyu// ling+ga dmar bcas shar lho bzhag/ sha khrag tsit+tar bcas pa la// phung byed ma mo'i drag sngags bzlas// nub byang mtshams nas brdeg par bya// A+oM ya ma rA tsa sa do me yaM bya tsa ye/

sing ga ye ru tsa du tsa ram hril shar ya ma ri b+h+yo/ nr-i mA ra ya rbad ya/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur bas// phung byed sngags rgod grub pa'i rtags// srin pa dmar nag hral hral po// sems can sna tshogs

gzugs su snang// tshub nag drag por bcas pa dang// ser ba thu lum rtse med kyang// sngon du 'bab pa the tshom med// log sred yul du thun 'phang zhing// sdigs mdzub bsgrengs nas kha bstan pas// thog ser

ji tsam 'dod par 'gro// nyi shu lnga la kong tse mchod// nyi shu drug la ki kang dbab// nyi shu drug gi tho rangs kha// skya rengs dang po shar tsam na// dpung g.yon klu btsan dgra lhar sprul// lho nas byang du rgyu byed
pas// ling+ga dkar dmar bcas pa dag/ byang phyogs dag tu gzhag par bya// dkar dmar rdzas dang til dkar la// klu btsan dgra lha'i drag sngags bzlas// lho nas phung byed chen po bskul// A+oM

nA ga sen sen dum pa le/ shag pa ku pa tsa badzra sA d+hu sa ma ya/ hril shar b+h+yo// nr-i mA ra ya du rbad du ya/ 'di gsang las grub rtags rnams kyang// sprin pa phyar sgye dril 'dra dmar// rlung dang 'dres pa'i ser ba
yang// spra tshugs dril ba bzhin du'o// thog dang bu yug rlung nag kyang// sum cu rtsa gsum sngags kyis 'grub// log sred gtan phung sngags 'di la// rtog dpyod yid gnyis gang za bas// nga yi dngos

grub thob mi srid// sngags pas the tshom med na 'grub// nyi shu dgu la kong tse mchod// gnam stong ki kang dbab par bya// gnam stong nyi ma snur chung la// snying dang mche ba mig dang gsum// byang shar mtshams

nas lho nub tu// bi nA ya kar sprul te rgyu// ling+ga sha rul khrag rul dang// ra mchin bcas pa lho nub bzhag/ thal chen khrag dang nyung dkar la// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sngags bzlas nas// sngags pas byang shar

mtshams nas brab// A+oM ya snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma du/ rA hu la/ hur hur/ pra tsar mud nan/ dgra sri dzar sang ni/ de pe ye nan/ hril shag se na ya b+h+yo// nr-i mA ra ya b+h+yo/ bzlas pa tsam gyis grub pa'i

rtags// sprin pa dung ka mgo bo che// lhug pas bar snang kun khebs nas// 'khrug cing thog ser myur du 'bab// 'brug sgra drag pos stong gsum khengs// de ltar grub pa'i rtags byung na// thog dang ser ba gang

yang rung// dmigs pa'i rten la myur bar bya// grub rdzas dngos grub dang blang la// bdag dang gnyis su med par bya'o// thog ser gtong ba'i dus su yang// kong tse ki kang yang kang ni// brtson ldan sngags
pas shes byas la// rdzas la sngags bzlas zor du 'phang// zor 'phang mdzub ris gar byas pa// nyi ma re res 'joms par byed// ser ba rbad kham du 'ong bas// sngags pas drag sngags grub par
bzlas// rog ti nag po 'di grub na// ri rab chen po'ang 'jig pa dang// rgya mtsho chen po skem pa dang// yams nad mdze shu ltas ngan dang// thog ser las rnams ci 'dod pa// dus med par yang 'bebs par

nges// srog ser las rnams gang rtsom yang// so dgu pa yi sngags la sogs// sde tshan brgyad po'i thun gyis dbab// sde tshan brgyad po'i sgrub thun la// drag por nyams su gang len pa// da ni nga yi gdang brgyud

'dzin// bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs rog ti nag po'i gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rag+sha'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i sngags rgyud chen po las/ bshad pa srog thun thog ser gyi rtog pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// phung byed drag po'i dkyil
'khor mchog/ dpa' bo chen pos rab bshad pa// stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten 'di// ming gcig sring bzhi sgrub pa ni// gdang chen drod ldan rnal 'byor gyis// thog mar gnas rab brtag bya ba// ri brag
gnyan zhing dgon pa'am// ri mtho thibs pa bkra mi shis// gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha yal bar yin nam dang// e dbyibs 'dra bar mkhas pas brtag/ de nas bslang ba'i las chen ni// snang dang mi snang la
sogs pa'i// gang dag bdag por gyur pa las// mchod sbyin gtor rtsal 'di skad brjod// dgongs shig sa bdag sde dpung bcas// don ldan rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// 'jig rten log sred 'dul ba'i

phyir// brten pa gnas kyi sa slong na// rten gnas bdag por gyur pa khyed// ma skrag phrag dog ma skye bar// gdug 'dul las kyi grogs byos shig/ de nas lha mo dran bya ba// sngon tshe bcom ldan gshed chen
gyis// thugs rjes sa la gshegs nas ni// rU tra gshin rje kun bsgral nas// bstan rgyas 'gro drug smin pa ltar// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang// 'dir gnas log sred kun 'dul bas// sa bdag

'khor bcas dpang mdzod cig/ de nas sa ni sbyang bya ba// khru gang brkos te gter stsal la// sa yi ro lnga gang byung yang// mi spo drag po'i dkyil 'khor ni// khru lnga pa yi tshad du bya// dri dang ldan pa'i rnam lngas
byug/ steng du bdag nyid rab gnas la// gzung zhing gyad tshul rngam stabs kyis// rdo rje keng rus gtams pa dang// gru gsum drag po'i gnas su brlab// de nas dkon mchog 'khor bcas la// mchod sbyin

rgya chen bsngo bya ste// phyi nas bskang bshags drag tu bya// de nas gdug byed rab bcing ba// rnal 'byor gshed chen thugs ka nas// mthing nag hUM gi khyad par las// stong gsum khro bor rab gsal te// rngam
sgras 'jig rten kun bkang nas// gdug pa g.yo 'gul ming yang med// gnod mdzes gsang sngags drag po yis// gang dmigs log sred ma gtogs pa// gdug pa ma lus mtshams bcad do// A+oM sum b+ha ni

sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn bid+ya rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// brtul zhugs ldan pas 'di skad brjod// gdug 'dul drag po'i dkyil 'khor

du// 'gal byed ma lus bsgral slad du// dkar gsum dme khrag dam rdzas 'dis// phung byed dkyil 'khor chag chag 'debs// oM me hA dz+wa la maN+Dal hUM/ de nas tshon dang ku ku ra// phag chen rgyu ma gsum sgril
la// thal chen byugs la 'di skad brjod// dur khrod drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gal byed gdug pa bsgral slad du// srin po rol pa'i thig btab pas// srid gsum dkyil 'khor nyid du

gsal// A+oM ma hA dz+nyA na maN+Dal hUM/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dbus su gru gsum e bskyed la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mtha' bskor du// gdug pa sbrul gyis bskor bar bya// bar khyams sgo bzhi
bcas pa dag/ gshed po nyid kyi khong par bri// e zur gsum gyi rtse rnams la// sgyed rdo dkar dmar nag po la// gsum btsugs gshin rjer dbang bskur ro// rtsibs la srin mo'i mtshan ma dgod// bar

khyams dag la dgod bya ba// drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma'o// de ltar bri ba'i las bstan nas// de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i rdzas// zangs sam thod pa mtshan ngan du// khrag sna snying sna sna tshogs dang// dkar thab

ra yi mchin pa dang// ba yi 'o ma dme khrag gsum// chu bdud tshang ba dag dang ni// sa rdo drubs dang gong bu dang// sngo sna phal dag ci 'byor stsal// mA ra ya yi ling+ga dang// yul gyi pho chu rdzi ba rdzing sa yang

dang// yul gyi ming yang bris la stsal// tsa ra rog po 'gal kha ba// cha su gong bzhin gsal byas la// stegs bu'i rtsar gdags gnas spo bya// klad phor bzhi ni khrag bkang nas// gdong mo bzhi yi mdun du

bzhag/ klad por de dag rnams su ni// ya ma dam sri'i ling+ga dang// yul gyi ming dang srung sngo kun// sngags kyis btab pa phor par rtsal// de la srin mo bzhis brten bsgrub// thod pa mA ra ya yi thod par

bya// zang bu ma ra'i bu sring dag/ gzed mor shi ba'i thod par bya// dre'u dang mdzo yi thod pa dang// sprad la bsgrub nas mnan pas 'grub// ling+ga dang bcas thod pa dag/ de rnams dgug cing drang bar bya'o// hUM

gshed chen ya ma rA tsa ni// ya ma dam sri nyams pa'i gshed// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung mdzad lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// srog bdud dmar po bdud kyi bu// gshin rje rgyal po me ru tse// bstan pa

gnyan po bsrung mdzad lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// gshin rje nag po dgra yi gshed// nag po rag+sha glog phreng can// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung mdzad lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol// A+oM

kro ta bi tsa rA tsa hUM/ oM he re te pa ga tsa hUM/ A+oM ya ma rA tsa sa to me ya hUM/ thod pa ling+ga drang bya ba// dang la ma nyes dpang btsugs la// de nas drag po'i las la gzud// bstan pa 'jig pa 'gugs mdzad
pa// nyams pa'i srog gshed srog gi gshed// ya ma rA tsa'i dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'bum 'gyed cing// rol pa'i stabs kyis ma mo 'dul// phrin las dam nyams bla tshe 'gugs// dgra bo'i bla tshe
khyer la shog/ gang dmigs rten la myur du stims// nyams pa'i srog gshed srog gi bdud// ma ru tse yi dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'bum 'gyed cing// rol pa'i stabs kyis ma mo
'dul// phrin las nyams pa'i bla tshe 'gugs// phrin las phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// dgra bo'i bla tshe khyer la shog/ gang dmigs rten la myur du stims// dgra bo'i srog len srog gi bdag/ gshin rje
nag po'i dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'bum 'gyed cing// phrin las phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad khyab// rol pa'i stabs kyis ma mo 'dul// phrin las dam nyams bla tshe 'gugs// dgra bo'i bla tshe khyer

la shog/ gang dmigs rten la myur du stims// sprul pa'i gshin rje thod pa 'dren// drongs shig stims shig myur du stims// A kar sha ya nr-i hUM dza dza/ bstan pa 'jig pa drang bkug nas// dmigs pa'i rten la

bstim byas la// gtad do gtad do'i tshig sgra dang// shor ra re yi ngag phyung ste// rnam gsum phyag tu gtad byas la// ri bo gsum gyi rtse la bskyal// bskal par thar pa'i dus med pa'i// gshin rje yul du
bskyal ba las// sdug bsngal mang po ya re nga// ki kang mang pos srog bcad nas// gshin rje rnams kyi lto ru sbyin// rA hu la yis khyur mid bya// bdud mo bzhi yis rngam zas bya// lhag ma lus pa med pa
ru// gshin rje rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// thod pa ling+ga la sogs pa// dmigs pa'i rten kun drangs byas la// sgyed po gsum la bskur bar bya'o// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol

byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rak+sha'i mdo snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi'i gsang chen gnad kyi le'u drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi tha

ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// phung byed dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// chos dbyings mi mngon rnam dag dbyings kyi lha// bstan pa rgya mtsho ma lus bsrung ba'i

phyir// stong nyid ngang las khro gtum skur bzhengs shig/ 'khor dang bcas pas spyan 'dren gyi// gru gsum mthing nag ri bo gsum 'dus pa'i// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// A+oM bud+d+ha

d+harma sang ge b+h+yaH/ kro te b+h+yaHA ral+la/ bi ba sarba bi sa ra hUM dza/ dbyings dang ye shes rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gru gsum mthing nag e yi gnas mchog 'dir// ya mAn+ta ka yab yum gshegs su gsol// zhe

sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// yak+sha dz+wa la 'bar ba gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags khrag mtsho khol ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// klu mo rdo rje glog 'gyu gshegs su gsol// tshang skong rgya mtsho klong
dkyil gting rum na// ma mo las la 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// phung byed ljang sngon drag po gshegs su gsol// shar lho drang song rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// drang srong mthu chen sgrol
bdag gshegs su gsol// byang phyogs bdud dpung 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// bdud dpon rog ti 'bar ba gshegs su gsol// lho nub srin po rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin po byi tri pa tra
gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs dmu bdud tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// phung byed b+hi nu rA tsa gshegs su gsol// nub byang gshin rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// du ba mjug ring chen po gshegs su
gsol// lho phyogs klu btsan 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi bsgrungs khyab mjug chen po gshegs su gsol// byang shar bgegs chen gtum khro'i dkyil 'khor nas// bgegs dpon gza' bdud sgra
gcan gshegs su gsol// mgo dpung yan lag dur khrod dkyil 'khor nas// sde brgyad rol pa'i mthu chen gshegs su gsol// stong gsum shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig stag
srin zor gdeng gshegs su gsol// gling bzhi lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig bam srin dred gdong gshegs su gsol// gling bzhi nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// srin
gcig kong srin bam gdong gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig 'brog srin chu srin gshegs su gsol// dregs pa mi bsgrungs pho mo 'khor dang

bcas// mthun pa'i dam rdzas gnyan la spyan 'dren gyi// bstan pa bsrung phyir ma thogs myur du gshegs// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ e h+ye hi/ pra b+ha ba/ a ra li/ he tri sarba pra bud+d+ha/ dzaHhUM ba hoH// bi sa ra he
hi dza dza/ thugs rjes log 'dren 'dul mdzad dkyil 'khor tshogs// gshed po yab yum lcam dral sras dang bcas// dregs pa mi bsgrungs pho mo la sogs pa// bstan pa bsrung phyir gnyis med bzhugs su

gsol// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ya mAn+ta ka/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// kA ya bAg tsit+ta/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM A hUM/ thugs rjes gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// dregs pa 'dul mdzad 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
mchog/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed// brjid pa'i 'od phung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid thugs mnga' gdug 'dul yum chen mo// chags pa'i rol pas thugs rje'i 'od zer

'phro// g.yas g.yon 'khril sbyor brjid pas 'khor 'khor ba yang rnams 'dul// dbyings nas khro mchog sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dug lnga kun 'dul thugs rje'i byin rlab kyis// lcam dral sku 'khrungs 'jig rten
kun gyi mes// ki kang sgra sgrogs srid gsum spa bkong ba'i// thugs rje rol pa'i gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// rngam chen srid gsum sgrol ba'i stobs mnga' ba'i// srog ser las kyi mnga' bdag

phung byed tshogs// lcam dral 'gal byed 'dul ba'i 'khor dang bcas// rnal 'byor gdung ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// ma hA gu h+ya sa ma ya// phu ru sha ma ho// gdug pa ma lus 'joms shing

sgrol// gshin rje rU tra kun 'dul ba// bcom ldan mgon po yab yum la// dme gtor khrag dang rab sbyar ba'i// dur khrod rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul// 'jig rten mi 'gyur zhe sdang sku// gdug byed srin po'i tshul
can la// sha khrag gsur bcas 'di 'bul gyi// rngam pa'i zhal du thim par bzhes// ba su rigs brgyad kun 'dul ba'i// thog sman rak+ta'i lcam gcig ma// dkar gsum dri dang bdug pa 'di// dmigs shing

dbul lo bzhes su gsol// dug lnga 'chol ba'i dbon sras mched// sde brgyad 'jigs byed kyang rol pa'i lcam dral la// dkar gsum rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul// gtsang sme med par rol du gsol// A+oM sarba a mr-i

ta ba ba ha re ni swA hA A+oM AHhUM/ sa ma ya s+t+wam/ ha ha he he ma trang kha/ ka rug sha/ sarba k+She baM ti kha kha sha tab la kha ram khA he kha le b+h+yo b+h+yo// ha he rak+sha khA hi/ rak+ta ru ti ru ba ling ta kha ram/ pi ba a ra li/ pi ba

sar+b+ba bi sa ra/ tra trad sa snyad gan+d+ha swA hA// sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i phyag rgya dang// be con sdigs mdzub rab bsgrengs nas// dbyings nas bskul zhing spyan drangs la// gnyis med
bstim rdzogs mchod par dbul// nga yis bsten pa'i gsang sgrub 'dis// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus su 'byung// de dus dad mos gang bsgrub pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ nges par thob cing gzi

brjid che// 'jig rten 'dir yang gsad gso dang// srid pa sbub par the tshom med// bdud rog ti nag po gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rak+sha'i mdo snying gzer drag po'i rgyud las/ phung byed phrin las
kyi rgyud chen po'i le'u bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// dmyal ba rdo rje byed pa dang// sdang sems ngan pas mnar ba kun// gos su re ba gyon
nas ni// zas su lci ba'i zas la za// srog gcod sdig la dga' ba dang// de 'dra'i las kyis mtshams sbyar nas// ru tra'i gnas kun rgyud mar len// de 'dul gnyen por bka' 'di srungs// bdud po rog ti
nag po ste// bya rog mgo brtsegs ki kang 'di// gshin rje gshed po nga nyid kyis// dam btags dam bstsal zas su ni// bstan pa 'jig pa rnams byin pas// 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// dang la gtso bo
yab yum bskyed// de nas 'khor rnams rim gyis so// de la thog mar sngags pa yis// ku sha'i stan la mnyam gnas la// 'khor 'das chos rnams dmigs med cing// ye med bdal ba'i ngang
nyid las// khyab gdal snying rje'i ngo bo ni// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs nyid de// mthing nag ya yi 'phro 'du las// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs bskul zhing// mthing nag be con nyid du gsal// 'od zer

sna lnga'i 'phro 'du las// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis chags// e yaM khaM sUM raM ke b+h+ruM// dur khrod rol pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yi dwags kiM thod lang long 'phyo// rtsibs bzhi lte dbus e yi gnas// bar

khyams sgo bzhi rab tu gsal// e tsakra maN+Dal// mthing nag e yi pho brang du// mi ro rta ro'i gdan stengs su// bcu pa sku yi bskyed sngags kyis// gshin rje gshed nyid 'bar ba'i sku// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka
hUM// stag zil chu nag rlab 'dra ba'i// mthing nag gru gsum srid rtser 'bar// thod skam nyi zla rab gsal ba'i// sbrul nag thod kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan dkyus shin tu ring ba ni// g.yon gsum thugs
rjes thur du gzigs// ngan song sdug bsngal phyags mas 'debs// g.yas gsum sdang mig zhe la gnon// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'dar// dbus gsum mtha' 'das mi g.yo'i spyan// gzigs
pa med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs// spyan mig dmar ser shin tu lci// 'bras bu mthing nag 'dril la 'tsher// smin ma glog 'gyus stong khams gsal// rdzi ma lcags kyu shin tu 'khrugs// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs
stong gsum 'gengs// shangs nas rlung 'tshubs rdo rjer 'phro// zhal gdangs gru gsum hom khung dbyibs// tshems kyis skye shi rtsad gcod pa// mche ba bcu gnyis dkar la 'tsher// zur gsum ri rab phur bus
bsnol// ljags kyis dug gsum ril mid mdzad// ag tshom me stag dmar pos mdzes// bcu bdun gdug pa'i gsung sgra yis// stong gsum sprul pas 'gengs pa'o// phyag drug 'bar ba'i g.yas dang

po// be con 'phyar zhing nam mkhar gdengs// g.yas par g.yas kyi tha ma na// ral gri lcags kyu rab bsnams pa// g.yon gyi dang po b+han dmar rngub// bar ma de bzhin sdigs mdzub bsgreng// tha mas sa gzhi

rab mnan nas// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'o// ba spu rtsang phur gshibs pa las// me stag thu lum rab tu 'khrugs// stobs dang byA g+h+ra car ma dang// tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhin na bzar bklubs// ru d+hi
rak+ta thal bas mtshan// gdug sbrul rigs bzhis yan lag dkris// rnam drang thod rlon 'bar bas kyang// se ral kha ru brgyan pa'o// zhabs ni na rag dmyal khams gzir// me dpung gdug pa'i klong dkyil
na// rngam brjid stobs kyis gnas par bsam// sbyor sgrol yum gyi sku bskyed pa// kun gzhi dbyings kyi ngo bo ni// khro mchog nyid kyi g.yas g.yon du// dmar smug ma gnyis spro bsdus pas// sbyor

sgrol yum mchog khros pa'i sku// ro langs g.yon nas 'khril shing sbyor// dmar chen gtso bo'i zhal du stob// sgrol byed mthing nag g.yas phyogs nas// tsit+ta kha T+wAM phyag na bsnams// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang

mthun// me dpung klong na de bzhin gshegs// ma bai tA li rak+sha man hUM b+h+yo// ma e ka dza Ti trag sha b+h+yo// de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka nas// 'od zer sna lnga'i spro bsdu yis// mthing dmar gnyis ka 'od du

'bar// spro bsdus dbyug to thod rlon gsal// dbyug to 'od kyi khyad par las// bdud pa sku yi bskyed sngags kyis// g.yas phyogs zla gam rak+ta'i dkyil// keng rus gram bu'i gdan steng du// yak+sha dz+wa la zhe
sdang sku// sngo nag sku gcig dbu gsum brjid// dbu g.yas seng chen kha gsal dang// dbu g.yon phag rgod rngam tshul can// dbus ma srin po'i mche gtsigs can// dbu skra ral pa dmar nag la// rgyu skar

tshogs kyi thod gdengs can// spyan gsum smin ma me 'bar zhing// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po 'byin// shangs nas nad 'thul sprin du 'khrugs// zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche gtsigs shing// ba spu kha T+wAM rtse

mo las// thog ser thu lum 'khrugs pa'o// phyag g.yas dbyug to phyar zhing brdeg/ phyag g.yon khrag mtsho 'khrug cing rngub// brkyang bskum zhabs bgrad 'chi bdag gzugs// sbrul gdug ko rlon tshogs rnams

dang// thal ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan pa'o// A+oM yak+sha dz+wa la ni hUM/ thod rlon 'od kyi khyad par las// bdun pa'i sku yi bskyed sngags kyis// g.yon phyogs zlu gam rak+ta'i dkyil// keng thod yi dwags gdan steng

du// klu mo rdo rje glog 'gyu ma// dmar nag sku gcig dbu gnyis brjid// dbu gcig ban glang 'brug sgra 'don// dbu gcig chu srin sgra yang 'byin// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// sdom sdig chu srin char
du 'bebs// ba spu thog 'bebs me 'bar zhing// kha rlangs yams nad sprin du 'khrigs// phyag g.yas sbrul zhags nag po bsnam// phyag g.yon khrag zor mdang 'phen zhing// mdze shug yan pa'i stong slag

la// sbrul nag brjid pa'i go zu can// tha ma nya phran cha gas mdzes// ba su rigs brgyad 'khor du sdud// klu phran tshogs dang bcas pa bskyed// A+oM nA ga ser rak+mo hUM/ de nas gtso bo'i g.yas phyogs nas// klu
srin gdug pa lcam dral gyis// 'dod chags skad ngan ki kang sgrub// yid g.yos chags pa'i gzer mda' yis// snang srid srog mdangs kun phrogs nas// slar 'dus 'bru brgyad 'od du 'bar// ma tsa du+u ra a
yan sha/ nub phyogs bar khyams khrag mtsho la// dmar ljang ma yi 'phro 'du las// 'bru lnga phung byed bskyed sngags kyis// ljang sngon drag po khros pa'i sku// kha gdangs mche gtsigs mig bgrad

cing// sna 'bud rna krongs ral pa gzings// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na lcags sgrog dmar po can// thog ser gri thabs gtong ba'i bdag/ ma rak+mo baM hUM/ shar lho bar khyams khrag mtsho la/
dkar ser tsa yi phro 'du las// drang srong dkar ser khros pa'i sku// kha gdangs mche gtsigs mig bgrad cing// sna 'bud rna krongs ral chen gzings// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na tri shUl
g.yab nag 'dor// thog ser yams nad gtong ba'i bdag/ tsa ba de pe le hUM/ bar khyams byang phyogs khrag mtsho la// mthing nag du yi 'phro 'du la// bdud po rog ti mthing nag sku// kha bgrad mche gtsigs
de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na bdud zhags nag po thogs// thog ser yams nad gtong ba'i bdag/ gyad tshul stabs kyis gnas pa'o// du ram mi ki hUM/ bar khyams lho nub

khrag mtsho la// dmar nag ra yi 'phro 'du las// srin po byi tri khros pa'i sku// kha bgrad mche gtsigs de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na ur mo gri chen gdengs// nad dang 'khrug

pa thog ser bdag/ phya rang gzugs chen 'gyings shing gnas// rag+sha tri a hUM// bar khyams shar phyogs khrag mtsho la// dung ka a yi 'phro 'du las// phung byed dmu bdud brjid pa'i sku// kha bgrad mche
gtsigs de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na stag chen mi mgo thogs// dmu rngo thog ser yams kyi bdag/ rang las btsan thabs byed pa'o// a trir ma tra ma hUM/ bar khyams nub byang

khrag mtsho la// sngo nag ya yi 'phro 'du las// gsod byed mjug rings khros pa'i sku// kha bgrad mche gtsigs de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na thod dbyug 'phyar zhing brdeg/ skye
'gro'i tshe srog thog ser bdag/ brda' mi 'phrod pa'i btsan thabs can// rol pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa'o// ya ma sa na yam hUM// bar khyams lho phyogs khrag mtsho la// ser nag na yi 'phro 'du las// khyab
'jug ser nag brjid pa'i sku// de bzhin kha bgrad mche gtsigs nas// g.yas na chu srin gdug pa phyar// g.yon na sbrul nag sum sgril sdog/ thog dang ser ba sa g.yos dang// drag shul stobs kyis gnas
pa'o// na ga ri hUM/ bar khyams byang shar khrag mtsho la// dkar dmar sha yi 'phro 'du las// mi bsgrungs sgra gcan khros pa'i sku// kha gdangs mche gtsigs mig bgrad cing// sna 'bud rna krongs ral pa
gzings// g.yas na chu srin gdug pa phyar// g.yon na khram shing rdo rje can// thog ser 'thib gri'i las mkhan pa// rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa'o// sha i san tri hUM/ phung byed chen po 'di
rnams ni// re re bskul kyang dgu dpung che// phung las sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// gza' bdud rgyu skar thabs kyis rol// phan gnod las la brtson pa'o// ki kang rol pa sde brgyad dpon// thog ser yams
nad sna tshogs dang// sa g.yos 'khrug pa 'byung lnga'i bdud// kun tu khyab cing kun la 'jug/ srid gsum sgrol ba'i las mkhan de// sngags pas gsal bsgom drag bskul nas// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo'i gdan
stengs su// ma tsa sha yi 'od 'phros pas// 'byung bzhi skye dgu'i srog bsdus nas// ser nag ma yi ngo bo las// bdun pa sku yi bskyed sngags kyis// stag srin ser nag stag gi mgo/ ral dmar gser gyi zor
bas brgyan// stag lpags rlaun pa'i ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po sgrogs// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong// zhal gdangs glog 'gyu ljags las
kyang// khrag chen ser ba drag tu 'bebs// ngan skyugs pho log sbos nad gtong// kha rlangs sprin las thog ser 'bebs// thugs las ltas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na bse phur 'dril zhing

'debs// g.yon na khrag zor dal kha 'bebs// chibs su sreg byed nyi ma chibs// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na'o// rag mo tsit+ta sha la ma b+h+yo// smug nag ra yi ngo bo las// bdun pa rgyu yi bskyed

sngags kyis// bam srin smug nag dred mgo ma// ral nag lcags kyi khro chu 'dzag/ dred kyi g.yang gzhi ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'bru sgra drag po 'byin// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud
lo nyes gtong// zhal gdangs glog 'gyu ljags las kyang// gnam lcags ser ba drag tu 'bebs// ngan skyugs glang sna'i nad gtong zhing// kha rlangs sprin las lcags thog 'bebs// thugs las ltas ngan

sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na gnam lcags s+t+wa chen 'phyar// g.yon na gdug pa'i sbrul zhags thogs// rol pa'i stabs kyis zla ba chibs// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i steng na'o// ram mo ru ru kha rag b+h+yo// dmar nag
tsa yi 'phro 'du las// bdun pa sku yi bskyed sngags kyi// kong srin dmar nag glang mgo ma// ral dmar khrag gi gru char 'bebs// ban glang g.yang gzhi ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po

'byin// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong// zhal gdangs glog 'gyu ljags las kyang// khar thog thu lum drag tu 'khrug/ ngan skyugs khrag nad gzer ba gtong// kha rlangs
sprin las btsa' mug gtong// thugs las ltas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na zangs gri dmar po thogs// g.yon na glog zhags bsdog cing 'phen// klu rgyal sdig pa chibs su chibs// nub

phyogs 'khor lo'i steng na'o// rag+mo tsa mu sha ma b+h+yo// ljang nag sha yi ngo bo las// bdun pa sku yi bskyed sngags kyis// 'brog srin ljang nag chu srin mgo/ ral nag lcags kyi char 'bebs shing// chu srin g.yang
gzhi ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po 'byin// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong// zhal gdangs glog 'gyu ljags las kyang// lcags thog thu lum drag tu
'bebs// ngan skyugs lhog rgal gag pa gtong// kha rlangs sprin las yams nad gtong// thugs las ltas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na rdo rje be con phyar// g.yon na 'ja' zhags bsngog cing 'phen// phyag
rgyal rmig pa chibs su bcibs// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i steng na'o// rag+mo shig kha rag lam b+h+yo// kun kyang srin mo'i cha lugs can// srid gsum sems can srog la za// 'jig rten phung ba'i ki kang
'bebs// srid pa dkrugs pa'i las mkhan ma// rnal 'byaur sems dpa'i stobs kyis bskul// sems can phal gyis ma yin no// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed rgyal po ki

kang rag+sha'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ bshan pa rag+sha sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya tha ma dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas
dkon mchog gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'ga' byed log sred cham la dbab pa'i phyir// shan pa gtso 'khor bskul ba'i las bshad pa// hUM// 'jam dpal lha mchog ya man+ta ka ni// gru gsum mthing nag e yi pho

brang du// rta ro gcal bkram mi ro'i khri steng na// ri rab brjid pa'i sku mchog rab bzhengs pa// 'phags pa ya mAn gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// stang zil chu nag rlabs ltar gnag la 'tsher// ral pa mthing nag
dbus su thor tshugs bcings// thod skam sbrul gdug nyi zla'i thod kyis brgyan// mi bzad spyan dgu shin tu 'bar ba ni// g.yon gsum thugs rjes thur du gzigs pa yis// ngan song sdug bsngal thar lam
gnas su 'dren// g.yas gsum sdang mig dmar po bzlog pa yis// khro gtum btsan drag phyogs med zil gyis gnon// dbus gsum mtha' bral mi gzigs gzigs tshul gyis// rtag tshang mtha' 'das chos

sku sa la ba// spyan sprin dma' ser 'bras bu mthing nag 'dril// smin mtshams glog 'gyu stong khams 'od gsal byed// rdzi ma lcags kyu shin tu 'khrugs shing 'bar// gsan pa ma 'gags snyan 'brug sgra 'byin
cing// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung tshubs mthing nag 'byin// zhal gsum hom khung gdangs pa'i zhal nas ni// mche ba phur bu bsnol ba'i tshems gtsigs pas// rU tra la sogs log lta zad par
sgrol// ljags ni hom gzar dug gsum ril mid mdzad// bcu bdun hUM sgras stong khams dregs pa 'dul// ag tshom me 'bar gdug pa'i me stag 'phro// 'jigs byed drug gi g.yas kyi dang po na// be con

phyar zhing nam mkhar rab tu gdengs// g.yas pa ral gris skye shi rtsad nas gcod// tha ma lcags kyus log sred tsit+ta 'dren// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+d+ha rak+ta rngub// bar bas sdigs mdzub rtse la me chen

'khrug/ g.yon gyi tha mas 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// ba spu rtsang phur gshibs pa'i rtse mo las// me stag thu lum thog ser rab tu 'khrug/ ko rlon tshogs dang khrag zhags thal bas mtshan// ba su rigs bzhi thod

rlon rgyan gyis brgyan// zhabs bgrad gyad tshul na rag dmyal khams gzir// me dpung klong na rngom brjid stabs kyis bzhugs// thams cad ma lus khro rgyal khyod kyi sku// de 'drar bdag bsgom bdag gis rang

bor nas// khyed kyi sku ru 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs// bdag la gnod byed dgra dang bgegs kyi tshogs// thul cig choms shig lnga phung rdul du rlog/ hUM/ kun gzhi rnam dag dbyings kyi ngo bo ni// g.yon nas

khro mchog sbyor ba'i yam chen mo// bai tA rak+sha mi bzad khros pa'i sku// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso bo yab dang mthun// ri rab chen po khong pa'i khong bdag mo// kham nag ral pa nam mkha'i thor tshugs te// ri rab

mchog gi thod gdengs brjid bag can// spyi bo'i gtsug nas sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// skra mtshams sprul pas stong khams khyab par byed// dpral ba'i dbyings su 'brug sgra drag po sgrogs// smin mtshams glog
'gyus stong khams gdug pa bsreg/ spyan nas mchi ma rak+ta'i gru char 'bebs// shangs nas bu yug rdzi 'bud thog ser 'bebs// zhal nas nad rlangs log sred tshogs la 'bud// thugs kyi dkyil nas thog

mda'i char chen 'bebs// g.yas pa'i phyag gis gtsor 'khyud 'khril zhing sbyor// g.yon pas thod khrag 'jigs byed zhal du stob// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gtso la 'khril sbyor bai tA
ro langs ma// mnyam nyid sun 'byin dkon mchog smad pa dang// bstan pa 'jig byed log sred dam nyams 'di// choms shig rdungs shig ma thogs myur du sgrol// hUM/ g.yas nas yum bskyed dza ti ral gcig
ma// sku mdog mthing nag g.yu yi ral pa can// bdud kyi bu mo nga rgyal drag shul che// 'jig rten khyab gnas mtshan mo mun la rgyu// me yi bskal pas gshin rje las la 'khol// khrag gi skyugs 'thor myos
mdzad dbang du sdud// skye 'gro'i tshe srog dbang byed dbugs la mos// kun gyi dbang po sdud cing nyams pa len// 'dom gang tsam nas snying 'byin las mkhan ma// g.yas kyi phyag na zhing chen tsit+ta
'byin// g.yon pas spu gris dam nyams srog gcod ma// rol pa'i stabs kyis drag shul tsan thabs can// srog gcod brtson pa'i las mkhan 'khor dang bcas// log sred tsit+ta phyung zhig srog rtsa dmar nas

drongs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// srin po yak+sha dz+wa la 'bar ba ni// nga rgyal phrag dog zhe sdang tshul 'chang ba'i// srog bdag sku gcig dbu gsum rnam par rol// dbu gcig mche gtsigs

srin po nga cho can// dbu gcig sang chen gtum pa'i 'brug sgra sgrogs// dbu gcig g.yag rgod ha la rngam tshul can// gdug byed ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// rgyu skar 'bum gyi tshoms bu 'khrug cing
'bar// sdang mi bzlog cing smin ma me ltar 'bar// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs khams gsum 'thibs kyis mnan// shangs nas dud 'thul gru gsum zhal gdangs shing// ljags 'dril tshems gcig rgyu drug ril

mid mdzad// ba spu kha T+wAM 'khrug pa'i rtse mo las// thog ser bu yug tri shUl char du 'bebs// phyag g.yas tir dbyug nam mkhar gdengs pa yis// zhe sdang srin po 'jig rten lam las sgrol// phyag g.yon khrag

mtsho 'khrug cing zhal du gsol// 'dod chags khrag mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// yum chen klu mo rdo rje yak+sha mo// 'dod chags gti mug 'dul ba'i khyad par ni// sku mdog dmar nag dbu gnyis brjid

pa ste// dbu gcig ban glang 'jigs byed phaT sgra can// dbu gcig chu srin dmar 'tsher lhang lhang 'don// rgyan dang cha lugs mi bsgrungs yab dang mthun// phung byed klu rgyal kun gyi yang phyi mo// tsi tsi dz+wa la'i

nad kyi bdag mo ste// 'jigs byed ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// sdom dang sdig pa mi bsgrubs char chen 'bebs// rdo rje lce 'bebs thog gi bu yug can// kha rlangs sprin phung 'khrigs pa'i byin brlabs
las// klu nad bsam yas gtong zhing phung byed ma// g.yas pas sbrul zhags dam nyams kun 'ching zhing// phyag g.yon rgya mtsho 'khrug cing nad gtong ma// thugs dam dus la bab po sa ma ya// klu thun sna
tshogs dam nyams dgra la ya// 'dod chags zhe sdang rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi dge bcu 'dus dug lnga'i don sras po// lus po gcig la mi mthun mgo dgu skyes// mi mthun mgo dgu rtsa gcig du ma
'khril// mi mthun mgo dgus sbyor ba kun gtong ba// srog dang ser ba mi mthun las dgur ston// mgo gcig srin po bi tri pa tra'i mgo/ srin po'i ki kang drag po'i ser chen 'bebs// mgo gcig phung byed
srin po rA hu la// skyin thang kyang 'dang ki kang thog ser drag tu 'bebs// mgo gcig 'jigs byed gza' bdud sgra gcan 'dzin// srog gcod gtibs gri ki kang drag tu 'bebs// mgo gcig
du ba mjug rings chen po ste// 'jigs byed kun sgrol gtan phung ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig khyab 'jug chen po sprul pa'i sku// lha srin gdug pa kun gyi ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig dmu bdud byiSh+Nu rA dza
ste// glo bur 'khrug pa'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// mgo gcig bdud po tsa ra ka yi mgo/ drag po las kyi ki kang hur thum 'bebs// mgo gcig 'jigs byed ljang sngon dmag dpon te// thog ser gri thabs sna
tshogs ki kang 'bebs// rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs te// sa g.yos sad ser btsa' dang mu ge dang// phung byed nad ngan sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// bka' las 'das pa'i log lta dam sri la// ki
kang sna tshogs dbab pa'i dus la bab// ral pa dmar po sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// 'jigs byed phung byed gza' bdud char du 'bebs// sku mdog dud ka ba spu'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje'i lca 'bebs

ser chen 'od kyi bdag/ mgo lus mig mangs khams gsum bya ra mkhan// smin ma glog 'gyu bar snang 'od kyis 'gengs// sna nas bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rlangs 'thul// gdug pa'i kha rlangs bar snang sprin du
'khrigs// sen mo lcags kyu g.yas na chu srin phyar// 'dzin shes gtong mi shes pa'i zhags chen gyis// log sred kun 'dul dam nyams 'dzin par byed// bka' las 'da' byed dam nyams smod pa la// srog

la chan thob lo la ser ba phob// glo bur ye 'drog dam sri'i snying la ya// shar phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng du// sring gcig chen mo stag srin zor ba gdong// bka' las mi 'da' 'bar ba bzhad mo
che// ral dmar spyi bcings gser gyi zor bas brgyan// sku la stag lpags g.yang gzi go zu gsol// snyan nas 'brug sgra spyan nas khrag 'dzag cing// shangs nas rdzi 'bud btsa' 'thibs lo nyes
gtong// ljags nas glog 'gyu mun pa'i go skabs 'byed// zhal gdangs khrag chen ser ba drag tu 'bebs// khrag zhag ngan skyugs pho log sbos nad gtong// kha rlangs sprin 'khrug gser gyi thog 'bebs

ma// thugs las ltas ngan sna tshogs sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na zor phur 'dril zhing snying la 'debs// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po dgra la 'phen// khyed kyi chibs su sreg byed nyi ma chibs// bstan pa 'jig
byed dam nyams dgra bo la// pho log ki kang dus 'dir myur du phob// lho phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng du// sring gcig chen mo bam srin drang mo gdong// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba bzhad mo
che// lcags kyi ral nag khro chu'i tho lum 'phro// sku la dred lpags g.yang gzhi ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs spyan nas khrag 'dzag cing// shangs nas rdzi 'bud btsa' 'thibs lo nyes
gtong// kha rlangs sprin las lcags kyi thog 'bebs ma// ljags las glog 'gyu mun pa'i go skabs med// zhal gdangs khrag chen ser ba drag tu 'bebs// khrag zhag ngan skyugs glang sna'i nad gtong
ma// thugs las ltas ngan sna tshogs sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas nas gnam lcags dgra s+t+wa 'phyar zhing brdeg/ g.yon na sbrul zhags gdug pas dam nyams 'ching// khyed kyi chibs su bsil byed zla ba

chibs// lce ring nad gtong spyugs pa'i glu dbyangs mkhan// bstan pa 'jigs pa'i log sred 'byung po la// glang sna'i ki kang dus 'dir myur du phob// nub phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng nas// sring
gcig chen mo kong srin ban glang gdong// sku mdog dmar nag 'od 'bar bzhad mo che// zangs kyi ral chen thu lum rab tu 'phro// sku la ban glang g.yang bzhi na bza' mnabs// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs spyan
nas rak+ta 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud btsa' 'thibs lo nyes gtong// ljags nas glog 'gyu bar snang 'od kyis 'gangs// zhal gdangs khrag gi bu yug rab tu 'thor// khrag zhags ngan skyugs khrag nad sna
tshogs zer// kha rlangs sprin phung zangs kyi thog 'bebs ma// thugs las sprul pa'i ltas ngan dgra la gtong// g.yas na zangs gri dmar pos srog rtsa gcod// g.yon pas glog zhags dam nyams kun 'ching

ma// khyed kyi chibs su klu rgyal sdig pa bcibs// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams log sred la// khrag nad gzer ba dus 'dir myur du phob// byang phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng du// sring gcig chen

mo 'brog srin chu srin gdong// sku mdog ljang nag 'od 'bar bzhad mo che// lcags kyi ral chen tsha tsha rab tu 'khrug/ chu srin g.yang gzhi'i stod g.yogs ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs spyan nas khrag
chen 'thor// shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes 'khrug pa gtong// ljags nas glog 'gyu stong khams 'od kyis sreg/ zhal gdangs khrag gi char chen rab tu 'bebs// khrag zhag dug skyugs lhog rgal gag pa

gtong// kha rlangs sprin las rdo rje thog 'babs ma// thugs las ltas ngan sna tshogs sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na rdo rje be con 'phyar zhing brdeg/ g.yon na 'ja' zhags skye 'gro kun 'ching ma// khyed kyi chibs su
khro rgyal smig pa bcibs// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams 'byung po la// lhog rgal gag pa ma thogs myur du phob// kun kyang srin mi mi srun 'jig byed ma// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'brug gi sgra sgrogs
shing// bar snang khams nas glog 'gyu mthu mo che// ri rab rtse nas thog 'bebs drag shul can// 'dzam bu'i glingabazhi phung byed mkha' 'gro yang kha 'khor ma// 'jig rten khams su ki kang sna
tshogs 'bebs// dmigs kyi gnyer gtad log sred 'byung po 'di// btang snyoms yal ba med pa'i rtse gcig mthus// thul cig choms shig nad ngan sna tshogs phob// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo
brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdog/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ bshan pa pho mo srog bskul gyi le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya

dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// drag po gsang sngags rab bshad pa// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ khro mchog nyid kyi

gsang sngags so// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kro ta ya bi dza ya/ dz+wa li ir ni dz+wI hwa pra ta shwI raM sti hUM phaT/ lus bsrung go bgo ba'i gsang sngags yin no// A+oM badzra be tA laM rag+sha rag+sha ma swA hA/ ro langs khro ma'i gsang

sngags so// oM e ka dzA Ti dza/ trag rag+sha/ mu tra mu tra ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo/ e ka dza Ti'i gsang sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki phor pa/ du dun ma ga shi kri ha na dz+wa la ta mur dzi tsi ci yang ti kra ti dur yaM swA hA/ mgo

dgu spyi'i gsang sngags so// A+oM tsa ti pra ti kar ni rA hu la/ bi kran+ta hUM ta ka raM shar ma ta mA ra phaT/ las kyi bskul ba'i gsang sngags so// A+oM badzra yak+sha dz+wa la ni/ ka la pra tsa ra/ tsit+ta rak+ta mur nan swA hA/ srin po

gdug pa'i gsang sngags so// A+oM yak+sha rag+mo u tsASh+ma/ nA ga le dum pa le tsit+ta ku lu ru lu b+h+yo/ glog 'gyu ma'i gsang sngags so// ma rag mo/ pan yaM shig/ mA ra ya nr-i dza dza/ tsa bad tsa le/ pra be sha/ ma ra tri dza dza/

dur me mi ki rA hu la/ hur thum ma ra dza dza/ rag+sha tri a tsit+ta rbad/ mA ra ya nri dza dza// a tri raM raM du+u na shag/ mA ra ya a nr-i dza dza/ ma ma sa na yaM/ ra tsa ram shar/ mA ra ya nr-i dza dza/ nA ga ri shi hril shag/ badzra sad

dun/ ra ma hrIl mA ra ya nr-i dza dza/ shi i san tri yaM du/ rA hu la hril/ shag ra ma sha ra/ nr-i mA ra ya dza dza/ sde brgyad rol pa'i dgug sngags so// A+oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka/ pe tA li rag+sha e ka dza Ti/ snying kha rag/ su

badzra yag+sha man rag mo// nA ga dum pa le/ sha shu ma rag+to// tsa bad sa le/ dur ma mi ka rag+sha nr-i raM traM/ ya ma pan yaM/ nA ga ri shi sha in+t+ra/ rag+mo tsit+ta du du tsa sa mu sha kha/ rag lam b+h+yo// ma ma raM/ hril hril/ shar

shar/ ru tsa du tsa shu tri phrom dud kar phrom/ sa man+ta ka a ka ra/ du ru du ru phrom/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma du/ yug ti smin khrag du tsar/ shar shar/ hril hril/ ya ra ma hril b+h+yo/ rak+sha b+h+yo// nA rag
b+h+yo// gdug pa'i dril sngags drag po yin// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ shan pa srog
sngags kyi le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// phung byed rol pa'i
las bshad de// sde brgyad dregs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bka' thob bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis// dur khrod ro yi ngas blangs la// mdze can bsregs pa'i rus sol dang// bi Sha'i thal ba mdzo rtol dang// sbrul

dang sbal pa'i snying khrag dang// bi Sha'i 'dab ma'i sngo khu dang// skyer pa'i rtsa shun bkus pa la// pho rog sgro mar sgro smyug gis// mgo dgu rol pa'i gzugs bris la// kha bgrad gzugs chen dung ka chu srin
can// mgo lus mig gang mjug ma sbrul// sde brgyad dpon snar mkhas pas bri// bstod dang mchod pa kun rdzogs nas// kong tsher 'jug pa'i tshes grangs la// nub nas mkhas pas dgra nas kyang// gro ga'am
dur khrod ras chen la// khrag chen dag gis gang dmigs bri// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// gshed po khros pa'i skur bskyed de// srid pa'i ma mo kun mngag ste// gang dmigs rnam shes rlung 'dra
ba// rten la phab ste rab bcings nas// dkar dang dmar chen rdzas sbyar la// ljang sngon zhal du 'di skad bstab// ma mo rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dmag dpon chen po sku bzhengs shig/ chu srin gdug pa
zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed dgra bo 'di// sgrol ging dmag dpon chems gyis chems// ma mo'i tshogs kyi zhal du bstab// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// ma rag mo hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/

khri bzlas ljang sngon lag tu gtad// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// mgo dgu rol pa shar lhor dgram// nub byang mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// shar lho mtshams nas sku

bzhengs pa// drang srong chen po zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed dam nyams 'di// rA hu la yi zhal du bstab// dgra lha'i rgyal po'i lag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// tsa sang sa le rA hu
la hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas drang srong lag tu gtan// phung byed 'khor bcas rol par dmigs// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong rtse'i tshes grangs la// bdud po mgo dgu byang du
dgram// gang dmigs lho nas 'di skad bstab// byang nas phung byed sku bzhengs pa// bdud dpon khros pa zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed 'byung po 'di// tsa ra ka yi zhal du bstab// bdud po rol
pa'i phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// du raM mi ki tsa ra hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas phung byed lag tu gtad// bdud dpung 'khor bcas rol par bsam// bskal

par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// srin po mgo dgu'i lho nub dgram// byang shar mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// lho nub mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// srin po mgo dgu zhal gdangs

shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'byung po 'di// bi tri pa tra'i zhal du bstab// srin po'i tshogs kyi lag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// rak+sha tri a rbad hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas srin po'i
lag tu gtad// rak+sha tshogs kyis rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// dmu bdud mgo dgu shar du dgram// nub nas log sred 'di skad bstab// shar gyi
phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// dmu bdud mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'byung po 'di// ha li ka l-i'i zhal du bstab// dmu bdud tshogs kyi phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma

btang// a tri ram traM dun shan hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas dmu bdud lag tu gtad// ha li tshogs kyis rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// ya mAn
mgo dgu nub byang dgram// shar lho mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// nub byang mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// phung byed mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams 'di// du ba mjug ring zhal

du bstab// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// yams na ya ma ra tsa khri shi dun khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas gshin rje'i lag tu gtad// mjug ring khros pas rol par
bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// klu btsan mgo dgu lho ru dgram// byang nas log sred 'di skad bstab// lho yi phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// klu btsan mgo dgu

zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sred 'di// khyab 'jug chen po'i zhal du bstab// klu btsan dgra lha'i phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang// nA ga ri shi sa dun hab hub khram kha mA ra
ya/ khri bzlas klu btsan lag tu gtad// khyab 'jug chen pos rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// bgegs dpon mgo dgu byang shar dgram// sngags pas
gshed po'i tshul 'chang ba// dam rdzas ling+ga bcas pa dag/ lho nub mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// byang shar mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// bgegs dpon mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i
log sred 'di// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi zhal du bstab// bi nA ya ka'i phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang zhig/ sha i san tri yam du bya/ rA hu la hab hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas
bgegs chen lag tu gtad// sgra gcan 'dzin gyis rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de nas dkar dmar rdzas chen dang// gang dmigs rten du bcas pa de// phung byed sku la dril nas

kyang// ki kang drag po'i phyogs dag gam// khams la dgra dar phyogs su sba// de nas thun zor drag bskul na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur yang// myur du 'chi bar the tshom med// phung byed rgyal po 'dis rol
nas// gza' bdun rgyu skar 'dis rol na// rtag tu gdug pa'i sbyor ngan gyis// gang dmigs gtso 'khor rigs rgyud bcas// thang gcig yid kyis rlag par byed// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs
gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ gza' gtad drag po'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi
snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// gtan 'pho las kyi 'khor lo 'di// thog mar brtag pa'i gnas chen du// cho gar ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sde
brgyad rol pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dur khrod thal bas tshul bzhin bri// rdzas tshogs drug 'bum bzlas byas te// mtshan ma bzang ba mthong ba na// log sred pha mes thod pa'am// rabs chad mdze can thod pa
dang// gzed dang yugs mo'i thod pa la// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bya la// lces bsad bsregs pa'i rus sol dang// gser dang gnam lcags la sogs pa// brdar khu bi Shar bcas pa la// 'bum bdun

pad+ma rak+tar sbyar// khA kha rig byed sgro rtsa yis// pho thod gong ma dag la ni// rim bzhin zlum por kun tu bskor// gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad dag tu bkod// gsum pa bcu gnyis 'khor bar bya// de nas drag po'i

sngags gzhan la// phung byed pho yi sngags dgod de// lte dbus ya dkyil bsgrub bya zhing// de mtha' yak+sha'i sngags kyis bskor// gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad steng du yang// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad ji lta
bar// gdug pa'i yi ge 'bru brgyad dgod// rtsibs mchan bsgrub bya'i ming rus yul// tshang bar sngags pas bri bar bya// gsum pa bcu gnyis dag la yang// phyogs bzhi gdug pa'i gsang sngags de// khyim
