gsum bzhi po tshang bar dgod// rtsibs mchan bcu gnyis dag la yang// mtshams bzhi gdug pa'i gsang sngags te// gong gsum grong gsum kyang mtshon bzhi tshang bar dgod// 'bru thad rim pas legs par
bri// tha ma bcu bdun sngags kyis bskor// de mthar phyag zhabs yang dag bri// skye shi bzhi yang srog la gtan 'pho ba'i// khrus mkhan pho yi 'khor lo yin// mo thod dag la 'di lta ste// rim pa gong
dang 'dra ba la// gnyis pa rtsibs bzhi legs par bri// de nas bdun pa'i mo sngags ni// lte dbus ya dkyil bsgrub bya bri// de mtha' glog 'gyu'i sngags kyis bskor// gnyis pa'i rtsibs stengs 'bru bzhi
bzhag/ rtsibs mchan bsgrub bya'i ming rus yul// legs par b+h+yo yi bar du bris// gsum par phung byed ma bzhi'i sngags// tshul bzhin 'khor bar dgod par bya// bzhi pa rol pa'i gsang sngags dang// ral
gcig ma yi sngags kyis bskor// zhal dang phyag zhabs de bzhin bri// phung byed ma yi 'khor lo yin// rnam gnyis 'khor lo de bzhin dang// 'ug pa'i sgo nga'i mar gyis byug/ de ltar bri ba'i 'khor lo

de// mo thod gan rkyal ri gsum rtse// pho thod kha sbub kha sbyar la// nang du dkar dmar rdzas la sogs// gser sgong rnams kyis rab tu dgang// de nas phung byed sngags kyis brab// dus la bab na dmigs rten

sgrol// thun dbab mtshon gdab mtshon gyis bshig/ kha brgyad sbyin sreg las la bya// sol thal rten du byas pa dag/ snying shun brub la khar bcu gnas// sbrul gyis kha bcing 'khor lor gzhug/ de nyid shun la

gril nas kyang// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// sngags pas yul gyi dbyings su sba// thab zor sngags kyis rab bskul nas// srid pa lto zlog khrus kyis dbyung// grong khyer pu shu'i rtsar sbas nas// sngags

zer thun gyis rab bskul na// lce 'bab grong khyer ra bcu 'jig/ de bzhin ri mtho rtser sbas nas// steng du tho ba rtsig thun bskul na// dmigs rten yul phyung 'khrug pas phung// dur khrod dkyil du sbas byas

nas// bi Sha'i thun gyis rab bskul na// mdze skran dmu cha yams su 'byung// lce dbab sad ser smos ci dgos// dre'u dang mdzo yi thod pa yi// bar du 'khor lo de bcug nas// lo gshed zla dang tshes grangs

dang// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// log sred dur gyi byings su sba// de nas sngags thun zor bskul na// 'gal byed gtso bor bcas pa ste// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur yang// 'di tsam thang gcig yud

kyis rlag/ gtso 'khor bcas pa rtsad chod de// gtan 'pho rmig med the tshom med// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo// snying gzer drag po'i rgyud
chen po las/ bshan pa 'khor lo nag po'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham
la dbab pa'i phyir// ki kang phur pa'i las bshad pa// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po yis// phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas// sde brgyad rol pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// thig gis yul bcad ji

bzhin du// ro bsregs thal chen sol phye dang// rak+ta skyer shun skam phye dang// bi Sha'i 'dab skams phye ma yis// e dang 'khor lo mgo dpung bcas// sgo bzhi mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mkhas pas kha dog

gsal bar dbri// phyi rol e rgyar mda' tshad pa'o// nang du dmigs rten tsa ra gdags// de nas drag po'i phur pa yi// rgyu dang dbyibs tshad byin rlab dang// dgod dang sgrub pa'i khyad par bstan// de la rgyu yi

bye brag ni// lcags sna lnga dang mchog chen rkang// mdzo mo'i shing dang shwa na'i rkang// shir shing phag rgod mche ba dang// glang shing glang chen mche ba dang// skyer shing ma he'i rwa rtse dang// seng ldeng smug po la sogs

yang// phur pa'i dbyibs ni ri rab rtse// rtsa ba mgo la co to rtse// rgya mdud gnyis pa logs brgyad mdzes// rtse mo zur gsum dpal dang ldan// lcags sna'i phur pa dag la ni// mkhas pas sor tshed bcu drug

pa'o// mchog chen rkang la bcu gnyis tshad// mdzo mo la sogs brgyad po ni// sor brgyad tshad du shes par bya// seng ldeng las byas sor bzhi'i tshad// de ltar tshad ldan rdzas mchog de// mkhas pas byin gyis
brlab bya ba// stong nyid ngang las skur bzhengs pa// rnal 'byor gshed po'i thugs ka nas// ya bzhi 'od 'phros slar 'dus pas// lag mthil g.yas g.yon mthe bor gnyis// ya ma rA tsa yab yum dang// sku

srin pho mo'i skur gsal ba'o// ya ma ra tsa sa do me ya/ ma ma e ka dza Ti sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ yak+sha dz+wa la ni/ snying khrag yag mo nA ga le/ sa ma ya ha// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thal mo lan gsum drag brdabs

pas// 'od zer spro bsdus 'bru brgyad las// g.yas mdzub gung mo srin lag dang// mthe'u chung de bzhin mdzub mo dang// gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams// bi tri pa tra rA hu la// sgra gcan mjug rings yab

'jug dang// biSh+tu ra tsa tsa ra ka/ ljang sngon la sogs rim bzhin te// de nas 'bru bzhi 'od 'phros pas// mtheb snying g.yas g.yon dag dang ni// de bzhin mdzub snying g.yas g.yon la// stag srin bam srin

kong srin dang// 'brog srin la sogs rim bzhin bsgom// de nas phan tshun dam bsnol ba'i// bar du phur pa de bcug nas// rting pas dril shing sngags 'di bzlas// A+oM kA ya shrI ma hA badzra dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na

A+oM/ de nas thal sbyar rtse sprad pa'i// bar du phar tshogs de bcug nas// dril tshul bstan cing sngags 'di bzlas// hriHbAg bu mur ba A/ de nas thal sbyar dam bsnol nas// gung mo bsgrengs te rtse sprad
pa'i// bar du phur bcug sngags 'di bzlas// hUM tsit+ta badzra s+t+wa hUM/ gru gsum 'od kyi spro bsdu dang// dregs pa pho mo'i 'od zer gyis// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// 'khrul rtog log

lta kun bsregs nas// phur pa gtso 'khor skur gsal byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan par brlab// de nas byug bdug drag tu dril// sngags 'dis srid gsum sgrol bar bskul// oM badzra kro ta rog ti yak+sha kI

li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ phung byed sgrol bdag pho mo de// sngags pas 'di skad dgod par bya// hUM/ srid gsum sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yum mchog mkha' dkyil e klong du// 'jigs byed
sku mchog dregs pa 'dul// byad tshul stabs kyis bzhugs su gsol// phung byed yab sras lcam dang bral// rtsibs rgyad mgo dpung yan lag dang// sgo bzhi keng rag gdan stengs su// rngams shing tshub pas

bzhugs su gsol// bskyed pa rtsa ba'i sngags mjug la// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes brjod/ e dang de bdun rtsibs brgyad dang// sgo bzhi keng rag gdan stengs su// mi mthun rdzas phur bcu bzhi dgod// dus
gsum dkar nag dud pas bdug/ thun rdzas mchod pa rim pas bzhag/ sgrub dang khyad par drag po'i las// bsgrub pa skyed chog bzlas pa ni// sngags bsnyen 'og tu 'bum bzlas nas// sde brgyad kun la
dpang btsugs shing// tha tshig can rnams drag mngags nas// grub pa'i rtags rnams yid brtan 'byung// de nas khyad par drag po'i las// ki kang rgyu ba'i dus dag la// mda' tshad e brgyad gang yin

par// log par blta ba'i 'byung po de// kha sbub gan rkyal gang yang rung// snying gi thad kar ming rus brgyad// mgo dpung yan lag gnas brgyad du// sde brgyad rol pa'i thun brgyad dbab// de nas drag po'i

phur pas brdeg/ lcags phur rlangs la 'di skad gdang// hUM mkha' klong e yi pho brang nas// khro mchog rgyal po sku bzhengs te// sku stod gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// sku smad zur gsum kI la ya// srog gshed khros

pa'i dpal dang ldan// lte ba'i dkyil du kI la ya// A+oM many+dzu shrI a kro te ka ya mAt+ta ka a mu kaM dza kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+ha nAn che ge mo mA ra ya/ oM be tA li rag+sha kro d+hI shwa ra'i u tsuSh+ma/ snying kha rag e ka dza Ti ma ma

trag sha b+h+ya// kI li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ hUM/ khrag mtsho rus khi'i gdan steng nas// srin po me 'bar khros pa'i sku// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// srog rtsa bcad pa'i dus la bab// A+oM yak+sha dz+wa

la ni snying khrag tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ rag+sha yag+sha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ yag mo nA ga le snying dun ti tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn mA ra ya phaT/ hUM/ nub kyi phyogs nas sku
bzhengs pa// sku stod ljang sngon dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// dpung pa g.yon la kI la ya// dgug sngags dang po'i mjug tu yang// gdab sngags 'di bzlas gsal

bsgom brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT// hUM// shar lho mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod drang srong dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// lag pa g.yas la kI la

ya// gug sngags gnyis pa'i mjug tu yang// gdab sngags 'di zlas myur du brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn che ge mo la A be po sha na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM/ byang gi phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod bdud

po dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// gsang ba'i gnas su kI la ya// gsum pa sngags mjug 'di bzlas brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn che ge mo ku ru she mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM/ lho nub

mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod bi tri dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// klad pa'i dkyil du kI la ya// bzhi pa'i sngags mjug 'di bzlas brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn che ge mo sa

d+han d+ha sha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM/ shar gyi phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod ha ling dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// gzhang dang rkub tu kI la ya// dgug sngags lnga mjug 'di bzlas

brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo hab hub kha rag mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM/ nub byang mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod ya ma dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dbal dang ldan// lag pa g.yon la

kI la ya// drug pa'i sngags mjug 'di bzlas brdeg/ kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo khu ru ru pe sha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM/ lho yi phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// sku stod khyab 'jug dbu dpung che// sku smad zur

gsum dpal dang ldan// dpung pa g.yas la kI la ya// bdun pa'i sngags mjug 'di bzlas brdeg/ kI la kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo kha lo shan rak+ta mA ra ya hUM/ hUM/ byang shar mtshams nas sku bzhengs
pa// sku stod sgra gcan dbu dpung che// sku smad zur gsum dpal dang ldan// snying gi dkyil du kI la ya// dgug sngags mtha' ma'i mjug dag la// gdab sngags 'di bzlas gsal bsgom brdeg/ kI li kI la

ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo bi ta bal su mA ra ya hUM phaT// shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig stag srin phung byed ma// lo tog nad kyi mnga' bdag mo// long rtsa g.yas la kI la ya// ma rag+mo

tsit+ta sha la thib/ tsa dun ha ra la b+h+yo// kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+hA nAn che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig bam srin dred mo'i gdong// glang sna nad kyi mnga' bdag

mo// a so li ka g.yas la ya// rag+mo ru ru kha rag hed tsit+ta ma ma b+h+yo// kI la kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig kong srin ban

glang gdong// khrag nad gzer ba'i mnga' bdag mo// a so li ka g.yon la ya/ rag mo tsab sham kha thums tsa ra na b+h+yo/ kI la kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil

yangs nas// sring gcig 'brog srin chu srin gdong// lhog rgal gag pa'i mnga' bdag mo// long rtsa g.yon la kI la ya// rag mo shig shig kha rag lam/ bal phyur du ya ma b+h+yo// kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+hA nAn

che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gdab tshul bstan pa tsam gyis kyang// srid pa gsum yang skad ngan 'don// dmigs rten gang bcas smre sngags 'don// sdug bsngal mi bzod ya re cha// bub 'gyel brgyal te 'dug pa
la// phur pas gnas rnams thal phyung la// dbang po bla rten bag bzhi nyams// bkrag dang gzi mdangs phur pas bsdus// rog ti nag po 'khor bcas kyis// dbang po gnas yul bcas pa dang// sha dang
rus pa pags pa sogs// rngams shing bcad de btog cing za// srog gshed pho mos srog gcod cing// srin po pho mo'i sprul pa rnams// la la yis ni dbugs ma rngub// las la yis ni khrag la 'jib// la las

srog pa rtsa nas 'dren// la las klad khrag dkrug cing 'thung// ki kang phab nas bsad pa la// rjes shul med par za byed cing// mA ra ya yi yul dag tu// ser ba sna tshogs sgong ltar 'dril// ki kang sna tshogs
dus med phob// de nas mtshon cha rnon pos shigs// lha tshogs kun la thim par phul// sbyin bsreg gnan pa'i las rdzogs bya// rngam stabs drag pos rnam par gzir// drag po'i las 'di kun rdzogs na// rdo

rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'jig/ bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo// snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ mngags pa srog phur gyi le'u bcu gsum
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyan gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// phung byed srog zor las bshad
pa// sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// drag por brtag pa'i gnas chen du// gshed kyi zla ba tshes gcig la// 'jig rten gdug pa'i lha srin la// mchod sbyin bsngos te bka' bsgo la// de nas drag po'i las

'di brtsams// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang tshad ldan pa'i// de dbus gru gsum khru do'i tshad// sor tshad drug pa rim gsum ste// dpangs kyang sor tshad drug drug pa// tha ma kun tu zlum por bskor// dur khrod
sol phye khrag chen gyis// gru gsum kun tu smug nag tu'o// zla gam bam chen khrag gis byug/ tha ma rak+ta thal chen dang// dug dang dkar dmar rdzas sbyar byug/ dkyil du be con phyag rgya

bzhag/ dang po rdo rje mda' gzhus mtshan// gnyis pa thod pa dgus mtshan pa'o// gsum pa me ris mtshan pa bri// dur khrod ro yis thal bas byug/ de nas gdug pa'i shing rdzas ni// dur khrod shing dang skyer pa

dang// nim pa'i shing dang yungs kar shing// gdug pa'i bse shing seng ldeng dang// bra ma'i shing dang dug shing ste// dang la dur khrod shing dag la// ro ras shun gyis byug pa yis// tshad med ci rigs sbams

nas dril// gru gsum dbus su de rdzas bsgreng// gru gsum phyi snam me ri la// gdug pa'i rno rtsang nyi shu gcig/ sor tshad bcu drug ldan pa la// rtse la dug byug mkhas pas dgram// yugs sa mo yi skra dag
la// bshan pas phyir phyogs bkal ba yi// phung byed khram thag nag po yis// rtsang sdom 'gag mig bcu gnyis bya// zla gam gru bzhi'i steng du yang// dkar dmar la sogs rdzas rnams bzhag/ bskyed mchod

bzlas dang bstod pa bya// de nas log sred 'byung po'i gzugs// phyi sa gos kyi dum bu'am// rkang rjes mchil snabs gang rnyed dang// lan tshwa ldong ros sa zhag dang// bag phye dag la khag gis sbrus// gcig la
mtho gang tshad ldan te// sor brgyad ldan pa bcu gnyis bya// dpral ba snying ga yan lag la// ming rus bla dgas gsal bar bri// de nas g.yel med ting 'dzin dang// snying rje gdug pa'i ngan sems
kyis// phung byed gtso 'khor kun mngags te// gang dmigs rten la bkug bstim nas// khrag thag 'gag mig bcu gnyis la// dmigs rten bcu gnyis ske nas gdags// gcig ni nub tu kha bltas
te// dmar dang sbrag la shar du bzhag/ de nas gnad la dbab pa'i tshe// yugs sa'am bshan pas me spar nas// bdud rtsi sna lnga la sogs te// dkar dmar rdzas dang sngo khu dang// rin chen sna lnga dug la

sogs// ming rus rten du bcas pa la// rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas mjug tu yang// ma ma sarba sha truM che ge mo ag+ne ye dz+wa la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ 'di bzlas sngags pas seng ldeng la// brgya brgyar bsreg na las

kun 'grub// de nas rdzas dang thal 'jim de// mi sog me sogs kyang khem gyis blang byas nas// drag sngags bzlas shing ling+ga ling+ga brab bsham sha yang/ ljang sngon drag po'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji

bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga nub byang mtshams su bzhag/ sngags pa shar lho mtshams su gnas// skyer pa'i shing la me spar te// rdzas dang ling+ga la sogs la// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar
bsreg byas nas// thal 'jib me sog khem gyis brab// drang srong chen po'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga dmar sbrag lho ru gzhag/ sngags
pas byang gi phyogs gnas la// nim pa'i shing la me spar te// rdzas dang ling ga la sogs la// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar bsreg byas la// thal 'jim sngags kyis de bzhin brab// thal 'jim mi sog g.yas

pas brab// tsa ra ka yi sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga byang shar mtshams su bzhag/ sngags pas lho nub mtshams su gnas// nyung dkar nyung nag shing dag
la// yugs sa'am bshan pas me sbar te// rdzas dang ling+gal sogs la// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar bsreg byas nas// thal 'jim de bzhin sngags kyis brab// bi tri pa tra'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji
bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga dmar bcas nub tu bzhag/ sngags pa shar gyi phyogs gnas la// gdug pa bse yi shing dag la// yugs sa'am bshan pas me sbar te// rdzas dang ling ga la

sogs pa// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar bsreg byas nas// thal 'jim sngags kyis de bzhin brab// biSh+Nu rA tsa'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga shar lho

mtshams su bzhag/ sngags pa nub byang mtshams su gnas// seng ldeng shing la me spar te// rdzas dang ling+ga la sogs la// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar bsreg byas nas// thal 'jim sngags kyis ling+ga brab// mjug

rings drag po'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga dam rdzas byang du bzhag/ sngags pa lho yi phyogs gnas la// bra me'i shing la me spar te// rdzas dang ling+ga la

sogs la// sngags bzlas brgya brgyar bsreg byas nas// thal 'jim sngags kyis ling+ga brab// khyab 'jug chen po'i sreg zor yin// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// ling+ga dam rdzas
cha gcig dang/ sbyar la lho nub mtshams su bzhag/ sngags pa byang shar mtshams gnas la// bi Sha sna tshogs shing dag la// yugs sa'am bshan pas me sbar te// bdud rtsi sna lnga la sogs la// dkar dmar

rdzas dang sngo khu dang// rin chen sna lnga dgu la sogs// dur khrod ras dang gro ga dang// khrag gis bris pa'i ming rten la// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi mjug tu yang// ma ma sarba sha trUM che ge mo ag+ne dz+wa la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de
bzlas sngags pas seng ldeng la// brgya brgyar bsreg na srid gsum phung// tshangs dang brgya byin la sogs kyang// nges par srog las gtan 'pho'o// de nas rdzas dang thal 'jim de// mi
sog g.yas pa'i khem dag gis// drag sngags bzlas shing ling+ga brab// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sreg zor yin// de nas dmigs rten ling+ga la// rtsang gis gtub cing thag pas sbrel// de nas rdzas dang
bcas pa dag/ re dul nag pos bril nas kyang// phyogs ngan gshed kyi lag tu gtad// yang na nA ga gnas sar sba// sreg zor hom brgyad 'di rdzogs na// 'jig rten phung las kun grub ste// thog ser
yams nad sna tshogs dang// btsa' mug lo nyes 'khrug pa'i sa// log sred nyid phung yul khams phung// bshan pa nag po'i srog las 'di// lnga brgya dus kyi mtha' ma'i tshe// gab gsang don gyi blo can
dang// sngags bsnyen rdzogs dang phyag rgya gsal// dam tshig brtser ldan mkhas pas bya// dam med ras chod gzu lums can// bka' thob med pa'i rang byan mkhan// gang des 'di rtsom rang nyid rlag/ bdud
rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ke kang rog ti'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ bshan pa hom nag gi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// khus 'debs drag po'i las bshad pa// cho ga kun ldan sngags pa yis// khru do'i tshad mdzes dkyil 'khor la// 'di

la thig dag bri mi dgos// dme khrag dag gis dmar por byug/ steng du tsa ra'i shun gding zhing// de steng log sred 'byung po'i gzugs// smos pa'i rgyu yi bye brag la// 'dra 'bag khru gang tshad du bya// dpral ba

snying ga yan lag la// ming rus bla dgas rdzogs par bri// khong par tsa ra'i snying yang gzhug/ de nas zhing chen g.yang gzhi la// dug dang pad+ma rak+ta yis// dpral ba 'gram pa g.yas g.yon dang// snying ga lte ba
rnams su yang// gshed po be tA tsa ti dang// klu srin gdug pa'i gsang sngags bri// ske dang bla dpung g.yas g.yon dang// gsang gnas mkhal khung g.yas g.yon du// sde brgyad gsang sngags 'khor bar

bri// yan lag bzhi yi mthil dag la// gdong mo bzhi yi gsang sngags bri// de ltar bris pa'i rgyal mtshan de// nub phyogs ngos su mkhas pas bsgreng// mthun pa'i dam rdzas rdzogs par bsham// de nas cho ga
rdzogs byas te// rlag byed rol pa'i tshogs mngags nas// gang la bya ba'i dngos po de// dbang med sngags kyis dgug nas kyang// dmigs pa'i rten la nges par dbab// de nas dus la bab pa'i

tshe// 'doms dang snying ga mgo rnams la// tshil chen gu gul rgyal tshil gyis// me btang dud pa cher byung la// rgyal mtshan brdab cing 'di skad brjod// hUM nga ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// sangs rgyas sras kyi thu bo
yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung brgyud 'dzin// sems can don la gcig tu brtson// lha srin gdug pa 'khor bcas kyis// dam nyams log sred 'byung po 'di// bsgral ba'i zhing la 'di gtogs
kyi// gtan phung gshed ma khyed kyis mdzod// lha srin gdug pa ming krug tu// log sred 'byung pos ma langs sa// de skad brjod cing g.yab nag dor// khus 'debs ngo yi nye dmigs bgrangs// drag sngags

bzlas shing rgyal mtshan brdab// khrag dang dug mtshon char du dbab// de nas dus tshig brgyad 'byor nas// dmigs rten khong gshag tsit+ta phyung// gtub cing lha tshogs zhal du bstab// gzugs phung thun rdzas
bcas pa dag/ tsa ra'i pags pas dril nas kyang// phyogs ngan gshed kyi lag tu gtad// yang na bu shu mar pa'am// smos pa'i gnas su sbas byas nas// dus dus zor gyis drag bskul bya// btsan thabs myur

ba'i las yin no// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// dad mos nyams su 'di len na// ltas dang cho 'phrul 'di 'dra 'byung// bud med mi rengs btsun chen dang// dge bshes rta pa min pa dang// mdze can mi
rengs nag po 'byung// de dag gus shing 'dud pa dang// phyag byed gdug pa'i mtshon thogs na// sngags rdzogs las rnams grub pa'i ltas// mtshon med phar la byin pa dang// mi gus log par blta ba

na// las rnams gang yang mi 'grub bo// nyi zla klad la 'khor ba na// gang yang the tshom med par 'grub// mngon sum pa yi cho 'phrul yang// 'brug sgra thog dang ser ba dang// nam mkha' 'khrug cing 'khyil ba
dang// nyi zla 'od dang bral ba dang// 'tshub na bu yug sa g.yos dang// gcan gzan gdug pa'i sgra 'byin na// rnal 'byor las rnams 'grub pa ste// phan gnod bye brag shes par bya'o// bdud rog ti nag po
bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ phung byed khus 'debs kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o//// gza' bdud chen po khyab 'jug gi
rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// 'di ni shin tu gnyan cing rtsub ste khro chu khol ma dang 'dra bas gsang rgya'o////

rgya gar skad du/ de ba ya tre san tri shu pa ti ba ya du ya ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// 'og min gyi gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po de la/ 'khor dpag tu med pas skor ba'i tshul gyis bskor te bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba la sogs pa du mas mchod cing/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ kye bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i mnga' bdag/ 'jig rten gyi

khams 'di ni/ rab tu snying rje ste// lha ma srin ni 'khrugs/ nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa mang po ni btang/ mtshon gyi char pa ni phab/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams ni shin tu nyen/ shin tu sdug bsngal te/ 'di rnams la
bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin nyon cig/ yid la zung zhig/ khyed kyis zhu bar spobs pa 'di legs so// ngas
gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhu ba spobs pa dang/ gleng gzhi'i le'u dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bsdu ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu dregs pa can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ub kyis 'dus nas/ la la ni brgyal/ la la ni rang skra rang 'bal/ la la ni khrag
tu skyugs/ la la ni kha bub/ la la ni gan rkyal du 'gyel nas 'dug pa las/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad gso ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ zhugs ma thag tu
dregs pa can thams cad brgyal ba sangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor zhing phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi snying po srog pa rtsa dang bcas pa phul nas/ bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
bsrung bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du las bgyi'o// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis nga yi bstan pa srungs shig/ dkon mchog gsum dang phyi rabs pa

rnams kyi 'khor yang srungs shig ces bsgo'o// de nas dregs pa can rnams kyis rang rang gi srog snying spyir dril ba/ ya du tri gam pa ni ba ra ti sang ge tsa tsa bam sa pa ri rag sha yag sha kro d+hi ram pa gram pi du
sad/ ces pa de dag phul lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar dbang du bsdu ba dang/ dregs pa rnams kyis dam bcas shing snying po phul ba'i le'u gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dregs pa rnams kyi gtso bo bdud mes rgyal ba rA tsa dang/ skos kyi bdag po dang/ mang ge ched po dang/ gar gyi bdag po dang/ btsan pa ting rje dang/

srid pa skos kyi ang mi ster dang// kha bzhi mig brgyad dang/ 'byung po'i bdag po dang// du ra tse kun dang/ rgyal rje 'od dkar dang/ skya 'dram chen po dang/ rA tsa ag sha dang/ srid pa'i bdag po srog bdag
dkar po dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ mgon po chen po dang/ bdud mo rgyal byin dang/ nag po khram thogs dang/ the brang ha stang dang/ klu rgyal chen po dang/ sa bdag bse dang/ khyab 'jug

chen po dang/ phung byed dbyug byed ja la ma'i sde dang/ de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bskor zhing phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi gdug pa'i mtshon yo phul te/ rang rang gi las ba stan pa gnyen po
bsrung ba 'di dag smras te/ srog 'di dag phul lo// gsad pa dang ni gso ba dang// 'bod pa dang ni rbad pa dang// dbab pa dang ni gcad pa dang// gnan pa dang ni gzir ba dang// dbug dang ltas ngan gtang

ba dang// bskrad pa dang ni zhi ba dang// las kyi rim pa gsang ba'i sngags 'di dag smras so// A+oM ya tri kram yer ya yag sha treg ka la rag sha dun ya rag sha sa ma ya tri krog ya/ ya tri sen yam 'og na rag sha

rbad sham yer ya/ kri ri ti sang te yaM rje yaM pa rbad/ tring tring la ma ni byo/ tri yer ya/ ya tri kra ma trag tu yer ya kha la ru tri thuM pa ni rbad yaM/ tri khaM ru pa na rbad bu 'dar liM ya/ kar pa 'dre ni yaM tri ku ru yaM/ nag po

kha la har hur shaM ya/ ta le yaM tri ga re du na ye/ u pa ri sad yaM/ nag po kA la 'ur chom le rung ya tri ya/ ma mus ma yo te pu ru ti ya/ ma re du tse khraM ya ting pi li/ mu ti ma/ kun ti thun/ pri te ma/ dri ma ku ru ya/

ma la sa ma bde sad/ ba li si da ma/ kar ne ya/ khya le tu le/ hi li mi li/ mu hab hab/ heb du ma ya/ sa do ya/ be do thun ti ma ku lu ma/ ru tri ma/ ba le saM pa ri yaM/ muM ti yaM ba/ der sha tsit+ta ma la te kun/ phe

phu se la nA ka hu be ya/ gaM pa na ge dung sar ya/ dung phyur ya dung phyur ya/ nA ga ke nA ga le/ ka tra ma ma ni ya/ rgo da ba ni/ na ra te/ saM pa re ya/ nA ga rA dza pa li sa ma ya/ phu ling phu ti ya/ si bi sa pa la gu ru ya/

nA ga ra ni pa ri te la mam/ nA ga ga tse pa ra ku ra te/ kar sha ya a ti bu li ya ya/ si ma pa to ya/ s-i ta/ oM ku ta la sha ya/ bri tri ni ya/ ho na be ta li/ hur sing ya ba tsa be ta ya/ tang saM pa tang yer yer/ ru

ne thuM pa re be ya/ ho ni sa to ya/ be ta sne la yaM/ ke ra ta ba la ya/ hor ma me ta sha/ ra sha ni ra sha ni/ rtse na yaM te yaM/ bi ku la sa ma ya/ si l-i ru tri yaM yaM/ ma te ye ta tang laM te yaM/ ma le sad ku ni ya/ gur ti ba

la yag sha si dam/ bi bar sha ya/ yag sha kA la rub pa ya la/ mar tse mar du ne ya/ gaM shaM ba ni/ ra yaM ka de ra rje rbad yaM/ si li ki taM me le ni/ yag sha se ta ka na de yang/ si bi ba ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ sho re sha ra

pa ra ya/ sho ba ti kar sha ya si ba ra rbad/ shag thuM ri li li ya/ rA hu la ya ma ti srog la rbad/ ba to so trag rag sha kha la hur hur/ sa ma ya ba ra bi ta ya/ shaM pa ri/ dam ba ni ya/ nam ting ya/ kur tri traM b+h+yo//

nir ti ra ya/ ba ru si ya/ sa ma traM ya/ dzaM ba la si bi ra ra ya/ Ar+ya dzaMb+ha la dza len dra ye swA hA/ Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la sid+d+hi ku ni dza/ Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la ni dza ba te saM ya/ de mo ka li rad na dzaM ba ni dza/ nA ga te

ra ya/ ra tsa ba li traM ya ya/ sa ma ti yer ya gaM shaM taM saM ya/ khu 'dze ta ya/ pra te ma yaM/ srog bi ni yaM/ sa ma ni ya/ e ka ni dzA ti rag sha yag sha ma ma ru ru rbad shag ya/ ding pi sa ra ba sha sha ya/ bi bir taM

laM shaM ba ri/ mu ne kar be yag sha rbad ya/ ti ri yaM te shar/ sa ma ti laM pa ni ya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa thams cad kyis rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul ba'i le'u gsum
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pas rang rang gi bcos ka 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams ni 'chos pa ni// la la de ba lha yi rigs te srid pa'i
nor 'dzin byed// la la zhe sdang bdud kyi rigs te gsod dang gcod la dga'// la la phrag dog btsan gyi rigs te sro gcod las la dga'// la la rgyal po chen po'i bu ste srog dang dbugs la dga'// la la
ma yams bdud mo'i bu ste nad dang 'khrug rims gtong// la la sa bdag klu yi rigs te gdug pa che la nad rnams gtong// la la the'u brang ja la ma yi rigs te 'jig rten phung khrol byed// la la gnod sbyin

bdud sde'i rigs te sha dang khrag la dang// de phyir spyi dang bye brag bcos// sngags bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna bcu gsum ngar phye la// rin chen phye mar byin gyis brlabs// de la ri rab chen po

ste// kha dog 'dra 'bag rigs dang bstun// smyug ma tshigs dgu byung rgyas la// kha dog tshang pa nam mkha'i gur// dar gyi rnam pas brgyan par bya// gnam la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// gzugs ni rim pa de yis
bskor// bshos bu bcu gsum byang shar bcas// mda' bkra bcu gsum bshos bu la/ nam mkha' bcu gsum ri rab la// mo 'phang bcu gsum 'brang rgyas la// gso bdar rgyal mtshan de bzhin bsag/ phud

dang gser kha spyan gzigs bcas// de ltar tshogs nas bsngo bar bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa spyi bcos kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//// bdud sham ba li kha la sed rbad yaM/ kaM taM

ni yag sha sen tre dro ni yaM yu dril kha la d+haM chum se de yaM/ gi pi dar ya ya treng treng ya/ bdud kha la dun tsa pra ma ne yaM/ ya ma rag sha tsit+ta rbud ling ya/ kyi ma nag po hur ma d+h+rim dun ya/ kha ru dri trag yer ya/ nag

po snying rtsa sha la dun kar yer ya/ gaM pa ni ru tri tra tre ya/ nyung mo thor snying mgo chod tra ya sa ma tri shar/ sen dur tu trid ya ma ya/ ma tra dun tse tra ma ya/ mug mu kha la rbad tog sha/ tring ma dre yaM/ yu ting yu ting dun

dun b+h+yo/ sa ma ya phring li dkar rtseg ma rbad b+h+yo/ bdud rje nag po dun yag sha rbun ya/ ting ge ma traM ya/ kar shaM rbad dun ya/ A+oM badzra ki li sang/ dun na ba ra thim na hUM/ se na ta ba ra tsa tsa ya/ ki

la sarba yaM pa ni/ bdud rag sha sa ma yaM/ ye ta ra sa ma thims ya/ ma du ke le thang mu le rbad ya/ ya ma rlag sha ru lu yaM/ nag po snying la thun cig/ ya ma trig sna ya/ sham ru su tri ya/ gaM shaM ya yer yar/ trag

ling sa ma ya/ be teng ku lu ya/ ya ma rA dza ni tsha 'dus/ ting sna ma ra du 'dus/ tshal pa tshal pa bu ting ya/ sa ma ti yi sad ni yaM// garba sad ni yaM/ rkur ti ri ti ri yaM/ rak+Sha srog rtsa ti rung ya/ sa ma ya badzra gaM la

sred ya btsan/ staM pa ya/ dur dur tse bang yaM/ za 'gram ni mu 'gram tri yaM/ me le sa ma tsa tsa yaM yaM/ gaM pa ri gaM pa ri rbad tubs ya/ me tsen te ya gra ni suM baM yaM/ ma ra te ra ya sarba ni kuM kuM ya/ mar yang ti sad

ka de ya/ se ting ye ni ra na ya/ ba de tsa tsa de shad shad/ tshugs ting ku ru ya/ rag sha du ne rbad ya/ ma ra tse tse ya/ ma ru du ma ra tse tse ya sa 'bur ti graM yer yer ya/ sarba ting lang be ta tsa sha ma ra du/ gi ba

ra sad nam/ yer yer yaM rbad/ mu ke ka ne sum rbad ya/ badzra bong ni bong ni ya/ badzra zhung tri sa ma te shang rbad/ rag sha yag dun dun rtsa la breng/ khro ni khro ni ma laM ba ni/ suM ba ni rbad/ ma ra tse ma ra yaM taM ya/

gur ni chuM ya/ har hur ma hA li rbad ya/ badzra ti ri ti ri ya/ btsan bstab pa ya ni/ grang tse grang tse te staM sta/ sa ma ya kar shaM rbad ya/ dug ne tshe sad rbad ya/ ma be du na chum skor sod// chum 'dril rgyug rtsa la

breng rbad ni ra yaM/ chub ni sad na yaM/ ma ting saM ba te na yaM yaM/ ki ma tsa ya ma ra tig ya/ tsa tsa sho le baM ba ni sa ma ya rbad shar shaM/ baM ril mus la thibs thibs/ kar ne sad mu buM ru lu yang/ te ni yaM yaM rbad

dun ling/ sa ter ker na ya/ yag sha 'de shaM rbad ya/ kha la mu he la yaM yaM/ bri gu lu+u sa ma ting mer ya/ rgyug tsa la greng yang/ ma ti ri ya/ gaM pa ni/ tsa ra ya/ sed ku ru yang/ be te sa ra tsa/ a ti ya/ ma ra

ting ling ya ya ma ru ma/ sa ma a tang ti rbad ya/ be ba ti ni grang du na thim/ ma ra du se ya/ oM bu ru lu+u sa ma thibs/ mar ting ya ni sad tu/ kri yer yer/ oM tro ta ni tro ta ni/ ba tra ba tra/ shu la shu la/ d+ha sha gri ba/

ging ka rA dza ti aM yang/ sen te se ya/ kang ka sha ba ya/ g+h+ra he g+ha re gyi la ya/ kyi krid rang khrid snying mgo chod/ khrag la mu sha rbad ting ya/ ra tsa rbad ni/ srog rtsa la thun ya/ ka ka sha la ya baM khro ta baM khro ta baM

sha/ rmugs tsit+ta bar la ho yang/ mar tan tse yaM yaM/ bram pa yer ting ku ru ya/ ra tsa ti ba ging kar glad pa la phaT te phoT te/ tsit+ta chod ba spu drongs yi ra te ke ya/ mi li mi li ma be yaM/ ba ba ri rbad na yaM/ badzra

ging ka ra srog rtsa la/ breng breng ya/ sa ma ya taM ka ni thuM ya/ ra tsa a ti shag/ a ti rbad ya/ rgyal po chen po be pur shag b+h+yo/ ti pa ni khraM b+h+yo/ staM b+h+yo naM b+h+yo/ ma ni b+h+yo/ braM b+h+yo/ sring mo b+h+yo/ spu dri b+h+yo/ d+h+ri

mu kha la b+h+yo/ mu ti ya b+h+yo/ ging ka ra ging ka ra/ pa tra pa tra// to to sho to to she/ mes mes sil sil/ ba ba ring ba ba ri/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ yu ti yu ti/ snying la dza/ ging ka rA dza/ rgyal po chen po rbud bu ling/

drag ling/ tsan d+ha ling/ tshal pa ling/ kar sha mang du kI la ya/ dun tshal pi kA la ya/ yag+sha s+t+waM b+ha kI la ya/ rag+sha s+t+waM b+ha kI la ya/ ga ba ri ya/ dza dur ya ma re tsa ya/ ma ra dun tshal pa kI la ya/ ma ra tse ma ra tse

srog rtsa la har hur ging ka ra tsi tsi ta la phaT te phaT te/ ma seM pa ni yaM/ yaM ba ni sad da ya/ oM ra tsa a ti mug ti mu hi srog rtsa la shad de/ shad de/ ra te/ rdza te/ sa ma ya ni ra zung/ tad+ya thA/ ru bo bo dra drag ya/

ni lo rA tsa snying rtsa la 'dus 'dus/ teng teng sa ma ya/ sri ru srog ta shad de rbad/ tsa tsa du ni sad de tsa tsa ra dza baM pa re/ sa ma ya dang staM ba ni/ ma hA kA li yaM ni yaM ti ti sa ma yaM/ ma ra ya te rtse ya/ be sha sha ra/

rbad nam/ be du staM kaM sa ma ya thibs// be ba stis sta rbad ta yaM/ ta ka bi ri mA ra ya/ oM ma ma ruM ruM sa ma ya/ rag sha ma ru lu b+h+yo/ rag mo ting laM sa ma ya/ chu sting yaM de tse ni rbad ya/ drag mo drang ba ni sa ba ri yaM/

yaM rbad/ dza ti muM pa ni gar bu ti yaM yaM ma nu rag sha dun kaM ba ni ya te ma/ khrim ya chur ti ye yaM/ me ma sa ma ya thibs ling ya/ ru ru pre ta ni thang thang ya/ rag sha ru lu ru sa ma ya/ nag mo har hur tur re rtsa cho/

mu ka yi/ bya tsa ye/ traM yer ya rag mo kha ling/ sad ni rbad/ mu si ti yaM/ tsam mo tsam mo/ khrag la rmugs/ dza ya ya ru ti laM ru ru sa ma ya bI tsa sha ma ya dun b+h+yo/ oM khri mun lan shag ti la rbad/ mu ni sad kri la ya

kri ni laM/ du na sa ra thim ya/ oM be ga ban smin sha ra be pa ta khrid de ru lu sa ma ya/ rag mo tsit+ta la rbad de rbod de shaM yaM pa ni rbad/ be ta ru ti ma ru ya thun ya ru ru ting ya be ta tad+ya su tir byo// shaM ting ne ma le tuM

sha baM baM ril ya/ oM di pa ra si bi ni shad shad ya/ ka ma la/ ru ti raM ya ting badzra ma yaM pa ni/ ting ku le be ti sti rbad/ sa ma teng kha le yer ru tri ru tre badzra ling/ badzra ya ma tig nan ya/ sa le kun ta tsa yaM/ mar

tsen 'dus pri ku ru/ yag mo ka pa ru pa zhung ya/ ma teng laM ya/ tang ting ke ta yaM/ sa ma ting dung ka dung dung/ khi ma 'du yo mu to tha 'du ting ri rag mo la la 'dus ya/ chu ti nag mo rbad/ shaM ya ru ru ting la dun

b+h+yo// ro ru ro ru sa ma ya/ khang b+h+yo sang pa ri sang/ ting yer muM ma thuM/ drag mo dra pra ma/ nig nig thig thig nig thig/ gcig med/ gnyis drag/ brgyad bcad/ gnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ ka te re rdza

de'u zhub thun ya dam/ ra tse sha ya/ sa ma ya/ dum ling tse ya/ sa ma ya/ in trA ya/ rbi pu shag ku ne yaM/ teng sang ya te re sa ma ti kang/ tsem tsem tse le ma na yaM/ gang go lo/ i pa taM yer yer la

ya lem/ shar tham pa ra shag thun/ a ti pa ta in+ta ya zhung zhung/ rban rba na rbu ne ya/ ti ri saM pa ya naM yaM/ ma pu sid ling tu re tu yang yang ga le ma teng laM/ gung bing sad rbad/ ruM ruM min pa ya/ kha la 'ur 'ur yaM

ya/ sha ba ri shaM shaM ya/ mu te yer ya/ oM ting yaM sa de rbad na hUM/ ba ba de sad bi da yaM/ taM le sad ya tri yaM/ graM te yaM/ tri mu tra dra ma ya/ zhung zhung war ni ya/ hu ba tsa la zhung zhung/ mu taM pa ni breng breng/ ti muM la te

sad/ ma ra bi sa shar sham de ba gar pi yaM/ sarba stod saM ya/ mi li kaM te yaM/ pi ting ku ru ya/ ma ma dan tri ma ting ya/ keM dre sad pa ri yang/ mi ru ru bi ta saM/ bi ra sad na la se yaM/ mi ku lu thibs/ bri bu ru lu

ya/ ga ma tang sa ma ya/ oM bri ku te ya/ ju te ya/ ju te ma thun/ sa ma ti ma/ ka la ru ma ting/ dza sa ma ru ya/ ma ra dun che ya/ lang te shar/ lung ti ma ya/ teng ke le sang/ 'u ni lam ba ya/ 'gar dri pa hUM/ che

yang bdud kyis bsad ya chung yang bdud kyis bsad/ bdud kyi bu la snying rje mi mnga' ste// zhe sdang bdud kyi bu ste srog gcod las rnams byed// bdud kyi mes po chen po ni// spyi mes rA tsa rgyal bas bya// de yi

bu ni gnam gyi dig pa chen pos bya// bdud kyi phyi mo sa chu mer bas bya// de yi bu mo mer mer lcam gcig ma// de gnyis thugs kyi sras chen po// sras ni ya bdud bcu gsum byung// spyi mes rA tsa rgyal po
de// bdud thod pa'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba ste/ yul ni bdud yul nag po na// bdud mkhar ni ldems se ldem// rtsa ba gser la rtse mo brag/ rtse dgu gnam du zangs se zang// rtse ni mi lpags rlon pas

g.yogs// nang na mi khog brungs su gtser// nang na rta khog rtsig par brtsigs// rtsa nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzag/ thod pa skam sngon mkhar du brtsigs// mkhar gyi rtsa ba na/ bdud spyad sngon po 'ur dang yams se

yam// bdud bya skyung ka di ri ri// bdud kyi khyi mo 'khang dang di ri ri// de yi nang na bdud chen mes po bzhugs// mi sha ma lags gzhan mi za// rta khrag ma lags gzhan mi 'thung// pho nya mang po sha la

'gyed// mgo brnyan mang po sprul par 'gyed// bdud mes yab yum mdos la spyon// ya bdud bcu gsum de/ nag po bkrag med de/ bdud rta nag po chibs/ zangs nag ber chen gsol/ bdud zhags nag po mda' ltar 'phen// bdud re ldem
go yag de/ bdud kyi rta nag zhon nas skyes pa khrom la 'debs// khams gsum rdul du rlog pa'i ma le ge shag de/ skye 'gro khram la 'debs pa'i bdud rje mang kug
dang// skye 'gro tshe la dbang bsgyur snyal snyoms kyang lde ngag btsan dang// bdud kyi gung blon mched bzhi ste// stag zhum ched bzhi bsad pa'i las la brtson// khyab pa lag ring skye shi rtsa ba
gcod// bdud chen 'od de 'bar ba dang// 'od de lkugs pa dang/ 'od de thom po dang/ lkugs pa 'dzum mul mi yi bla rnams 'chang// ral pa spyi bcings sri skye 'gro srid pa'i rgyu 'grul byed// gar bu
shan thogs bdud kyi bang chen byed// 'khor lo bcu gnyis srid pa cham la 'bebs// bdud chen rgyal ba dbugs chen len pa ste// thom po thom chung mi la chad pas gcod// bdud rje 'ol po'i tshogs ni mi bu
dag la phyags mas 'debs shing 'dzin// phyag brnyan bzhi ni mi bu 'dzin par byed// bdud sil ma stong ni mi la ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// bdud rje bdud sde 'khor bcas kyang// srid pa'i mdos bzhes

shig/ hUM spyi btsan ni chen po ste// sha khrag bdud la rgol// mthu che ni phya la sku// mi yi lus po la// sprul pa phyogs bzhir 'gyed// yul btsan yul po phu gsum na// btsan mkhar dmar po ldem pa na// btsan
mi lus g.yag gi mgo bo can du byung/ dpral na kha gcig mig gnyis la// ltag na kha gcig mig gnyis byung// g.yas na kha gcig mi gnyis pa// g.yon na kha gcig mig gnyis pa// bse rta dmar po la/

rmig pa brgyad par byung/ mi bu rims kyis gsod/ sha la gcod sbyin kyang sbyong byed/ spyi btsan chen po bya/ ri rab 'byung ba'i shar phyogs na/ dung gi mi dkar ldem pa gcig/ ri rab lho phyogs na/ gser gyi mi
ser ldem pa gcig/ ri rab nub phyogs na/ zangs kyi mi dmar gcig/ ri rab byang phyogs na/ g.yu yi mi sngon gcig/ dbus na mchong gi mi pho gcig/ 'byung ba lnga la dbang byed cing/ srid pa gsum la dbang

bsgyur ba/ de ni 'byung ba'i btsan lnga ste/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ gnam btsan ding ba dang/ sa btsan yu bu dang/ gangs btsan de se dang/ g.ya' btsan mi rom dang/ brag btsan rom bu dang/ chu btsan

sngon po zhung bu rje/ klu btsan thor ba dang/ btsan phran stod tshogs kyang/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ hUM srog bdag chen po ste// gnam gyi ding ba chen po bya// mi dkar po ldem pa gcig/ rta dkar g.yu yi rngog

ma can la chibs// glo la shel gyi gri chung btsugs// bzhugs pa gnam gyi dkyil na bzhugs// sprul pa 'dzam bu gling bzhir 'gyed// mi dkar ldem pa la// dbu la ral gri sha ra ra// dpral na mig gcig lhangs se
lhang// zhal nas mche gtsigs thams se tham// phyag na skyogs dkar ta la la// gnam ral phyed kyi bdag po yin// sa chu phyed kyi bdag po yin// skyes pa brgya yi srog gi bdag po yin// mdos
bdag mdos bzhes shig/ ya cho dkar po dang/ yam shud dmar po dang/ khu le lag dgu dang/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ dkar po ni de se dang/ shor ba skya dgu dang/ rgyal sde chen po nyi pang

srad/ khyung pa sad/ se pang sab/ sprul pa sad/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ rgyal phran bcu gnyis/ rgyal sil ma stong ste/ rgyal po chen po sde bzhi/ de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig yul sbas kyi la de na/

stong ma bdud chen mo bzhugs/ mkhar zo ba gzhogs ral gyi nang na/ yul khri 'du stong 'du bya ba na/ bdud mo rgyal byin bya ba des/ dre'u nag rkang gsum chibs nas/ sku la dar nag go zu gsol/ phyag na ba
dan rtse gsum 'phyar/ spyugs pa'i glu ru len cing ma yams 'dun mar sdud// zhing lpags g.yab chung 'dor zhing bgegs rnams g.yob par byed// khrag mig mdangs su phyung nas rgyal po dkar chen dag la

brdeg/ mi bu bsad bcad lha 'dre dam la sdud// sha la ral gris gtub cing khrag ni b+han+d+ha stong stong 'thung// bdud mo'i mdun ma gcod cing dregs pa pho rnams dgyes pa skong/ pho bdud g.yas kyi pho bdud ru

'dren mo bdud g.yon gyi ru sna 'dren// srid pa'i g.yul ngo zlog cing bsad dang gcod la dga'// ma bdud ni bcu gsum yang/ la la mdzo mo ru ring zhon nas rgyug/ la la rnga mo rke ring zhon nas rgyug/ la la

rtol bu la dkar zhon nas rgyug/ la la bdud bod gwa dmar zhon nas rgyug/ la la gsal le grus mo zhon nas rgyug/ la la bong bu nag po zhon nas rgyug/ khrag gi gru char 'bebs shing mi nad phyugs nad gtong/
de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig the'u rang stong sde yang/ gnam la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang// bar la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang// sa la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang// the se kug sem chu ring
gsum// dri se ba ni mu dri gsum// gnam lha byang chub gnam rten se rta dang// gnam the'u dkar dang gsum// ba te lag ge te ni gsum// dar dkar dmar dang ser po gsol// srid pa'i the'u rang stong sde

yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ ja la sum brgya drug cu yang// nyul byed khyab byed mdos bzhes shig/ sa bdag rgyal po ho pa dang// be sna lag chen tsang kun chen po dang// gtsang btsan da la

'khor ba dang// ho ba te te se ba dang// pha ni shi sa ta yin// ma ni ru zan de mo yin// 'byung ba sa la dbang bsgyur te// la la shing lo gos su gyon// la la sa dang rdo la gnas// la la chu dang shing la

gnas// byol song mi sdug mgo bo can// la la ri rab de la gnas// sa bdag sil ma stong tshogs kyang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// klu rgyal ni chen po ste// ri dang mtsho la gnas pa ste// dga' bo dang
ni 'jog po dang// mtha' yas dang ni dung skyong dang// pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang// kar ko ta dang ba ru Na// sbrul mgo bdun dang lnga pa dang// gsum pa dang ni rigs bzhi dang// de ring srid pa'i
mdos la spyon// klu gzugs sna tshogs dag tu ston// la la gzugs med sgo nga 'dra// la la nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon 'dra// la la 'dod chags bya yi gzugs// la la nga rgyal rtsangs pa'i gzugs// la la nor

bu'i tshul du gnas// la la sta ri kha yi gzugs// la la glang dang be lug gzugs// rigs ni bzhi la sde ni stong// srid pa kun la dbang sgyur byed// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur ba// de ring mdos bdag mdos
bzhes dang// dang po srid pa chags pa'i dpe// de nas 'jig rten nor dang bdun// 'byung ba bskyed pa'i dpag bsam shing byung bas// bskyed pa'i 'bru sna bcu gsum dang// skyems dang bcas pa'i gser gyis
mchod// rin chen kha dog sna lngar grub pa'i nam mkha' 'di// nam mkha' 'di ni yul du 'bul// mda' bkra 'di ni mkhar du 'bul// gzugs brnyan 'di ni dkon du 'bul// sgra snyan gsung gi glud du
'bul// me mar sems kyi glud du 'bul// zang zing longs spyod glud du 'bul// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// dregs pa spyi bcos kyi le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar dmu lcam mched bzhi dang/ bdud mo nyis brgya lnga bcu dang/ bdud nyid la nying babs te/ bdud mo rnams la ming po bcu gsum dang/ btsan bdud yor po dang/ bdud chen rnams babs nas/
bdud mo rnams bsnyun gyis zin nas/ bcos thabs 'di skad smras so// lcags kong gcig ni mar gyi bkang// de yi nang na zhun mar bcu gsum gtang nas ni// phud ni gtsang ma rin chen skyogs gang la// rin

chen brdar la byin gyis brlabs// mda' dang dar sgra snyan dang bcas// pi wang rdza rnga'am cha lang dril bu'i sgra brdung zhing bsngo bar bya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud nyid bcas kyi bsags pa'i
le'u drug pa'o//// hUM/ mi la bdud babs srid pas bskos pa ste// bdud la bdud babs srid de na// bdag cag rnams ni bdud mo kun dga' ste// 'jig rten legs dang nyes pa'i stang
'dzin cing// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang// bdud la bdud bab cho re 'phrul// ming po bdud chen rnams ni tshur nyon dang// khyed ni zhe sdang bdud kyi bu yin te// zhe sdang nyid kyang sems nyid
do// sems ni ye nas sangs rgyas te// gnyis med don gyi lung la nyon// bdud la bdud babs ming po bdud chen rnams la sdig/ nyes legs stang 'dzin stong gi sde dpon khyod kyis zung// gsal ba'i zhun
mar 'di ni sems kyi glud// 'di la kha dog lnga mchis te// phung po lnga yi glud du 'bul// 'di la du ba spu ris ma// dang ba sems kyi glud du 'bul// 'di la 'od zer lnga mchis te// 'byung ba lnga
yi glud du 'bul// 'phro ba sems dbugs sems kyi glud du 'bul// bdud kyi zhe sdang da khrol dang// zhe sdang spangs na sems sangs rgyas// srog gcod las 'di spang bar gyis// stong gi sde dpon gyis ni
gsungs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas bstan pa srungs la las rnams kyis// de las 'das na bdud chen rnams la sdig/ ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud bcos pa'i le'u bdun
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa can thams cad kyis rang rang gi snang gsal 'od kyi mdos 'di dag smras so// par bu'am kong bu dgu ru/ gsal ba'i zhun mar dgu
bltams la/ rin po che yi skyogs gcig gi nang du/ phud gcig gser la sogs pa'i rin po che sna lnga brdar la/ de'i rtsar mda' bya rgod ma gcig/ dar dmar sing nge ba gcig btags la/ bdag dbang gi

rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin gsal te rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab la bsngo bar bya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las bdud nyid bcos kyi le'u brgyad pa'o//// hUM snang ba gsal ba 'od kyi mongs// snang
gsal chen po 'di la kun gson cig/ zhe sdang chen po bdud kyi bu// nga rgyal btsan gyi bu// phrag dog rgyal po'i bu/ 'dod chags gnod sbyin ma yi bu// gti mug sa bdag klu yi bu// ser sna yi dwags 'dre
bkrin bu// the'u rang ja la la sogs kun// ston pas gsungs pa'i lung la nyon// khyod ni 'dre bkrin yi dwags te// log lta'i sems dang ldan pa yis// las ngan dag gis lus ngan blangs pa ste// mi yi 'jig
rten dag na khyed gnas te// tshe srog dbugs la dbang byas pas// mnar med pa yi dmyal chen yin// da ni dag pa'i sems skyed dang// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// dug lnga nyid kyang sems shes
na// de ni sangs rgyas sems chen no// ma bgrod sa la dgod pa yin// lug nyid nyon la gdug pa zhi bar gyis// snang ba gsal ba glud du bsngo// dang po sems kyi glud de bzhes// kha dog phung po khams kyi
glud// du ba dbugs kyi glud la gsal ba yul gyi glud// bdud dang btsan dang rgyal po dang// ma bdud ma yams dang// the'u dang ja la dang/ sa bdag klu tshogs gnyan po kun// snang gsal glud 'di bzhes

la zhe sdang khrol bar gyis// de ltar bsgo tshig btab/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ snang gsal gyi le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pas
bskor zhing phyag 'tshal nas/ rang rang gi gtad pa dang khram gyi las 'di dag smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di ltar bgyi ste/ gtad pa dag

ni 'chor mi srid// gang la dmigs pa brlag par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes smras so// de nas bdud kyi spyi mes rA dza rgyal bas/ rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di gsungs so// bstan pa gnyan

po bsrung ba ni// mon pa nag po'i thod pa ru// khyi nag khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs drug bri// dbus su dmigs bya'i yan lag rdzogs par bri// mtha' ma'i 'khor lo drug po la// g.yon gyi phyogs nas bdud kyi

sngags kyis bskor// gzas pa du yod ming rus tshang ba ste// dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// ma btang sod ni mtha' ma bskor// ma nyes pa yi dpang yang gzug/ thod pa'i kha ni dar gyis dgab// oM naM pa
ra ti sad tri ya/ tri khraM staM zhes bris la/ dur chen po'am/ ri'i spyi la mnan la/ steng nas 'dag pas 'thas par bya/ des dmigs bya rlag par 'gyur/ de nas bdud mgo g.yag gis gtad pa'i las 'di dag
smras so// khyi nag gser mig thod pa ru// de ru dmigs pa'i ming dang rus// dur khrod ras ma dag la ni// dmigs pa'i gzugs bris ming dang rus// mtha' ma bdud sngags 'di yis bskor// bdud yaM pa ni

ra sad praM yer khraM tri/ de ni khyi yi thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ ma nyes pa dang 'dis nyes bya// bdud kyi bya ra sa ru mnan// des ni skyugs pa'i nad kyis 'chi// de nas bdud nag po bkrag med kyis rang gi gtad
pa'i las 'di dag smras so// gro ga ras sam shog bu la// dmigs pa du yod gzugs bris la// snying gar ming dang dpral bar rus// 'di yis nyes kyis 'di ma btang zhig bya// mtha' ma dme khrag rnam gsum

gyis// bdud sngags bris la mtha' ma bskor// nag po du na tse yaM saM khraM yaM/ de ltar bris la glang nag po'i rwa yi nang du bcug la// dur ram ya kha can du sbas na/ dmigs pa glang thabs nad kyis 'chi/ de nas
bdud mo le ge shag gis rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// gro ga shog bu dag la ni// de la dmigs pa'i gzugs bris la// ming dang rus ni bcas pa la// mtha' ma bdud kyi sngags rnams

bskor// badzra tang sa se ya ma ta khraM te/ spyang ki sngon po'i thod pa ru// ri gsum rtse'am lung gsum mdo// de ru mnan na dmigs pa gri rnams gsum gyis 'chi// bdud rol po bcu gnyis kyis rang gi gtad pa'i
las 'di dag smras so// rta yi rgyu shun dag la dmigs pa'i gzugs ni bris nas su/ ming rus bdud sngags spel bris nas// 'phar ba dmar po'i thod par gzhug/ de nas dur gyi 'gab tu sba// taM taM laM laM
yak+Sha trag/ yak+Sha rbad na hUM/ de ltar byas la ma nyes pa'i dpang gzug/ de nas bdud rje mang khug gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi las 'di smras te/ rabs chad nag po'i thod pa
ru// gro ga shog bu dag la ni// dmigs pa du yod gzugs bris la// ming rus tshang bar byas nas su// tha ma bdud kyi sngags kyis bskor// oM ta ru rag tu rbad la yag te khraM taM/ thod pa de yi nang bcug
la// kha ni dur khrod g.yam pas bcad// dur khrod sbas nas ma nyes dbang// de yis dmigs pa smyo 'bog dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud stag bzhi mched bzhis

'di dag smras so// bdud bya nag po'i thod pa ru// de yi nang du dmigs pa'i gzugs// tha ma bdud kyi sngags kyis bskor// kha ni mthing nag dar gyis bcad// rmu tri hrim yaM s+t+waM pa na khram/ bdud brag nag po'i

rtsa ru sba// des ni las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar// ya bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// dur khrod ras ma dag la ni// mi rta khyi
dang gsum gyi khrag gis ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis kyi// dbus su dmigs pa du yod gzugs dang bdud kyi gtso bo'i sngags// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri ba'i

sngags// oM ti li rbad ya/ te pi bi su ru pi bi de/ mu du sha ni/ mung ha ba ni/ rbad tsi pi dang/ mu d+haM bi pa ra/ ru ya ta kraM ya/ dud kraM ya/ mu d+hi ba ya/ spre ta khraM ya/ de ltar 'khor lo dag la g.yon bskor
bri// rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ kha ni yugs sa'i skra yis bcad// dur ram dur khrod chen por sba// ma nyes pa yi dpang gzug go/ des ni dmigs pa gtan nas len// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud sil ma stong gis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// gro ga'am shog bu dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa la// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs ni yan lag

rdzogs par bya// ming rus dag dang ldan par bya// mtha' ma bdud kyi sngags kyis bskor/ oM yag+sha graM pa raM ba ri ma du yaM kyang traM ser yaM khraM te bang pa te yang mang/ sang ni suM rdim khro 'dus khram tri// 'khor lo dril

la phag pa'i thod par gzhug/ dur du sbas la 'dag pas 'thas par brdzi// ma nyes pa dang 'dis nyes byas// des ni bdun rgyud rlag par 'gyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud la gtad pa'i
le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ spyi btsan chen pos rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// gro ga dag la gzugs bris te// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa la// dbus

su dmigs pa du yod pa'i ming rus bcas// 'khor lo brgyad par btsan gyi sngags// tsa tsa ra te thum/ shu la then po ri sha ka ya ba te khraM bri ya du ya khraM/ glang dmar dag gi rwa ru gzhug/ kha ru 'dzam
bu gling bzhi'i gzugs kyis mnan// 'thas par brdzis la brag dmar po'i them pa la mnan no// des ni gzer nad dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'byung po btsan

gyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// shog bu gtsang ma dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni lnga pa bris// dbus su dmigs pa ming dang rus// mtha' ma btsan gyi sngags ni 'khor lo la// rA dza sho la

khraM/ mu tri khraM gzer/ rbad du na si ri khraM/ bri du khra ma yaM na rbad/ de ltar bris la 'khor lo bril// 'phar ba dmar po'i thod pa ru// 'byung ba brag gi them la mnan// des ni brgyal thabs dag gis 'chi// de nas

brag btsan dmar pos rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// sdang bya 'ug pa'i thod pa ru// dmigs pa kun gyi ming dang rus// brag btsan sngags kyis bskor la bzhag/ tsa tsha baM ri sad de yaM ba bdeng

la khram gzer rgyug/ brang skor chod chum dril rmugs stobs yang khraM ti/ de ltar bris la 'khor lo gril// thod pa de yi nang du gzhug/ dmar po dar gyis kha bkab pa// brag dmar de yi them la gnan// des ni
skems shing rid nas 'chi// de nas skyes bu lung btsan gyis rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// dmigs pa du yod ming dang gzugs// gro ga dag la bris byas la// rwa yi thod par dril la kha yang
btsem// de ni dar gyis gril nas su// ming byang mtha' mar btsan gyi sngags// oM then 'u ke ru traM yer ga ti rbad/ de ltar byas la lung gsum mdo ru mnan byas la/ des ni dmigs pa dmyal thag gcod/ de
nas yang btsan sil ma stong sdes rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ras dkar dag la 'khor lo ste// rtsibs ni brgyad par bris byas la/ de la btsan gyi sngags kyis bskor// dbus su dmigs

pa'i ming rus bcas// 'khor lo ra yi thod par gzhug/ o ta tse gur bi lang ling mu khraM/ yer zhung tsa tsa ta le pad ya khraM te/ zhes bya ba bris la kha dar dmar pos bcad la/ gong gsum du sbas na dmigs bya
'chor mi srid do// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las btsan la gtad pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po srog bdag mched bzhis rang rang gi
gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ras dkar dag la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ dbus su dmigs pa'i yan lag rdzogs bris la// ming rus de ru bri bar bya// mtha' mar/ 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
bshigs pas 'di khyed la gtad do// bzhes shig ces bya'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri ba'i sngags// oM rA tsa a ti rbad shad/ ti muM yer ba a ti pa ya/ a dza khri ti ya/ ma ta taM ti ya rbad/ oM bi bu

la gang lo sad in+t+ra ya zhung/ zhes pa bris la rta dkar po'i thod par gzhug/ dpral bar mkhar tshul dpral ris mdzod// mig gnyis sna gnyis kha dang ag tse gnyis te brgyad/ dpral bar phug pa dang/ dgu ru
tshang bshos dgu gzhug/ de nas skor khang ngam mchod rten 'og tu sbas na/ dmigs pa gtan la phebs par the tshom med/ de nas yang rgyal po chen po bzhis gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// stag gzig

gi thod par ming dang rus bcug la/ rgyal po'i sngags kyis bskor/ oM be ba ta ka ru ba tri khraM/ oM baM ru baM raM sad khre/ oM be ru yi pa na khraM/ oM be ta gaM taM khraM ti/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskor la/ skor khang dag

tu gnan par bya'o// des ni dmigs pa 'chor mi srid/ de nas rgyal po sil ma stong gis rang rang gi las 'di dag smras so// lkugs pa lug gi thod pa ru// de ru ming dang rus bcug la// rgyal po dag gi sngags

kyis bskor// a ting sad khad ba ru na bri shu shag khraM ste yo ga dbab pa ni seng/ de yis bskor la kha bcad/ mchod rten 'og tu mnan/ des ni las rnams 'grub par bshad// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ rgyal po la gtad pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ ma bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// dur khrod ras ma dag la
ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gsum ste// dbus su gru gsum dmigs pa du yod gzugs// yan lag nying lag rdzogs par bri// 'khor lo rnams la bdud mo'i sngags// g.yon bskor du ni khrag gis bri// ru ru

rak+sha tsa la khraM ya ma traM pa li/ bra tog kha la hu+u ra ya/ ma ma rak+sha ru lu/ sa ma ya thibs/ thuM thuM rtsal breng breng ya tri sad mu ting ya/ b+h+yo rag mo tsa la 'dus/ tig sna kha yi ma dur tsen yang/ khraM ti dza hur snying la laM/

sa ma ya thibs/ sa ma ya rub zhung thun ya/ bri ma shag laM sad srog la ni myur ya/ de ltar 'khor lo dril la rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ de nas dur khrod du sba/ des na rims nad mang pos 'chi// lha
'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo la gtad pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag
smras so// rigs bye dmar po'i thod pa ru// dmigs pa'i ming dang rus bcas nas// oM lag+sha ruM ting khram gzer ya/ kha yang dug gis gcad par bya// lung gsum mdo ru mnan sbas na// khrag skyugs nad kyis
'chi bar 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gnod sbyin la gtad pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the'u rang stong rtsa gcig gis

rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// bong bu+u rna ring thod pa ru// gro ga shog bu dag la ni// dmigs pa'i ming dang gzugs rus gzhug/ the'u rang stong gi sngags kyis mtha' yang bskor// oM leM leM gaM

gaM tri ni in+d+ra gaM ba rod te sa ma ya rbad gtubs sod ya/ pra ku ru sod/ de yis bskor la thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ thod pa shing rkang gcig gam yal ga can du sba// des ni brdab snol bzung gdug dag dang
ni// smyo 'bog nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the'u rang la gtad pa'i le'u bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang ja la ma rnams kyis gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras

so// snel dri mo ye thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs ni sum cu gnyis// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri ba'i sngags// ram pa ni gur na sad ti gaM duM laM shad ser/ sad khram yu to mu ma lam pa ni/ zhes pa de dag bris nas
su/ dbus su dmigs pa'i ming rus bcas par bya// lung gsum mdo 'am rgya gram lam// mnan pas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ja la ma la gtad pa'i le'u
bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan las kyi spyan sngar/ sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pas/ rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ra rog po'i thod pa'am glang ru'i nang du/ dmigs pa

du yod pa'i ming byang bcug nas su/ ming rus mtha' ma sa bdag sngags// the se laM pa guM na yaM/ ma yi ta pa la taM pa na/ de nas rwa de sba ba ni/ sa bdag gnas pa'i gnas g.yas su sba/ des ni zha grum skam pas
'chi bar 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag la gtad pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang klu rnams kyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ras

dkar gtsang ma dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas su// dbus su dmigs pa'i yan lag nying lag rdzogs par bri// 'khor lo rnams la klu yi sngags// nA ga le dum pa le/ sum ba le hu ya khraM ti ya/

dung ya dung dung ya/ bra tad kar ne ye/ phyi phu lu+u sa ma ti ma ti nA ga ra tsa kyi long yA/ de ni 'khor lo dag la g.yon bskor bri// 'dis nyes 'di la bka' chad phob// klu rnams kyi sku la 'di yis bsngos pa yin

pas/ 'di khyed la gtad do bya'o// chu mig mgo zlum 'og tu mnan// des ni mdze dang phol mig dang// nad sna mang pos dmigs bya 'chor mi srid// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu la gtad pa'i
le'u bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas klu btsan mched gsum gyis/ rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ming byang gzhug pa gong bzhin te// glang ru'i nang du bsag/ klu btsan

sngags ni 'di yin te/ tsa tsa ra tsa nA ga dum pa le ya khraM ti ya/ de ni klu yi mig tu mnan// des ni las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu btsan la gtad pa'i le'u bcu dgu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the'u rang stong rtsa gcig gis bskor zhing phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi las 'di dag tshigs su bcad pa smras so// bdag cag rnams ni 'chos pa

na// gtsang ma'i gnas ni btsal nas su// gtsang ma'i ris kyi gzhi bting la// 'bru sna rin chen rdzas rnams bsag/ gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna bcu gsum ngar phye la// rin chen phye mar byin
gyis brlab// ri rab ldem pa brtsigs nas su// kha dog 'gram bag rigs dang bstun// smyug ma gtsang ma nam mkha' tshon rdzogs gur// ri rab de la gzug par bya// rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs gzug par

bya// nam mkha' tshon rdzogs stong rtsa gcig/ mda' bkra de bzhin stong rtsa gcig/ gong thum stong rtsa gcig/ ngar bu stong rtsa gcig/ bya stong rtsa gcig/ 'brang rgyas stong rtsa gcig/ chang bshos stong rtsa

gcig/ gsob stong rtsa gcig/ shar du bshos bu stong rtsa gcig la/ mda' bkra stong rtsa gcig dgod/ lho ru ngar bu stong la/ nam mkha' stong rtsa gcig/ bya stong rtsa gcig la/ phod stong rtsa gcig/ chang bshos

stong rtsa gcig la/ gong thum stong rtsa gcig gzug/ glang dang stag dang seng ge la sogs pa'i gzugs shar du bsag/ lug dang bya ni nub tu bsag/ ra dang spyang 'phar ri dwags byang du bsag/ dom dred spyang ki

rnga mo bong bu dang// mdzo rtol dwe'u'i gzugs ni mtha' ma bskor// shar du rta thod stong rtsa gcig/ lho ru stag gzig gi thod pa stong rtsa gcig/ nub tu mdzo rtol thod pa stong rtsa gcig/ byangadu bong bu dre'u dang sha

zan gyi thod pa stong rtsa gcig/ phud dang rin chen dar gyi yol// lcags su lcags zangs gser dngul phye// dung dang bse dang spos chang dang// spyan gzigs dkor cha de bzhin bsogs// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i

rgyud chen po las/ the'u rang stong rtsa gcig gi bsogs pa'i le'u nyi shu pa'o//// hUM/ bdag cag rnams ni the'u rang stong rtsa gcig ste// la la de ba lha yi rigs te srid pa'i nor 'dzin byed// la la 'chi

bdag bdud kyi bu ste bsad bcad las la dga'// la la nga rgyal btsan gyi bu ste sha la gcod sbyong byed// la la srid pa rgyal chen rigs te srog gi ging pa mdzad// la la gnod sbyin sde yi rigs te sha dang khrag
la dga'// la la ma mo byad ma'i rigs te stong gsum rgyug 'gro byed// la la klu yi rgyal po'i sde ste zhe sdang gdug pa che// la la 'jig rten byad ma byed cing la la tshe len dbugs len byed// stong
gsum rgyug 'gro byed pa stong gi rtsa gcig ste// pha ni 'byung ba nam mkha' nas// 'od kyi ming la ya mtshan can/ dkar po mig gcig yin par nges// ma ni 'byung ba nam mkha' nas// srid pa'i bdag mo yin

par nges// bu ni the'u rang stong dang rtsa gcig yin// zhe sdang sems dang gti mug sems// nga rgyal sems dang 'dod chags sems// de las dregs pa'i the'u rang stong rtsa gcig/ pha ni srid pa dkar po yin// ma

ni sa yi srid pa'i bdag/ bu ni the'u rang stong rtsa gcig/ srid pa kun gyi bu yin te// srid pa gsum la dbang yang byed// stong gsum dregs pa thams cad kyang// la la bdag cag rnams kyi pha/ la la bdag cag

rnams kyi ma// la la bdag cag rnams kyi bu// la la bdag cag rnams kyi sde// bdag cag rnams la ma gtogs gang yang med// bdag cag rnams kyi srid pa'i rgyud 'gro byed// tshe dang srog ni blang ba la// thang

gcig yud la the tshom med// ltos pa kun gyi tshe yang bsring// bstan pa bshig pa rnams ni bsgral bar bya// la la byang chub sems dpa'i sde// sa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba byed// sems la

zhe sdang mi mnga' ste// 'khor ba srog gcad the'u rang gnas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// srid pa'i dkar po spyan gcig kyang// 'od kyi mi dkar ldem pa la// 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i na bza' gsol// chibs

su zer gsum dag la chibs// g.yas na gser gyi nyi ma dgu// g.yon na shel gyi zla ba dgu// bar na gza' brgyad rgyu skar nyi shu brgyad// 'ja' yi thod pa dung gi ral pa can// khyod ni skyes chen mi bo che// de

ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// lan cig sprul cing 'ong ba'i tshe// g.yu yi mi sngon ldem pa gcig/ chibs su g.yu rta bya gdengs chibs// dbu la 'ja' yi thod du bcings// sku la rma bya'i thul pa gsol// shel gyi
bu chung sku gzugs 'bar// dbu la 'ja' thod ma lags te// nad kyi dbu rgyan can/ rma bya'i thul pa ma lags te/ dug gi ri mo can/ bu chung ma lags te/ sgrol ging chen por 'dug/ khyod ni srid pa kun gyi

bdag po ste/ the'u rang stong gi sprul pa 'gyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ the'u rang ni stong rtsa gcig/ brgya ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs// brgya ni de ba lha yi rigs// chibs su shwa ba yu mo
chibs// lus ni gser mdog ser po la// g.yas pa brgya na lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yon pa brgya na ga'u bsnams// srid pa gsum gyi longs spyod rku zhing bsogs// gser mkhar ser po sgo gcig nang na
gnas// bsam pa'i nor dgu dang ni brab pa'i lcags dgu dang// yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin par byed// rin chen sna lnga dag la dbang mdzad cing// lha yi bu mo brgya dang rol// nor dang

longs spyod bsam mi khyab// la la dag la phan par byed// la la dag la gnod par byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// brgya ni zhe sdang bdud kyi bu yin te// sha dang khrag la longs spyod cing// stong gsum
rgyug 'gro byed pa'o// lcags kyi mi chen ldem pa brgya// mgo la sa ti yug re bcings// lag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs// lcags mkhar sgo gcig nang na gnas// 'chi bdag bdud kyi pho nya ste// bcu ni

lcags spyang sngon po zhon nas rgyug/ g.yas na lcags kyi khram bam bsnams// g.yon na zangs kyi sog le bsnams// skye 'gro lings su 'debs shing sha khrag rlon pa za// sha la 'breng brgya rtse gcig gcod sbyong

byed// khrag la hubs kyis 'debs shing spyugs pa'i gad mo bgad// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// drug cu stag dgu+u ra khra zhon te rgyug/ skyes pa rnams kyi bla yang len// na chung rnams kyi srid kyang

'phrog/ g.yas pa lcags kyi s+t+wa re thogs// g.yon pa lcags kyi dra ba thogs// stong gsum khyab par byed pa'o// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bcu ni dom bu nag gu zhon nas rgyug/ stong gsum khyab par nyul

byed pa// g.yas pa brgya ni 'ug pa khra ru thogs// ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs par byed// skye 'gro ma lus gsod do zer// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// brgya ni btsan gyi bang chen ni// zangs mkhar dmar

po'i nang na gnas// zangs mkhar bse yi sgo gcig ma// nga rgyal btsan gyi bu ste srid gsum rgyug 'gro byed// spyugs pa'i glu ru di ri ri// btsan stan stong gi kha lo byed// drug cu rtsa gcig zangs kyi 'phar ba

dmar po re re zhon nas rgyug/ sha yi brdal du byed cing rnag khrag mtsho ltar 'khyil// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// sum cu zangs kyi mi reng khres khur can// zangs kyi lba ba khur tsam re// lag na zangs

'khar dmar po thogs// kha ni dkar gyi thog nyab po// skyur gyi drungs 'byin no// phyugs la shan dmar byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// dgu ni zangs kyi bya dmar dgu la zhon// mgo la dar dmar thod
du bcings// zangs zhags dmar po mda' ltar 'phen// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// sum brgya rgyal po'i bka' nyan de// dung gi mi chen re res rta dkar phrum dmar zhon nas rgyug/ la la ban glang dkar

po zhon nas rgyug/ la la khyi dkar zhon nas srid pa kun la dbang byed pa// mi dkar ldem pa gcig/ phyag na lpags dkar rgyal mtshan 'phyar// ral pa'i lpags dkar lde tshon g.yab pa'i tshe// srid pa'i the'u
rang stong sde 'dar zhing rgyug/ de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ dung gi mi dkar ldem pa brgya// lus la dar dkar ral ga gsol// dbu la nor bu'i rgyan spras pa// phyag na shel gyi mkhar ba
bsnams// srid pa kun la dbang byed pa// stong gsum rgyug 'gro byed cing rgyal po'i dmag tshogs g.yob// bdud dang ma yams g.yob cing rims nad mang po gtong// lcags gri lag na thogs nas rgyal po'i

ging ba mdzad// mi la nad du gtong zhing phyugs la god bdag mdzad// srid pa kun tu rgyug cing phung khrol las byed pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// zangs kyi mi chen mche ba rgya zor 'dra// mgo la

zangs kyi 'ob log can// ba skya yu mo zhon nas rgyug/ mna' dang gzu yi dpang po mdzad// lha 'dre kun gyi sna 'dren pa'o// gcig ni bse yi mi chen la// lus la sles khra gos su gon// mgo la 'phying ser yib
zhu can// lag na 'om mkhar dmar po thogs// khros chen khur zhing skyi ser mchan na sdig/ srid dang kha rje kha ru 'jug/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang/ gcig ni skya ral thul pa can// lag na zangs
nag thogs byed cing// dkar dang dmar dang sngo thab gsum// thab sna gsum gyi sna yang drangs// bdud btsan rgyal po ma yams dang// sa bdag klu gnyan g.yob 'dren byed// de yang srid pa'i mdos bzhes

dang// gcig ni bong bu dmar khra zhon nas rgyug/ ba dan rtse gsum phyag na bsnams// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang du sdud cing gum gcod las la dga'// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// nyi shu rtsa gcig g.yu

yi mi sngon la// dar gyi gos la 'ja' yi thod// ske na dung gi lba ba khur tsam skyes// de srid dra ba zhon zhing rgyug/ ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs byed cing// srid gsum skye 'gro ma lus kun// bsad de bcad do

zer zhing rgyug/ dkar po spyan gcig ging ba mdzad// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang/ sprul pa brgya ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed// brgyad cu srid pa'i gzu+u dpang mdzad// legs nyes zhal lce gcod cing

bka' yi bang chen mdzod// sum cu rtsa gnyis dpal gyi lhag ma sdud cing 'jig rten byol zlog byed/ srid pa'i the'u rang rgyal gyi tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ brgya ni 'jig rten phung khrol byed

cing srid pa chen po'i skos// la la rngam pa stag gi mgo ste gang la babs pa len par byed// la la lkugs pa lug gi dbu ste gang la bab pa myos par byed// la la smyon pa dom gyi mgo ste smyo 'bog nad rnams

gtong// la la mi lus dred kyi mgo ste thams cad brgyal bar byed cing dngangs par byed// la la spyi ring yib zhu can// la la 'greng khur mi reng po// la la dud 'gro sna tshogs zhon// la la glog dang 'od la
chibs// la la 'bog dang brgyal thabs gtong// la la srid pa'i bang phyin byed// la la cho len dbugs len byed// la la stabs bsnol zungs rmugs gtong// la la yod pa med par byed// la

la gang ba stongs par byed// la la dag la phan par byed// longs spyod ma lus 'phel bar byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// nyis brgya 'dzam gling tshe srog dbugs kyi bang chen pa/ mang ba tshes mtho
re/ spyi ring len to re/ 'dus pa se to re/ mkhar gsum dag la gnas kyang bcas// bse mkhar sgo gcig dung mkhar sgo gcig dang// lcags mkhar sgo gcig nang na gnas// 'khor yang the'u rang stong sde

'gyed// lha yi bu mo chung ma yin// yid bzhin nor bu 'tsho bar byed// lha la phung khrol mang bas gsang bdag thugs khros pas// des kyang dam la btags pa de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang/ the'u rang la

sogs la la ri rab rtse skor byed// la la 'byung ba dbang bsgyur ba/ sa the'u ser po dang/ chu the'u sngon po dang/ bar the'u khra chen dang/ the'u rang 'byung lnga la/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'bul lo// la la mi ni in+d+ra

zhes bya ste// rgyal 'gong chen po drug cu gcig/ ngan 'gong ni sum cu lnga/ byur 'gong nyi shu gcig/ mi lus spre'u mgo can// kha ser so ser lce ser gsum// nyin bzhin grogs po phug rdug nyal// mtshan zhing

grong khyer khyab par nyul/ byur 'gong lba ba can/ mi rang 'greng khur can/ 'khar skya so skya lag na thogs/ phung 'gong ra slag can/ zangs kyi lba ba khur tsam skyes/ brgyad cu sa bdag klu gnyan dag dang

bsdongs// skrangs dang 'bur gyi nad du byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ rtsa gcig 'dus kyi 'debs byed ma// lha 'dre kun gyi sna 'dren mo// rtsa gcig ni the rang la/ bcu gcig srid pa'i nor dang
longs spyod dang// dkor khang gnyan po srung bar byed// nor dang longs spyod bsrung ma ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// dgu ni srid pa'i 'gong po ste// gnam la gnas pa spun gsum
byung// gnam the'u dkar po dang/ gnam lha byang chub dang/ gnam lha dkar po gsum// dar dkar ser dkar lpags dkar gon// dung mkhar shel mkhar spa mkhar gsum// rgyal mtshan gsum ni phyag na
bsnams// bya rgod seng ge khyi dkar gsum la bcibs// gnam khyi dkar po mched gsum yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// bar na gnas pa'i spun gsum la// dri bse ba bse lag bse
gsum// khri gcig dre si pa ti'i thod// lcags mkhar 'od 'bar bsnams/ stag dang gzig dang bya rgod rgyal mtshan bsnams// sa la gnas pa'i the rang spun gsum yang// the sem chu ring gsum/ chu dang me dar
sa dar gon// rgyal mtshan gsum ni lag na thogs// zo skya 'khar skya rgyal mtshan 'dzin// srid pa'i the rang spun gsum yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// the rang stong dang rtsa gcig
kyang// zhe sdang dag ni da khrol la// dang ba'i sems kyis glud 'di longs// stong gi sde dpon gyis gsungs bzhin// bka' las ma 'da' glud 'di bzhes// 'byung ba ri rab brten pa'i glud// nam mkha' 'di
rnams yul du 'bul// rin chen nam mkha' gzhal yas khang// mda' bkra 'di rnams mkhar du 'bul// rin chen rgyu las grub pa'i mkhar// rin chen 'di rnams gter du bsngo// zad med gter la
longs spyod cing// gzugs brnyan 'di rnams gter du bsngo// dkor gyi longs spyod chen por bsngo// sgra snyan 'di ni gsung gi glud// gzugs brnyan 'di ni sku yi glud// snang gsal 'di ni sems kyi

glud// dang po srid pa'i dpe/ de nas 'jig rten nor bdun dang// spyan gzigs dkor cha zas su bsngo// the brang sde sde mang po dang// sngon gyi lan chags ded pa'am// zas nor 'dod phyir rgyu ba yang// mthun
pa'i las su bshams/ sha chang rgyu ru 'don/ bden pa'i tshig gis bkrol/ mdog bzang dag par byin gyis brlab// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mchod// da ni the rang stong phrag brgyad// ltos pa rnams la grogs
kyang mdzad// zhe sdang ngan pa zhi bar gyis// da ni gshegs so gnas su gshegs// dang po byung ba'i gnas su gshegs// rigs dang sde ni snyog nas gshegs/ ri rab kha la gshegs/ stong phrag dag ni gnas su
gshegs// rin chen sna lnga'i 'khor du gshegs// gdug pa thams cad zhi bar gyis// zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the rang stong rtsa gcig bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu gcig
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po srog bdag mched bzhis/ rang rang gi bcos pa'i thabs tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gra phying gtsang ma'i gzhi steng du// 'bru sna

tshang ba'i ngar phye la// dbang gi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rin chen phye mar byin gyis brlab// de la ri rab chen po brtsig par bya// kha dog ni rigs dang bstun// smyug ma gtsang ma nam mkha'i gur// dar dang me

long dag gis brgyan// rta thod dang ni bong thod dang// ba dan dang ni 'phan gyis brgyan// rin chen khri ni mdzes pa ru// bshos bu ldem pa bzhi ni bzhag/ dkar po gnyis dang rtsa dmar dang// phrag pa can dang
bzhi po la// mda' mkhar thabs ma dang chu ris mig/ rmog mgo mkhar thabs chu 'babs bzhi ni de la gzug par bya// nam mkha' dkar po dang ni dmar po dang// rin chen tshang dang brgyan pa bzhi// bshos bu
dag la gzug par bya// bya dang khyi dang rta yi gzugs// g.yag dang ra dang lug gi gzugs// spre'u dang ni glang gi gzugs// bse phor mtshan ldan nang du ni// phud dang spyan gzigs bsham par
bya// srid pa'i 'gong po la bshos bu dgu brgya dang// mda' bkra lpags bu'i thod kyis brgyan pa bsog/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po spyi bcos bsogs kyi le'u nyi shu gnyis
pa'o//// hUM/ phyogs phyogs dag kyang pha gi na// nyi ma shar phyogs pha gi na// shel yul dkar po pha gi na// shel mkhar dkar po gnam du zangs se zang// dung gi sgo mo thabs se thab// de yi nang

shed na/ ya cho dkar po bzhugs/ mi gcig po la ming gsum po// rgya gar chos kyi skad du ni// shar lha chen po zhes kyang bya// yi dwags bon gyi g.yung drung mon nam skad du ni// btsan 'gong rgyal po zhes kyang

bya// dam pa chos kyi skad du ni// rdo rje legs mchog zhes kyang bya// khyod kyi pha smos pa/ yar lha bshos kyi skyes gcig pa zhes kyang bya/ yang yar lha shod kyi skyes to re zhes kyang bya/ ma ni srid pa'i bdag mo
yin// de nyid thugs kyi sprul pa las// sras ni lcam dral gnyis byung ste// ming po ya cho dkar po yin// sring mo ma btsun u chos g.yar mo sil// ming po bcos su gsol/ ya cho dkar po de/ mi dkar bla na

'phyo// rta dkar 'og na 'phyo// skyogs dkar ta la la/ dang po li'i yul nas babs pas/ li yi phyag tu glud phul bas/ li pa sad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas yang le shod du byon// yang le'i phyag tu glud

phul bas// yang pa sad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas mi nyag yul du babs// mi nyag gis phyag tu glud phul bas// lteng ro sad kyi rgyal por bya// de nas zhang zhung yul du babs// zhang zhung gi phyag tu glud
phul bas/ spyan mig g.yas pa shel du 'dug pas shel dkar btags// sku la dar dkar mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// seng ge dkar mo'i thod pa can// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs// 'gong po

rnams kyi bdag po byed// glud la rnam pa gsum byung ste// dang po g.yag dkar dang mdzo dkar dang/ ra dkar gnya' nag dang gsum zhig byung/ bar yang se dang lug se dang bya se dang gsum zhig byung/ tha ma
bshas su chag gang dang/ skyems 'phang smyug ma tshigs dgu'i bdag po lags// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ gnam rim pa bcu gsum yar steng na// mkhar nye brtsegs pa'i yang steng na// srog bdag

dkar po spyan gcig bzhugs/ khyed kyi pha smos pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting shed na// chu srin chen po ma tang ga/ khyod kyi ma smos pa/ srid pa'i rgyal mo yin/ gnas pa bar snang dag la gnas// de nyid thugs kyi
sprul pa las// ming po dkar po spyan gcig yin// sring mo e ka ral gcig ma// ming po de ni bcos su gsol// srog bdag dkar po de spyan gcig pa// dbu+u la ral gcig sha ra ra// dpral

nas mig gcig lhangs se lhang// zhal nas tshems gcig thabs se thab// gzi mig khra bo chi li li// sma ra nag po phya ra ra// phyag sor nag po shad de shad// 'bar ba'i rnga chung glo la btags// khang pa kun

kyang 'od kyis khengs// srog bdag dkar po 'od po che// gnam ral phyed kyi bdag po lags// sa chu phyed kyi bdag po lags// mi dkar bla na ldem/ rta dkar 'og na 'phyo/ phyag na sba dkar ta la la/ skyes pa
pho brgya'i srog gi bdag po yin// sku la zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na lcags gri rnon po bsnams/ glud kyi dang po ni/ g.yag dkar lug dkar dang/ mdzo dkar ru dmar dang/ rta dkar phrum dmar
gyi bdag po lags/ bar pa lug dkar po bya nag dang/ khyi dkar sna dmar dang/ bya dkar ze dmar gyi bdag po yin/ tha ma bshos bu ldem pa dang// skyems 'phang dar 'phen dang/ smyug ma tshigs dgu'i
bdag po yin/ glud bdag glud bzhes dang/ byang phyogs pha gi na/ yam shud dmar po bzhugs/ byang ri dmar po'i kha la bzhugs/ rtse la gnod sbyin stobs chen gnas// zur la yam shud dmar po
bzhugs// rtsa na btsan btsun phyag brnyan 'khrul// zangs mkhar dmar po ldems se ldem// zangs mkhar dmar po ldem pa la// logs rim bse yi sgo mo gsal// mthing shun sngon po'i ri bzhi la// byu ru dmar
po'i g.yag shing la// zangs khri dmar po'i gdan steng na// yam shud dmar po bzhugs pa lcags zhul khug gsol/ phyag na zangs kyi zhags pa 'dom dgu brgya dgu bcu bsnams// zam mo brgya'i srog gi
bdag po yin// sku la zangs khrab dmar po gsol// glud kyi dang po ba dmar glang gi bdag po yin// bar pa bya dmar gro dang/ lpags bu gro se'i bdag po yin// tha ma smyug ma tshigs dgu dang// bshos
mchog skyems 'phang bdag po lags// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ yul khu le khu stod na/ shar lho mtshams shed na/ blon po khu le lag dgu bzhugs// khyod kyi pha smos pa/ lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgu
yin// gnas pa ri rab zom la gnas// khyod kyi ma smos pa/ gser gyi grog ma kha med gcig/ de gnyis sprul pa'i sras/ mi gcig po la lag dgu byung// lag gcig ste 'dzom gnam du snyab/ lag gcig ste
'dzom sa la snyab/ lag gcig bdud kyi gnas su gtong// lag gcig btsan gyi nang du gtong// lag gcig ston gyi lo thog snyab// lag gcig na chung srid la snyab// lag gnyis dkar dang skyur gyi thog kyang
'bab// sku la gser khrab ser po gsol// rgod ma rte'u med 'bri g.yag sham gyi bdag/ chung srid thams cad kyi bdag po yin// bshos bu phrag pa can dang/ mda' bkra spyan gzigs kyis
mchod// phyag brnyan the rang chen po ste// de ring glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ dang po srid pa chags pa'i dpes// ri rab dpag bsam bcas pa'o// nam mkha' yul du 'bul
lo// mda' ni mkhar du 'bul lo// sems can gzugs brnyan dkor du 'bul// spyan gzigs dkor cha skyems kha gser// sbu ron khungs dag sha chang rgyus su 'don// da ni gnas su gshegs/ mkhar chen
bzhi ni slebs te gshegs/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po mched bzhi bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan thams cad kyis rang rang
gi bcos pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa gtsang dben pa'i gnas su btsal nas su// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba'i gsang phye la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin

bya// ri rab de ni brtsig par bya/ kha dog rigs dang smyug ma nam mkha'i gur// nam mkha'i kha dog rigs dang sbyar// dkar po drug dang ser po lnga// sngon po lnga dang dmar po lnga// nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ dar
dang spyan gzigs dkor cha bya// phud dang rin chen de dag bsog/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi bcos kyi le'u nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// hUM yul dang btsan yul pha gi na// btsan

yul pho gsum pha gi na// btsan mkhar dmar po gnam du thongs pa pha gi na// bse yi byan lag lings se ling// bse yi khyi mo kangs se kang// bse rta dmar po tse re re// de na btsan gyi rgyal po bzhugs// kha
