drag bdud la rgol// mthu che phya la 'khu/ 'gran tshol rgyal la tshol// mi lus g.yag gi mgo/ dpral na kha gcig mig gnyis po// ltag na kha gcig mig gnyis po// g.yas na kha gcig mig gnyis po// g.yon
na kha gcig mig gnyis po/ kha bzhi mig brgyad byung/ rta gcig lus po la// rmig pa brgyad par byung// lag rmig bzhi dang rkang rmig bzhi// mgyogs pa sde brgyad yin// lag na bse yi gzhu mo dang// bse

mda' dmar po thogs// sku la bse khrab zhul khung gsol// dbu ni srid pa'i khams su gsig/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// 'byung ba ni lnga yi btsan// shar phyogs pha gi na// sa bdag dngul gyi bu// dung

mkhar skya mo la// g.yu yi kha bad can// mthing gi re bzhi la// g.yu yi sgo mo can// de yi nang shed na// mi dkar ldem pa gcig/ rta dkar phrum dmar gcig/ dung phub sku+u la gsol// btsan mda' btsan gzhu
bsnams// dri za stong la dbang bsgyur ba// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ lho phyogs pha gi na// 'byung ba chu yi bu// mi sngo rta sngo ste// lcags mkhar sngon po'i nang na gnas// btsan mda' btsan
gzhu phyag na bsnams// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ nub phyogs pha gi na// zangs mkhar dmar po'i nang shed na// me dang drod kyi bu// mi dmar rta ru dmar// btsan mda' btsan gzhu bsnams// mdos
bdag mdos bzhes dang// nyi ma byang gi btsan// rlung dang ngad kyi bu// mi ser rta ru ser// gser mkhar ser po'i nang na gnas// btsan mda' btsan gzhu phyag na bsnams// byang btsan stong la dbang sgyur
cing// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ dbus btsan mi smug rta ru smug/ mchod mkhar smug po'i nang na gnas// dbus btsan stong la dbang sgyur ba// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ gnam btsan ding ba
de// 'byung ba nam mkha'i dbang sgyur byed// g.yas dkar ldong rum ni// mi dkar rta dkar btsan// gangs btsan stong la dbang sgyur byed// g.ya' btsan mi sngon de// g.ya' btsan stong la dbang sgyur

byed// spang btsan mi ser rta ser ba// spang btsan kun la dbang sgyur byed// nags btsan mi nag rta nag de// nags btsan steng la dbang sgyur ba// g.ya' btsan mi bkra rta bkra btsan// de ring srid pa'i mdos
bzhes shig/ brag btsan mi dmar rta dmar de// brag gi thabs la gnas/ mi dmar mdung tsam mo// dbu la ral pa me ltar 'bar/ phyag na mdung gi srin mo'i rkang// mi gnas skar chen char ltar

'bebs// chibs su brag gi rtsangs pa chibs// rol du srin bya'i bu mo rol// brag gi wa mo kha nag zhon// brag bya 'ug pa khra ru thogs// gos su brag gi dreg pa gon// zas su brag rgya ha 'o za// skom du brag
chu'i thigs pa 'thung// brag btsan 'bum gyi kha lo sgyur// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// btsan yul pha gi na/ btsan mkhar ldem pa ya gi na// skyi ma lung gsum ya gi na// skyes bu lung btsan
bzhugs// skyes bu'i lus la ci gsol na// dmar po dar gyi ral ga gsol// chibs su btsan rta ser po chibs// stag ral g.yas la gzig shub g.yon// lan 'ga' zhags pa mda' ltar 'phen// btsan gyi
ral gri skya 'byam btags/ bse zhu dmar po la/ phod dkar ldems se ldem/ kha drag bdud la rgol/ bdud la do yang bsngo// cho long 'thab gsum btab/ 'thab kyis pham ma myong/ lung btsan stong gis kha lo
sgyur// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ yul dang btsan yul pha gi na// mi lus glang gi mgo bo can// lag na shing ris rgyan mkhar thogs/ kha nas khrag gzer mda' ltar
'phen// mi la gzer ba'i nad du mdzad// btsan mi yi lus la rta yi mgo bo can// lag na bse phor dmar po thogs// mig nas me dang 'od du gtong// kha nas gdug pa'i nang du gtong// sna
nas rlung dang bu yug gtong// lag na btsan zhags mda' ltar 'phen// mi la bdud du byed cing phyugs la sha bdal gtong// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig glud bdag glud bzhes shig/ btsan mi lus shwa
ba'i mgo bo can// lag na gdug pa'i mtshon thogs la// kha nas gdug pa'i skyugs pa gtong// sho rde'u dmar po mi la 'debs// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ btsan ni ya ba rkya bdun te/ btsan rta dmar

po zhon nas btsan zhags mda' ltar 'phen// skyes pa'i bdud gcod na chung srid kyang rku// ya ma skya rnga dang ni skya gsum dang// ya ma skya gcig 'khor dang bcas// btsan rta dmar po zhon nas btsan zhags

mda' ltar 'phen// gang la bab pa brgyal bar byed// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ btsan phran stong sde yang/ la la brag dang chu la gnas// brag bu skya re la/ btsan bran skya re gnas/ la la shing dang rdo la
gnas// la la mtsho dang rten la gnas// la la mkhar dang rdzong la gnas// brag btsan stong sde yang/ btsan rta ni re re chibs/ la la rgyan gyis mdzes pa ste/ nad du gzer nad gtong// mdos bdag mdos

bzhes shig/ dur btsan ni mi smug te/ rta smug tse re re/ se btsan ni mi nag ste/ rta nag ni tse re re/ skye btsan ni chen po la/ mi dkar rta dkar btsan/ klu btsan mched de gsum/ mched po klu btsan nag po
lags/ chibs su sbal pa nag po chibs// nya nag sbrul nag thul pa gsol// se bdud se btsan sprul par gtong// chu mig nag po dag la gnas// klu btsan ser po ste/ sbal pa ser po chibs/ nya chen rtsa
mo'i thul pa gsol// brag btsan 'bum dang bcas/ klu btsan dmar po ste/ glang dmar ru dkar chibs/ sku la spyang mo'i thul pa gsol// brag btsan ni sprul par gtong/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// dri
btsan khran dang rje/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ 'jig rten dpe mchis so// bden pa'i tshig mchis so// nor dang dkor mchis so// gsol ba'i zas mchis so// mdos bdag mdos bzhes
shig/ mda' ni nam mkha' la/ nam mkha' yul du 'bul/ zas kyis mchod la nor gyi gter// btsan po gnyan mchod na/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan
bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ ya bdud bcu gsum phyag brnyan dang bcas pas rang rang gi las 'di dag smras so// 'bru sna tshang ba'i dar phye la// dar
nag rgyan dang bcas pa gnyis// dar nag gcig la mda' bcu gsum// kha dog rigs dang bstun par bya// bshos bu bcu gsum rtse nag bya// lug nag bya nag de bzhin bsag/ phud dang mda'
dang rin chen bsag/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ya bdud bcu gsum la yas bsag pa'i le'u nyi shu drug pa'o//// yul de bdud yul nag po pha gi na// lcags mkhar gnam du zangs
se zang// rtsa ba gser la rtse mo g.yu// rtse dgu gnam du zangs se zang/ de na bdud kyi rgyal po bzhugs// gnam bdud thod pa'i phreng ba can// me ni sa chu me dang sbrul// ya bdud

bcu gsum byung// sring mo bcu gsum byung// che yang bdud kyis bsad/ chung yang bdud kyis bsad/ bdud las gnyan ma mchis/ bdud kyi rgyal po ba/ re ste mgo yag de/ rta nag ri tsam chibs/ zhags nag mda' ltar 'phen/ mi bu
zas su za/ dud 'gro bshas su bsha'/ de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ bdud nag po bkrag med de/ rta nag ri tsam chibs/ zhags pa mda' ltar 'phen/ kha rlangs nag po thu lu lu// sma ra nag po phya ra
ra// phyag sor nag po shad de shad/ bdud sde dang btsan de/ gser gyi mdo bo chibs/ gser zhags mda' ltar 'phen// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// lag pa g.yas na khram bam bsnams// lag pa g.yon
na sho rde 'grem// bdud bran 'bum ni sprul par 'gyed// mi bu rnams kyi bdud gcod pa// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang/ glud bdag glud bzhes dang/ bdud ya le ge shag de/ sku la dung khrab dkar po
gsol// chibs su lkugs pa lug la chibs// lag na lcags kyi sog le bsnams// mi'u ris su gsod/ dud 'gro bshas su byed/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud ma le ge shag ni/ chibs su stag gu
ris bkra chibs// sku la zangs khrab dmar po gsol// phyag na zangs kyi sog le thogs// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud skos kyi bdag po drang dkar de// gnas pa dpag bsam shing gi sked pa dag
la gnas// sku la mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe len byed// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug de// chibs su chu glang nag po chibs// sku la chu dar ral ga
gsol// phyag na bdud kyi zhags pa thogs// bdud phran 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur byed// tshe len dbugs len bdag po yin// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud rje mang
khug de// chibs su gzig ris sa le chibs// lus la zangs nag ber chen gsol// g.yas pa lcags kyi s+t+wa re thogs// g.yon pa lcags kyi gtan pa thogs// mi bdud 'phrang khar gcod par byed// bya bdud
shing khar gcod// rta bdud srab dkar gcod// kha nas so gcig pa/ dpral nas mig gcig pa/ bya mig bzhin du ma sa yar 'gebs// rta so bzhin du khong nas gcod// de ring srid pa'i mdos
bzhes dang// bdud ni stag zhu mched bzhi ste// sku la stag lpags zhul khug gsol// dbu+u la stag zhu rol po gsol// phyag na zangs kyi mkhar ba bsnams// mi gnas me 'bar kha nas khrag gi gru char
'bebs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud lkugs pa 'dzum med bya ba de// chibs su lkugs pa lug la chibs// lus la ba bal nag po gon// kha mi smra la srog la rgol// bdud bran 'bum ni phyag
brnyan 'gyed// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud khyab pa lag ring de// chibs su bya dmar 'dab bzang chibs// lag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha ste// bse yi mdung thung gsor zhing brdeg/ mdos bdag
mdos bzhes shig/ bdud thom pa thom chung bya ba de// sku la zangs ma'i ral kha gsol// chibs su bdud kyi rnga mo chibs// thom ra thom lug bdag po yin// bdud ni 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa// srid pa kun la
dbang byed pa'o// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// shar ba phreng thogs dang/ nyan pa rna gsang dang/ snyab pa lag ring dang/ lta ba mig rnon dang/ bdud kyi phyag brnyan bzhi/ mi yi bdud ma bcad/ dud 'gro
gnya' ma bzung/ bdud lkugs pa lug mgo dang/ rmang rje spyang mgo dang/ gnyis pa dom mgo dang/ gsod pa stag mgo dang/ bdud rje khyed rnams kyang// mthun pa'i yas bzhes shig/ bdud rol po skya dgu
dang/ rol po skya gsum dang/ rol po skya gcig rnams/ de ring srid pa'i mdos shig 'bul// lha bdud gang bu dang/ gnam bdud med pa dang/ bdud rje skol po dang/ bdud ral pa spyi bcings dang/ 'od de
'bar ba dang/ 'od de smyon pa dang/ 'od de thom po dang/ 'od de lkugs pa dang/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ bdud phran stong sde de/ phyag na khram shing re re bsnams// sog le re re phyag na
bsnams// bdud kyi rta ni re re chibs// bdud zhags mda' ltar 'phen/ mi phyugs khram la 'debs/ khams gsum khyab par rgyug/ sha la longs su spyod/ khrag la hub tu 'jal/ srid gsum rgyug 'gong byed/
mi bu bsad do zer/ dud 'gro la shan dmar bya'o zer/ mi yi bdud du ma bab dang// rin chen dar gyi mi chen 'bul// mda' dang nam mkha' mang po 'bul// nor dang dkor cha mang po 'bul// zhes bsngos la
btang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ ma bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di
dag smras so// maN+Dal gtsang ma'i steng du ni// rmang rnams dag ni bting nas su// 'bru sna chang ba'i bshos bu la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// dar nag che ba gcig byas la// tha ma ngar bu
stong gis bskor// yang na bcu gnyis dag gis bskor// nam mkha'i grangs kyang de bzhin du// byas la ngar phye dag la gzug/ mo 'phang g.yu lo bcu gsum ni// dar bu bcu gnyis dag la gzug/ lug dang khyi

dang bya dang mdzo// rtol dang rnga mo bong dre'u rta// bya sna tshogs dang so bya'i gsob dang ni// skyung ka'i gsob dang me long dar sna dang// gseb g.yu 'brang rgyas bcu gnyis bya bcu gnyis// spyan gzigs sha khrag
stag gzig ras ros bsham/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ma bdud gsog pa'i le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ srid pa skos kyi bdag mo ste// nyi ma shar phyogs pha gi na// gnyan yul bya

ba'i gong thang na// khrag mtsho mer ba'i rtsa shed na// bdud kyi skyung ka di ri ri// bdud kyi khyi mo 'drel dang zhungs se zhung// bdud bya nag mo diri ri// ce spyang kang ka di ri ri// ma mo khri 'du stong ni 'du ba'i
gnas// mkhar ze ba gzhog ral ba// bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mo// nag mo ral gcig srid gsum rgyug/ de na ma bdud bcu gsum bzhugs// bdud mo stong sde yang de ru 'du// 'dun stangs gcod cing

sha khrag za// khri gnyer bya ba'i blon mo che// bdud kyi rgyal mo glu la byon// me mkhar de ni nang shed na// mi sha rta sha brums su gtser// mi khrag rta khrag mtsho ltar bskyil// thod pa skam rlon rtsig par brtsigs// de

yi ni mnga' bdag mo// nag mo ral gcig srid pa khyab par rgyug/ bdud bong rkang gsum zhon nas skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// ral nag bsigs pas mun nag khyi li li// khri za khri

sgrol bdud mo kun gyi gtso// sha khrag rlon la za zhing spyugs pa glu len ma// mtshon gyi dru gu rkyong zhing nad kyi rkyal pa 'bud// bal nad mang po gtong bar byed// mi phyugs gnyis ni khyod kyis khram la
'debs// byang dmar dkyus la 'debs shing sho rde dkar nag 'grems/ mi rnams bsad cing mi lpags gos su gon// mgo bcad lag na sgong du rtse bar byed// dmag dpung skyed cing bdud kyi g.yul ngo
zlog/ skye 'gro srang la 'debs shing srid pa nyal thag gcod// bdud mo mi zan mdos longs shig/ de yi gcung mo mi zan ma// nag mo 'ug mgo bya ba yin// chibs su mdzo mo rog mo chibs// nad kyi rkyal pa
khal du 'gel// lag na b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang ba thogs// srid gsum rgyug pa'i mthu mo che// lus la la ba nag po gon// lag na sho rde'u dkar nag 'grems// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// de yi
gcung mo khrag mig ma// bya mo nag mo zhon nas ni// sku la rma bya'i thul pa gsol// lag na par bu dug gis bkang// srid pa kun tu khyab par byed// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long dang// de
yi nu mo gcung mo de// sku la khrag gi re lde gsol// chibs su chu glang nag po chibs// mi gnas me 'bar khrag gi skyin thang 'bebs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// de yi gcung mo bdud mo
ni// bud med ral nag mun ltar gtibs// lus la zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// chibs su rtol bu rwa yon chibs// lag na mtshon gyi dru gu+u bsdog/ chibs su ru yon bskyod pa'i tshe// khams gsum rgyu zhing ma
yams 'dun mar sdud// rdo rje glo ma srin du grags pa yin// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long dang// de yi nu mo gcung mo ni// chibs su dre'u nag rkang gsum chibs// lus la mthing nag gnam gyi gos su
gsol// mig nas khrag 'dzag thu lu lu// lag na g.yu yi zor ba thogs// lag nas thod pa mda' ltar 'phen// bdud mo chen mo go ti ma// chibs su chu rta gzhung chen la// gru dang gzings kyi sga bstad

nas// dar spra sngon po gur du phub// chu bdud stong gi 'dun mar sdud// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// de yi nu mo nag mo kha mchu ma// bud med lus la khA yi mchu// phyag na sle chen g.yab 'dor ma// mdos
bdag chen mo mdos long dang// de yi nu mo gcung mo de// dur khrod kun gyi 'jo le ma// mi mo dred mo yu 'jol ma// lag na lcags mda' lcags gzhu thogs// gang nas gang du rbad pa'i tshe// lcags kyi tshub
nag slong zhing 'gro// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// ma bdud de yi gcung mo ni// g.yu mtsho sngon mo'i gting rum na// bud med g.yu yi go lcog can// gdug pa'i nad rnams 'bebs par
byed// srid pa kun tu rgyug byed cing// kha nas dug gi kha chu 'bebs// lag pas spar gdengs nad gtong ma// gcig ni bdud mo khrol thogs ma// srid pa kun la dbang sgyur ma// bdud mo chen mo mdos long
dang// gcig ni bud med nag mo la// lag na khrag gi phor thogs ma// dur khrod kun tu rgyug par byed// chibs su rtol bu ra dkar chibs// spyugs pa'i brda yis ma mo g.yob// mdos bdag chen mo mdos
longs shig/ bdud mo chen mo bcu gsum dang// 'khor du bdud mo stong tshogs dang// bdud mo khram zan nad gtong ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ mthun pa'i yas ni 'di bzhes shig/ mthun pa'i
dkor nor mang po bzhes// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las ma bdud bcu gsum bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ ja lam sum brgya drug cus
rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnasam ni srid pa nyul le ste// gnas sam sa ni brtags pa der// rmang rnams dag gi gzhi steng du// dbang gi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin ldan
pa des// nas dmar dang ni ram bu dag/ skye tshe dang ni gro dang ni// so ba dang ni 'bru mar dang// de las sbrus pa'i bshos bu la// dbus su ri rab bang rim gcig pa'i ri rab la// nam mkha' sum brgya

drug cu gzug/ kha dog dang ni rigs dang bstun// smyug ma gtsang ma nam mkha'i gur// ri rab de la gzug par bya// ra bu sum brgya drug cu bya// khyi dang bya dang sems can gzugs// de yi grangs su shes par

bya// ri rab de ye tha ma bskor// 'brang rgyas sum brgya drug cu dang// mo 'phang g.yu lo sum brgya drug cu bskor la gzug/ rams skyems tshwa bal bul tog dang// lho rdzas la ras kun kyang gsog/ 'bru sna rin po
che dang sha sna mang po dgram par bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ja la ma bsog pa'i le'u sum cu pa'o//// hUM stong gi sde dpon bka' 'og na// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas

kyang// stong gsum kun tu rgyug 'gro byed pa bdag cag ja la ma// 'jig rtain 'di yi bang chen rnams ni bdag cag ste// gtso mo e ka ma ni srid pa kun gyi bdag/ ma tshogs kun gyi bdag mo e ka ma// skye med

chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las sku bzhengs srid pa kun gyi bdag/ byang chub sems la skyon gyis ma gos kyang// de yi 'khor na bdud mo stong tshogs gnas// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ skye 'gro ral
gcig ma ni sems can kun gyi tshe srog bdag/ nag mo bong bu zhon nas nad khrag mang po gtong// ma yams 'dun mar sdud cing srid pa'i bdag mo khyod// mi lpags g.yab dar spyugs pa'i glu len nas// pho
bdud las la gtong zhing ma mo bran du 'khol// ral nag mun ltar gtibs shing sdigs pa'i gad mo dgod// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ ja la sum brgya drug cu ni// la la bka' yi bang chen
byed// la la ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// la la bdud btsan bang chen byed// la la khams gsum kun gyi phung khrol byed// la la brdab snol gzud rmugs byed// la la dag la phan par byed// la la dag la
grogs kyang byed// 'jig rten nor la zad 'phel byed// mi la nad du byed cing phyugs la bshan mar byed// nad sna mang po gtong bar byed// brgya ni bdud dang btsan gyi bu yi rigs yin te// bsad bcad

las la dga' zhing dmag dang dpung la dga'/ brgya ni sha za mo yi rigs te nad yams mu ge 'khrug pa gtong// brgya ni rgyal po the rang rigs te 'jig rten phung khrol byed cing tshe len byed// rtsa dgu srid pa'i
lhag ma sdud byed cing// nyi shu rtsa gcig gnod sbyin rnams ky-i bang chen mdzad de sha dang khrag la dga'// ja la sum brgya drug cu rnams// drug cu srid pa kun la dbang byed ma// lus la lwa ba nag

po gyon// mgo la sle nag go lcog gcan// mdzo mo rog mo drug cu zhon nas rgyug/ srid pa'i tshe la rgyug par byed// byis pa kun gyi chung dur 'bebs// la la mdung thogs dmag sna 'dren// la la phyugs kyi rdzi bo

byed// la la rnga mo ske ring zhon nas byis pa'i tshe la rgyug/ la la dom bu nag gu zhon nas na chung tshe la rgyug/ la la bud med nag mo la// ral pa'i zar bu g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil// dred mo lag dkar zhon

nas na chung tshe la rgyug/ la la bdud shwa nag po zhon nas rgyug/ la la bud med dmar mo la/ bzang btsan spre'u la zhon cing khram gyi shing bu 'bar zhing rgyug/ la la dur bong kha skya zhon nas rgyug/ zangs kyi bud
med ral can brgya// zangs kyi ral pa mda' tsam sha ra ra/ lag na zangs kyi sog le re re thogs// zangs kyi 'phar ba dmar po zhon nas rgyug/ la la lcags kyi bud med ral can brgya// lcags kyi ral pa

mda' tsam sha ra ra// lag na lcags kyi sog le thogs// lcags spyang brgya la zhon nas rgyug/ la la khrag gi bud med ral pa can// khrag gi phor thogs gnam gyi tha ma bskor// 'byung po dbang du bsdus nas
ni// thams cad kun gyi nyul le byed// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// la la ba skya yu mo zhon nas ni// la ba nag po lus la gon// chu dar sngon po g.yab 'debs byed// la la srid pa'i nyul le

byed// kha nas khrag skyugs khrag gi gru char 'bebs// la la bdud kyi bang chen te// bong bu nag po zhon te srid pa skor bar byed// la la me yi thul pa gon pa mo// la la bud med nag mo go zu can// wa mo kha

nag zhon nas rgyug/ la la srid pa'i bang chen te// bdud rta nag po zhon nas bdud kyi zhogs nag mda' ltar 'phen// la la nad kyi rkyal pa khur zhing grong khyer skor bar byed// la la nad khrag 'thor zhing srid
pa'i phung khrol byed// la la phag pa rog po zhon nas rgyug/ la la rtol bu kha dkar zhon cing dar gyi g.yab mo 'debs// la la thab g.yag rog po zhon nas su// lus la re nag gon par byed cing khrag gi

phor thogs srid par rgyug/ la la khrag 'thung dur khrod nyid phugs rgyu// la la srid pa'i lha 'dre g.yab cing ma yams las la gtod// the rang stong sde las la gtong zhing kho rang rgyug 'gro byed// mi phyugs gnyis

ka gsod par byed pa ste// srid pa'i ja la ma ni sum brgya drug cu yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// mthun pa'i yas ni mang bsog 'di bzhes la// nad ka thams cad slar la sgyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bla la ma bcos pa'i le'u so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ mtsho sman dkar mo'i tshogs dang klu nad sa bdag 'khor dang bcas pas
rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams ni 'chos pa na// glud bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang bar bsags nas ni// dben pa'i sa'am gtsang ma'i gnas ni btsal nas
su// ras dkar dag ni gzhi mar bting nas su// rdzas kyi rim pa de ru bsag/ byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// dbus su ri rab chen po de// kha dog dag ni rigs dang bstun// rin po che yi ngar gcig

bya// smyug ma gtsang ma'i nam mkha'i gur// gtor ma dgu ni bya ba'o// nam mkha' nyi shu rtsa gcig la// gtso mo dkar la gzhan ma'i rigs// ri rab de la gzug par bya// smyug ma gtsang ma dgu la ni// de la

gsang ba'i bum bu bya// mtha' ma nam mkha' brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// ri rab de la gzug par bya// rin po che yi skyogs brgyad du// shar du dkar gtor mar dang bcas pa bzhag/ lho ru 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor

ma la/ nub tu me tog sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ byang du sman sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ shar lhor 'o ma sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ lho nub tu klu sman sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ nub byang du tshan spos sna tshogs

pa'i gtor ma/ byang shar du chu sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ nub byang du sha sna khrag sna'i gtor ma bzhag/ dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma gzhung bzhin gyi steng du sha khrag gi gtor ma'o// bya gsob sna tshogs/ lug

smug nag bya dkar bsag/ thod pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ dar sna rtsa brgyad/ klu yi gzugs dang bya dang ngar bu dang ra khyi'i gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad/ mda' dang me long brgya rtsa brgyad/ ngar mo brgya rtsa brgyad/ dar gyi lding

khang gur lnga bya/ shar du yang dkar po/ lhor sngon po'i gur bya/ nub tu dmar po'i gur bya// byang du ljang gu'i gur bya/ rdzas de rnams bsag la shin tu gtsang bar byas la bsngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ mtsho sman gyi gur mdos bsag pa'i le'u so gnyis pa'o//// hUM/ chos rnams stong pa'i ngo bo la// stong pa'i ngang las cho 'phrul byung// byung ba nyid las dngos po med// thams cad sems kyi rang

bzhin te// sems nyid yi ge hUM du gsal// yi ge hUM ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i skyon bral pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ nges pa'i hUM las dbang gi sku ru gsal/ d+hi hUM e yaM baM su raM b+h+rUM/ b+h+rUM las dag pa'i

gzhal yas khang// ma ni zla gam gsang ba'i gnas// de las thams cad bskyed pa'o// ru ru rag mo kar te ma ka laM b+h+yo// rak+sha mdung dung/ rag sha ru ma ka la/ dang pa rag mo/ sha ba ma ti kar ma/ de las
dkar mo dbu dgu bsam// dbang gi rgyal mo bzhi ni phyogs bzhir re// phye phu de la sa bdag klu tshogs kun// 'dab brgyad zla gam gsang ba'i gzhal yas su// srid pa'i dkar mo sku ru
gsal// de nas dbang gi rgyal mo ste// mtsho sman stong sdes bskor ba'o// hUM/ dbang gi rgyal mo'i gzhal yas su// dkar mo dbu dgu tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur
gshegs dbang gi rgyal mo'i tshogs// hUM/ pad+ma ge sar gdan mchog bshams pa 'dir// dkar mo dbu dgu mtsho sman 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol// oM badzra yag mo ru ru sa a ti pu ho// de nas dbang gi

rgyal po pad+ma shwa ri ma// rnam dag srid pa'i dbang bsgyur dkar mo yum// mtsho sman 'bum sde 'khor bcas la// rnam dag bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// de nas bstod cing smon lam gdab po// de nas bsngo bar

bya'o// hUM/ e ka ma ni srid pa'i bdag mo ste// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa yi// dbang gi rgyal mo gsang ba'i yum// srid pa'i ma mo dag la dbang byed ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos cig bzhes// skye 'gro ral

gcig ma ni khams gsum khyab pa'i bdag/ srid par nad khrag spyo zhing gsang ba'i las mdzad ma// rims nad 'khrug par gtong zhing spyugs pa'i glu len ma// 'dzam bu gling bzhi bskor zhing sdigs pa'i gad mo

dgod// khrag gi phor thogs dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug/ dmag dpon byed cing ru mdung 'phyar// srid pa gsum gyi b+h+yo bzlog byed// de ring sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bzhes// dal ka chod la nad kha sgyur/ hUM/
srid pa'i dkar mo dbu dgu ma// sku lus dkar sham ldem pa la// dar dkar ral ga sku la gsol// dbu la rin chen thor cog can// gza' chen brgyad ni ske rags byas// rgyu skar sked nas 'chang bar

byed// gza' rgod mig dmar char du 'bebs// gnas pa rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// rgyu ni bar snang khams su rgyu// nyi ma zla ba sked nas 'char// zhabs ni rgya mtsho'i gting na ste// klu chen brgyad yang gzir

bar byed// dbang gi rgyal mo bzhi ni phyogs bzhi na// gcig ni nyid kyi thugs ka nas// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum gung dkyil na// dar dkar gur gyi nang shed na// nya chen rtsa mo gur du phub// sbal pa nag po

za ra tshags// de yi ni nang shed na// pad+ma 'dab brgyad gdan steng na// dkar mo dbu dgu de na bzhugs// mtsho sman 'bum ni 'khor dang bcas// lan 'ga' 'gul nas bskyod pa'i tshe// shwa ba yu mo chibs su
chibs// stong khams ma lus khyab par rgyu// srog dbugs kun la mnga' mdzad ma// nad yams kun gyi bdag mo khyed// lha srin kun yang dran du 'khol// dur khrod ma mo kun yang g.yob// sa bdag klu gnyan
kun yang pho nyar 'gyed// klu chen kun dang bsdongs nas ni// mdze dang g.yan pa gtong bar byed// sa bdag gnyan dang bsdongs nas ni// skrang 'bur zha grum skem pa gtong// dkar mo ni dbu
dgu ma// dbu dgu ye shes dgu yi don rtogs rtags// ye shes spyan gyis srid pa sa ler gzigs// 'bar byed thugs ni chos nyid klong na bzhugs// stong gi lha bran rnams dang rol// rgyal chen bzhi yi gzus
sam mdzad// 'dzam gling kun gyi kha lo sgyur// mdzes shing dag pas sku lus dkar la mnyen// zhabs kyis ma bgrod sa la gnas pa'i tshul// rgyal mo'i tshul gyi dbang gi rgyal mos bskor// kun gyi gtso mo

mdzad pas mtsho sman 'bum gyis bskor// gur gyi nang na gnas tsam na// lan 'ga' chu srin pir la chibs// gur chen de yi gru bzhi na// chu srin sram gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi// gzhal yas de yi nang shed na// srid

pa'i dkar mo chen mo khyod// sbal pa nag po'i thod pa ru// khrag sna stong gi sbyar nas gsol// nag mo stong ni dam la sdud// lan 'ga' rin chen sna lnga'i thod pa ru// 'o ma sna tshogs 'dus pa dang// mar dang me
tog sman kyang gsol// sman mo 'bum ni dam la sdud// lan 'ga' b+han+d+har rak+ta mang po gsol// gnod sbyin 'bum ni dam la sdud// rin chen gser gyi phor pa ru// bdud rtsi chu ni bcus gyin gsol// ser mo
'bum ni dam la sdud// dar gur de yi nang shed na// dung dang gser dang byu ru dang// g.yu dang lcags las grub pa yi// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// der ni srid pa'i bdag mo bzhugs// de ring

srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// sha sna khrag sna 'o ma dang// me tog chu sna 'bru sna mchod// tshan spos chang dang rtsi sman mang pos mchod// gzugs brnyan mang pos thugs dam bskang// klu yi gdug rtsub zhi bar

gyis// sa bdag gdug rtsub zhi bar gyis// ma mo'i nad rnams slar la dul// shar phyogs dar dkar gur gyi nang shed na// nya chen rtse mo gur du phub// pad+ma dkar po gdan du bting// rin chen dung gi gzhal
yas khang// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// dkar mos mche gtsigs srid pa'i bdag/ sman mo 'bum sde gshegs su gsol// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// lho phyogs gur sngon nang shed na// chu srin
'bar ba'i za ra tshags// sbal pa ser po gur du phub// rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas khang// de nas dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// sman mo stong la dbang sgyur ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// gtor
ma sna dgu dag gis mchod// gsob bshas mang pos thugs dam bskang// nub phyogs dar dmar gur gyi nang shed na// sbrul dmar mang po gur du phub// nya chen mkhar ba'i rtsar du byas// byu ru dmar po'i
gzhal yas su// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan steng du// dbang gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhugs// dmar mo byu ru'i ral pa can// sbal pa dmar po'i thod pa ru// khrag sna mang po sbyar zhing gsol// bdud rtsi
'bar ba'i mchod pa dang// gtor ma dgu yi mchod pa bzhes// dmangs rigs sa bdag klu yi gdug pa zhi bar gyis// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// byang phyogs ljang khu dar gyi gur nang du/ g.yu sbal

gshog pa'i gur du byas// lcong mo gshibs pa'i rtsar du byas// rin chen g.yu yi gzhal yas su// de na dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// lag na g.yu sbal thod pa ru// bdud rtsi khrag sna sbyor zhing gsol// ma mo

'bum ni las la 'gyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// rgyal mo chen mo bzhi po yang// me tog sna tshogs dang/ 'bru sna mang po dang/ bdud rtsi chu sna mang po dang/ rtsi sman 'o ma mang po dang/ dkar gtor
dmar gtor sha sna tshogs dang bcas// gsang ba'i ma mo mched bzhi yang// nam mkha' yul du 'dul// gsob bshas thugs dam bskang// lug smug thugs dam bskang// bya dkar thugs dam
bskang// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ dus bzhi ma mo kha sgyur ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// dkar mo'i tshogs dang ser mo'i tshogs// dmar mo'i tshogs dang smug mo'i tshogs// sngon mo'i
tshogs la sogs pa yi// srid pa'i ma mo 'khor bcas kyang// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// glud bdag chen mo glud bzhes dang// 'jog po mtsho yi bar mtshams na// rgya mtsho de yi nang shed

na// dung gi lbu ba gur tsam gcig/ de yi ni nang shed na// sman mo ni 'bum sde gnas// dkar mo'i lus la ldem bag can// dar dkar le'u sku la gsol// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs// mtsho sman rgyal mo

chen mo bya// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// g.yu yi lbu ba gur can nang shed na// de na mtsho sman 'bum sde gnas// bud med sngon mo g.yu yi lan tshar can// g.yu bran gzhibs pa'i cha ga can/ lag na
bdud rtsi bum pa 'dzin// kha nas gdug pa'i nad yams gtor// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// zangs kyi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// zangs kyi bud med dmar mo la// zangs kyi ral pa mda' tsam
gsig/ zangs kyi mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// klu sman 'bum sde las la 'gyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// gser gyi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// gser gyi bud med lan tshar can// lag na
gser gyi bum pa 'dzin// sman mo 'bum ni las la gtong// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// lcags kyi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// lcags kyi bud med la ba can// srin mo sha za 'bum ni las la
gtong// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// mchong gi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// gdug pa'i bu mo mche gtsigs ma// srid pa kun tu khyab par byed// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ gzi

yi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// srid pa'i mtsho sman chen mo gnas// lus ni khra mo ya mtshan can// phyag na gzi yi bum pa 'dzin// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// byi ru'i lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// byi
ru'i bud med dmar mo ral bsig ma// gzer ba nad kyi bdag mo ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// shel gyi lbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// shel gyi bud med dkar mo gnas// srid pa kun tu khyab byed
ma// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// dkar gsum mngar gsum rtsi sman sna tshogs mchod// srid pa yongs kyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo mche gtsigs srid pa'i bdag/ 'khor ni sman phran 'bum gyis
bskor// srid pa yongs la dbang byed cing// nad du mdze dang skem pa dang// zha grum mang po gtong ba'i bdag/ dkar mo chen mo de yi 'khor// klu bdud stong yang 'khor na gnas// de ring dkar gsum mngar

gsum mchod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes dang// sman mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// sman mo chen mo tsa mun+ti// klu mo dkar mo tsa mun+ti// klu gdug stong la dbang byed cing// 'khor ni sman mo 'bum gyis

bskor// gnas pa rgya mtsho'i gru la gnas// dmag ni srid pa'i ma mo dang// klu gdug the rang mang po rbad// nad ni stong gi bdag mo ste// rgya mtsho'i gting nas ma mo bskyod pa'i tshe// g.ya' sman spang sman mang po
yang// dar dkar g.yab kyis 'debs shing stong gsum khu yis 'debs// klu gdug rnams kyang zhe sdang me ltar 'bar// srid pa'i bu mo kun yang 'dar dang gam dang gum// de ring mthun pa'i yas kyis

mchod// sa bdag tsang kun ho pho the se yang// be sna lag chen tshang tsang rnams// shar nas stag ni skya bo mtsho// lho nas rus sbal nag po 'gying// nub nas 'brug sngon 'gyu ba na// byang nas bya dmar 'phur pa'i

tshul// srin mo lha mo brtan ma ste// shing lo gos su gon// gdug pa'i nad rnams mang po gtong// 'byung ba lnga la gnas pa ste// sa dang rten ni so sor bzung// gze re che dang gdug pa che// gnyan chen mang po

gnas pa'o// de ring ni 'bru dang gnyer// gtor ma dgu dang rtsi sman dang// me tog sha sna mang pos mchod// de ring glud dang mi ru phye// nad dang mi ru phye// gdug pa klu yi bu// dga' bo 'jog po mtha' yas

dung skyong dang// pad+ma chu lha kar ko ba ru dang// sbrul mgo bdun dang dgu pa dang// lnga pa dang ni gsum pa dang// gzugs med pa dang pad+ma dang// nam mkha'i 'ja' 'dra sgo nga 'dra ba dang// rta dang rtsangs pa sdig
pa dang// nya sbal lcong mo sdom sdig dang// mi sdug gzugs kyi klu rnams dang// rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa dang// ri rab dag la gnas pa dang// 'byung ba dag la gnas pa yi// klu gdug klu bran
'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// me tog sna dgu mang po dang// tshan spos klu sman sna tshogs dang// gsob sha chu sna mang po dang// 'di rnams 'bul lo mdos bzhes dang// nam mkha'
yul du 'bul bas bzhes// 'byung ba'i rten dang 'jig rten nor gyis mchod// srid pa'i ma mo sa bdag klu gdug tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// nad rnams thams cad sos par gyis// zhes
bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mcho sman gyi mdos kyi le'u so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar// bdud nag po bkrag med dang/ phyi btsan kha bzhi dang/
rgyal po spyan gcig dbang phyug chen po dang// klu 'jog po dang/ gza' yi ti pa dang/ the rang rdo rje legs pa dang// bdud mo ral gcig rnams kyis/ ser ba dbab pa'i rang rang gi las 'di smras so// drag
las 'bebs pa'i gnas dag btsal nas ni// maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// de yi dbus su rabs chad thod pa gcig/ thod pa de la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus ni zlum po dkyil gru

gsum// dbus su klu bdag dang ni ling+ga gzir// shar gyi 'khor lo dag nas bskor// shar du rgyal po lho ru btsan// nub tu klu la byang du bdud// shar lhor gza' la/ lho nub tu dbang phyug ste/ nub byang du the
rang/ byang shar du bdud mo'o// sngags kyi rim pa de ltar dgod// dbus su dmigs pa'i ming rus yul dang rdzas bcas/ seng ldeng phur pa gcig ni klu yi bdag nyid du gsal ba de yis bzhag/ de la bsgrub

cing tha ma brda yang de yang de yis bya/ gang du sbas pa de ni 'joms pa'i gta' ma'o// gang du sbas pa de ru nges par 'babs par 'gyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ser ba dbab pa'i le'u so bzhi
pa'o//// oM bdud ya tri maM maM/ sad du drag tu pu ta phob ya/ oM btsun shu tri tsa tsa dri phob ya/ de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis mi rnams la ltas ngan btang ba'i las 'di smras so// gtang bar 'dod

pas thod pa'i nang// ras sam shog bu dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas su// de la lha 'dre'i sngags bris te/ thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ de la lha 'dre'i snying po ltas ngan gtong ba'i sngags 'di

bri'o// oM ra sad de hu le phreM// shar kol thabs sad 'u mi si se mang lang ling ler/ khu dz+wa hi ha/ zhes bris nas de la bzlas nas/ gar 'bebs pa'i phyogs su btab na phebs par 'gyur ro// gang ji ltar
'dod pa 'bebs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ltas ngan btang ba'i le'u so lnga pa'o//// de nas dregs pa rnams kyis ltas ngan babs pa de'i rtags dang bzlog thabs

smras so// shul la byung na dregs pa'i gnas btab pa'o// than g.yo ba dang bzlog pa dang// rgyas 'debs pa'o// bya mi snyan pa byung na bang chen pa ste/ than bsgyur ba'am zor bzlog bya'o// ri dwags babs na

gnam lcam zhes bya ba ste gto bsgyur ro// sems can mtshe ma byung na mi sdug pa ste/ de rang gis bzlog pa bya'o// snying mi dga' ba ni nyams sad pa ste/ tshe chog bya'o/ lha la skyabs su bya'o// rmi ltas log na lha

'dre babs pa ste/ srid bsgyur gtong ngo// lug la ro khal dang khyi la rtsed pa byung na/ de rang gis bzlog go/ bya 'bras byung na dmu sngo yin te khram phyi bar bya'o// de rnams kyi ltas ngan rangs pa bzlog na/ khyi nag

po'i thod pa'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyi nang la/ de la sngags 'di bris te/ phaT te ra sad khu le phyo ni khu le dri sha dri ni b+h+yo/ zhes pa de bris la/ dbus su gsang bdag sngags bris la/ dar mthing nag

gis kha bcad la/ sngags de bzlas shing/ thod pa de lung gsum mdo'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ ri gsum rtser bskyal te mnan na ltas ngan gang babs kyag zlog par 'gyur ro// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen
po las/ ltas ngan bzlog pa'i le'u so drug pa'o//// de rnams kyi rang rang gi rgyu lugs dang ki kang rgyu ba bstan cing smras pa ste/ bdag cag rnams ni dregs pa 'khor bcas te/ rgyu ba'i dus ni 'di lta

ste/ srod la bdud rgyu/ srod chung la btsan rgyu/ gung stod la bdud rgyu/ gung smad la rgyal po rgyu// tho rangs the rang rgyu/ skya rengs la the rang rgyu/ nam langs la sman rgyu/ nyi rtse la klu rgyu/ dros la sa bdag rgyu/ de ltar

rgyu ba lags te/ gang dang 'phrad pa de ni phung bar 'gyur ro// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u so bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/
dkor gyi bdag po be dkar gyis rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams ni srid pa'i dkor gyi bdag po yin/ bdag ni srid pa las byung ba lags te/ lha bshos ldem pa dang ting
lor bcas// me mar kha lnga spyan gzigs bcas// nam mkha' dkar po dag dang ni// bshos bu rgyas pa de la gzug/ smyug ma gtsang ma tshigs mang dang// rin chen mkhar ni sum sgrog bri// lha bshos de la

gzug par bya// 'dab chags bya dang gcan gzan dang// ma he rta dang glang dkar dang// 'br-i dkar gsob dang las dag bya// khyung gi sgo nga zangs kyi khyi// sbrul gyi bla med lcags kyi khyi// dkor nor dang ni spyan
gzigs dang// dkor bdag de ni mchod par bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ be kar bsag pa'i le'u so brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ srid pa dang po las byung ste// dang po byang
chub sems dpa' ste// sa pa la ni gnas pa'i tshul// de las tshul dang sdom pa nyams// sa la babs nas nam mkha' gnas// de nas lha yi yul du babs// mi dkar ldem pa la// 'od dkar lam se se

lam// dbu la 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i dpe// zla gam dang ni sog kha dang// zlum po gru bzhi dbu la tshang bar 'dug/ lha rnams kyi lha bshos dang/ me tog sna dgu dang/ rin chen sna lnga dang// mthun pa'i las 'di

'bul// lha yi rgyal po'i zhal na re// 'u cag lha yi bu mo khab tu 'dod pa/ 'di ni srid pa'i bu gcig yin par nges/ dbu la 'dzam bu gling bzhi tshang bar 'dug pas/ be kar rgyal po bya ba yin gsungs nas/ be
kar rgyal por btags/ 'di ni dbu la ze 'bru yang 'dug pas/ byang chub sa las chad pa yin/ gnam las byung bas 'di ni gnam lha byang chub bya bar yang btags so// de nas srid pa yongs la gnod
do// 'dzam bu gling bzhir babs/ b+ha ta hor gyi yul du babs// de na dkor gyi longs spyod bsam mi khyab// da lta bod yul yongs la gnod pa byed// srid pa'i rgyal po mdos bzhes shig/ me tog sna dgus
mchod// lha bshos ri rab kyis mchod// snang gsal 'od kyis mchod// nam mkha' yul du 'bul// mda' ni mkhar du 'bul// rin chen sna lnga gter du 'bul// spyan gzigs dkor cha mang po 'bul// zhes
bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dkor gyi bdag po be kar bcos pa'i le'u so dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po srog bdag spyan gcig dang// sad

bzhis rang rang gi bcos pa'i thabs dang las 'di dag smras so// sa gzhi de ni brtag pa dang// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba'i ngar phye la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// ri rab

de ni chen po la// rtse la me mar kha bzhi btang// gla ba spos dang rkang dang tshil// mar dang mkhris dang gla bas brgyan// za 'og gur dang nam mkha' bzhi// seng ge g.yu ral can dang nyi ma zer mdangs rgyas pa

dang// g.yu sbrul sngon mo dang ni khyung chen rgyas pa dang// gzhan yang mkhar dang pho brang dang// g.yag dang lug dang ba glang dang// rta dang bya dang mthun pa'i yas stags bsag/ de yis mchod cing las 'di
bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po gsog pa'i le'u bzhi bcu pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' lags par cha ma mchis// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' lags par cha
mchis na// g.ya' ba la ni pha yi rgyu// dma' ba la ni ma yi rkyen// nya lcibs mtsho yi gos// mi mtshams brda ru mtshams// mtshams rje yag pa gcig/ mi yi mi sngon lags// lag pa brgyad du

'dug/ lag pa brgyad po yang/ g.yu dang mu man lags// glo dang snying ga 'debs// sku la rma bya'i mdongs kyi thul pa gsol/ dbu la 'ja' yi thod/ 'ja' thod ma lags te/ nad kyi dbu rgyan bya/ rma bya'i thul
pa ma lags te// dug gi ri mo can// g.yu rta bya gdong chibs su chibs// zhol zhol sgra yi gzugs// khol brgyad rje dang dgu// sngar yang ma mchod de// da yang mchod mi 'tshal// mi 'tshal ba yi dbang ma

mchis/ g.yas na stag smad 'phyang// g.yon na srung smad 'khyug/ thugs ka'i thal gyis bu chung sku gzugs 'bar// rgyal po cir brdzun// shel gyi nyi ma dang// g.yu yi nyi ma dgu ru brdzus/ rgyal po nyi pad
sad// shel gyi zla ba dgu ru brdzus// zla ba phyag 'tshal na// bdud du ma bab cig/ gshed du ma bab cig/ rgyal po gza' ru brdzus// lha dkar po bsangs// rgyal po seng ger brdzus// gcan gzan stong

tshogs kyang// seng las gnyan ma mchis gangs ri seng bang sad// rgyal po khyud pad sad// rgyal po nyi pad sad// khong mtsho dgu sde sad// g.yu sbrul sngon por brdzus// klu bran stong gis bskor// klu rje sprul pad

sad// rgyal po ni chen po ste// 'bog pa'i nad du mdzad// smyo ba'i nad du mdzad// brlam pa'i nad du ma mdzad dang// rgyal po chen po khyod// mgo 'khor bar ma mdzad// mi bas glud re che// ri rab chen po
dang// gsal ba'i mar me dang// spyan gzigs dkor chas mchod// mthun pa'i yas ni 'bul// gla ba spos kyis mchod// mkhris dang mar gyis mchod// mthun pa'i yas kyis mchod// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las// rgyal po bcos pa'i le'u bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan sil ma stong gis rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di dag smras so// 'bru sna tshang
ba'i gsang phye la// ri rab dang ni dpag bsam shing// nam mkha'i gur dang sil ma'i rkyen// sa la 'dzul dang gnam la 'phur// gzugs ni mang pos bskor bar bya// nam mkha'i rigs tshogs nyi shu
gcig/ mda' dmar grangs kyang de bzhin bya// btsan bshos zur gsum nyi shu gcig/ bya dang ngar bu grangs kyang de bzhin bya// rta pa phub can grangs kyang de bzhin bya// spyan gzigs dkor cha phud kyis
mchod// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan sil ma bsag pa'i le'u bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//// hUM/ phyi btsan chen po ste// kha bzhi mig brgyad po// nga rgyal chen po'i gtso// btsan phran
ni kha lo bsgyur// srid pa gsum gyi srog dbugs bdag/ skye 'gro ma lus bdag/ mi yi bdud dang phyugs kyi nad// mdos mdag mdos bzhes dang// 'byung ba lnga yi btsan// mi dkar rta dkar
dri za'i 'khor// lho btsan mi sngo rta sngo de// gshin rje'i gdon tshogs 'khor// nub btsan mi dmar rta dmar te// klu btsan 'khor dang bcas// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// byang phyogs gnod sbyin
btsan// mi ljang rta ljang ste// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs 'khor dang bcas// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// btsan ni stong sdai yang// sde ni dmangs rigs sde ru gtogs// 'byung ba lnga la gnas bcas

nas// nga rgyal khengs pas srid pa'i mi la gnod// btsan gyi stong sde las// khyed srid pa ni khyab par gnas// 'phan po btsan gyi bu// gzer dang khrag skyug nad du mdzad// la la 'byung ba nam mkha' dag la
gnas// skar chen gzhan dang dgu tshigs gnas// nyi zer zla zer dag la gnas// mi bu gsod par mdzad// dud 'gro shan dmar byed// gnam lcags mda' ltar 'phen// mdos bdag mdos bzhes
dang// la la 'byung ba sa la gnas// sa dang rlan gyi bu// mi bkra rta bkra 'byung// zhags pa mda' ltar 'phen// btsan dmag g.yob cing rgyug/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// la la shing dang sa la
gnas// mi dkar rta dkar dang// shing lo gos su bsog/ thang chu skom du 'thung// shing 'bras zas su za// srid pa kun tu rgyug/ gnas pa shing la gnas// gnod pa mi la gnod// rgyab tu klu chen
g.yob// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// la la 'byung ba brag la gnas// la la brag dmar rtse la gnas// la la brag nag ngos la gnas// la la brag ser ngos la gnas// la la brag dkar zur la

gnas// 'byung ba'i mi de rta la zhon// la la mi dkar rta dkar rgyug/ la la mi dmar rta dmar te// la la mi ser rta ser 'byung// la la mi nag rta nag can// la la shing gi ri mo can// la la rin chen sna lngas
brgyan// la la dar dang nam mkha' gsol// gnas pa brag la gnas shing rgyu ba'i rtse lung gsum rgyu// gnod pa 'dzam bu gling gi mi la mdzad// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// glud bdag glud bzhes

dang// brag bu skya re la// btsan bu skya re gnas/ lung pa sul re la// btsan pho skya re gnas// mkhar dang rdzong re la// btsan po skya re gnas// mdos dang yas bzhes dang// sma btsan sngon dang rje// se btsan

spun dgu dang// dur btsan dgu po kha// brag btsan shor ba rje// gnam btsan 'phrul bu rje// sa btsan ldon de na// chu btsan sngon dang rje// gangs btsan rom bu rje// g.ya' btsan dar btsan rje// spang btsan
gang bu rje// nags btsan mun dang rje// g.ye btsan khrin du rje// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// glud bdag glud bzhes dang// btsan bran stong sde dang// 'byung ba khyab par gnas// skye 'gro
kun la gnod// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// zhes bsngos la gtang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan bcos pa'i le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang ston pa'i spyan
sngar/ klu btsan mched gsum gyis rang rang gi las 'di dag smras so// glud bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dar dkar ras dkar gdan steng du// 'bru sna gsum mam tshang ba la// btsan bshos zur gsum
byas nas ni// dmar dang ser dang nag por bya// mda' ni ltong dmar ltong ser dang// ltong nag gsum ni gzug par bya// glang dmar dang ni lug dang ra dang gsum// bya dang bcas pa bsag pa'o// sbal lcong

nya dang ni// sbrul dang rtsangs pa rta dang phug ron dang// sdig pa ba glang bcas pa bsag/ ngar bu bya dang gzugs kyang bsag/ 'o ma sna tshogs rtsi sman bcas// me tog 'bru sna mang po dang// nam mkha' gsum ni

rigs dang bstun// 'brang rgyas gsum la gzug par bya// dkyil du spyi yi bshos bu khru gang bzhag/ phud dang 'byor pa tshang bar bsag/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu btsan bsag pa'i le'u bzhi

bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bsngo ba ni/ hUM/ srid pa kun gyi bdag/ klu btsan ni mched de gsum// nad dang sna tshogs gtong// gdug pa che zhing lha 'dre kun gyi rgyab mdzad pa// pha ni btsan la ma ni

klu yi lcam mo de// klu btsan tshogs pa'i drag shul can// pha ni 'gro steng rgyal ba yin// ma ni btsun bza' lcam gcig ma// bu ni spun gsum byung ba la// phu bo klu btsan nag po gcig/ mi nag mdung tsam
gcig/ dar nag ral ka gsol// sbrul nag za ra tshags// sbal nag cha ga can// rta nag chen po chibs// g.yas na se btsan stong gi dmag sna 'dren// g.yon na brag btsan stong gi sna yang 'dren// rgyab na
gdug pa klu yi bu// sna ni the rang chen pos 'dren// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang// klu btsan dmar po de// mi dmar mdung tsam gcig/ glang dmar ru dmag chibs// dar dmar ral ga la// sbrul dmar
gdengs ral can// sbal pa dmar po'i cha ga can// sdom sdig sna nas 'thor// 'brum bu nag dang nad khrag mang po 'thor// btsan phran 'bum ni sna yang 'dren// gdug pa klu yi rgyab mdzad pa// mdos bdag

mdos bzhes dang// klu btsan mched gsum khyod// ston pa stong gi sde dpon lung la nyon// dregs pa kun gyi rgyab mdzad pa// yi dwags 'dre bkran ma 'dren sna ma mdzad// ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las// klu btsan bsngo ba'i le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brtan ma bcu gnyis kyis rang rang gi bcos pa'i thabs tshigs su bcad

pa 'di dag smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab cing sbrus nas su// ri rab kha dog rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha' tshon sna

lnga'i gur// dar dang rgya long brgyan par bya// ra dang lug dang bya dkar mo dang/ smug mo dang dmar mo dang sngon mo dang bcas pa mang du bsag go/ shwa ba dang rta dang glang dang mdzo rtol dang/ so bya dang 'bri dang
bcas pas ri rab bskor/ 'brang rgyas bcu gnyis ri rab dkyil du che ba gcig bya/ de la nam mkha' dmar po bzhi/ dkar po bzhi/ nag po bzhi byas la 'brang rgyas la gzug/ 'phang gi grangs kyang de bzhin

gzug/ lha rdzas lho rdzas byang rdzas bsag/ sha khrag gtor ma dkor cha rin chen phud rnams bsag/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brtan ma bsag pa'i le'u bzhi bcu drug pa'o//// hUM/ brtan ma

ni bcu gnyis te// skyong ma dang ni bcu gsum ni// dbang phyug dang ni dregs pa'i bu// dregs pa chen po'i bu mo ste// la la drag cing mthu rtsal khyad par mi bzad de// ri rab rtse bsnyil rgya mtsho'i gzhung yang
skem// gnam gyi mtha' bskor srid pa'i rlung bas mgyogs// khram shing sho rde dkar nag byang dmar dkyus// tshon gyi gru gu nad kyi rkyal pa rdebs// brgyal dang khrag skyug gzer ba'i nad rnams

gtong// 'dir spyon srid pa'i mdos la spyan 'dren na// pha ni gnam gyi rdzi rgan de// ma ni nag mo khro gnyer can// bu mo bdud mo chen mo bzhi// bdag nyid rdo rje kun grags ma// bdud rta nag po zhon nas srid

pa khyab byed ma// dar nag lus la gon zhing khram nag phyag na bsnams// dpal ldan rdo rje g.ya' ma skyong// gsal le grus mo zhon nas stong khams khyab par nyul// bdud dar nag po gon zhing khram la mda'

ltar 'phen// gangs kyi yum chen rdo rje kun tu bzang// rnga mo ske ring zhon nas srid pa kun tu 'gro// mthing nag le'u gon nas rin chen rgyan chas spras shing khrag gi gru char 'debs// 'brog chen 'khor 'dul rdo

rje bgegs kyi gtso// dril nag zhon nas dar gyi la'u gyon zhing ru mtshon 'phyar// me mig 'phro zhing srid par rgyug/ bdud mo chen mo bzhi yang mdos bzhes dang// pha ni zangs mgrin chen po ste// ma ni dmar mo

mche gtsigs ma// bu ni gnod sbyin chen mo bzhi// gangs kyi yum chen rdo rje g.yu+u bun ma ni dkar mo mdzes ma la// gser g.yu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis spras// sman sha yu chung zhon nas rgyug/ gser chen mkha' la

lding ba rdo rje klung chen ma// rin chen sna lngas brgyan nas rkyang bu zhon nas rgyug/ rma ri rab 'byams rdo rje grags mo rgyal// rmar snam mdzes pa gsol nas rin chen cha ga can// kha rag khyung btsun
srid pa kun gyi yum// dmar mo rin chen rgyan dang dar gyi na bza' gsol// gnod sbyin chen mo bzhi ni mdos bzhes dang// pha ni lha chen po ste// ma ni dkar mo bzhin bzang ma// bu mo sman mo chen mo
bzhi// kong btsun de mo rdo rje bod khams skyong// dkar mo'i lus la rin chen go lcog can// chibs su sha ba yu mo zhon nas rgyug cing rmen nad gzer ba gtong// ma btsun ug chos rdo rje g.yar mo
bsil// chibs su rnga mo chibs nas mdzes pa'i rin chen gsol// btsan la rol lo rdo rje sman gcig ma// na bza' rin chen sna lngas brgyan// sman mo bzhi yang srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// ma btsun brtan

ma bcu gnyis po// gsang bdag ston pa'i spyan snga ru// bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa// rgyu ni srid pa khyab par rgyu// mthu rtsal chen po'i khyad par ni// bdag cag brtan ma bcu gnyis te// bstan pa gnyan
po bsrung ba na// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pa ni// sngags kyi yang dben 'jig pa na// lcags thog zangs thog rdo thog dbab byas la// de ru bcad cing gsad par bya// zhal gyi ngad bdag las ni// dung ser

dkar po der phab la// 'bru sna rtsi thog skem zhing sems can rlag par byed// tshon gyi gru gu der brkyangs la// sna lnga'i nad kyis bcing bar bya// nad kyi rkyal pa der brdabs la// sems can dmyal thag gcad

par bya// gzer nad khrag skyug gtang bar bya// byang dmar dkyus la gdab par bya// khram la gdab cing shod la dgram// sangs rgyas bstan pa der srung ngo// dus ngan tha ma lan cig byung ba'i tshe// bdag cag

rnams kyi bstan pa 'byung// ltos na yon tan tshe srog bsring// ming po bgegs can rnams dang nad sna mang po bsrung// 'bru rnams 'khrungs shing sku tshe bskyab par bya// bod khams skyong ba'i brtan ma rnams// ri
rab nam mkha' skye 'gro'i gzugs// 'bru bcud skyems dang sha sna khrag sna dang// spyan gzigs dkor cha mthun pa'i yas rnams 'bul// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang// nad kha sgyur la god kha
sdoms// zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brtan ma bcos pa'i le'u bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa thams cad kyis smras pa/

bdag cag rnams ni tshe dang srog la dbang byed pa ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe dang srog la dbang byed pa ste/ tshe srog gi bdag po'ang bdag cag lags te/ mi de'i srog dang glud brje bar 'dod na/
lug gam tsa ra gang yang rung// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dbang bskur bar du byin gyis brlab byas nas// de la mi yi zhwa dang gos dang lham ni bkon// mtshal thig gdab cing
gser g.yus brgyan// phud gtsang dang ni chas kyis bsham// de ltar bshams nas sngon bzhin phul na/ de yis mi des glud du brje ste nad rnams sos la 'chi ba bzlog/ ces gsungs so// hUM/ srid pas bskos

pa'i phung po bskos pa zhes// srid pa'i bya mkhan nad khrol sha la byon mdzod cig/ ru bdud chen po ru la brten// bdud kyi spyi mes chen po khyod// tsa ra rgyal ba 'di yi bcud bzhes shig/ lhu ni bcu gnyis mgo
dang bcu gsum la// ya bdud bcu gsum glud bzhes dang// ya mkhal ya bdud chen po rnams la 'bul// ma mkhal ma bdud chen po dag la 'bul// sha la kham re khrag la thigs re dang// spu la nyag re

bdud bran bzhes// nam tshong lha bdud gang du bzhes// gshar kha dur bdud dur btsan bzhes// gnye ma gnyis bdud gnyis ma kham bdud bzhes// gzhung bu spyi btsan chen po ste// phung po lnga ni 'byung ba'i

btsan// mchin pa brag btsan rje btsan bzhes// sul mang btsan bran stong sdes bzhes// snying dang srog rtsa srog bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bzhes// glo ba sil ma stong sde bzhes// shan sman smen bu rgyal the'u

rang spun dgus bzhes// srog bdag g.yas g.yon nang khrol tshogs dang bcas// bdud mo 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// sha khrag rlon pa the rang stong sde bzhes// pho ba rmang kha ja la ma rnams bzhes// grod pa sa

bdag klu gnyan bzhes// sha khrag rus pa'i phung po yi dwags 'dre bkren bzhes// sgo bzhi 'phrang ba bzhes/ mi dang sha ru brjes/ mi dang khrag tu+u brjes/ mi dang srog tu brjes/ srog pa'i mdos bzhes dang/

zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mi dang glud brje ba'i le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
gsol to// bgegs chen de dag kun rnams ni// mchod na ting 'dzin ji ltar bgyi// bsgrub na dbang du ji ltar bsdu// dus ni gang dang gang la 'jug/ drag po'i las ni gang la bya// mnan dang gtad pa byed na

ting 'dzin ji ltar bya// gnyen po stobs kyi lha ni gang// bri ba snag tsha'i rgyu ni gang// dus tshod gnan pa gang la bya// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// brgya byin nyon cig/ mchod na rnal
'byor lha yi gdeng du 'jug/ mgron thabs spyan drang mchod pa sprul pas bkye la btang// slar log tshe bstim bkra shis gsol// bsgrub na ting 'dzin gsal bas zla stod dag la 'jug pa ste// gza' dang skar
ma shis pa dag la 'jug/ nya nas mar te drag po'i las rnams brtsam// bdag ni ting 'dzin gsal ba la// bgegs rnams dbang sdud bran gyi tshul du las byed pa'o// sems la khu 'phrig med la
blta ba bsar// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gtad pa'i las ni 'di dag ste// gsang bdag klu bdag 'jam dpal ting 'dzin ldan pa des// phyi dro'i dus su bri zhing nam gyi gung du srod la

mnan// snag tsha snag tsha chen po ste// mi dang khyi dang ra yi khrag gis bri// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'di skad ces
gsol pa dang/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ lta ba zhes bya 'di ltar blta// thams cad byang chub sems chen te// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// bdag ni skye med byang chub sems su blta// skye ba med

pa'i ngang las thams cad byung ba ste// byung ba nyid las dngos po med// nam mkha' stong med dngas pa la// sprin dang khu rlangs ci byung yang// nam mkha'i ngang las byung ba la// zhi yang nam mkha'i ngang du zhi// de

bzhin skye med byang chub sems de yis// skye ba'i cho 'phrul ji ltar byung yang sems nyid ngang du zhi// de la skyon gyis gos pa med// de ltar rtogs na de la nyes pa'i skyon mi gos// zhes stsal to// lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha bskyed dang dus dang snag tsha bstan pa dang dbang du bya ba dang/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brgya byin gyis
smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di yi dkor dang gtsug lag khang rnams kyi mnga' bdag gang gis bgyi zhes zhus pa dang/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten 'di na mthu che ba/ lha chen ma hA kA la

zhes bya ba yod de/ de yi sring mo bdud mo phung byed khram thogs bya ba yod// de gnyis kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bsdus te/ ming sring gnyis bcom ldan

'das kyi drung du byung nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam dur khrod lha rten du/ bdag cag ming sring gi sku bris nas su/ sngags kyis 'don cing gang ltos pa/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mthu ni dngos grub 'byung ngo// las

rnams thams cad grub par bya'o// dmod pa'i mtshon cha gang la smos pa dmyal thag gcod do// zhes gsungs so// oM ma hA kA la yag shaM pri ma rbad shag ya/ kA la ha la ni 'gyo myags rub thum ya/ oM ru ru rag

mo ha la tsa la hur hur/ baM shag rbad/ ru lu sa ma ya thibs/ pi shag tsa tsa ra tsa ya b+h+yo thun/ rbad bu rbad bu yag mo ru ru snying rtsa la shad de shad de/ zhes phul ma thag tu byin gyis brlabs kyis/ ma hA kA la zhes bya
ba dang/ sring mor bcas 'ongs nas/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi/ dkor khang yang bsrung bar bgyi/ dben gnas bsrung bar bgyi'o// zhes gsungs nas/

ming sring gnyis kyis smras pa/ dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// chos 'khor gnyen po bshig pa na// nga cag bstan pa der 'byung ngo// bdag cag ming sring gnyis bsgrub na// dmod pa 'di yis las rnams 'grub pa

ste// gsang ba'i bdag po ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// nyung dkar nyung nag thod par blug nas su// de la khrag sna bstsal la dmod pa de skad gdab// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las/ ma hA kA la ming sring gi le'u lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ dregs pa de dag rnams sgrub pa na// dam tshig ji ltar bsrung bar bgyi/

zhes zhus pa dang// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// mi rta khyi dang gsum la smad mi bya// srog gcod sdig pa dag la spyad mi bya// bud med dag la bag bsdam sems mi 'chor// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod gang

la yang// lta ba dag las yengs mi bya// nyams pa med cing brtul zhugs bskyed// sha khrag dag la spyad par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ spyod pa dang dam tshig bsrung ba'i
le'u lnga bcu nga gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das/ dregs pa chen po 'di rnams ni// bcos na yon tan ji tsam
'byung// ma bcos pa yi skyon ni gang// zhes gsol pas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// dregs pa bcos pa'i yon tan ni// lo legs 'bru 'khrungs mi rnams dar// nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa
chad// tshe ring nad med bkra shis pa'o// de ltar gyur na 'jig rten bde// de yis bcos pa rab tu gces// ma bcos pa yi skyon bstan pa// ma bcos 'jig rten lha 'dre 'khrug/ nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa

dang// sad dang ser ba mi bde sna tshogs dang// dus kyi 'khrug pa langs shed bsod nams chung// mi rnams tshe thung longs spyod chung bar 'gyur// de ltar gyur na mi rnams phung// de bas bcos par rab tu
gsungs// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa bcos pa'i yon tan dang/ ma bcos pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u lnga bcu nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams
kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad kun gyi ston pa'o// mi dang lha rnams kun gyi ston pa/ e ma ho// thams cad kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i don mdzad
pa// dgos 'dod re ba skong ba'i yid bzhin rin po che// phongs pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa// 'gro ba'i dpal gyur ston pa dam pa khyod la bstod// ces bstod do// 'khor de dag
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas bstod pa'i le'u'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams rjes su yi rangs nas bstod pa'i le'u lnga bcu gsum
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// nga'i rgyud 'di 'khor khyed rnams kyis// mig gi 'bras bu ltar chongs shig/ rin

chen srog ltar chongs shig/ 'di kun tu zung shig/ dar zhing rgyas par gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/ stong tshogs pas stong gi dra ba zhes bya bar zung zhig/ thams cad gso bar byed pas gso byed kyi rgyal po'i

rgyud ces bya'o// thams cad cham la 'bebs shing gsod par byed pas 'jig rten dregs pa'i phung rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ yongs su bzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u lnga
bcu bzhi pa'o//// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi pu le pra be sha ma hA sU tra na/ bod ska du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer
du 'dug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas

na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'dong ngo// btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul li bri dzar rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra bsrung ba'i tshal na

bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di

dag dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smos shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyi
bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pa'i bsams pa/ tshangs pa so so'i bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bsams pa/ dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang
po'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pa'i bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa// bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas

'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/
lha'i bla ma gshegs shing/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang/ dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong

ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong/ lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag

kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nirgats+tsha ta// nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byed cig khyed cag las gang sdang
ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig

sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu su mu su mu/ su mu ru su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu

ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru ri mi/

mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mi rU rI ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri ti/ mI ri ti/ mi ti/ si sI si mI/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra ta/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka

ra tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ro tI ti/ ku ri sho kaM ka rA/ kaM

ka ri shi/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti re te phu+u swA/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA/ nA na thA tha/ ri phu ri phu/ nA thA thA/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri phu ri phu/ nirgats+tsha te/ pA la ya ta/ ri phu ri phu/ pA la ya ta/
sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang

snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ k+Shi phraM na ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub
pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing// thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa
gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi
phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde
legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing// gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum
gyur// gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing// don grub
tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pa'i sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing// sems can thams cad rab dga' des// khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing// bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing// tshogs
kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin
gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang// lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de di ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi
khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing// khyed cag kun
tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams
'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dir ni stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung
po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni

lhags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan dang chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bos/ btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bi sa ra ta// bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ chos
kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so so'i bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bsams pa/ dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha ma
yin thams cad kyi bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pa'i bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can

gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing dbang po dang bcas

pa'i lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong/ lha stong phrag du ma dag dang/
lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir

'ong ste/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig
gang dag byams pa'i sems dang lda zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka'

stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/

mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru rI ti/ ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI/ di rI rI di/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/

mi ri mi ri ti/ ha si mi rI ti/ mi ri si si mI/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra ta/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/

kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ro/ tI ti ku ru sho kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ri shi ri ri/ ri ri/ ri ri ti/ ri phu swA/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nA nA tha/ nA nA tha/ ri phu ri phu/ nA nA tha/

nirgats+tsha ta/ ri phu ri phu/ nirgats+tsha te/ pA la ya ta/ ri phu ri phu/ pA la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas

pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ k+Shi phraM na nirgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi mchog dang/ chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka'

stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing// thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des// khyed
la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing// chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams
kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin
du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cig/ gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhig bslu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes
pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing// don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pa'i sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing// sems
can thams cad rab dga' des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing// bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad
par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams
cad chos kyis 'pham mdzad cing// tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang// 'byung po kun

gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang// lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyaid
cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs
shing// khyed cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad cing// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i
bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang// dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di na ni stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang
srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung

po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyad gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du
'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// ! shis par brjod pa'i
tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi bkra shis don grub cing// phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du mthun par
shog/ phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar// lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog/ g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog/ tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing// phyogs bcu dag tu

'gro ba rnams// rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cig/ de dag bde ba skyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur

cig/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang// mgo dang lag dang nab so dang// rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste// de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar

phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste// de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang
yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi

phyogs cha na// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang// don grub ma dang mi 'pham dang// dga' mchog ma dang dga' bde dang// dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma// de dag khyed la

nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod// rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa// de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen// de yang
khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos

pa la la gang gi phyir// lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni// me bzhin nag pa lnga pa yin// sa ri dang ni sa ga ste// de

dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// 'phags skyes
po zhes bya bar brjod// de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag/ gshin rje lhan gcig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par

yang// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan
ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin ma// legs par langs dang rab snga dang// legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ lho phyogs logs kyi

phyogs cha na// pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar// rtag tu thams cad gsal bar byed// de yang khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag
bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig pa ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der

gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang// brtson 'grus brten ldan snrubs dang ni// chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang// gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de
dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes// de ni klu rnams kun gyi

bdag/ chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis pa

lhag par skyong gyur cig/ nub phyaugs logs kyi phyogs cha na// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha sra mkhregs ma dang ni// pad+ma dkar dang skya reng dang// cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang// rol dang gnag dang

stabs myur srid// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shisapa lhag par skyong bar shog/ nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub// nub pa'ang khyed la nor

sbyin 'gyur// de yang khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de

ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnos pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mon gru dang ni mon gre dang// khrums stod dang ni khrums smad
dang// nam gru dang ni tha skar dang// bre nye dang ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu

srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mi la zhon pa lus ngan po// gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzang lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu

rtsa gcig zad par yang// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rabs chags lha

mo stong lha mo// sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can// rgyal po che la nye gnas dang// re dang khre yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha

na// spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung po kun gyi gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs lta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing// shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed

cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas// lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis// phyogs

bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad// yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad// dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra

shis gyur// ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog/ gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog/ gnyen gyis lta ba'ang bkra shis shog/ dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang// dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas// thams cad du ni

bkra shis dang// bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog/ tshangs pa dag ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang// zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang// klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes srungs// ston brgya mtshungs par tshe

ni skyong bar shog/ 'phags pa rgya che rol pa'i mdo'i/ tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las byung ba/ shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta mang+ga la gA tha/ bod
skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla

ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong
