stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// 'brel pa 'brel par nga yis bstan// snying po tho chen bzhi dang 'brel// tho bran bzhi dang kun tu 'brel// dper na dra ba mig mangs bzhin// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras

bur 'brel// dbang dang dam tshig sngags dang 'brel// dkyil 'khor lha la bsnyen sgrub 'brel// theg pa srid pa mtsho bas 'brel// 'byung ba nad dang sde brgyad 'brel// sgyu ma lus dang man ngag 'brel// sgyu ma
dri za mig yor dang// rmi lam chu zla smig rgyu dang// sprul pa sgra brnyan mig skyon 'brel// srog dang snying po bsad gsor 'brel// bkra shis dur khrod chos dang 'brel// dge bcu pha rol phyin pa
'brel// sa lam gzhi dang rgyu 'bras 'brel// thugs rje byin rlabs cho 'phrul 'brel// 'khor 'das dge sdig kun dang 'brel// yod med rtag chad drug dang 'brel// thabs shes dben gcig dbyings shes
'brel// rtsa rlung thig le gsal stong 'brel// zhi gnas lhag mthong thams cad 'brel// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod 'brel// 'brel pa 'brel par lo gnon gyis// tho chen tho bran yul mi bzla// bden
mnyam rdzun mnyam gnyis med bstan// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ tho chen kun 'brel mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas lag na
rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye 'gro mgon thugs rje can// 'brel pa'i ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba dang ni mthun pa'i dpe// 'brel pa log non sgyu ma brgyad/ srog dang snying po bsad gso
yis// chud blangs bsrungs pas phan gnod pas// sangs rgyas bstan pa gzug pa'i phyir// rmongs pas mi 'tshal rgyal bas gsungs// zhes zhus pas/ rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// 'khor tshogs 'dus pa

rdo rje nyon// 'brel pa'i ngo bo gcig pa yin// nges tshig de 'brel rgyun chad med// 'brel pa'i dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// bdag nyid rgyu 'bras phan tshun dang// de las de byung 'brel ba'o// dper na drwa ba mig mangs
bzhin// gnas lugs snying po kun dang 'brel// snang srid 'khor 'das 'brel par gcig/ dper na gser dang gzugs brnyan 'dra// ngo bo gser las 'gyur ba med// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba
yin// gnas lugs snying po kun gyi rgyu// sa bon myu gu 'bras bu 'dra// sa bon 'bras bu logs na med// pha gdung bu rus logs pa na// yod na pha yi ming yang med// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa
yin// gnas lugs snying po mtshon byed pa'i// ga nas a sogs sum cu'i bar// 'greng bu na ro tsheg shad dang// ra btags ya btags zhabs kyu rnams// rgyud ngan sang sring gnyen 'brel 'dra// phan tshun
dag gi 'brel pa yin// gnas lugs snying po ma ltar te// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags rang byung bu// dper na ma bu gnyis kyi tshul// de las de byung 'brel pa yan// 'gro ba drug sogs 'khrul pa rnams// bde bar
gshegs pa'i rigs yin pas// rig sngags zhes ni rab tu brjod// gnas lugs snying po gzhi gcig pas// ngo bo nyid ces 'brel pa che// 'khor 'das zung du 'brel pa yin// gzungs sngags zhes ni rab tu
brjod// sangs rgyas snying po 'gro ba yin// rang la rang chas rang la gsang// rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas// gsang sngags zhes ni rab tu brjod// thams cad gnas lugs snying po rang/ gnas

lugs ma bcos phyogs lhung med// rgya chad med de rang byung bas// snying po sngags zhes rab tu brjod// 'brel pa'i ngo bo gnas lugs spyi// 'brel pa'i nges tshig kun dang 'brel// dbye ba de bzhin sngags

bzhi'o// mthun dpe dra ba la sogs lnga// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'brel pa ngo bo nges tshig sngags dang sbyar ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rdo rje

'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// sgyu ma'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni// spyi sa snying po ci yang med// dang po 'byung sa med de stong// stong pa nyid la phu mda' med// dper na nam mkha'

phyogs mtha' med// spyi sa snying po ci yang min// mtshan mar mi 'dzin bla na med// de la man pa ci la bdag/ smon pa med ces bla dgas tsam// rang byung rang snang gzhan snang med// mtshan mar mi 'dzin yul

snang ste// yul snang yod du rang la med// mtshan ma med ces rab tu brjod// ces gsungs nas/ lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sgyu ma'i chos brgyad po de dang po gang nas byung/ bar du gang na
gnas/ mtha' ma gar 'gro zhes gsungs so// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sgyu ma de dang po rten 'brel las byung/ bar du mig dang dbang po 'khrul pa la gnas/ tha ma kun rdzob bden par 'gro lags so// zhes

gsol pas/ ston pas yang bka' stsal pas/ sgyu ma rten 'brel las ji ltar byung// bar du dbang po ji ltar 'khrul/ kun rdzob tu ni ci ltar bden// zhes gsungs so// badzra pA Nis gsol pa/ sgyu ma yang dang po

rdzas dang sngags kyi rten 'brel las byung/ bar du dbang po 'khrul pas ngo mtshar ba'o// mtha' ma kun rdzob yin pas gtan du mi gnas lags so// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rdzas gang yin/ ngo mtshar

gang kun rdzob gang bden ces pas/ badzra pA Nis yang gsol pa/ rdzas ni 'byung bzhi'o// ngo mtshar ni dbang po lnga la'o// kun rdzob ni 'khrul pa'o// zhes gsol bas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ badzra pA Ni

'byung ba bzhi gang las byung/ dbang po gang la 'dzin/ 'khrul pa bden nam zhes gsungs pas/ badzra pA Nis yang smras pa/ 'byung ba bzhi nam mkha' las byung/ dbang po'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa bden/ 'khrul pa
'gro ba la bden lags/ zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nam mkha' gang las byung/ mtshan nyid cir 'dzin/ zhes gsungs so// lag na rdo rjes gsol ba/ kye kye 'gro ba'i
mgon po lags// ma dpogs ma 'tshal ma rigs na// byung sa mi gda' mtshan mas 'khrul/ kun rdzob mi bden don dam rags// zhes gsol pas/ 'gro mgon rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig

rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// dang po sgyu ma byung ba med// bar du sgyu ma gnas sa med/ mtha' ma sgyu ma 'gro sa med// sgyu ma de la mthong snang med// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po

dang// sgyu ma'i slob ma mchan bu dang// 'dus pa'i khrom sogs mthong ba gnyis// mthong snang tha dad 'dzin yul gnyis// stag dang seng ge wa mo sogs// rnam pa sna tshogs cir yang snang// sgyu ma mkhan la

mthong ba med// sgyu ma'i slob bus sgyu mar shes// 'jigs dang bag tsha chags sdang shes// phal pa rnams la 'jigs skrag dang// chags sdang rol mo bden par 'dzin// sgyu ma byed pa'i mkhan po la// yul mi

gnyis ka grub pa med// sgyu ma'i slob bu de bstan shes// phal pa chags sdang dngos por mthong// dngos por 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i chos// 'khrul pa yin pas yod pa med// sgyu ma de ni smon pa med// sgyu ma mtshan

ma med pas mtshan ma med// sgyu ma stong pa yin pas stong pa nyid// sgyu ma yin lugs cir yang med// sgyu ma'i snang lugs cir yang med/ gcig tu ma yin ci yang med// de bzhin 'gyu dran 'dzin chags pa'i// ci

yang ma yin ci yang bzhi// ma bcos snying po 'gyur ba ci yang min// dran pa ci yang ma yin ci yang min// snying po phyogs su ma lhung ci yang min// snying po rang byung ci yang med// dang po 'gyu ba 'byung sa
med// bar du 'gyu dran gnas sa med// mtha' ma 'gyu dran 'gro sa med// byung sa med do gzhi yi dras thag chod// yul med med bral ci yang med// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ sgo gnyis
sgyu ma dris lan 'gyu dran gnas lugs ci yang ma yin pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra pA Ni sogs// dper na mtshan mo'i rmi lam gnyis// mdza' bo yid
sdug grogs dang bu// shin tu longs spyod rkyen ldan nas// lo mang bde la spyod gyur la// bu shi nor brlag mya ngan byas// sad par gyur na gnyis ka med// de bzhin ma rig gnyid log ste// snod bcud dgra

gnyen chags sdang dngos// bden pa'i don du 'jig rten 'di// dge sdig las spyod yin min rtsi// shes rab gnyis sad gnyis ka med// de bzhin sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma'i tshogs sprul yod pa med// sgra

brnyan smig rgyu gzugs brnyan dang// mi g.yor chu zla sprul pa rnams// yod nas mi snang med pas snang// snang ba rang gis spyod ma yin// dbang po rnam shes tshogs drug ni// rmi lam sgyu ma sprul par ltos// mthong
ngam mthong na lta ba'i gdeng// legs par mthong na bsgom par bya// ma mthong bar du ci zhig bsgom// sgom ngo shes pa shin tu dka'/ goms dang 'dris pas spyod pa spyad// dge sdig las kun
gang byed kyang// rmi lam sgyu ma'i spyod par shes// dus gsum 'bral med 'bras bur 'gyur// snying po chos sku mngon gyur yin// lta ba'i gnas lugs ma rtogs par// bsgom par byed pa'i blun po

rnams// dper na rgyus med lam 'dren 'dra// de bas mkhas pas legs par ltos// sgyu ma phrog yin gang snang kun// gang brtags snying po ma yin no// sgyu ma'i gzugs dang sgyu ma'i sgra// sgyu ma'i dri dang sgyu ma'i

ro// sgyu mar shes na sgyu ma bsgom// rmi lam gzugs dang tshor ba dang// 'du shes 'du byed rnam par shes// rmi lam shes na rmi lam bsgom// de bzhin sprul pa sna tshogs brgyad// mthong ngam shes na bsgom par

bya// ma bcos rang byung lta ba rtogs// phyogs lhung rgya chad med par bsgom// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ sgyu ma'i lta bsgom bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga
pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// de las srog snying sgrub pa ni// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// bsgrub par bya ba rnam pa brgyad// 'jam dpal sku yi

sgrub pa dang// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa dang// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa dang// bdud rtsi yon tan sgrub pa dang// phur pa phrin las sgrub pa dang// ma mo rbod gtong sgrub pa drug/ 'jig rten sgrub pa rnam pa

gnyis// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa dang// 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'o// sgrub pa chen po re re la// brgyad brgyad dag tu shes par byos// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las rbod
gtong drug/ drag sngags mchod bstod rnam pa brgyad// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub pa ni// 'khor lo bzhi la rdzogs pa yin// gnas pa'i 'khor lo gnas lugs bzhi// srid pa'i 'khor lo 'brel pa'i
tshogs// sprul pa'i 'khor lo rgyud pa'i chos// gcod pa'i 'khor lo srog snying gnyis// gnas pa'i 'khor los gnas lugs bstan// srid pa'i 'khor los snang lugs bstan// sprul pa'i 'khor los sprul
lugs bstan// gcod pa'i 'khor los phrin las bstan// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub pa rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ sku'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang

ston pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa yang// rgya chad phyogs lhung med par bstan// rta skad mtha' mas spyod pa bstan// sngags dang dam tshig dbang du bsdu// rta skad
dang po gnas lugs te// yi ge 'bru bzhi shes par bya// ka kha ga nga tshogs kyis bstan// tho chen gnas lugs gdams par gyis// rta skad bar mas lta ba brtag/ tshom bu bzhi tshoms brtag pa

gnyis// chos kyi sgo mo sgra skad gsung// ka dang a sogs grogs kyi shes// rta skad mtha' ma phrin las bzhi// srog dang snying pos srog phrogs te// rta skad dang pos bsngag par bya// rta skad gnyis pas dran du
gzhug/ rta skad gsum pas dbang du bsdu// rta skad mtha' ma'i go rim mo// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ gsung gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/

nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa yang// ru lu 'bru brgyad dgongs par 'dus// ru lu'i ngo bo chos nyid yin// ru lu'i 'phro 'du spro lugs dang// ru lu'i rnam par dpe go dang// ru
lu'i mthar rdzogs 'bras bu rdzogs// ru lu'i chos nyid gnas lugs te// dpal chen rang bzhin bstan par bya// rang bzhin ye nas bcos pa med// de la rgya chad phyogs lhung med// ma bcos pas na rang byung

yin// rang bzhin ci yang yin par shes// ru ni chos nyid dbyings su gcig/ lu ni gnas lugs skye ba med// ru lu skye 'gag med pa yin// hUM ni thams cad snying po la// b+h+yo ni ma mo'i b+ha gar shes// ru lu chos

nyid don du sbyar// ru lu'i 'phro 'du bstan pa ni// ting 'dzin gsum gyis khog phub la// sems dpa'i rang bzhin gsal byas la// ru lu stags su spro ba dang// ru lu mtshon char spro ba'o// mchod sbyangs dregs

pa tshar bcad yin// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i don zhes bya// ru lu dbyangs su shes bya ste// dung nge breng nge sha rtsa ba// gar rtsa ba dang cang ka de// bang ka ste la sogs pa'i dbyangs// srod dang tho rangs dus drug

blangs// nyams dga' zil gyis gnon pa yin// ru lu lha yi rnam pa yin// ru lu dkyil 'khor chen po yin// ru lu phrin las rang bzhin yin// ru lu spyan drang bstod pa yin// ru lu chos nyid de ltar yin// ru
lu don rtogs blta ba yin// goms pa mthar phyin 'bras bu yin// snang ba thams cad sku ru rtogs// grags pa thams cad gsung du shes// gnyis su med par rtogs pa thugs// dpal chen re ba mi byed
de// ngan song gnas la dogs mi byed// las 'dzin khur 'grogs rang ngo shes// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ ru lu 'bru brgyad kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas ston pas

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje sogs// bdud rtsi yon tan sgrub pa ni// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhir 'dus te// chos nyid bdud rtsi bstan pa dang// lha sngags bdud rtsi bstan pa dang// dam rdzas bdud rtsi
bstan pa dang// sman mchog bdud rtsi bstan pa'o// chos nyid bdud rtsi zhes bya ba// ma rig 'khrul pa bdud yin gyis// gnas lugs ye shes rig pa rtsi// thos par byas pa'i bdud rtsi

yin// gnas lugs ma bcos rgya chad med// phyogs med rang byung su za ba// rigs drug nyon mongs bdud kyi rtsi// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong bdud// chos sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong rtsi// chos nyid bdud rtsi che

mchog yin// lha sngags bdud rtsi bstan pa ni// phung po rnam lnga bdud yin te// che mchog rigs lnga'i rtsi yis btang// dam pa rigs brgyas rtogs tshogs bsgyur// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrI tha/ lha
sngags bdud rtsir shes par bya// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pas// don mchog bdud rtsi zhes bya'o// dam rdzas bdud rtsi bstan pa ni// dam rdzas rnams la skyon med de// rnam rtog bdud la rtog med

rtsi// mnyam nyid yon tan che mchog rtsi// sman rnams bdud rtsi zhes bya ba// 'du bar gyur pa bdud rnams la// sman la sel med mkhas pas btang// nad kyi bdud la sman gyi rtsi// bdud rtsi'i yon tan bsam
mi khyab// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// phur bu thal 'byin dgongs pa

ni// chos nyid ye shes phur pa dang// gsang ba byang sems phur pa dang// tshad med sprul pa'i phur pa dang// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa bzhi// gdab pa'i yul dang gdab pa'i thabs// thebs pa'i tshad dang
ma theb skyon// thebs pa'i 'bras bu phur bu rdzogs// chos nyid ye shes phur pa de// yul ni chos kyi dbyings la gdab// gdab thabs shes bya bzhi bskor thabs// thebs tshad gzhi lam gnyis su
med// ma thebs nyon mongs rgyud drug 'khor// 'bras bu yul med chos kyi sku// gsang ba byang sems phur pa de// rtog tshogs yum gyi mkha' la gdab// mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras rnams bskyed// de la phur pa
ma thebs na// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed mi nus// 'bras bu mtshon pa'i longs sku 'byung// tshad med sprul pa'i phur pa ni// rigs drug 'khor ba'i yul la gdab// ma btab 'khor ba drug tu
'khyams// btab pas thugs rje thabs kyis zin// thugs rje'i dpyang thag chad pa'i phyir// 'bras bu 'gro don sprul skur rdzogs// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa ni// bstan dgra dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
gdab// thebs tshad phrin las rnam bzhir brtag/ ma thebs ma shes dgra bgegs der// 'bras bu sku lnga ye shes 'thob// yang dag dgra bgegs zhi ba'i phyir// phur pa phrin las rim par bstan// sku
gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// ma mo rbod gtong sgrub pa ni// chos nyid gzhi
yi ma mo dang// rtogs pa ye shes ma mo dang/ 'khrul pa las kyi ma mor 'dus// ma ni snying po'i gnas lugs yin// mo ni 'khor 'das gnas lugs yin// ma ni ma bcos kun gyi gzhi// mo ni gzhi las cir

yang srid// ma ni phyogs lhung rgya chad med// mo ni rang byung kun gyi gzhi// ma ni snang srid nga las byung// chos nyid kun gzhi'i ma mo yin// ma ni chos kyi sku yin no// mo ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// ma mo kun

gyi yum yin no// 'khor 'das ma lus 'byung sprul sku// ye nas ma shes ye shes yin// 'byung lnga phyi yi ma mo yin// sha khrag drod dbugs nang ma mo// rang sems kun srid gsang ba yin// kun gyi las byed las

ma mo// ri rab srid pa'i yum drug nas// gang rgyu srin mo la sogs pa// gdul bya rten gyi ma mo yin// rtsa la zhon nas khrag la rgyu// don snying yan lag dbang por brgyud// 'byung 'jug dwangs snyigs las byed

pas// rnam shes nang gi ma mo yin// rang sems rnam shes rta zhon nas// yid rgyud 'gyu dran 'dzin chags kyis// chags sdang ye shes las byed pas// gsang ba sems kyi ma mo yin// ye shes ma mo dbyings kyi

yum la rbad// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// ma rbad dbyings kyis ye shes 'khor// las kyi ma mo dgra la rbad// dgra bgegs bdun rgyud rtsa ba chad// ma rbad bstan pa'i chos la gnod// ye shes ma mo

skye ba med// las kyi ma mo 'gag pa med// ma mo'i rigs te bsam mi khyab// phyi nang gsang ba'i ma mo nas// nges pa don gyi ma mo dang// dbyings kyi ye shes ma mo dang// phan gnod phyi yi ma mo dang// phan

gnod nang gi ma mo dang// phan gnod gsang ba'i ma mo dang// sprul pa dam tshig ma mo rnams// rtsa la gnas shing khrag la rgyu// rtsa rlung ma mor zhal 'chos dang// sha za khrag 'thung srog la gcod// bkrag
mdangs 'khrog cing dbugs rngub pas// pho nya rbod gtong ma mor byas// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las// rbod gtong ma mo'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'jig rten pa thams cad dbang du bsdus nas/ de yi las la rnam gnyis gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// 'jig rten las la rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa ni// 'jig rten
pho mo tshogs la ste// pha mes rgyud nas chags pa dang// slob dpon rgyud nas chags pa dang// rigs rgyud sngon nas chags pa dang// 'dug sa gnas shing chags pa dang// legs nyes zhal lces chags pa
dang// mgon skyabs stong grogs lha brgyad ni// phyaugs su mchod cing bstan pa dang// lus dang grib bzhin 'grogs pa yin// shin tu nye bar bsten thabs la/ khang bu bca' zhing rten btsugs

la// tshul bzhin mchod cing dam bsres pas// ji ltar bcol ba'i las byed de// 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa yin/ khyi snying phru+u la chags ltar 'khor// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/
'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos bstan pa'i ru gzugs pa'i phyir/ dregs pa thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin/

rdo rje 'od 'phros pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu lha dang klu dang gza' rgod dang/ bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ btsan dang/ srin po la sogs pa thams cad

kyi gzugs kyi ba spu dang/ skra thams cad langs/ snying ni 'dar// sems dang yid rnam shes stong pa ltar bsngangs te/ skad cig ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas 'dar zhing yed yed phyag dang

bskor ba byas te/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul ba las/ de dag kun kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bsdus so// de yang lha yi gtso bo zhe sdang can tshangs pa nga rgyal can khyab 'jug
dang/ 'dod chags can ma hA de wa dang/ gti mug can dbang phyug chen po gsum mo// klu rigs kyi gdug pa can lnga la klu bdud nag po dang 'chi bdag go/ gza' du ba mjug rings lcags kyi mdog/ gza'

phur snying 'byin rkang gcig mgo dgu po/ bdud ngo bzhin nag po 'dzum med/ nag po me dug gi kha rlangs can dang/ bram thog ri ti 'gong g.yag la sogs dang/ ma mo ral gcig khrag 'thung dang// dbugs len mdangs 'phrog rtsad

gcod ma rnams dang/ gshin rje dmar nag reg chod rnams// btsan a gi ba bzhi sde brgyad dang/ gnam lcags thog 'bebs la sogs rnams dang/ gtsug na me 'bar la sogs gnod sbyin rnams dang/ lang ka mgrin sngon gdong

dmar la sogs srin po rnams dang/ srog bdag rgyal po dkar nag dang/ dge bsnyen klu tsha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing legs nyes kyi stangs 'byed du dbang bskur ro// dam la

gnas shing bstan pa bsrung bar gyis shig/ ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ dregs pa can dbang du bsdus te las khrims phog pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa la// srog dang snying po gnyis kyis bsgrub// srog ni gzugs la snying po min// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// srog dang srog gi snying po las// mi gtong
'dzin pa srog yin te// rang dbang med pa'i snying po yin// 'da' bar dka' ba dam tshig yin// sku gzugs snang bar gsal bas srog/ btags pa de mtshon snying po min// ming la drag sngags
bdun gyis bod// re re la yang bdun bdun no// de bod dmod pa drag sngags bdun// rigs nas bod dang ming nas bod// gsang mtshan mtshang nas bod pa dang// rang btags srog nas bod pa bdun// gang

zag sgrub par shes par bya// de la lha yi bod pa bdun// d+he ba ming la rdul ni rigs// ke 'u gsang mtshan shi sa mtshang// a ni rang rtags srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go/ de rnams gcig tu dril nas

bod// tshangs pa khyab 'jug ma hA de// dbang phyug la sogs lha rnams la// de las 'das pa'i drag sngags med// klu yi rigs kyi bod pa bdun// nA ga nas drangs ming yin te// tsa tas drangs na gsang mtshan

yin// hu ya zhes ni rigs nas bod// shu ya bya ba mtshang yin no// phu ni ya ste srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig la// de rnams dril bas klu la bod// gnod sbyin la yang bod pa bdun// yak+Sha nas drangs ming
yin te/ len gyis drags na mtshang yin no// dzaM gyis drangs na gsang mtshan yin// ku be ra ni rigs su shes// k+Sha ni rang rtags srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig la// gcig tu drags na dril ba

yin// gnod sbyin sgrub 'dod de ltar bod// srin po bdud kyi 'di lta ste// raka shas drangs na ming yin te// pra mas drangs na gsang mtshan yin// ru nas drangs pa mtshang du 'jug/ tra zhes bya ba rigs yin

no// tri ni rang rtags srog tu bya// sa ma ya ni dam tshig la// de rnams gcig tu dril ba'o// srin po sgrub 'dod de ltar bsgrub// ma mo bdun ni 'di lta ste// ma mo drangs pa ming yin te// kA la rigs nas bod pa

yin// ru ru+u mtshang nas baud pa yin// trag ni rang rtags srog yin la// ma hA ru ru gsang mtshan yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go/ gnyis gsum drug ka dril bas bod// bdud kyi bod pa bdun po ni// phra mas

drangs na ming du bos// du ru ye ya rigs su 'jug/ tsan tis drangs na mtshang yin no// badzra thibs ni gsang mtshan no// du tri rang rtags srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig yin// gnyis sam drug sdeb dril

ba yin// rgyal rigs bdun ni 'di lta ste// gang gis drangs pa ming yin te// rA dza rigs nas bod pa yin// b+ha ga song nas bod pa yin// badzra gsang mtshan tri srog snying// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go/ sdeb nas

kun tshang dril ba yin// ging gi bdun yang 'di dag ste// ging ka ming la rA tsa rigs// sham ni mtshang la tri ni rtags// tsa pa gsang mtshan bod pa yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go/ de rnams gcig tu dril bas
bod// the brang sa d+hus drangs na ming// tri'u mtshang la trI du rtags// badzra gsang mtshan ya tri rigs// dam tshig dral ba bdun yin no// gshin rje'i bdun ni 'di rnams te// hri sti ming la tri sna
mtshang// ya me gsang mtshan ya ma rigs// yak+Sha rang rtags srog snying rigs// sa ma ya ni dam tshig la// gcig nas drug sdeb dril ba yin// 'jig rten kun 'jug khyab 'jug gza'// ka tas drangs na ming

nas bod// rA hu la ni mtshang yin no// tsa pa ti drangs gsang mtshan la// ya mas drangs na pha ma'i rigs// pa sha rang rtags srog snying yin// sa ma ya ni dam tshig go/ ming nas dam tshig bar du mtshang// dril
nas bod rbad las sbyor yin// dregs pas sgrub pa de bzhin byos// legs par ma shes rang srog phung// legs par rtogs shing mkhas par gyis// ming nas bod pa rnal ma yin// mtshang ni mtshang tshig brus pa
ste// mi 'ong ba yi rang dbang med// gsang mtshan rgyal ba slob dpon dka'// bka' las mi 'da' 'ong bar 'gyur// dam tshig sngon gyi khas blangs yin// dam las mi 'da' 'ong bar 'gyur// srog nas bos

pas rang gis rang// bskul nas rang dbang med par 'ong// rigs ni pha yi cho 'brang ste// nye bar 'ong nas las byed de// dril nas bod pas 'grub par byed// rkyang ba gnyis sdeb gsum du dril// bzhi tshang lnga
dril drug ka dril// sham bu'i sngags dang bdun ldan na// dmod mo'i las 'grub gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ drag sngags dmod pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas

ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// sgrub pa 'das dang 'jig rten la// srog snying gnyis kyi bsgrub pa bya// srog ni sku gsal gzugs gsal yin// snying po dpa' bo 'bru lnga dang// ya ma
nA ga tri la sogs// drag sngags mi mtshang bod pa ste// bsnyen pa bsgrub dang las sngags yin// srog ni gsal ba gsum gyis 'phrog/ dang po yid la gsal bar bya// dngos po lta bur gsal bar
bsam// gnyis pa dbang po'i yul la gsal// bltas shing dngos po lta bur mthong// dper na chu nang zla ba bzhin// dngos med dngos por gsal ba'o// gsum pa lus kyi reg byar gsal// che chung ci yang
dngos su snang// yul gsum gsal ba rab kyi tshad// 'jig rten pa yi tshad yin no// gdams ngag myur du gdab pa yin// dngos po'i bdud kyis bslus pa ste// yul med gdams pa rab tu gces// gsal
stong don rtogs dngos su 'khor// srog gi don po dgu dang ldan// mthong dang reg dang phra ba dang// 'dres dang gtam dang gcugs pa dang// bsgo dang nyan dang las byed dngos// 'jig rten srog gi don po
dgu'o// sems shar rang byung ma bcos pa// rgya chad phyogs med lhun grub pa// mnyam nyid gnyis med ngos med dang// 'gyur med chos sku chen po ni// nang ltar srog ni gzhi la dgu// rnam shes

don ster mthong ba med// yul med ming bral yin pa med// ci yang ma yin min pa med// yin pa med dang spang blang med// shin tu gsang ba'i srog thob yin// lta ba mthong na sgom byed mkhan// lta spyod rang

sems dngos su spyod// nor bu rin chen 'chang ba 'dra// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ sgrub pa don po dgu phyi nang gsang ba gsum du thob pa'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas ston pas

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa rdo rje'i 'khor// de bzhin sgrub pa'i las byed pa// lo dang zla ba gza' skar la// dus 'dzom dus ni bzang 'jug bya// byi phag gnyis ni bsdus pa'i lo// stag yos gnyis ni

bskyed pa'i lo// rta sbrul gnyis ni smod pa'i lo// bya sbrel gnyis ni gcod pa'i lo// glang lug khyi 'brug gdug pa'i lo// ma bu dgra grogs rang gshed brtag/ ra ba 'bring po tha chung ste// bsnyen bsgrub las
gsum mkhas pas 'jug/ 'bod rbad bsad gsum 'grub par byed// rgyal blon khams dang rgyu dus kyi// thebs ldog las kun mkhas pas brtag/ shar lho nub byang skar skor bdun// gang tshes nya stong lo
gza' bsten// bzang ngan dus tshod mkhas pas brtag/ nga yi theg chen yangs pa 'di// phan gnod las kun mdor bsdus bstan// 'gro drug phyi nang rgyu 'bras kyi// theg pa sa lam grub pa'i mtha'// 'bros
dang log non bzhi nas brtsi// yul med ming bral 'dod phugs gtib// bden nyams rdzun nyams dang po yin// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ 'brel pa log non gyi le'u ste nyer drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rigs 'khor// gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir// thams cad 'brel te 'dus pa yin// rgyu dang lung dang man ngag
gsum// yi ge gsum gyi dgongs pa yin// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// rdzong 'phrang gsum gyi mtha' la gtug/ rnal 'byor gsum gyis nyams su blang// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu yin// bskyed pa'i

rdzong dang bskyed pa'i 'phrang// rdzogs pa'i rdzong dang rdzogs pa'i 'phrang// rdzogs chen rdzong dang rdzogs chen 'phrang// yo ga gsum du rig par bya// bde gshegs snying po sems nyid do// ma bcas rang yan rgya
phyogs med// 'khor 'das snang srid de las bskyed// kun gzhi sems kyi rdzong chen ma hA yin// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de ka rgyud/ khams gsum rigs drug 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal rgyud// ye shes
'khrul pa'i 'phrang las bskyed pa'o// don dam ngo bo ma skyes kyang// kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor du// rim gyis bskyed pa ma hA yo ga yin// kun gzhi snying po sems la rdzogs// rang bzhin lhun

gyis grub pa'i rdzong// lung mchog ma bcos rang byung lung// rgya chad phyogs lhung med par rdzogs// spyi sa kun gzhi rdzong chen las// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags 'phrang rtog 'khrul// a nu yo ga'i lung zhes bya// snying

po'i don la kun ka rdzogs// bcos dang ma bcos gnyis ka'i rdzong// phyogs su 'dod pa'i 'phrang las thar// bskyed dang rdzogs pa gnyis ka'i rdzong// gong 'og phyogs 'dod 'phrang las thar// rang byung rdzogs

chen 'gran med rdzong// re ltos grub pa'i 'phrang las thar// 'gran med rdzogs pa chen po yin// ye nas shes la bcos pa med// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ yo ga gsum gyi rdzogs 'phrang
gi le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lag na rdo rje 'dzin// gsang sngags 'bras bu bla med 'di// lta spyod gnyis su shes par gyis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa

che// bskyed pa rgyud kyi lta ba ni// thams cad shes rab gnyis med blta// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rnam pa lnga ru spyod// rdzogs pa lung gi lta ba ni// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med

blta// kun bzang yab yum sras ltar spyod// man ngag rdzogs chen lta ba ni// rang byung ye shes phyogs med blta// dgag sgrub spang blang med par spyod// thabs kyi rdzong la shes rab 'phrang// lta ba'i rdzong la spyod

pa'i 'phrang// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrang la gzung// dbyings kyi rdzong la ye shes ltos// bzang ngan med pa'i 'phrang du spyod// rang byung rdzong la phyogs med ltos// spang blang med pa'i 'phrang du spyod// thabs shes
dkyil 'khor lta ba la// don dam skye med kun rdzob dgras/ 'dod pa'i 'phrang la 'jigs pa'i bdud// 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung bar mchi// kun rdzob dus na don dam yin// thabs kyi nges na shes rab
yin// bskyed pa'i dus na rdzogs pa yin// sku dang ye shes de ltar 'grub// lha yi dkyil 'khor dbyings su 'dod// yum dang sras kyi dgra de 'phrang// 'dod pa'i 'phrang la 'jigs pa'i bdud// 'dod pa 'khor

ba'i g.yang la ltung// dbyings dang rig pa'i ye shes so// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// dbyings kyang rang las byung shes pas// ye shes yul med rang byung rig/ yab yum sras kyi 'dod pa bral/ lta
spyod gnyis kyi mtha' las grol// rdzogs pa'i dus na rdzogs chen yin// snang srid sems su blta ba la// phyogs med phyogs blta gsang ba'i ngag kha 'khyams nag 'khyams 'jigs pa'i 'phrang// thar med rdo

rje'i g.yang la lhung// rang sems rgya chad phyogs lhung med// rang byung chos sku ye nas yin// lta ba'i rdzong la spyod pa'i 'phrang// sbyor sgrol phyi nang gsang ba gsum// thabs kyi rdzong dang shes rab

rdzong// rig pa rang byung gnyis med rdzong// bskyed pa rgyud kyi rdzong du shes// bsnyen bsgrub cho ga sgrub pa'i lam// sbyor sgrol nyams len spyod pa'i 'phrang// rgyud kyi lugs su mkhas pas spyad// dbyings kyi rdzong

dang ye shes rdzong// lus gnyis sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'phrang// sgyu lus 'pho shes rdzong 'phrang ni// rdzogs pa lung gi rdzong 'phrang ngo// gnas lugs bzhi skor rdzogs pa'i rdzong// chos can gcig la chos kun

rdzong// mi yengs mnyam gzhag sgom pa'i 'phrang// cir spyad rang byung spyod pa'i 'phrang// man ngag rdzogs chen rdzong 'phrang yin// gsang ba'i dgra gsum bsad pas 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi choms// 'gro drug
g.yang sa bcad pas 'da' dka'i 'phrang las grol// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ yo ga gsum gyi lta spyod rdzong 'phrang du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bka'

stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// srung ba 'tsho byed rgyal po ni// rnam rgyal sa yi bdud rtsis bya// 'byung 'khrugs nad dang rkyen byed bgegs// byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs chen yin// dge bshes rnal

'byor sngags 'chang nas// byis pa pho mo gtsang ma dang// wa spyang brun yang bag cig gtang// bdud rtsi rnam lnga tshil chen gtang/ khyi phag sha tshil brun yang gtang// byang chub sems rnams tshogs tshad
bsag/ bzang drug la sogs 'bras bu gsum// chos kyi sman gyis gtso bo bya// mar bag gro dang bsil sman dang// cong zhi mu zi ra mo shags// gu gul rgya tshil ma gi ta// tsan dan ga pur la sogs
te// grogs kyi rta ni bsag par bya// bdud rtsi dri chen khal gcig gam// ci 'byor ci mang legs bskams dang// bum pa brtsegs mar ldugs pa'i tshe// mar khu'i kha brus btab byas la// tshil chen bcud can
rus pa gzhug/ shin tu dod nang bum pa gzhug/ sa mtshams bum pa brtsegs byas te// gsang sgo bum pa lnga mas brib// shin tu gdug pa'i shing brtsigs te// me bcug 'bar ba'i bar dag du// chu gtor glud
gtor phud gtang la// bden pa bdar la mtshams bcad de// bum pa yi dam dkyil 'khor dmigs// dri chen lha tshogs khros par dmigs// lcags sam gtsub shing me bton la// gdug pa'i shing la spar

bar bya// bsnyen sgrub yi dam gzhung du bsrang// gtor tshogs mchod pa ci ldan dbul// dri rlangs mi gtang kha sbub bsdam// zhag gcig dag tu me mi gcad// mi shi dngos grub tshul du blangs// rang bza' lha la
mchod pa bya// bdud rtsi mar khu rin chen snod// lo 'am zla ba'i zhag grangs su// gzhan la mi bstan gsang bar bya// dngos grub mi yal dam tshig yin// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi
rgyud las/ rdzas bsag cing bdud rtsir bzhu ba'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas/ gtso bo'i mdun du 'dug gdong du bltas nas mig mi 'dzum par thal mo sbyar te

gus par btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// bdud rtsi mar khu de la ni// yon tan ji tsam 'byung ba lags// grogs su gang dang sbyor bar bya// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis
bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// bdud rtsi mar khu bza' bar bya// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang// 'byung ba snyoms nas lus bde ste// bgegs kyis mi tshugs rims mi 'ong// 'gro ba

rnams kyi mgon du gyur// kun la phan thogs nor bu 'dra// gnod pas mi tshugs nam mkha' 'dra// 'chi bas 'jigs pas tshe bsgrub ste// bdud rtsi mar khu bre re la// zhun chen bre re rtsa ba'i phrad// mar rnying bre

re de bzhin phrad// a ru ra stong ba ru skyur// rdog po 'ga' 'ga' grogs su gtang// bzang po drug ni bong dang sbyar// zhib par btags te sbrus byas la// ril bu mthe bong ril ma tsam// cong zi chos sman rkang

par gtang// lo dang lo dus ri lu bza'// cong zi chu+u ba 'o ma grogs/ stong nyid lta bsgom gsang sngags bzlas/ kham zas spangs pas chog pa ste// drag shul mi bya shes pa bsgrib// yid dang ngag gis brtson
'grus bya// tshe lo dpag tu med pa thub// bcud mchog bdud rtsi mar khu 'di// lo gcig zos pas lo brgya thub// longs spyod nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// lo gsum zos na sum brgya thub// gling gcig nor la
dbang byed 'gyur// lo bzhi zos na ma mo dang// mkha' 'gro ma yis grogs byed de// mi mo rnams la dbang byed 'gyur// lo lnga zos na skyes pa 'du// rgyal po'i rgyal srid ster bar 'gyur// lo drug lo bdun
zos pas ni// 'og gi klu la dbang byed 'gyur// lo brgyad lo dgu 'di zos na// dug dang dug gis tshugs med 'gyur// lo bcur zos na mtshon dang me// bsad pas mi sod tshe la dbang// mi med ri dwags

wa spyang bya// mi rgod sa gcing gnas pa yin// gzhung dang tshul du 'di bsgrubs na// nges par tshe yi rig 'dzin 'thob// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi tshe sgrub bcud len gyi le'u ste
sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa che// gdug pa klu dang 'gras pa'i mis// 'dze 'phro gcad pa tshur log pas// bdud rtsi mar khu bdud rtsir sbyar// gu gul tshil chen
rta bon dang// gla rtsi bo ngas lus byug bza'// gsang bdag bya khyung rta mgrin bsgom// yi dam bsnyen sgrub sngags bzlas gdab// zhag grags bdun du zos bsgrub na// yang na mdze yi nad

las thar// bdud rtsi mar khu de nyid dang// cong zi gu gul rgya tshar sbyar// sngags bzlas zos na gag pa thub// skrangs 'bur nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi bzang drug sle tres dang// shu dag dkar po gla rtsi
sbyar// sngags bzlas zos na rims las thar// bdud rtsi sgog skya gla rtsi dang// nyung dkar mi rus mu zi sbyar// zos pas 'brum bu dkar nag gi/ nad rims las ni thar bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi a ru ra dang
ni// zangs g.ya' a ba lca 'brum dang// zhim thig le dang sbyar zos na// mig gi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi skyer pa'i mkhr-is pa dang// ti rtse mu zi sbyar byugs na// me yi nad las grol bar

'gyur// bdud rtsi sgog skya rdog gcig ma// nyung 'bras mar khu nyung dkar sbyar// dug las grol bar byed pa yin// bdud rtsi kyi gu'i klad pa dang// ro tsha na tshil khu ba dang// dom gyi mkhris pas dug nad

sel// lo drug sbyar ba'i dug las thar// bdud rtsi mkhris pa thar nur sbyar// za 'phrug gang nar byug pas grol// 'o mar bdud rtsi mu zi byug/ shu ba'i nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi sgog skya byi tang ka/ gla

rtsi sbyar na srin las grol// bdud rtsi lga dang pi pi ling// pho ba ris dang bu ram sbyar// ku ku rA tsa'i pags pa gding// gtum mo me yi ting 'dzin bya// grang ba'i nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi tsan dan

dkar po dang// cu gang dkar po dri chu dang// kha ba'i sman dang sbyar la gtang// tsha ba'i nad las thar bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi gu gul rgya tshil dang// ti tshe ra gzhob ko gzhob dang/ khrag rul btsan dug la

sogs sbyar// skrangs pa'i nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi sman lga ra dug rtsa// pho logs nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi gu gul srub ka sbyar// 'bras kyi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi gla rtsi mu zi
dang// shu dag kyi lce dang sbyar na// sha 'khrig thal mig nad las thar// bdud rtsi ra mo shag sbyar na// lus bde bcud len shin tu bzang// bdud rtsi 'o ma sbyar zos na// shin tu sha mdangs dkar ba

yin// bdud rtsi tsha sna bu ram dang// gze mar sbyar na mkhal nad 'tsho// bdud rtsi mar khu ru+u rta dang// rma bya'i sgro dang sbyar bas na// rna ba'i nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi bya yi zas dang ni// a ru+u ra dang

gla rtsir sbyar// snying gi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi brag zhun sbyar bas ni// mchin pa'i nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi ka ra sro lor sbyar// glo yi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi bcud dang sbyar
bas ni// rlung gi nad las thar bar byed// bdud rtsi dur bying rgya tshwar sbyar// bu yi nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi klad pa sna tshogs sbyar// mgo yi nad las thar bar byaid// bdud rtsi snum

dang sbyar byas na// bsku mnye byas te de bzhin phan// bdud rtsi cu gang ka ra sogs// gzer ba'i nad las grol bar byed// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang sbyar// bdud rtsi pad+ma'i khrag dang sbyar// bdud rtsi ru rta

ra mo shag/ rkang mgyogs dngos grub 'thob par byed// bdud rtsi 'ug pa srin bya'i mig/ zos na mtshan mo mthong ba yin// ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ bdud rtsi zos pa'i yon tan gyi le'u

ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad zhus// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// de ltar 'tsho byed sman gsungs nas// skor 'go phan gnod las rnams gang// rang gshed

spar kha sme ba khams// bstan pa bsrung phyir gsung du gsol// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// spar kha sme ba lo gza' skar// dus tshod mtshon chas srog la

dbab// me chu shing dang sa lcags la// rang gshed rang la 'bab dus bya// kung la phur pa shing gis gdab// glang lug 'brug dang khyi yi gshed// shar skar drug dang stag yos lug/ shang la nyi ma mig dmar

dang// rta sbrul lho skar drug dang sbyar// ji la zla ba lag pa des// byi phag byang skar drug la'o/ khyi 'brug shar skar bzhi yis so// skag la pa ba sangs bya sprel// nub skar drug dang sbyar bar bya// kung la skag

gi thod par bya// skag la shang gi thod par bya// ji la bu yi thod par bya// shang la j-i yi thod par bya// 'u la kung gis thod par bya// gshed kyi zla ba bstan pa ni// dpyid ston ra ba stag sprel keg/ ston dpyid

'bring po bya yos keg/ dpyid ston tha ma 'brug gi keg/ dbyar 'bring dgun 'bring bya rta'i keg/ dbyar dgun tha ma glang lug keg/ dbyar gun ra ba phag sbrul keg/ zhag keg dus tshod mkhas pas brtag/ rang
gshed dus la bab dus bya// pho mo skor skar dgra grogs gshed// gza' rgod 'gyu dus phung bar nges/ zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ ngan thabs gshed ma gtsug lag rtsis kyi bstan pa
bsrung ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir// so so'i skye bo lha min nas/ khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang// log lta mu stegs rtag chad

dang// nyan thos sde pa rang rgyal nas// byang sems dbu ma sems tsam dang// kr-i ya u pa yo ga ste// ma hA a nu a ti rnams// theg chen rdo rje 'di dang 'brel// don rnams la shan mkhas pas dbye// dang po rab
tu dga' ba nas// bcu pa bcu gsum sa lam yang// theg chen gnas lugs 'di dang 'brel// don 'brel don la brtsi bar bya/ gnas lugs snying po bzhi skor la// chos sku'i dgongs pa shes
par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bya// de yi don la rnal 'byor brtson// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas lugs don la yengs pa med// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas lugs ma

bcos phyogs lhung med// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yin// snying po'i don rtogs cir yang bzod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin// de yi gdams pa 'khor la sbyin// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin// gnas
lugs snying po bzhi skor shes// ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin// chos sku'i snying po gnas lugs so// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// gnas lugs tho chen bzhi yis mtshon// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa

yin// 'khor 'das rgya thos mya ngan 'das// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin// gsang sngags 'bras bu bla med 'dir// thams cad rgyun chad med par 'brel// rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba yin// de lung 'khor 'dus pho
mos blangs// lung mchog dgongs pa 'dus pa yin// tshegs med pa ru gsang ba shes// man ngag tshegs chung don chen yin// des ni rang dbang rang rig thob// dbang mchog rgyal po rang dbang yin// gnas
lugs snying po bzhi skor yin// 'da' ba'i sa med dam tshig mchog/ snying po'i dkyil la bzhi skor 'khor// dkyil 'khor 'phros pas dkyil 'khor mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchod pa'i mchog/ rnal mar rtogs
pas rnal 'byor mchog/ kun la bsngags pas gsang sngags yin// kun gyi las rdzogs phrin las yin// mtshon nas brjod med bsgom pa yin// de ltar spyod pas spyad pa yin// rang ngo rang shes lha dang
mjal// chos sku 'bras bu lha yi mchog/ ces gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ thams cad 'brel pa rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la

'di skad gsol/ kye kye rdo rje chos kyi sku// rgyud chen 'di yi dpe ni gang// de la mtshan du ji skad gzung// dus tshod gang du dar bar byed// ces gsol pas// rdo rje chos skus bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rig
'dzin rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje pho mo 'dus pa'i tshogs// nga yi rgyud chen kun yangs 'dir// dper na nam mkha' ji bzhin te// phyogs bcu mi dmigs phyogs bcu'i gzhi/ kha dog ma yin kha dog gzhi// dper

na nam mkha' chen po 'dra// dper na chu yi rgya mtsho 'dra// dper na rin chen gser dang 'dra// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// dper na mun pa nyi ma 'dra// dper na skye 'khrungs sa dang 'dra// dper na dra ba mig
mangs 'dra// dper na rma byas dug dang 'dra// dper na sman mkhas sman dang 'dra// dper na 'jim pa'i gzugs dang 'dra// dper na sangs rgyas spyan dang 'dra// dper na sgyu ma mkhas pa

'dra// de yi rgyud chen kun grol 'di// bdud dang bdud rtsi lta bu yi// me dang shing bu lta bu yin// rgya mtsho gza' skar lta bu yin// phreng ba phreng thag lta bu yin// shel gong dar dang za 'og 'dra// de bzhin rgyud
chen kun 'brel 'dir// kun gzhi'i gnas lugs ston pas na// snying po spyi gzhi'i rgyud du zung// thams cad gang yang bcos pa med// ma bcos pa yi rgyud du zung// gang gi phyogs su lhung ba med// phyogs

lhung med pa'i rgyud du zung// gar yang rgya chad med par bstan// rgya chad med pa'i rgyud du zung// thams cad rang las byung bas na// rang byung chen po'i rgyud du zung// thams cad 'di dang 'brel pa ste// 'brel pa

chen po'i rgyud du zung// sku gsung thugs las 'gyur med pas// rdo rje chen po'i rgyud du zung// rtsa ba thams cad 'di la rdzogs// rtsa ba rdzogs pa'i rgyud du zung// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa 'bras// yi ge 'bru la

ngo sprod pas// ngo sprod chen po'i rgyud du zung// yi ge'i tshogs kyis thams cad 'grol// yi ge 'gros kyi rgyud du zung// rten de la brten gdams ngag brten// rten 'brel chen po'i rgyud du zung// yul mi gnyis

kyi sgro 'dogs gcod// 'brel pa log non rgyud du zung// bden mnyam rdzun mnyam rang med ston// rgyu zad rkyen zad rgyud du zung// zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las/ dpe dang mtshan gyi le'u

ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang ni gdams pa ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje'i 'khor// zung zhig gtad do rdo rje 'dzin// legs par chongs shig rigs kyi bu// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// chos la dar nub

gsum 'ong gi/ dus kyi snyigs ma las ngan byed// de dus nga yi rgyud 'di 'byung// sems can bsod nams bri ba'i rtags// tshe thung nad mang longs spyod chung// nyon mongs rags te nad 'khrug 'ong// kun la

gces pa'i rgyal khrims nyams// nga spyad nga sgrin g.yo sgyu yis// de tshe rab tu byung ba kun// 'dul khrims g.yo dang khram du byed// sde pa'i gnas brtan dmag dpon byed// dge slong sgom chen khram pa

byed// dga' spyod byams sgom dag la bstod// sngags pa dam tshig mi bsrung zhing// phyi rol mu stegs sgrub pa byed// ngan sngags 'ba' zhig nang dme byed// gtso bo rtsad 'chang mna' la za// dmangs kun rang
dga' ngo tsha bral// pho ni khril shor jag choms byed// mo ni cho shor lus tshags lhod// kun kyang dkon mchog dkor la 'bagags// byis pa rgan spyod las la brtson// gnyen du bcas pas dgra ru
'ongs// zas ngan dug gi kha len byed// lhar bsten pa ni bdud du 'babs// gdon du klu dang sa bdag sdang// sna ni btsan dang rgyal pos 'dren// nad du rims dang dug gis 'debs// chos
skor dgra tshad byed pa ste// ar bas lam 'phrang bsrung zhing 'tshe/ khrims la bag tsam gnas pa'i tshe// nga yi rgyud kyis grol bar byed// rgyud chen nor bu nam mkha' 'di// nor bu nam mkha' 'di thos

pas// thos pas dred pa'i gting 'khyags dang// thos chung blo sbram rtog mang dang/ kha dkar gting nag brag gangs 'dra// gzhogs smod snying 'dod rdo gser chu// skyer tsher dar gyis gtums 'dra la// srog

chags kun pa'i kha bzhin sdom// che rgyud dregs pas bcings pa bzhin/[ \u0f7c]/ btsun pa btsad po slob dpon dang// rje dpon sngags kyi snod min gsod// bstan yang drin med snod ngan gnyis// bu dang chung ma
gnyis las sba// 'jig rten rgyur 'gyur 'bred snon byed// ser snas gtong phod tshul la sdom// lta log mu stegs skyon can gzhi// dam med slob dpon mnyes mi byed// rum zhugs sems can rlung bzhin

sdom// dad pa skyon med gsang ba thug/ bla ma rnam gnyis rtag tu 'khur// bla ma mnyes byed gtong phod che// srog lus bu smad nor mi 'phangs// le lo g.yo med dam tshig brtson// tshi chen bkrag med theg chen
blo// bag yangs spyod pa gsang ba thub// dbang po skyon med yan lag bde// lus drang khams bzang nyams su len// gzhan gyis mi 'gyur gcig la gdams/ kha gcig gting gcig byis pa'i spyod// de 'dra'i

skal ldan bu yis spyod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'dus pa rnams rjes su yi rang nas mngon par bstod do// sku gsung thugs rdo rje rtsa ba thams
cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// rdzogs so//// u rgyan gyi slob dpon pad+ma dang/ bod kyi dge slong nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab
pa'o//// rgya rgya rgya/[xxx]/ rgya gar skad du/ d+harma sarba b+he la a ti ti la/ bod skad du/ chos thams cad kyi don ston pa rdzogs chen thig le nyag gcig ye nas bya rtsol bral ba/ ka dag lhun

grub mnyam nyid phyogs bral brdal khyab chen po'i klong la phyag 'tshal lo// tan+t+ra rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po/ 'dus pa lung thams cad kyi spyi 'grel/ gsang ba man ngag thams cad kyi nges don/ theg pa thams

cad kyi yang rtse/ bstan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas/ gsung rabs ma lus pa'i snying khu/ dgongs pa thams cad kyi zhe phugs/ chos thams cad kyi me long/ don thams cad kyi mjug sdud/ ngo sprod thams cad
kyi mdzod/ nges don thams cad kyi rgya mtsho// theg pa thams cad kyi spyi phud/ blta ba thams cad kyi yang rtse// rgyal ba thams cad kyi yab/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi yum/ bstan pa thams cad kyi

bu gcig pa/ tan+t+ra 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud/ gsang ba bas kyang yang gsang ba/ kun tu bzang po ma 'khrul pa'i dgongs pa/ gzhi'i 'dug tshul 'khor ba dong sprugs su ston pa/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum

gyi yang zhun/ bla na med pa'i thig le'i dgongs pa/ log par blta ba thams cad kyi gnyen po/ ma rig pa thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba/ ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad skyed pa/ rnam rtog dra ba thams cad gcod

pa/ phyogs gcig tu rgya chad pa med par ston pa/ snang ba mi 'gag la gnyis su med par shar grol du ston pa/ ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa/ snang tshul cir yang snang ba/ yin tshul nges pa med par ston pa/

kun dang bral cing ci yang ma spangs pa/ mtha' bzhi ma 'gags mu bzhi rang grol ba/ nyams mi nga ba blta ba'i gdeng du ston pa/ 'dzin pa med pa bsgom pa'i gdeng du ston pa/ blang dor med pa spyod pa'i gdeng du

ston pa/ spang thob med pa 'bras bu'i gdeng du ston pa/ dngos po thams cad rang grol du gtan la 'bebs par byed pa 'di nyid/ chos nyid grag stong du thos pa'i dus gcig na/ gnas 'og min chos kyi pho brang

sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnam par dag pa rgya chad phyogs lhung tshad las 'das pa/ rang byung 'od kyi gzhal yas khang/ chos nyid kyi mkha'/ dbyings nyid kyi klong/ sems nyid kyi gnas 'byams klas pa na/ ston pa

rig stong kun tu bzang po nyid/ ma bcos spros bral byang chub snying po'i ngang la rang shar te/ zhal phyag gi rnam par bzhengs nas/ sngon du byung ba'i 'khor ni nyid kyi ngo bo chos kyi sku dang/ nyid kyi rang bzhin

longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ nyid kyi thugs rje sprul pa'i sku dang/ zhi khro'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang/ khyad par sku'i 'khor rdo rje'i rigs dang/ rin chen rigs dang/ pad+ma'i rigs dang/ las kyi
rigs dang/ bde gshegs rigs dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang/ 'dod khams dang/ gzugs khams dang/ gzugs med
pa'i khams dang/ shin tu rnal 'byor dang/ yongs su rnal 'byor/ rnal 'byor chen po dang/ sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar ba dang/ dag pa dang/ ma dag pa dang/ sgro

skur can dang/ phyi pa'i 'khor phyi dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ mu stegs dang/ mur thug dang/ rgyang 'phen dang/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi dang dri za dang bcas pa'o// gsung gi 'khor ni/ nyan thos dang/
rang rgyal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ kr-i ya dang/ u pa dang/ yo ga dang/ ma hA dang/ a nu dang/ a ti dang/ a ti chen po dang/ rdul dang/ mun pa dang/ snying stobs dang/ phyi'i rtag

chad mu bzhi'o// thugs kyi 'khor ni/ gsal stong dang/ snang stong dang/ bde stong dang/ grag stong dang/ rig stong dang bcas te/ nyid kyi rang bzhin dang/ ngo bo dang/ thugs rje dang/ chos nyid kyi rdo rje 'dus ma
byas pa rnams dang mi 'byed cing/ 'byed pa mi mnga' ba/ mnyam rdzogs lhun grub klong yangs na thabs gcig tu gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rig stong kun tu bzang po de nyid

'khor shes rig sna tshogs pa rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir/ 'khor thams cad kyi thugs la thim zhing/ rang byung gi ye shes gsal la// mi snang ba dang/ mi mdzad pa dang/ mi 'phro ba dang/ mi 'du ba dang/ mi

'gyur ba dang/ mi 'ong ba dang/ mi 'gro ba dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ lhang nge/ lhan ne/ lhag ge lham me/ thal le ba dang/ dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang/ dpa' bar 'gro

ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tog dang/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo rnam par rol ba dang/ glog gi phreng ba dang/ 'khor lo chen po dang/ 'od 'bar ba dang/ phyag rgya zil gyis gnon pa dang/ 'bar chen snyom pa

dang/ chos nyid sna tshogs pa dang/ rnam par bkod pa rnam snang rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ thams cad thig le nyag gcig la bkod nas bstan pa rin po che rnams/ thams cad ma phye/ mi
'byed/ yid la bdag tu med pa'i klong nas klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud 'di nyid/ brjod du med pa dang/ bstan du med pa dang/ bltar med pa dang/ cung zad med pa dang/ mnyan du med pa dang/ rang

bzhin med pa dang/ gyin 'da' dang/ yul can ma yin pa dang/ du ma med pa dang/ so ma dang/ gnyug ma dang/ lhug ma dang/ rnal ma dang/ ma bcos pa'i ngang nas 'ub chub cing rang grag ngo bo'i tshig tu rang

shar ro// sarba ma la a ba ma la d+ha thim/ b+hai Ta A lo ke a nan pa ni ki sarba ma Ni Ta sha e sha a/// ma ma/ e ka bar/ t+ya n+ya ta ma~M/ e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// sus kyang ma byas khang bzangs

na// ma myong skye med rig pa'i sku// spang thob med pa'i rang lus kyi// grub ma myong ba'i sku ru gnas// mi grag grag stong tshul du ni// thos ma myong ba'i chos nyid gtam// ye klong chen po'i don rnams kun// 'di yi

yul du shar grol te// spros med spros pa'i rgyu med pas// mnyam yang chos kun ma 'dres par// thig le nyag gcig ngas bshad nyon// e ma ho// lta ba rang byung ye shes ltos// dge sdig las 'das ngo mtshar
che// gzhi ni ma bskyod khyab gdal che// lus ngag lta sgom phan gnod bral// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul ltos// snang ba ma bsgyur ngo mtshar che// bde sdug dran bsam ci shar yang// don la

'gyur med dngos po bral// stong pa ye shes kun 'byung ltos// dran bsam spyod pa sna tshogs kun// rol pa'i rtsal shar ngo mtshar che// skye 'gag gnyis kyi mtha' dang bral/ chos nyid kun khyab ye shes ltos// skye

med lhan skyes ngo mtshar che// skye 'gro kun gyi srog bcad kyang/ dge sdig phan gnod gnyis dang bral/ rang shes stong pa kun snang ltos// rang snang rang grol ngo mtshar che// cho 'phrul sna tshogs ci shar yang// thog

ma'i gzhi las g.yos pa med// rig stong kun grol snang ba ltos// rang gis rang rnyed ngo mtshar che// nyon mongs 'gyu dran ci shar kyang// rang shar rang grol bcos slad bral// rig stong gsal dag ngo bor
ltos// 'bad med 'bras thob ngo mtshar che// gcig po de yi don shes pas// 'khor 'das gnyis med kun grol dag/ stong pa kun bzhag tshad la ltos// 'gro drug khams gsum ma lus pa// sku gsum rang snang
ngo mtshar che// 'gro rnams sgom sgrub ma byas par// dus gcig sangs rgyas 'khor dong sprugs// sku gsum ye rdzogs 'bras bu ltos// dus gsum 'bras med ngo mtshar che// phar phyin bsag sbyang ma byas

par// sgrib byang tshogs gnyis ye nas rdzogs// rig pa gcer bzhag kun mnyam ltos// thams cad rgyan shar ngo mtshar che// spang dang len pa'i chos rnams kun// nyon mongs gtan sprugs 'ching grol med// ye

stong ka dag ngang la ltos// sangs rgyas g.yang yang sar yang sa ngo mtshar che// bya byed ye dpyod bsgom pa yis// ye grol ma shes lhung bar 'gyur// mi stong stong pa dngos can ltos// med pa bdag 'dzin ngo mtshar

che// snang srid 'khor 'das kun skyed kyang// skye med ngang dngas ka nas dag/ e ma ho// byung gnas med pa'i rang rig la// 'gro 'ong med pa ngo mtshar che// kun tu 'jug byed yid drug la// brten sa med de blo
las 'das// thams cad sdud pa'i kun gzhi la// bzhag sa med de ngo mtshar che// 'khor 'khrul kun gzhi ma rig pa// 'gyur med ka dag bya btsal bral// thams cad yul zhen nyon mongs la// gzhi rtsa med pa

ngo mtshar che// phra dang rags pa'i dri ma la// chags pa med pa ye dag yin// e ma ho// gzhi rtsa med pa'i chos nyid 'di// ma btsal cog bzhag ngo mtshar che// 'gro 'ong med pa'i rig pa la// thug pa med pa ngo

mtshar che// ma bkod gsal ba'i dag dbyings la// phyi dang nang med ngo mtshar che// rang snang dag pa'i 'od lnga la// 'char nub med pa ngo mtshar che// shar ba med pa'i sgron ma la// nub pa med pa ngo mtshar

che// cha phra spros med thig le la// lnga lngas brgyan pa ngo mtshar che// mi 'gyur rig pa'i rang sku la// 'gro 'ong med pa ngo mtshar che// snang ba rang dag chen po la// mtha' med rgya che ngo mtshar

che// dbyings dang rig pa rang 'brel la// 'phros pa med pa ngo mtshar che// stong pa chen po'i 'byung gnas la// mtha' bzhi 'gags pa ngo mtshar che// thog ma'i mgon po dri med la// 'gran pa'i zla med ngo mtshar

che// nyag gcig rang gnas dgongs pa la// bar mtshams med pa ngo mtshar che// rtsol sgrub rang dag spyod pa la// dgag sgrub med pa ngo mtshar che// rang bzhin bsam gtan bar med la// bying rgod med pa ngo

mtshar che// gtad pa mngon sum blta ba la// rang snang ye rdzogs ngo mtshar che// ye yod 'bras bu rang thob la// dmigs gtad med pa ngo mtshar che// ma btsal cog bzhag chos nyid la// thams cad kun gsal

ngo mtshar che// rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sku gsum la// cig car rdzogs pa ngo mtshar che// brdal ba chen po'i nang dbyings la// mtha' la thug med ngo mtshar che// stong pa chen po'i shes rab la// gzhal du med pa ngo

mtshar che// 'bras bu kun bzang stong nyid la// dngos po zad pa ngo mtshar che// dngos med ye shes zang thal la// gzung ba med pa ngo mtshar che// rang bzhin babs kyi snang ba la// mthong ba med pa ngo mtshar
che// gsang mchog nges pa'i tshig de kun// ston pa sus kyang gsungs pa med// rang byung chen po'i nam mkha' la// rang rtsal rig pa ma 'gags pa// spros med chos nyid rang sgrar ni// ma bstan rang

byung thog mar grag/ rgyun chad med par chos kun tshig/ rang gi sgrar ni ye nas grag/ rang byung ye shes tshig gis mtshon// rang las rang byung shar grol bas// rang byung chen po'i tshig tu bzung// de skad

du ston pa rig stong kun tu bzang po nyid rang la rang ngo mtshar ba'i che ba brjod de lham mer bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor rnams kyi nang nas/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba

nyid kyi thugs kyi rtsal zer las rang byung ba nyid dang/ 'khor rnams kyi rdo rje glus 'di skad du bskul lo// e ma ho// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang// chos dbyings spros bral thugs klong nas// rang gsal ye

shes mkhyen pa yis// zhal phyag rdzogs shing 'gro ba'i yab// sangs rgyas mes po yab rje bstod// e ma kun bzang klong chen rab 'byams gson// de ltar ngo mtshar gad rgyangs de// kun gyis thos kyang rtogs

dka' bas// yang gsang thig le chen po 'di// kun gyi spyi phud klong chen mchog/ rgyas par gnang ba'i skabs dbye zhu// de skad du ni zhus pa las// ston pa nyid kyis bka' g+Nal pa// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje
nyon// klong chen rab 'byams rgyud 'di la// gzhi 'khrul khyab tshul gang gnas pa// lam sgo yul gyi snang yul dang// theg pa'i dbye ba rdzogs tshul dang// bla mas slob mar dbang bskur
dang// grol ba'i gdams ngag lag khrid dang// lta sgom spyod pa bar do dang// nyams sngangs rtags tshad grol tshul lo// 'di ni rgyas par bdag gis ston// ma nor nges par yid la zung// chos sgo bsam
yas thams cad kun// 'di ru ma rdzogs gang yang med// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud yin// skal ldan 'khor rnams spro bar soms// zhes bka' g+Nal pa dang/ 'khor rnams yid mgu ba dang bcas spro bar gyur cing
shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur to// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud/ klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye ba gleng slong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas ston
pa kun bzang la// sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad zhus// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang// bstan pa 'di yi rang gzhung gi/ sangs rgyas sems can 'khor myang 'das// ma grub thog ma'i gong dag nas// kun khyab
ye shes ji ltar gnas// ston pas bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa la// ston pa grag stong tshig tu byon// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// 'khor rnams yid rab tshim bya'i phyir// ma
grub thog ma'i gong rol du// kun khyab ye shes gnas tshul de// 'dzin pa med pa'i ston pa ngas// spros med rang dag gzhal yas su// nyid dang dbyer med snang 'khor la// mtshan ma ris med gsung gis
ni// spros pa med pa'i tshig rnams kun// mi snang ba rang zad thugs las byung// ma gsungs gsung ba med par ni// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du bstan// rang gsal dag pa'i ston pa ngas// 'od lnga rnam dag
gzhal yas nas// spros med gter chen gsung gis ni// sku lnga rigs kyi 'khor rnams la// dngos med dag pa'i chos rnams ni// ye shes 'dus pa'i thugs las phyung// rnam dag 'od zer ljags la
bkram// rang byung ye shes thams cad du// ma gsungs rang byung chen por bstan// sprul sku mngon zhen med pa yis// chos 'byung 'dus byas rang gnas nas// rigs drug las sad skal ldan la// spros bcas
gsung gi tshig gis ni// dbang po gang mos chos rnams kyang// dran pa rang gsal thugs nas ni// dbang po 'dod med ljags la bkram// theg pa grangs kyi chos su bstan// ngas bstan spros pa'i tshig rnams

la// don che bka' la grangs mang ste// 'di kun mtshon par khyod la bstan// 'gyur ba med pa'i sems kyis zung// thog mar ka dag gsal stong khyab// spyir yang rgya chad phyogs lhung bral// kun gzhi ye nas
bcos bslad med// ngo bo stong la rang bzhin gsal// thugs rje kun la snang nus pa'i// gzhi de 'od khyim lta bu la// 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje 'dra// 'byung bzhi dmigs pa'i rkyen mi
gnas// gzhi de ma bcos lhun grub yin// de yang ye shes chen po nyid// thog ma'i ka dag gsal stong la// rang bzhin nyid ni 'di lta bu// sus kyang ma byas rang gsal nyid// ye nyid nas ni rang bzhin

khyab// rang byung ye shes rang la byung// ma dpyad pa yi yul can nyid// sngar 'das phyis byung da lta med// las dang bag chags ma rig med// yid dang 'khor ba shes rab med// myang 'das dag kyang yod ma

myong// rig pa nyid kyang yod ma yin// ye shes su yang snang ba med// kye ma rig stong nyag gcig nyon// rang byung ye shes srog med pas// dge sdig gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// rang byung ye shes bya byed

bral// rig pa nyid kyi kun khyab la// brdal ba chen po zhes kyang bya// de bzhin nyid las mi 'gyur bas// 'gyur med ye shes zhes kyang bya// skye nas grol ba'i gzhi yin pas// dus gsum dgongs pa zhes kyang
bya// nges pa gcig tu mi gnas pas// bdag med chen po zhes kyang bya// mthong med rol pa mi 'gag pas// 'gag med chen po zhes kyang bya// don la bdag med skad cig ma// brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam pa

gnyis// sprul pa 'gyed pa yin pas na// sprul pa chen po zhes kyang bya// dbyings rig gnyis las 'das pa yi// rang byung ye shes mi g.yo ba// snang ba'i rtog pa rang chod pa'o// rang byung ye shes 'du 'bral

med// sku dang ye shes mngon snang nyid// rang byung ye shes snang mtha' bral// yul dang yul can kun las 'das// rang byung ye shes rtsis med pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis las 'das pa'o// rang byung ye shes phyi

nang med// skyon dang yon tan kun las 'das// rang byung ye shes 'khrul pa med// rang byung ye shes mtha' las 'das// rang byung ye shes 'gyu byed bral// rang byung chen po'i ye shes la// ston pa'i snang ba ma
spangs rdzogs// ngo bo snang stong gnyis med la// mnyam nyid skye 'gag gnyis su med// snang ba rig pa gnyis med pa// gnas lugs rang byung gnyis med pa// gnyis chos kun bral chen po'o// gnyis med
mtha' grol chen por gnas// gnyis med thig le nyag gcig la// gshis nyid ma grub ngo bos stong// chos nyid kyi ni lhun grub bo// chos rnams thams cad rtsal ma 'gags// chos can lhun grub nyid du
gnas// chos rnams ngo bo cir mi rtog/ gnyis med lhun grub chen por gnas// de nyid sus kyang byas pa med// rang byung lhun grub gdod gnas sa// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// lhun grub ma
yin chos gzhan med// lhun grub chen por ye nas gnas// chos rnams 'byung rung grub pa med// bden pa rang rgyud ye mi gnas// lhun grub mtha' bral chen po'o// 'khor 'das rang rig lhun
grub bo// dbyings chen rnam dag ye shes dag/ tha snyad chos dag dngos po dag/ bden pa ka dag yod med dag/ gnyis med rnal dag gnyis chos dag/ rang bzhin rnam dag dngos med dag/ mtha' dbus ka
dag rnam dag che// ma spangs rnam dag gsal stong gnas// rang rig byang chub gnyis chos sangs// gnyis med ye shes ye rgyas nyid// yod pa ma yin med rgyas min// gshis la grub med ye nas rgyas// rang

bzhin chos sku gdangs gsal lo// gnyis med sprul sku stong ji lta// rang gsal ji snyed gnyis dbyer med// gsal stong mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// gshis la 'khrul pa ma grub stong// spangs pa phun sum tshogs
pa'o// ngo bo gnyis su med pas na// rtogs pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// de ltar ye sangs ma rgyas na// bsgoms kyang sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo// sa le sbram bu gser min na// btul bas gser du ga la

'gyur// de ltar ye sangs ye rgyas de// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba la// ngo bo nyid kyi sku shar te// chos sku thig le nyag gcig go/ ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba ni// ye shes lhun grub chen por bzhugs// de yang gnas lugs

'di ltar ro// rgya chad med pa'i ye shes dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid dang// mtha' dang bral ba'i rig pa dang// dag pa chen po'i snang ba dang/ phyogs lhung med pa'i

lta ba dang// spang thob med pa'i 'bras bu dang// yangs pa gsal ba mi 'gyur ba// zang thal ye shes ma 'gags pa// ma 'khrul pa yi chos nyid do// phyi yi rgya yang ma ral te// nang du 'od lnga ma 'gags pa// sku

dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// ngo bo stong pa chos kyi sku// ka dag chen po'i ye shes ni// ma rig la sogs rtog pa 'gag/ rang bzhin gsal ba lhun grub sku// rang bzhin ye grub ye shes ni// gsal byed rang

dwangs nyid du gnas// dgongs pa yangs pa ye shes sku// ye shes mkhyen pa rdzogs pa'i cha// shugs kyi sems can rnams la 'char// thugs rje kun khyab sprul pa'i sku// ye shes rol pa chos sku'i rtsal// 'gag

med cho 'phrul cir yang snang// ngo bo ka dag ye shes la// ma rig pa zhes srid med pas// gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs med pas// gang du+u 'ang ma phye chos nyid la// ye shes tsam du grub pa med// rang bzhin lhun
grub ye shes zhes// rtsal dang yon tan 'gag med pas// rol pa tsam du snang ba las// sna tshogs rdzogs pa'i gzhi ma'o// dgongs pa yangs pa'i ye shes la// 'khrul zhes tsam du brjod du med// de bzhin ma
'khrul pa yang ci// de phyir 'khrul pa gdod nas dag/ ma rig pa nyid yod ma myong// rig pa tsam du grag pa med// rig ma rig gi tha snyad 'das// 'khrul ma 'khrul yang grag pa med// thugs rjes
kun khyab ye shes las// mi mdzad sna tshogs shar ba'i sgo// mdzad pa ltar snang ngo bor rdzogs// chos sku stong pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes thugs rje mkhyen brtse shar// ngang gis sems can rnams la
shar// 'di med 'khor 'das sde chad pas// mkhyen pa rig cing gsal ba de// rtsal ldan rtsal phyir de mi 'breng// nga yin nga la bdag gzung med// ngo bo nyid la 'khor 'das gsal// stobs dang shugs gnyis

'chang ba'i bdag/ bzhi ldan chos sku'i tshul du bzhugs// de ltar chos sku ka dag ni// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar 'gyur zlog med// ri rab lta bur g.yo 'gul med// rgya mtsho lta bur kha gting med// gser dngul

lta bur 'gyur ba med// 'di nyid chos sku ka dag yin// de yi snying po ye shes ni// 'khor dang 'das pa mi gnas pa'i// chos nyid stong pa kun khyab pas// ye shes rang ngor gnas pa la// gsum dang bzhi ru
dbyer med do// ka dag lhun grub gzhi de la// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// ye shes sgrib g.yogs ye grol gnas// theg pa bsam yas gnas lugs nyid// ye shes gsum dang sku bzhi'i klong// ye shes

gsum gyis gzhi khyab ston// sku ni bzhi ldan dgongs pa yang// ye shes zang thal nyid du gnas// zang thal de yi bkrag mdangs yang// rang byung ye shes 'od skur shar// dper na nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// de yang

chos sku ye shes la// mdun rgyab med par zang thal le// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// ye shes lus de lus kyi mchog/ ye shes lus la sha khrag med// spros bral ye shes ka dag ni// ngo bo rnam dag snying

po'i gzhi// de la tshig dang yi ge bral// brjod pas gtan la dbab tu med// sgro 'dogs tha snyad kun dang dral// gzung 'dzin 'gyu ba rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas sems can ye ma grub// chos med chos kyi 'du
shes med// gang med ci med ci yang med// rin chen 'od 'bar sku ru bzhugs// ye shes spyan la gsal 'grib med// gsal dwangs zang thal chen por khyab// ye shes 'od la phyi nang med// ye gsal zang thal
nyid du bzhugs// ye shes thugs la yangs dog med// stong gsal mdangs lnga nyid du bzhugs/ kha dog ma yin rang gsal bas// shes shing rig pa'i cha rnams tshang// 'dzin pas gzung yul gang med

phyir// rnam par rtog pa'i 'dzin chags med// 'od gsal 'das pa'i ye shes su// rnam dag phyag rgya chen por gnas// rang bzhin snang ba'i klong chen na// mtshan ma'i dmigs pa ye med do// don gyi cha la 'di
ltar gnas// rang mdangs skyed pa dkar po'i cha// gting gsal chen po nyid du gnas// gting gsal ngo bo'i bkrag bskyed pas// snang ba rang zad ser po'i cha// mi mngon gting nas rang ngo
gsal// rang ngo chags med mdangs bskyed pas// rang gis bcings pa bral ba yis// chags pa rang zad dmar po'i cha// gting gsal ma 'dres chen por gnas// ma 'dres so so'i mtshan 'dzin pa// bya
btsal bskyod pa bral ba yis// mdzad pa med pa'i ljang gur ni// thog ma rnams kyi zer du yang// mi mngon gting nas gsal ba'i cha// gting gsal khyab pa'i 'brel byed pa'i// 'gyur med rdzogs pa'i mthing
ga ni// ye rdzogs byas pa med par gnas// sku ni snang la mtshan nyid bral// ye nas rang dag chen po la// rdzogs chen rnams kyi rtse mor gnas// de yang dngos por ma grub pas// rtag pa ther zug can du

med// rgya chad can du ma yin te// rang bzhin 'od gsal tshul du bzhugs// gdos bcas mtshan ma rang dag phyir// gting gsal chen po'i gzhi mar gnas/ khyab dang khyab pa nyid kyis stong// phyogs su chad pa
med par gnas// stong gsal yin pas gnyis mtha' zad// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// gsal byed snang ba'i cha ma 'gags// rig gzhan med cing rang sar dag/ rang bzhin gyi ni cha la

bzhugs// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba ni// ye shes kha dog lnga ldan te// rang bzhin bkrags mdangs me re re// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug tse re re// nyi ma las ni 'od bzhin du// rang gis byas pa ma yin te// rang
gi rang bzhin de ltar snang// ngo bo mi 'gyur skur bzhugs pa// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa yi// thams cad 'char ba'i gzhir gnas te// mtshan ma ris kyi zhal phyag med// rang bzhin gsal ba'i mdangs
lnga yang// gzhon nu bum sku'i tshul bzhugs te/ kha dog ris bzung grub pa med// thugs rje rig pa'i ye shes su// lhun grub bzhugs cing mkhyen ma 'gags// so sor gsal ba gnyis gyur kyang// bya ba
byed dang byed dngos med// gsung ni rang bzhin don gyi gsung// grag stong chos kyi sgra ru gnas// ris med shes bya'i bab las grub// 'di 'dra gcig na ma nges pas// sna tshogs snang ba
gsung gi gzhi// thugs ni rtog med ngang la gnas// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa med// dbang po lnga la rag ma lus// ma rig pa yi dri ma bral// nyon mongs pa yi yid ma skyes// 'khrul pa'i tshig gis gnod
pa bral// yid kyi rnam par shes pa med// thams cad dbyings gcig tha dad bral// ye shes med cing sku yang med// 'od med kha dog rnams dang bral// rig pa sgo lnga dag la yan// rnam par shes
pa'i tshogs brgyad bral// nyon mongs ma skyes ka nas dag/ snang ba ma smos yod pa med// dang po nas dag thog ma dag/ gdod ma nas dag dag chen po// ka zhes thog mar byung ba la// dag pa

dri ma'i grangs mtha' zad// ngo bo ye dag chen po la// rang bzhin rang dag thugs rje ni// shugs 'byung dag tu ye gnas so// ngo bo stong pa tha snyad bral// rang bzhin ye gsal rgyu rkyen bral// thugs rje kun
khyab cha shas bral// ngo bo ka dag brjod gzhi bral// rang bzhin lhun grub cir snang rdzogs// thugs rje kun khyab rang shar ro// ngo bo stong pas rtag mtha' bral// rang bzhin gsal
bas chad 'dzin bral// thugs rje khyab pas gnyis mtha' bral// ngo bo stong gsal dbyer med la// rang bzhin gsal stong dbyer med de// thugs rje rig stong dbyer med do// ngo bo ka dag nam mkha' 'dra//

rang bzhin rgya mtsho dngas pa 'dra// thugs rje nor bu dri med 'dra// ngo bo sku la rang bzhin 'od// thugs rje rig pa ye shes so// sgrib med ye shes gsum dang ldan// ngo bo ka dag ye shes dang// rang bzhin lhun grub

ye shes dang// thugs rje rang snang ye shes gsum// 'bral med gcig ste phyogs med gnas// ngo bo ka dag ye shes ni// ma rig rtog pa kun dang bral// rang bzhin lhun grub ye shes ni// 'khrul pa'i tshig gi tha

snyad bral// thugs rje rang snang ye shes ni// thams cad dbyings rig gcig tu gnas// ye shes rang la rang gnas phyir// gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do// rnam grangs kun gyi mtha' las 'das// ji lta mkhyen

pa'i ye shes dang// ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rang gi dngos po'i gnas lugs dang// gdul bya kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen// rig pa'i ngo bo 'khrul ma myong// rang bzhin nyid la 'khrul mi gnas// thugs

rje nyid ni 'khrul mi srid/ khams gsum ka dag chen por gnas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yi// ye shes chen po gcig tu bzhugs// ye shes de yi phrin las ni// sku lnga dang ni ye shes lnga// 'od lnga zhing lnga

phrin las lnga// rigs lnga yum lnga gzhi lnga dang// lam lnga 'bras bu rang mdangs lnga// de sogs lnga tshan so lnga ni// ye shes gcig gi ngo la rdzogs// chos sku'i klong nas thogs med shar// longs sku'i ngos nas ma

'gags shar// mi mdzad sna tshogs 'char ba'i sgo// mdzad pa ltar snang ngo bor rdzogs// thugs rje sprul skur gnas pa'o// de yang gnas lugs 'di lta ste// rigs pa'i ngo bo sku lngar bzhugs// sku ni snang la
mtshan nyid bral// stong gsal 'dus pa'i ye shes mdangs// ngo bo ka nas dag pa'i cha// sku gsum gyi ni gzhi tsam las// zhal phyag du ni grub pa med/ kha mig rna ba yod pa na// gzugs can yid tsam gnyis
song srid// gzugs can 'gro drug phal pa ste// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi'o// mtshan ma byung na ka dag min// stong gsal chen po'i sku lnga'o// sku lnga'i snying po ye shes lnga// ye shes bkrag

mdangs 'od lngar shar// gzhi yi mtshan nyid ye shes lnga// sku lnga dbye na 'di lta ste// thig le nyag gcig sku dang gcig/ 'od zer mi 'gyur sku dang gnyis// rig pa kun bzang sku dang gsum// rig pa rtsal

rdzogs sku dang bzhi// rang bzhin lhun grub sku dang lnga'o// snying po ye shes rnam lnga ni// chos sku'i ngo bo rang stong pas// chos dbyings 'gyur med ye shes so// stong pa'i rang mdangs rang gsal bas// me long lta

bu'i ye shes so// stong gsal ma phye gnyis med pas// mnyam nyid chen po'i ye shes so// yon tan so sor rang shar bas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// de dag gzhi la lhun grub pas// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes

so// de yi bkrag mdangs 'od lngar shar// chos sku mi 'gyur 'od zer mthing// rig pa dri med 'od zer dkar// rig pa 'od ldan 'od zer ser// rig pa bde gsal 'od zer dmar// rig pa 'gag med 'od zer ljang// 'od
zer de dag snang tshul ni// 'phra la dwangs shing gsal la 'tsher// rang bzhin bkrag mdangs ma nyams pa// sos ka'i smig rgyu lta bu ru// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba 'dra// bltas pas mi
ngoms mtshan dper ldan// ye shes 'od dang kha dog lnga// bco lnga dus gcig 'dus pa la// ka dag babs kyi sangs rgyas zer// de yi gnas tshul shes pa la// ye nas ji bzhin sangs rgyas zer// de yi mtshan

nyid shes pa la// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas zer// de yi rtogs tshul shes pa la// rtogs pa mngon gyur sangs rgyas zer// ngo bo nyid kyi snang ba la// ngo bo nyid kyi sku shar bas// ye nyid nas ni

bud+d+ha'o// thams cad gzhi la lhun grub pas// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// rang grol mtha' yi dri ma sangs// rgyu med rkyen las 'das pa'o// lhun grub re dang
dogs las grol// ka dag yin phy-ir kun las grol// rang 'dzin med pas nyon mongs grol// gzung 'dzin med pas rnam shes grol// skye 'gag med pas sgo lnga grol// bcos bslad med pas rtog pa grol// dri

ma med pas 'byung bzhi grol// 'od gsal stong pa sku lngar ldan// de ni gzhi yi bzhugs tshul yin// chos sku ye shes chen po ni// mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum dang ldan// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// chos kyi

sku yi mtshan nyid yin// mi 'jig stong dang gsal ba dang// bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa ni// chos kyi sku yi mtshan nyid yin// 'gyur med 'gag med khyab pa gsum// chos kyi sku yi nges tshig yin// gsal dang
dwangs dang ma 'dres gsum// chos kyi sku yi yul yin no// dpag med dmigs med 'dzin pa med// chos kyi sku yi gnas yin no// 'gag med zhen med chags pa med// chos kyi sku yi spyod pa

yin// lhan ne lhang nge yengs pa med// chos kyi sku yi bsgom pa yin// bltar med bltas zin lta ba rdzogs// chos kyi sku yi lta ba yin// byas med 'byung med byung sa med// chos kyi sku yi 'bras bu yin// bsgrub

med bsgrubs zin sgrub dang bral// chos kyi sku yi phrin las yin// gcig byung gnyis byung thams cad byung// chos kyi sku yi yon tan yin// 'gag med gsal stong ngo bos stong// chos kyi sku yi snang ba yin// phyi

med nang med dbyings su med// chos kyi sku yi rang lus yin// 'gro med 'ong med gnas pa med// chos kyi sku yi rang rtags yin// nyi zla pad+ma rgya mtsho shel// chos kyi sku yi mtshon dpe yin// chos sku'i ye shes de

ltar gnas// longs sku'i ye shes lnga lnga ni// dbye na bsam gyis mi khyab de/ kha dog ma 'dres so sor gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od zer 'bar// yab yum sku yi cha lugs 'dzin// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i

cha lugs yin// skye yod 'chi med rdo rje'i sku// 'od lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// yab lnga yum lnga tshom bu lnga// zhing khams rtog pa lnga dang ldan// gzhi lnga lam lnga 'bras bu lnga// gnas lnga yul lnga ngo bo lnga// longs spyod
rdzogs sku'i ngo bo yin// chos nyid ngang la gnas pas longs// gsal la ma 'dres khyab pas longs// thabs shes gnyis su med pas longs// gyi na bltar mi bzod pas longs// 'dzin med rang sar spyod

pas spyod// gsal le sing nge mnyam pas spyod// gnas shing sprul pa 'gyed pas spyod// sku don mthar phyin rol pas spyod// rang byung rang la thim rol spyod// bya byed kun las 'das pas rdzogs// dmigs med

don la gnas pas rdzogs// phyogs lhung 'gro 'ong med pas rdzogs// byas pa med pas rang byung rdzogs// ma spangs sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs// gsal stong ye med rdzogs pas pa// rgyan dang cha lugs 'dzin pas

pa// sku dang thig les brgyan pas pa// 'od dang kha dog bkra bas pa// ma rig dug lnga dag pas pa// 'dzin pa rang sar dag pas sku// kun snang thugs rje shar bas sku// ye shes klong na gsal bas sku// ma

'gags skye ba med pas sku// yin pa bdag 'dzin med pas sku// lhun grub longs sku'i bzhugs tshul lo// thugs rje sprul pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// bya ba rdzogs dang bya ba byed// phyi nang bya ba rdzogs pas te// bya

ba rdzogs pa'i sprul sku'o// gang la gang 'dul tshul du ni// de la der ston mthun par snang// thugs rje'i nyi zer kun la khyab// 'gro ba yongs la snang nus pa// sprul pa sku yi bzhugs tshul lo// ye shes rang
rtsal phyogs bcur khyab// sku gsum ngo bo gcig gi ngang// ye shes gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rang gi ngo bo gcig tu gnas// ngo bo dus gsum 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin rtag tu 'gag pa

med// thugs rje kun la rang snang ngo// ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang// thugs rje yi ni snang ba yang// blo can rnams la snang ba'o// ngo bo gang du'ang ma grub pas// rang bzhin snang cha gsal bar snang// thugs

rje'i cha la ye shes gnyis// bya dang byed pa med par shar// rang byung rang shar rang grol lo// rtogs dang ma rtogs sngon rol du// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma phye// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul de// gzhi

yi gnas tshul de ltar ro// gzhi la mi mthun mang du bshad// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// mthun dpe dag dang bzhi bzhis te// ngo bo thig le nyag gcig yin// nges tshig gzhi la rtsal rdzogs pas// kun gyi
kun gzhi zhes kyang bya// dbye na skyon can skyon med gnyis// skyon can drug dang brgyad kyis bstan// bsam las grub pa'i kun gzhi la// sna tshogs ngos nas lhun grub gzhi// 'gyur med cha nas ma nges

gzhi// mi 'gyur cha nas nges can gzhi// cir yang sgyur btub gzhi ma dang// thams cad 'byung phyir khas len gzhi// sna tshogs khra bor 'dod pa'i gzhi// sna tshogs sogs pa'i kun gzhi dang// sbyor ba kun gyi

zhun gzhi'o// de ltar brgyad kyis phye na yang// skyon med ka dag nyid du gnas// 'di ni ngo bo gcig tshul dang// brjod gzhi bral ba'i dang po ste// thams cad 'di las mi 'da' 'o// 'on kyang de nyid 'di lta
ste// lhun grub nyid du gnas pa la// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying por snang// rgyu las 'bras bu grub ma grub// grub na go log skyon du 'gyur// nges pa med pa'i gzhi ma ni// 'gyu byed yid tsam rnam par

snang// ming don gnyis su nges pa med// ma nges me las chu 'byung skyon// ma nges pa de nges can 'gyur// nges par rang ngo kun gzhi de// dran byed phra ba med par snang// 'di ni rtogs dang ma rtogs gang// rtag
chad gnyis kyi skyon du 'gyur// sgyur du btub pa'i kun gzhi ni// 'bad med blo yi rnam par snang// rtag dang mi rtag gang nas 'gyur// gnas lugs sgyur du btub pa na// 'di yang nges med gzhi dang
mtshungs// 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyur zlog phyir// 'bad pa don med bem po yang// rig pa can du zlog pa'i skyon// rtag pa ma yin ngo bos stong// mi rtag ma yin shes rig gsal// cir yang ngo bor khas len

gzhi// gang snang rang gi ngo bor snang// yod med ma yin phyogs nas 'das// med na mo gsham bu skye'i skyon// yod na shes bya rgyab kyis phyogs// thams cad ngo bor grub pa'i phyir// thug pa med pa'i skyon du
'gyur// sna tshogs khra bor 'dod pa'i gzhi// ngo bo kun tu shar ba'i phyir// sna tshogs so so'i tshul du snang// snang dang shes pa gang la 'dod// snang la 'dod na sems tha dad// shes la 'dod na

'gyu byed de// kun gzhi'i steng nas 'gyu bas na// 'phang ba don med 'bad mi lang// de lta bu yi skyon du 'gyur// ngo bo ma grub mtshon gzhi bral// rang bzhin rang grol spang blang bral// sna tshogs sogs dang

sbyor ba'i gzhi// gnyis drug so so'i dbyings na gsal// de rnams phyogs tsam bstan pa ste// sems can blo yi rim pa'o// skyon med ka dag gzhi ma yin// ye don dang po'i sangs rgyas de// 'khor dang 'das pa
de mi gnas// mtshan nyid bzhugs tshul dbye ba dang// sku gsum ye shes gsum du ldan// ka dag lhun grub kun khyab tu// snying po'i gzhi ma brjod bral gnas// sgro 'dogs tha snyad gzung 'dzin med// sangs
rgyas sems can chos sogs med// grol dang ma grol rtogs ma rtogs// ye thog mgon po mtha' bral gnas// nyag gcig rang gnas bzhugs tshul lo/ gzhi gnas chos sku
dag pa la// rig rtsal rdzogs lugs 'di ltar ro// rlung dang rig pa nam mkha' gsum// bya ba kun grub ye shes ni// dbyer med gcig gi tshul du gnas// ye shes rlung gis g.yo bskyod med// rig pa dri
med gcer bu la// ma rig pa yi srid ming med// gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs mtha' zad// ye shes chos nyid gdags gzhi bral// de la rtsal yon 'gag med pas// nam mkha' gsal stong bsnan 'phri

med// bya grub ye shes rang mdangs yin// ye shes lnga yi dwangs bcud de// 'od ljang khra bo ltem ltem pa// rig pa'i ngo bo rol klong snang// gzhi la g.yo 'gul med pa ste// bya grub ye shes klong na gsal// shes
pa bcud du 'dril ba de// rlung rig gnyis kyis rtsal ma bskyod// rdzogs ldan chen por de bzhugs so// de yis gzhi yi dbye ba bshad// mthun pa'i dpe ni 'di ltar ro// stong pa yangs pa khyab pa ste// nam
mkha' lta bur gnas pa'o// dri med gsal dag zang thal te// man shel dri med lta bur gnas// gdod nas ma skyes gzhi rtsa med// dus gsum dus med stong par gnas// byung sa med par rgyu yis stong// skye sa
med pa rkyen gyis stong// 'gag pa med pa ngo bos stong// dbyibs nges med pa dngos pos stong// thog mtha' med de rang bzhin stong// dran 'gyu med de mtshan nyid stong// phyi nang med pa gzung 'dzin
