stong// dngos po med pa rtag pas stong// 'gag pa med pa chad pas stong// mtha' dbus phyogs med gnyis kas stong// nyes pa'i dri spang skyon gyis stong// nyes skyon ma spangs gnyen pos stong// gdod nas ka
dag bdag gis stong// ma 'gags rtsal rnams klong na gsal// rgya mtsho dwangs ma mkha' ltar gnas// sangs rgyas sems can ston bstan pa// ma grub thog ma'i gong dag na// kun khyab ye shes

gnas tshul dang// thog ma spyi gzhi'i 'dug tshul lo// zhes gsungs nas ka dag gi klong na lhan ner bzhugs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams rgyud las/ ye thog spyi gzhi'i
'dug tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di skad zhus// thog ma'i spyi gzhi'i sngon rol dang// kun khyab
ye shes gnas lugs rnams// legs zab rgyas par gsungs na yang// 'khrul med snang tshul nyid kyis ni/ khams gsum 'khor tshul gsung du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba'i lan// ston pa nyid kyis
bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje sogs// rang rtsal 'gag med 'khor rnams gson// ngas bstan tshig la nor ba med// ma 'khrul nor med sems kyis kyang/ khyod kyis 'di kun sems la
zhog/ kye ho/ gong ltar gzhi la 'phrul med kyang// 'khor 'das gnyis su 'khrul ba ni// gzhi yi klong nas 'gyu lugs bstan// gzhi dang gzhi shes khyad par las// 'khor 'das gnyis su gyes pa ste// dge ba
spu tsam byas med par// de nyid ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// sdig pa spu tsam byas med par/ khams gsum rigs drug dag tu 'khyams// de yang dang po ye gnas ni// gzhi yi ye shes rang rlung dang// gzhi yi
rig pa gcer bu dang// gzhi yi nam mkha' gsal stong dang// gzhi yi bya grub ye shes bzhi// dbyer med gcig gi rang bzhin te// rgya zho chags pa lta bur gnas// de la g.yo 'gul 'di ltar byung// ye shes
rlung gis rig pa btegs// rig pas sgo mthong nam mkha' phye// bya grub rig rtsal ma 'gags te// g.yo 'am mi g.yo bag tsam g.yo// 'gyu 'o mi 'gyu bag tsam 'gyu// gzhi la g.yo 'gul med mod kyang// rig

pa'i rtsal las g.yo 'gul byung// 'gyu ba de la yid ces zer// de yang lhun grub thugs rje'i rtsal// dang po gser gyi rlangs pa'am// bye'u chung gi kha rlangs sam// bya phod rkyen med 'gul ba'am// rta rnga brgyar

gshags cha tsam cig/ rig pa nyid kyang yid du 'gyus// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig zer// dngos med snod phye bag la nyal// ngo bo kun gzhi las 'phags te// rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i rkyen phan nyid// gzhi yi

nges med rang rtsal rtag/ de yang gsum yin kun tu btags// lhan cig skyes dang nga bdag can// kun gyi rgyu ni gcig pa la// lag pa lto rgyab bzlog pa bzhin// rig pa de las mthong snang ni// phra rags rtog
pa mang po shar// 'od khyim kha dog lnga lnga ni// nam mkha' stong pa'i klong du shar// rig pa 'gag te yid du 'gyus// de yang rnam pa drug tu dbye// kun tu tshol bar byed pa'i yid// gtan la
'bebs par byed pa'i yid// nges par 'jog par byed pa'i yid// 'gyu phyed thams cad 'dzin pa'i yid// sna tshogs sdud par byed pa'i yid// nyon ni mongs pa can gyi yid// de 'gyus 'od khyim rtag dpyad

btang// 'od khyim pha gi nga yin ni// pha gi nga las byung ngam ci// nga nyid pha gi yin nam ci// gnyis 'dzin rtog pas ngo bo bslad// ye shes nyid las ma rig 'khrul// rang snang rang gis ma rig pas// las kyi
rlung nyid kha dog gsal// lhan skyes ma rig ces su byung// skyes yul chos sku'i klong du skyes// su yis su nyid ma rig na// dper na me long dkyil 'khor la// bdag po rang gis bltas pa yis// rang gzugs

yin par ma rig ste// 'od byad yul snang so sor bzung// 'od byad blta mkhan rtog dpyod bzhi// dus la snga phyi med pa'i dpe// don ni nam mkha' stong pa la// rig dang ma rig 'od snang dang// rig pa'i ye

shes rtsal nyid rnams// snga phyi med de lhan cig skyes// rgyu bdag gcig pa'i lhan skyes ni// gnyis med rang mdangs ma shes pas// phyi nang so sor bzung bas bcings// grod pa phyi nang ji bzhin no// ma rig la

ltos de bzhin te// ma 'khrul pa yang de bzhin du// rig pa nyid ni ma rig go/ ma 'khrul bud+d+ha ma nur 'khrul// de yang yul dang yul can gnyis// ye shes gsal ba'i yul drug la// gnyis 'dzin sems de byung

ba'o// dung la ser por mthong ba dang// gser la nag por mthong ba rnams// mig 'khrul min te rang 'khrul yin// gzhi ni gang yang byed med cing// nges med rtsal ngo ma shes pas// shes pa 'gyu dang yal ba
dang// ched 'dzin dri mas rab tu sbags// shes bya rang gi rgyud bcings so// dmigs 'dzin 'brel pa bcu gnyis su// 'khor ba'i ye thog nyid du 'khrul// chos sku ka dag dri med la// nyon mongs can gyi yid
kyis ni/ kha nang bltas nas nga bdag bzung// rnam pa gcig brtsad nga bdag 'khrul// yid kyi rnam shes kha phyir bltas// sgo lnga yul drug rjes 'brangs nas// rtog pas med pa yod par bzung// dper na tho

yor mir bzung zhing// thag pa sbrul dang smig sgyu chu// sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa nyid// yid kyi rnam par shes pas bslad// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la// nyon mongs yid kyi nga bdag bslad// gnyis snang

rtog pa'i cha las 'khrul// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// dngos su yod kyang ma rig pas// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu gsum du byung// rgyu yi rkyen dang dmigs pa'i rkyen// bdag po'i rkyen dang mtshungs pa'i
rkyen// rkyen bzhi 'dus pas 'khrul pa yin// rgyu yi rkyen ni chos nyid dang// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'od snang nyid// bdag po'i rkyen ni rig pa nyid// de gsum dus snyom mtshungs pa'i rkyen// 'khrul
pa de ma thag ces zer// 'khrul pa'i dus ni 'di ltar ro// rig dang ma rig gnyis 'dzin rnams// chos nyid yul la shar dus 'khrul// yid drug yul la 'jug dus 'khrul// rnam rtog bdag tu bzung dus
'khrul// snang ba logs su dpyad dus 'khrul// snyem ma ris su phye dus 'khrul// rang rtsal gzhan du bzung dus 'khrul// yid kyis sgro btags byed dus 'khrul// rang gzhan gnyis su rtogs dus 'khrul// log

rtog skad cig 'gyu dus 'khrul// gzung 'dzin thur la bltas dus 'khrul// yin min the tshom dus su 'khrul// rig pas 'tshol gro byas dus 'khrul// min chos yin par bzung dus 'khrul// 'gyu ba rlung gi rta pho
la// sgrib g.yogs ma rig pa dang gcig/ yul rkyen 'dzin byed g.yo ba dang/ re dogs yid kyi 'char sgo dang// bag chags brtas pa'i mthu dag ni// dus gcig log par bltas dus 'khrul// 'khrul pa'i

'bras bu snod bcud ni// ye shes kha dog 'byung ba lnga// gdod nas ye shes rtsal nyid du// 'du 'bral med par ma rig pas// 'od khyim kha dog lnga ldan la// brtag dpyad byas pas 'byung lngar 'khrul// mkha'

la rlung brten de la chu// 'bum phrag bcu gcig ngag gis ni// zlum la 'dril ba nyid du'o// gzhi dag me long ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas chu ru 'khrul// gzhi dag mnyam nyid ye shes la// rtog dpyod
btang bas sa rdor 'khrul// gzhi dag sor rtog ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas me ru 'khrul// gzhi dag bya grub ye shes la// rtog dpyod btang bas rlung du 'khrul// gzhi dag chos dbyings ye shes

la// rtog dpyod btang bas nam mkhar 'khrul// rtog dpyod byas pas yul lngar bzung// ming med ming du song ba ltar// 'byung lnga med bzhin rim gyis chags// phyi yi yul lnga'i dbang las ni// nang gi sems
kyis nga dang bdag/ gnyis su bzung bas 'od lnga ni// gsal bar ma nus 'byung bzhis bsgribs// ma rig pa de sems yin te// de las byung bas 'byung ba'o// rang mgo rang gi rkang pas gnan// rang gi gnya'
lag rang gis bcings// sems kyi snang tshul gsum du shar// 'od gzugs sha gzugs rig gzugs gsum// de las 'khor 'das gnyis su gyes// yul tu brtags pas snang bar zhen// min pa'i chos la
yin bzung zhing// brtag dpyad byas pas snod du 'khrul// de yang ri rab rgyal po ni// bang rim bzhi dang lcog chen bzhi// rol mtsho dang ni ri rnams bdun// gling rnams dang ni 'khor yug chags// stong
gsum la sogs khams rnams so// de la brten nas nang bcud kyi// 'khrul lugs dbye na 'di ltar ro// 'khrul gzhi ye shes lnga las byas// 'khrul rgyu ma rig gnyis kyis byas// 'khrul rkyen skad
cig lnga yis byas// 'khrul pa 'bras bus yid kyis byas// ye shes ma rig yul du bzung// der 'dzin rlung sems 'dus pa las// 'byung ba lnga po'i sbubs su tshud// rlung sems yid du 'gyus pa las// shugs

ldan sna tshogs rgya mtsho rlung// de la ye shes drod rlan byung// rgya mtsho chen po de nyid la// chan la phabs rtsi btab pa ltar// sa yi rnam pa snyoms par chags// de la dud rlangs lag dar tsam// de yi dwangs ma 'od

skor ni// sba phub tsam pa gsum du byung// 'od gcig snang la rang bzhin med// de la brten pa'i 'khrul 'bras ni// yod min ci yang med pa dang// rnam shes cung zad med pa dang// gzugs med mu bzhi rab tu
chags// 'od skor gnyis la mtho ris kyi// gnas bcu dag ni rim gyis chags// gnas gtsang la sogs lus can ni// gong nas gong du theg pa'i tshul// 'og min lha dang lha min 'dod// mngon mtho de min
gnas gsum ni// byol song yi dgas dmyal ba dang// sems can de dag skye ba bzhi// de nas yid kyis rtog dpyod btang// yid kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa na// srid pa 'od kyi sgo nga mthong// de nyid mdzes par

rab mthong nas// yid kyis sbyor ba byas pa las// mdzes pa'i chags sems sgo ngar 'thums// nyi ma rab snang dros byas te// nor bu dri med brlan byas so// phyi ltar shed bu shed la grogs// nang ltar 'dod

chags bya sgong dang// zhe sdang sbrul gyi sgo nga zer// gsang ba ltar na thabs shes rab// de dus za ba'i zas med pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod// sa la brten nas gzugs rnams byung// chu la brten nas

sgra rnams byung// me la brten nas dri rnams byung// rlung la brten nas ro rnams byung// mkha' la brten nas reg rnams byung// rig pa'i kha lo phyir bltas pas// 'dod yon lnga po yul lngar zhes// nang du shes
pa kha log pas// yul lnga brten pa'i sems 'dzin gyur// nyon mongs lnga gsum dug lnga shar// sa la brten nas gti mug byung// ma rig pa yi lcags kyis bsdams// gti mug zhags pas ske nas bcings// chu

la brten nas 'dod chags byung// 'dod chags tsha ba'i ro la chags// rlung la brten nas phrag dog byung// phrag dog nyid kyi sgo mo 'khrigs// nam mkha' la brten nga rgyal byung// nga rgyal dag gis mgo btums

te// me la brten nas zhe sdang byung// zhe sdang mi yi tshad pas gdung/ khong khro la sogs dmag gis bskor// gzung 'dzin zhags pas rkang nas bsdams// snga phyi'i bag chags 'dam du bying// rnam smin nyid dang
lag sbrel lo// drug lnga'i rtsal kun rang rdzogs pas// las kyi ma nu'i mtshams sbyar te// 'gro ba rigs drug dpag med smin// gcig nas gcig tu zo chu bzhin// bzang ngan rim par lus

blangs te// de ltar 'jig rten gsum po dag/ phung po lnga dang dbang po lnga// yan lag lnga dang don snying dang// yul lnga dang ni nyon mongs lnga// sems lnga yid lnga rtog pa lnga// gzung 'dzin 'khor ba nyid du

grub// phung po khams dang skye mched lnga// gzung 'dzin dag gis bzung nas ni// 'khor ba nyid du yun ring mnar/ khams gsum pa yi khang pa ru// zhe sdang cha las bsad bcad byas// 'bras bus tsha grang dmyal
ba byung// 'dod chags cha las ser phrag dog/ 'bras bu yi dwags bkres skom byung// gti mug cha las rab blun rmongs// 'bras bus byol song glen lkugs byung// nga rgyal cha las nga bdag bzung// 'bras

bus brel phongs mi ru byung// phrag dog cha las khong khro byas// 'bras bu lha ma yin du smin// 'gro ba rigs drug de dag la// ngar 'dzin so sor byung ba yis// snang srid lha 'dre thams cad byung// lha med pa la lha

ru mchod// 'dre med pa la 'dre ru bkar// ming med pa la ming du btags// rnam rtog 'dre ru bzung las byung// dmyal ba rnams la gshin rje byung// yi dwags rnams la mo 'dre byung// pho 'dre thams cad zhor la

byung// byol song rnams la glu gnyan byung// mi la gnod sbyin thams cad byung// lha la phywa dang dbang phyug dang// gza' dang skar ma thams cad byung// lha ma yin la gza' srin byung// de sogs rigs drug
gzung 'dzin bcings// ma rig nyid dang spags pa'i phyir// shes bya nyid kyang dri mar snang// sems la dran bsam dpag med shar// ngo bo nyid ni rtog pas sbags// yid drug 'dzin cha ma 'gags pas// chos

sku nyid kyang bzung bas bcings// cha med rdul dang bcas pa'i phyir// 'od gsal nyid kyi bag la chags// rkyen bzhi'i dmigs pa ma dag phyir// snang ba nyid kyang du mar shar// snang ba de nyid yul snang

phyir// so so'i rigs su skye bar gyur// yid sgrib ngar 'dzin shes pa rnams// skam glog lta bur wal wal shar// ngag sgrib yul du dpyod byed pa// sbrang char glog ltar dus mnyam shar// lus sgrib chags sdang
'khrug nyon mongs// nyon mongs ngar 'dzin thog ser ltar// dus gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying// ngan song lcags kyus gting nas bzung// rang gis rang bcings nyon mongs dgra// srin bu dag gi kha chu

ltar// dmyal ba la sogs me chur snang// yi dwags rnams la bred dang sdigs// byol song rnams la na bun ltar// mi rnams phung po khams dang ni// skye mched 'byung ba lnga ru snang// de yang bde sdug btang
snyoms so// lha min rnams la go mtshon te// lha rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan no// dper na myur 'gro'i 'khor lo bzhin// rgyun chags 'khor la yun ring gnas// de ltar snang ba sna tshogs

rnams// thag pa la ni sbrul mthong bzhin// de ma yin la der bzung ste// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su chags// bcud kyi 'gro ba rigs drug la// tshe tshad dus tshad longs spyod dar// bde sdug skye ba bzhi dag

ste// gti mug dag gis brdzus te skyes// nga rgyal dag gis sgo nga la// zhe sdang dag gis drod gsher la// 'dod chags dag gis mngal las skye// nad rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dang// bgegs rigs stong phrag

brgyad cu dang// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su phyis// 'khrul pa'i 'dra dpe bstan pa ni// kun gzhi'i rnam shes khyim dang mtshungs// gzung 'dzin nor rnams sogs par

byed// nyon mongs yid ni chung ma 'dra// bdag 'dzin dbye ba 'dzin par byed// yid kyi rnam shes khyo dang 'dra// sgo la zhugs te las rnams sogs// sgo bzhi'i rnam shes bu dang 'dra// kun la ris dang bdag
bzung byed// lus ni rnam shes mna' ma 'dra// gzung 'dzin chags sdang rab tu spyod// de yis rgyud drug 'khor lo bskor// sems dpa' rdo rje rab tu nyon// ye shes gsum gyi gnas lugs la// lhun

grub thugs rje'i 'khrul tshul bshad// phyi rabs rnams la khyod kyi ston// ces gsungs te yangs pa chen po'i klong du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ thog ma'i
kun gzhi skye med las rtsal 'gag med du 'khrul tshul rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/[ xxx ]rgya rgya rgyaH de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// kun bzang
nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye rang byung rol pa kun tu bzang// ma bcos mi 'gyur kun khyab rje// 'khrul tshul legs par gsungs na yang// sems can rnams la sangs rgyas gzhi// sa bon khyab tshul bstan du
gsol// de skad gsol pa thugs dgongs nas// ston pa 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung ste// klong bral brjod pa ye med pa'i// tshig gi rgyal po 'di dag kun// mig ni mthong byed med pa yis// dmigs gtad med
pa'i yul zin nas// lus med bsam bral thugs las ni// ma grub yangs pa'i mgur nas drangs// smrar med mi snang ljags las kyang// spros med mi mdzad tshul du bkras// ye med rang stong zhal dag
gis// 'gro dang 'ong med dbugs las byung// mi sgrib dngos med tshoms la bkram// brjod cing bshad pa'i rten med par// ma gsungs thos pa'i tshul du shar// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje sogs// rig
mdangs rig pa'i 'khor rnas gson// sems can khams gsum gnas pa la// sangs rgyas dang ni byang sems nyid// kun la khyab tshul 'di ltar ro// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ngas// sangs

rgyas sems can thams cad la// til la mar gyis khyab bzhin gnas// thams cad khyab pa'i rang byung nga// rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po ste// rtsol ba 'dun pas dag 'gyur 'grogs// chos nyid snying po nga nyid

kyis// 'khor dang 'das pa kun la khyab// e ma ho// rang byung rtsol bral klong chen de// kun la lhun grub ye khyab cing// sems can sangs rgyas 'khor myang 'das// rgyu gcig klong chen nga yis khyab// sa chu me
rlung nam mkha' dang// bdag gzhan gnyis dang 'jig rten theg/ rigs drug mu stegs rtag chad dang// lam skas theg pa rim pa dgu// kun kyang nga yi klong na thim// sems gcig kun gyis chos dbyings khyab/
khyab pas rtsa ba'i don 'di gcig/ gcig pas sems can sangs rgyas grol// grol bas chos kun dbyings su gcig/ dpe 'bras don rnams snang bar dag/ spros med sgro skur zlos pa'i klong// kun gyi snying po

byang chub sems// dper na nam mkha' stong pa yis// klong na yod pa'i 'byung chen sogs// snod bcud kun khyab ji bzhin no// yang dag sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sku dang ye

shes tshul du gnas// snang stong dbyings ni yul che bas// thams cad rig pa dri med kyis// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan tshul// til 'bru+u 'am ni nyung 'bru la// mar nyid ye nas lhun grub bzhin// sems can lus
sems 'di nyid la// de bzhin pa yi sa bon ni// mthun cing 'od dang bcas par snang// sangs rgyas sku gsum nyid la 'phro// 'dus ni sems can lus la 'dus// gnas ni lhun grub sangs rgyas

gnas// bskyed ni rang bzhin lhun grub bskyed// bde gshegs snying po kun bzang nga// snying po med pa'i kun 'byung nga// bstan pa med pa'i ye khyab nga// ston pa med pa'i yongs khyab nga// 'khor 'das med

pa'i rang grol nga// kun khyab nga las chos rnams 'byung// 'byung ba lnga dang dug lnga kun// lam gyi snang bzhi ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes su che// chos nyid ma skyes chos nyid dngos// gzugs med skye
ba'i cho 'phrul gzugs// thugs rje lhun grub stong snang khyab// 'dod pa'i khams gsum de tsam che// rang byung rgyu rkyen med par khyab// rtsol sgrub la 'das 'gag med khyab// ye nas thog med ser bu'i

rlung// chos sku thig le nyag gcig khyab// 'gyu byed ltar snang sems 'di nyid// rig pa'i ye shes bud+d+has khyab// rig pa'i snying po khyab rung nyid// chu yis yongs khyab ji bzhin no// chu yi rang bzhin gcig nyid
la// rkyen gyis chu+u rigs mi gcig bzhin/// thig le chen po'i kun khyab la// snang tshul bgrangs lang mthong tshul mang// sems can sangs rgyas snying po can// nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin// thig

le che las ma 'das par// skye 'gro la sogs cir yang byung// sems su mnyam la bzang ngan byung// sku gsum 'bras bu ma smin kyang// rgyu yis kun la khyab pa ni// gla ba pho la rtsi bzhin no// chos nyid byang chub
dgongs pa de// dgongs tshogs rnam pa gsum dag gis// nam mkha' bzhin du kun khyab nas// kun byas kun bskyed sa bon bzhin// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// chos rnams 'byung ba'i lte ba chad// nga med pa

yi sngon rol na// 'khor 'das 'byung ba'i lte ba chad// nga med pa yi sngon rol na// chos kun byed pa'i rgyal po med// nga yis ma khyab gzhan dag na// ston bstan 'khor zhes bya ma grub// nga yis ma khyab gzhan
dag na// sbyang gzhi sbyong byed yongs ma grub// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// lnga 'am ma shes bzhi yis khyab// 'dod pa'i khams kyang kun bzang nga// gzugs med khams kyang kun tu bzang
po nga// gzugs kyi khams kyang kun tu bzang po nga// nges khyab thams cad bde gshegs snying po'am// kun gyi thig le sa bon tshul du'o/ khams gsum rgyud drug sems can la// rang byung nges med ngas ma

bshad// sangs rgyas sems can mes po nga// nga ni rang byung ye shes te// nga ni chos kun snying po yin// nga ni kun gnas rtsa ba bzhin// snying po rang byung ye shes ngas// snang ba dang ni srid pa dang// snod dang
bcud kyis bsdus pa dang// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ khams gsum rgyud drug sems can dang// de bzhin du ni thams cad la// ma lus khyab de 'ub chub bo// de ni kun khyab gnas lugs
te// rang rig ye shes nus la gnas// til 'bru la ni mar bzhin du// lus kyi bkrags dang gzi mdangs ni// ye shes rlan gyis khyab pa'o// 'gro ba'i lus la sku lnga dang// ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga

dang// 'od lnga rlung lnga shes rab lnga// ye nas gnas pa'i rtags nyid du// ma dag rang ngo ma shes dus// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang 'dod yon lnga// nyon mongs phyogs lnga la sogs

'dzin// phung po sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag/ 'gro ba'i lus 'di bud+d+ha'i sku// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// rigs dang rigs kyi bdag por grol// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes lnga// yul lnga la ni 'od lnga'i

sku// phung po lnga la sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung ba lnga la yum lngar rtogs// srid pa gsum nyid sangs rgyas zhing// gnyis med lta ba'i rang lus yin// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// rang rang lus la rdzogs pa
ste// gzhal yas rnam par rang lus la// ye rdzogs sgrub rten mchod rdzas dang// dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa ste// rang rig sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye rdzogs thig le nyag gcig dang// rgya
chad phyogs lhung kun dang bral// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas phung po yin// des na srid gsum dkyil 'khor che// des ni rang lus gdos bcas nyid// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas bstan// sku dang ye shes

rig pa la// ye nas rdzogs pa'i rnam dbye yang// ye shes lnga dang sku lnga ste// rlung lnga shes pa'i rtsal kyang lnga// 'od lnga kha dog rnam pa lnga// shes rab lnga dang rigs lnga dang// snang yul de nyid rig par snang// snang
mdzad ma btsal ye nas gnas// rtog 'gags rig pa rdo rje sems// mi 'gyur mi bskyod rtsol mi dgos// rang rig ye shes nyams 'phel rgyas// rin chen yon tan ye nas gnas// 'od kyis zhing khams mtha'
yas snang// snang mtha' ma btsal ye nas gnas// rig pa bud+d+ha'i sa bon tshul// nyams blangs don grub rang grol bas// don grub rang la ye nas gnas// rig pa chos spyi'i don rab gsal// me long ye shes
ye nas gnas// rig pa ye mnyam sgyu ma mnyam// rkyen nyid gdams pas tshad la phebs// mnyam nyid ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa so sor rtog dpyod btang// sor rtogs ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa
ye grol 'bad rtsol bral// bya grub ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa de rnams tha mi dad// chos dbyings nyag gcig thig ler gcig/ chos dbyings ye shes ye nas gnas// rig pa drod phebs me dang
mnyam// 'khor dang 'das pa'i srog 'dzin pa// ye shes sgron ma dngas snyigs dang// don dam kun rdzob dbang po'i yul/ kha dog 'byed pa dngas snyigs rlung// 'khor 'das kun khyab khyab byed rlung// 'khor
srog gcod cing myang 'das 'phen// snying rje med pa'i rlung du gnas// sngar 'das shul du rig pa gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa ye nas gnas// mtho ris ngan song gang la yang// bzang ngan med pa rdo rje'i
rigs// de la 'khor 'das yon tan rdzogs// rin po che yi rigs su gnas// de la 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// pad+ma'i rigs su ye nas gnas// de nyid las snang kun dngos pas// sangs rgyas dus na las kyi
rigs// rig pa ngo bo ka dag la// las dang nyon mongs dri med pas/ kha dog dkar por ye nas gnas// yon tan rang rdzogs ser po ste// dbang bzhi ye rdzogs dmar po la// rtsol ba las 'das ljang gur
grub// sna tshogs 'gyur med mthing ga'o// 'khor 'das ma lus kun 'byung bas// 'byed par byed pa'i shes rab ste// de nyid rig las ma 'das pas// sdud par byed pa'i shes rab bo// 'khor 'das kun gyi
srog kyang gcod// sgrol bar byed pa'i shes rab bo// thams cad ngo bor de byung bas/ khyad par byed pa'i shes rab bo// rlung gis ye shes mkha' bskyod pas// bskyod par byed pa'i shes rab
bo// rig pa nyid las ma 'das pas// rang byung ye shes rang gnas so// gsal la rtog pa ye med de// sgo lnga'i rnam shes yid ma bslad// med cing mi bden ye shes so// kun gzhi'i rnam shes nyon mongs

kyi// yid kyis bdag tu ma bzung ste// rang bzhin mtshan nyid chos kyi dbyings// yid gnyis rtog pa kun dang bral// chos sku thig le nyag gcig go/ ye nas rang byung rang khyab pas// rang byung gi ni ye shes

so// ye nas 'gyur med sangs rgyas pas// rdo rje 'chang ngam bud+d+ha'o// sku dang 'od dang ye shes gsum// brtsegs sam gcig ste ma 'dres gnas// ngo bo sku la rang bzhin longs// thugs rje sprul pa'i sku
ru'o// 'od mdangs rang shar ye shes rtsal// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun kyang// ye rdzogs rang gi lus la gnas// chos longs sprul dang sde snod gsum// theg dgu myang 'das dkar chos rnams// lus

dang sems la ye nas rdzogs// gzhan du btsal bas rnyed mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor nyid kyi lus la tshang// sa ni sha ste dngos po can// chu ni khrag ste sdud par byed// me ni drod ste lus kun smin// rlung ni dbugs
te lus gzugs 'dzin// nam mkha' sems te lus mdangs 'dzin// nyi zla mig ste gsal bar byed// sems nyid ngo las chos rnams kun// ye nas lhun grub tshul du gnas// lus dang sems la tshang ba'i

phyir// phyi rol snang ba nyid las grub// de yang thog ma'i ye shes gsum// ka dag gzhi yi steng na tshang// de ltar rtogs par gyur pa na// 'di ltar khams gsum 'khor ba yang// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang
med// don de nges par rtogs 'dod na// des ni nam mkha' lta bur blta// don ni chos nyid skye ba med// rtags ni sems nyid 'gag pa med// nga yis ma bsgrubs kun khyab pas// gsal ba'i ye shes gzhal
yas khang// rang byung nyid las gzhan mi bzhugs// chen po lnga dang khams gsum rnams// nga yi sku gsung thugs bkod yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas sems can rnams// nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin// nges
pa gcig la bden pa gnyis// shing sdong yal ga sngi bzhin no// rgyu ni lhun grub thugs rje las// 'bras bu khams gsum sems can te/ khams gsum sems can rgyu byas nas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas ming
btags te// rgyu 'bras dpe don de ru bstan// rgyu ni khams gsum sems can la// 'bras bu sangs rgyas lung bstan pa// de ni sems can drang ba'i don// yang dag sems can sangs rgyas med// snying po skye
'jig ye bral la// rdo rje zhes su nga yis bshad// lus 'di gang zag lha mi yang// dgongs pa'i chos nyid sangs rgyas te// nga yi rang byung ye shes khyab// thugs rje'i rang byung ye shes lnga/ khams

gsum rgyu drug 'byung ba yang// de bzhin nga yi ngo bor bshad// ces gsungs nas brdal khyab chen po'i ngang du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ sems can la
sangs rgyas kyi rgyu+u 'am gzhi sa bon ji ltar khyab tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// kun bzang nyid la 'di
skad gsol// kye yang dag don rtogs kun tu bzang// bde spyod kun khyab klong chen 'byams/ khams gsum sems can thams cad la// sa bon khyab tshul gsung na yang// gnas pa'i sa ni gang na
gnas// dwangs dang snyigs ma gang la gnas// brten pa'i sa ni gang la bgyi// gnas pa'i ye shes ji lta bu// bdag cag 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol bas thugs dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i
'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ho// gnyis med gsal ba'i gzhal yas na// dpag med dmigs med dkyil 'khor shar// mi 'gyur ye shes ston pa ngas// theg pa spyi dang rang min pa// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs

'khor rnams la// smra brjod bral ba'i bstan pa bshad// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// ma 'khrul dag pa'i blo yis zung// a ho/ tsit+ta/ ro ma/ go ro/ b+hud+d+ha/ dz+nyA na/ ru pa/ ha ga la/ b+ha k+Sho/ snang srid ye khyab kun

bzang la// rig pa'i snying po rang shar byung// kun la 'jug cing gsal bar 'char// gnas ni tsit+ta'i dkyil na gnas// gsal ni dbang po'i sgo la gsal/ khyab ni snang srid kun la khyab// byung ni phyi rol rkyen
du byung// bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po med// mthong du dmigs yul yid dpyod bral// shes su tshig brjod kun las 'das// ming 'dogs ma grub mngon sum ma// 'byung ba'i dngas snyigs 'byed pa la// phyi

dang nang dang bar dang gsum// sa rdo ri brag snyigs ma ste// dwangs ma rtsi shing nags tshal dang// 'bru sna rtsi thog dwangs ma'o// gling bzhi gling phran snyigs ma la// ri rgyal ri bdun dngas ma'o// chu yi dngas ma zla

chu shel// me yi dwangs ma nyi me shel// rdo yi dwangs ma g.yu rin chen// sa yi dwangs ma gser la sogs// rlung gi dwangs ma rang sgra ste// kun 'dus dwangs ma 'ja' gza' skar// nang gi dwangs snyigs dbye ba

la// sha rus spu lpags snyigs ma ste// de yi dwangs ma ga ti ka/ shel dkar skud pa snying na gnas/ khrag dang chu ser snyigs ma yin// de yi dwangs ma khrag thigs ni// mthe bong tsam gcig snying na gnas// lus
drod 'di nyid snyigs ma yin// de yi dwangs ma rang drod ni// nyi 'od tsam gcig snying du gnas// 'gyu ba dbugs ni snyigs ma yin// de yi dwangs ma dbugs nyid ni// rta rnga tsam gcig snying na

gnas// byang khog rtsa sbubs stong pa snyigs// dngas ma thig le khra yi mig/ stong gsal snying gi dkyil na gnas// gsang ba'i dwangs snyigs dbye ba ni// ye shes rnam lnga dwangs ma la// phyir shar 'od lnga snyigs

ma'o// don lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// 'od lnga kha dog lnga dang ldan// dbyer med snying gi dkyil du gnas// de yang rgyas par bshad pa na// rin chen zur brgyad gzhal yas dang// 'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas

dang// dung khang b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas dang// lta byed mig gi gzhal yas khang// gzhal yas chen po de bzhi na// gsang sngags kun gyi gsang chen nyid// chos sku ngo bo bcu drug tshul// dbyer med gcig gi tshul du

bzhugs// gnyis med ye rdzogs chos sku dang// ye nas rang byung chos sku dang// dus gsum sgrib med chos sku dang// spang len mi mnga' chos sku dang// rang byung 'gyur med chos sku dang// ma rig pa yi chos sku

dang// sbyor ba med pa'i chos sku dang// gzhon nu bum sku'i chos sku dang// rgya che rab 'byams chos sku dang// mi rtag sdug bsngal chos sku dang// stong pa rig can chos sku dang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos sku

dang// don dam kun rdzob chos sku dang// sbyang bgrod med pa'i chos sku dang// dag pa gsum grol chos sku dang// thabs shes gzungs kyi chos sku'o// sha ni sra byed rdo rje dbyings// skye 'jig med par sangs rgyas

gnas/ khrag ni rin chen gter gyi dbyings// thams cad sdud byed b+hud+d+ha'i gnas// drod ni me dag sreg pa'i dbyings// gzung 'dzin sreg pa'i b+hud+d+ha'i gnas// rlung dbugs yang zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings// kun tu

skyod byed bud+d+ha'i gnas// sems nyid rig pa gcer bu'i dbyings// ma bsgribs mngon sum b+hud+d+ha'i gnas// lus kyi tsit+ta rin po che// 'dus pa zur brgyad gzhal yas khang// don ni rang gi lus dkyil na// ngo

bo sku ni zhi ba'i tshul// gdangs kyi sku ni so drug bzhugs// so so rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// rig pa ye shes yab yum snang// yab kyi cha 'dzin thabs kyi sku// yum gyi cha 'dzin shes rab sku// 'od dang 'od
zer zhi ba'i mdangs// gnas pa'i 'od zer tsit+tar gnas// rig pa dngos med chos sku la// nyon mongs pa yi dri ma med// ye shes sku la mdun rgyab med// thugs rje'i rtsal la bri bkol med// rin chen gsang
ba'i sbubs nyid ni// rang bzhin rnam dag nga nyid la// rang bzhin shes rtogs 'khor dang bcas// 'du 'bral med de dbyer mi phyed// gzigs snang gsum ni mi 'gag ste// ye shes snang ba 'od lngar
gsal// rang la tshur bltas chos sku'i yul// rang gi byang khog stod na gnas// ye shes yul ni rang gi byad// phyir bltas rig yul dbyings nyid la// sgron ma'i yul ni nam mkha' 'o// ye shes

yul ni me shel yin// 'od yul rang gi rig pa la// mtshan ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sangs rgyas ngo bo chos kyi sku// rang gi snying gi dkyil na bzhugs// sku ni nang gsal bum sku la// 'od ni bum nang mar

me bzhin// ye shes rma bya'i sgo nga 'dra// sku lnga ye shes chos kyi sku// rig pa 'od lus ye gdod nas// yul dag snang ba ma 'gags gnas// sangs rgyas rang chas sku ye shes// 'od dang rig pa zang thal du// ye

nas rang chas tsit+tar gnas// 'od dang 'od khyim tshul du snang// chos sku mi 'gyur ye shes snying// ye shes lha sku lhang nge ba// 'od du byung zhing zer du gsal// dag pa'i snang ba phyogs bcur shar// nub pa med
par tsit+tar gnas// mtshan med yul med grub pa med// rig pa'i ngo bo 'gyur ba med// thugs rje dbri med dri ma med// 'gag med ma 'gags thogs med pa// ma 'gags 'od gsal yul la khyab// mtha'
med yul can rgya chad med// ye shes snang ba ma 'gags par// yul la sems 'dzin ma zhugs par// ye shes rtog bral chen por bzhugs// snying dkyil chos sku stong pa la// ye shes zhing khams kha dog

phyed// gsal ba 'tsher te 'od du 'phro// sku ni mi g.yo zhal phyag rdzogs// yab yum tshom bu lnga ldan de// 'gyur med ye nas phyogs ris med// dag pa chen por de na 'khyil// brten pa byang khog stod na
gsal// bzhugs ni tsit+ta'i dkyil na bzhugs// gsal ba nam mkha'i ngang du gsal// sangs rgyas sa na zag pa bral// gsang chen gser gyi maN+Dal la// g.yu yi me tog legs bkram ste// nyi zla gnyis kyi

dkyil na bzhugs// man ngag bla ma'i gsung gis shes// bud+d+ha sa ma ti/ ro ma hA/ ka la b+hid+d+ha/ dz+nyA na tsit+ta/ bud+d+ha badzra/ ma hA tsak+Shu/ b+hid+d+ha/ a ma la/ ma hA pany+tsa ka la/ k+Sha aM a a ma ma
e ma rang gi snying dkyil na// thig le nyag gcig kun bzang pa// lnga ldan 'od khyim tshul du gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// chos dbyings ye shes mthing ga'i
phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// me long ye shes dkar po'i phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// mnyam nyid ye shes
ser po'i phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// sor rtog ye shes dmar po'i phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// bya grub
ye shes ljang gu'i phub// ye nas ngos bzung bral bar gnas// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta'i dkyil// chos sku'i thig le nyag gcig de// 'od lnga'i dkyil na me re yod// shes rig ma 'gags wa le

ba// 'di rtogs yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung// shar tshad yon tan rgya mtsho'i ngang// tsit+ta rin chen kun gyi mdzod// ngo bo rang gsal gzhal yas na// bum pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin// 'od du de ni ma re yod// rgyal

ba rigs lnga'i tshom bu ru// dkyil 'khor de ni khra mer yod// nyung 'bru tsam la phul thag tsam// sna tshogs gcer grol nyid du yod// ta thA ga ta/ ku la pany+tsa pa ni bud+d+ha ku la san ta/ tsit+ta pa ni/ b+hud+d+ha

kA ya/ hA hA/ nyi zla thabs shes khang pa na// chos sku ka dag 'od 'bar lnga// ngo shes bud+d+ha'i gdams ngag de// bla ma kun bzang ngag la dris// e ma sangs rgyas sum cu drug/ rang gi tsit+ta'i dkyil nyid na// sangs

rgyas bye ba 'bum khri grangs// cha phra gsal la shin tu dwangs// mdzes pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// blta bas mi skyo mdun rgyab med// sna tshogs gcer grol nyid du bzhugs// bla ma dam pa'i ngag gis

gsal// sngon gsum thag gcod ngo sprod do// kye sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// dag pa dbyings zhes sgron ma nyid// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// rang bzhin mtshan sgom goms dang tshad// gnas dang 'char sgo gnad

mthun dpe// man ngag rtags dang bcas pa rnams// rig pa phyi 'phros mkha' la gsal// rang shes nang du gsal ba'i tshe// tsit+ta'i dkyil du gnas pa yin// mtshan ldan bla ma nga 'dra yi// gsung gi bdud rtsis
sgo phye mthong// zhes gsungs nas shar grol 'gag med du lhan ne bzhugs so// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye sku gsum yongs rdzogs kun tu bzang// dang po'i sangs rgyas lhun rdzogs

dpal// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta la// rang gnas chos sku gsung lags kyang// dung khang b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas na// bzhugs pa gang bzhugs rten sa gang// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pa

nyid kyis gsan// nyon cig rig mdangs 'khor rnams kun// e ma rig pa'i ye shes nga// sems can kun gyi tsit+ta la// gong ltar gnas pa'i rang rtsal nyid// dung khang nang na khro bo'i sku// yab dang yum du rnam

par mngon/ khro dang khro mo'i tshul 'char zhing// ye shes lnga lnga dag dang ldan// gsal 'tsher gzi brjid rab tu 'bar// bum pa'i sku dang bum nang gi/ mar me'i rtsal zer 'ja' 'od nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa

sku yi yul// rang gi mgo yi dung khang yin// phyi yul tshom bu dag dang bcas// gnas ni longs spyod khro bo'i sku// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad klad nang bzhugs// brten pa rang gi mgo la brten// gsal ba dwangs ma ye

shes kyi// sgo phyai bla ma'i thugs mdzod kyis// me long dkyil 'khor mngon sum 'char// dung khang klad rgya'i nang dag na/ khro bo'i sku ni shin tu rngam// thugs rje 'dzin byed lcags kyur bcas// sku ni

nyung 'bru phul thag tsam// sna tshogs gcer grol dgu khri'i grangs// klad nang 'od lngas gang nas yod// cha phra mdzes pa gsal 'tsher bkrag/ nyam nga mdzes pa'i 'od zer 'phro// phrum phrum 'tsher ltar rab tu

gnas// rang gi shes rig ngo bo 'di// ngos bzung ma grub stong sangs nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bor grub// stong stong phyang du ma chad pa// ngo bo ma 'gags gsal ba 'di// me long lta bu'i ye shes grub// stong
dang gsal ba tha mi dad// rang rig shes dran ma 'gags pa// dbyer med mnyam nyid ye shes grub// rang gi shes rab so sor 'char// ma 'gags rang grol wal wal 'di// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes
grub// rang rang gang la'ang 'gag thogs med// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes grub// stong gsal 'dus pa chos sku'i mdangs// zhal phyag rdzogs pa bum sku'i tshul// dung khang klad pa'i gzhal yas
na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnams bzhugs// dper na bum nang mar me ltar// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dang bcas// shar phyogs gcig pu bgrangs mi lang// 'od zer bye ba 'bum dang bcas// lta bas mi

skyo gsal 'tsher 'phro// mdzes shing 'od lnga'i phung po la// brten pa mgo ste gnas dung khang// snying mig klad par rtsa 'brel nas// gsal ba mig dang me long gsal// rgyu ba gzhungs pa'i nang la rgyu// 'byung ba

gsang ba'i sgau ru 'byung// rig pa ye shes sbubs nyid na// sprul pa'i he ru sku lnga 'byung// ye shes 'khor ni kau rI brgyad// phra men ma brgyad sgo ma bzh-i// dbang phyug rtsa brgyad lnga bcu brgyad// stong zhing bdag med

mdzes zer 'phro// rtog med 'od lnga'i lus can du// ye shes nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// reg bya'i dri ma dag dang bral// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod// 'phrul gyi bang mdzod sgo phyes la// sangs rgyas bye
ba khrag khrig 'bum// blta bas mi skyo mthong bar 'gyur// ma 'gags nam mkha'i khams la ltos// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa nyag gcig yin// rang rig mthong ba ma 'gags gsal// longs spyod rdzogs skur de
yis bshad// rang gi shes rab phyogs med shar// shes rab nyid kyi sku yin no// ma bris pa yi dkyil 'khor na// rang bzhin 'od gsal srog med sku// dung khang klad pa'i sbubs dag na// rig pa ma 'gags

zang thal ba// ye shes kha mig can gyi sku// gsal ba shes rab kun tu khyab// longs spyod rdzogs pa mdangs kyi sku// gdul bya kun snang thugs rje brdal// 'od kyi kha mig sprul pa'i sku// yang sprul khrag khrig bye
ba rnams// zer gyi kha mig sna tshogs sku// e ma rdos bcas phung po'i lus kyis stong// 'gyu byed yid kyi lus kyis stong// dmigs bcas ting 'dzin lus kyis stong// dpyod byed shes rab

'od lus dag/ 'di yis don kun go bar gyis/ bud+d+ha/ sa mA twi/ ma la/ ma la/ ma hA/ tsak+Shu/ ro ma ha/ ka la/ bud+d+ha/ kA ya/ go ro tsa na/ bud+d+ha/ kA ya/ tri dz+nyA na/ pan+tsi ta/ ro ma ha/ b+hin+d+ha/ ka la/ bud+d+ha/ hri

da ya/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ a ma la/ b+hid+d+ha/ dz+nyA na/ a bud+d+ha/ sa mA ti/ kra tra na/ ku hr-i da ya/ d+harma kA ya/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ ngo sprod 'bru tshogs gnad du dril/ b+hi d+d+ha/ dz+nyA na tsit+ta/ go ro tsa na/ ka la ha/ b+hud+d+ha/ ri

rab chen po'i rtse la/ nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i man ngag/ sems dpa' rdo rjes go bar gyis// e ma sgron ma 'di ltar ro// shes rab rang byung sgron ma zhes// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// rang bzhin

mtshan nyid gnas pa'i sa// 'char ba'i sgo dang shar ba'i yul// goms dang dgongs tshad mthun dpe rnams// phyir shar sgo ni dbang po lnga/ khyad par kha dang sna la 'char// skyed byed rtsa nas tsit+tar 'khor// ro ma

rkyang ma kun 'dar ma// shel sbug khog pa stong pa'i nang// gsal ba rang shes chen por bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bor ni// ming bzhi 'dus pa'i ye gdangs su// ye nas lus kyi cha la gnas// thos dang bsam
dang sgom pa dang// kun 'byed rang rig shes rab rnams// 'di nyid ngo bor ye nas bzhugs// gdams ldan bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thung// zhes gsungs nas/ kun snang chos nyid kyi rol par lhan ner

bzhugs so// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho rang byung kun tu bzang// klong chen rtsol bral thugs rje can// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas na// kun snang khro bo dpag med rnams// ye nas gnas par
gsungs lags kyang// sngar gsungs rnams la 'brel med pa'i// lta byed mig gi gzhal yas de// bzhugs pa gang bzhugs rten 'brel gang// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pa nyid kyis

gsan// nyon cig rang rig rang rtsal 'khor// sems can kun gyi mig nyid la// thugs rje sgron ma 'di ltar ro// nyi zer gyi ni sgron 'od ltar// sgron 'od gting la thug pa med// rig yul dbyings la sgron yul
mkha'// sprul sku'i bzhugs gnas sgal tshigs so// ye shes zang thal mig gi dkyil// thugs rje sprul sku ye nas bzhugs// brten ni chu bur mig la brten// bzhugs kyang a 'bras dkyil na'o// gsal la
mthong ba ma 'gags pa// gsal 'grib med par da lta bstan// dpe'u ris dag gis ngo sprad do// snying nas mig tu rtsa dkar 'brel// rang rig mthong ba ma 'gags te// chos sku snang ba'i bar dag na// ye
shes ngo bo zang thal 'khyil// de ngos bzung la mkha' la gtad// rang rig ye shes lhug par 'char// sangs rgyas rang gi snying bzhugs pa// sha khrag lus kyis ma thums te// chu bur mig tu

zang thal nas// mthong ba 'gag med chen por bzhugs// brten pa dbang po mig la brten// bzhugs pa mig 'bras b+ha shu'i dkyil// skyon med mkha' la mngon sum ltos/ bud+d+ha/ dz+nyA na/ kA ya tsak+Shu/ rang byung

brag phug gnyis po na// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur// mngon sum bzhugs pa nga la dris// gnas snying lus brten skur shar te// 'od lus zang thal mig la smin// ro ma/ tsak+Shu/ ka la/ pa ni/ b+hu ta/ rgya

mtsho'i gting du nor bu sbas// rin chen ri rab rtse la thon// 'od zer nyi zla'i mkha' la 'phro// skad cig dang por b+hud+d+ha'o// lung ldan bla ma'i thugs las ltos// ri rab chen po'i rtse ye na// kun gsal grong khyer

mi rgod lnga// dz+nyA na pany+tsa ka la ha tsak+Shu/ lung bstan bla ma'i thugs la zhog/ mthong ba ma 'gags zang thal sku// dus kyis ma bsgribs zang thal sku// skye shi med pa zang thal sku// lus lngas ma bsgribs zang thal

sku// mdun rgyab med pa zang thal sku// dge sdig ma bsgribs zang thal sku// phyi nang med pa zang thal sku// yul shes gnyis med zang thal sku// rkyen gyis ma bsgribs zang thal sku// ye shes spyan ldan zang thal

sku// bcu yi tshul du shes par gyis// e ma ho// rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma nyid// skye byed sa bon tshul du gnas// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// mtshan nyid bzhugs tshul gnas sa dang// skye byed 'char sgo mthun
dpe tshad// 'di rnams legs par yid la zung// ngo bo snang ba gnyis ka sdud// rgyang ni rig sku mthong ba ste// gzugs sogs 'dod yon lnga sogs rnams// 'di yis 'ching bas zhags pa yin// snang ba rang

sar bzhag nas ni// bdag 'dzin bral bas chu zhes bya// sgron ni rang gi snang bar gsal// gong nas gong du 'phel ba'o// dbyings rig 'dres pas ma zhes bya// dbye na rgyang zhags chu sgron dang// ye shes 'dus

pa'i rgyang zhags dang// dbang po 'dus pa'i rgyang zhags so// mtshan nyid 'char byed 'gag med pas// dbang po'i dwangs ma mig ces bya// 'byed pa pad+ma'i spyan du'o// 'di yi gnas ni mig yin te// mthong byed

'gag pa med pa yis// yul rnams 'dzin par byed pa'o// klad pa dung khang dkar po nas// g.yas su 'khyil pa rtsa gsum po'i// ba men rwa 'dra'i rtsa yi dbyings// rtsa yi nang na 'di nyid gnas// 'char ba'i sgo

ni tsak+Shu ra// skyed byed mngal du rang zhugs tshe// dus kun gyi ni thog ma ru// lte ba'i rtsa mdud gru gsum du// pha ma'i rgyu rkyen dwangs ma yis// mig gi dwangs ma nyid du chags// pha ma'i rgyu rkyen cha gnyis
las// dkar nag 'dres pa de bzhin no// mthun dpe 'dzin byed lcags kyu yis// gang snang sna nas 'dzin pa bzhin// 'khor 'das sna gnyis 'di yis 'dzin// sgron mas yul gzung rig par
snang// lu gu rgyud mthong tshad yin no// zhes gsungs nas dmigs med ka dag gi ngang du lhan ner bzhugs so// rgya rgya rgya// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// 'di skad rang sgras ston pa
bskul// kye ho bya btsal med pa'i dpal// mig gi gzhal yas gsungs lags kyang// sngar gsungs tshig la 'brel med pa'i// 'gyu byed rtsa yi gzhal yas na// bzhugs pa gang bzhugs gang la brten// ston
pas 'khor la bka' g+Nol cig/ ces pa gsan te bka' g+Nal pa// nyon cig rig mdangs sprul 'khor rnams// 'gyu byed rtsa yi dra ba na// ye shes sku bzhi'i ston pa nga// rang bzhin thig le'i tshul bzhugs

te// sems can kun gyi lus zung 'dzin// rang bzhin 'od kyi gong bu bzhin// rtsa rnams nang na thig le'i sku// che tshad nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// chung tshad rta rnga bcur gshags tsam// gsal tshad nyi zla sgron

me 'dra// gsal la 'tsher te gzi brjid 'bar// 'gro dang 'ong dang gnas sa ru// ye shes mkha' 'gro bye ba 'bum// sa ya grangs 'das brjod mi lang// nyung 'bru'i lus la spyan phul thag/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i

khyad par nyid// 'pho gnas rlung gi 'phar rkyen no// thig le'i yul ni rang gi las// thig le'i pho brang 'khor lo lnga// thig le'i gzhung lam gzhungs pa nyid// thig le'i grong khyer b+he ta lI// brten pa sgal pa'i

tshigs la brten// gsal ba 'phrul gyi bang mdzod nyid// bla mas sgo phye dbyings la gsal// sprul pa'i grong khyer dgu khri 'bum// thig le rang byung gzugs la brten// rtsa rnams kun gyi nang na bzhugs// thon
pa gsang ba'i sgo la thon// gsal ba rdo rje'i mi tog nyid// pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i 'og bcug pas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la// mngon sum rtag 'char gsal nyams myong// rgyu

lam ngo bo dbyings 'bras bu// bde gsal nyams myong gdams pa rnams// tshad ldan bla ma'i thugs mdzod brus// e ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma zhes// chos rnams kun gyi yid ches

pa// 'di nyid don rnams yid la zung// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// mtshan nyid dgongs pa gnas pa dang// 'char sgo rang bzhin yul snang ba// tshad dang yon tan thabs mthun dpe// 'di rnams rtsa ba blo la

zhog/ ngo bo nyag gcig cha phra ste// stong pa'i mu yang rang gsal ba// mi rtog spros bral zlum po'o// thig ni mi 'gyur drang po la// le ni brda' ba chen po yin// stong pa dngos yul zhen blo dgag/ sgron mas 'od
lngar rang snang ste// rang rig rang ngo gsal mdangs ldan// nges pa'i tshig yin the tshom sel// dbye ba lnga yin 'di ltar ro// gzhi gnas rang gi thig le dang// kun rdzob rgyu yi thig le dang// don
dam spros med thig le dang// rang byung 'bras bu'i thig le dang// mi 'gyur thig le stong pa'o// rang gnas dgongs pa gcig yin te// tha snyad grangs zad 'dzin zhen bral// mtshan nyid dngos

po rang stong ste// ma bsgoms par yang mtshams med pa'i// thig le zla bral nyid du'o// ka ti gser gyi rtsa chen te// dar dkar snal ltar 'phra la 'dril// shel sbug can bzhi'i nang na ni// rang gnas sus kyang
byas med par// ye nas mnyam pa chen por gnas// res ni rlung gi rta la zhon// lus dang rtsa yi nang dag na// sems can kun gyi lus rten du// thog ma nyid nas gnas pa'o// 'char byed ma bsgribs sems
can mig/ tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo nas thon// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang// kun gyi mig nas 'char ba yin// rang bzhin babs kyis gnas pa la// ye gdangs rang bcas rang gsal te// sus kyang ma byas

rang bzhin no// 'char yul bar snang stong pa la// byung gnas 'gro gsum bral ba yi// bde stong mi rtog zag med dang// rang byung thig le brjod med stong// nam mkha'i khams su spro bsdu med// bar snang mi

'gyur de nyid na// nges par tshad du de 'gyur ro// rtsol med nyid du rang grol te/ khams gsum 'khor bar zlog re kan// dngos ni lha la rang mtho gang// lha min chag gang mi mtheb gang// 'od lnga 'dus pa'i

zlum po ru// zad pa med par snang ba yin// thabs kyi man ngag mtheb mdzub kyis// tsak+Shu'i phugs dang 'gram btsir bas// mngon du snang ste yid ches so// mthun dpe rma bya'i mdongs 'dra ste// dra mig nya mig
bzhin du gnas// 'di la rang bzhin dbang thob nas// rtsol med nyid du rang grol lo// zhes gsungs nas kun bzang yangs pa lhun 'byams chen por lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen
rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ thog ma'i sangs rgyas sku dang thig ler gnas pa'i sa/ zhi ba rgyas gsal bar gsungs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/
de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye sprul pa'i sku mchog kun tu bzang// skye med chos las kun 'byung ba// sems can rnams kyi pho brang bzhir// sgron ma bzhi dang
sangs rgyas sku// gnas pa rgyas par gsungs na yang// lam ni gang la rgyu ba lags// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pas gsan cing dgongs// dges pa'i mdangs phyung tshig 'di

gsungs// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// rang byung rig pa'i ngo bo nyid// lam ni rtsa la rgyu ba ste// rang la rtsa yi 'khor lo lnga// sku gsum ye rdzogs rtsa gsum ni// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar ma// rtsa
gsum rang gi lus zungs yin// dbu mas 'khor lo bzhi brten te// 'di yi g.yas g.yon dbus dag nas// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba ni// lus dang yan lag bskyed pa dang// sgron ma nyid kyang 'dir smon

te// tsit+tar sku rnams smin byas nas// rtsa rnams thig ler smin par byed// lus kyi rgya mdud 'khor lo bzhi// dra ba bzhin du 'bral med kyang// drang por lus kyi ka ba'i tshul// rtsa gsum sku gsum skyed byed

de// nus pa spyi gtsug stod la 'thon// dbang po'i dgongs pa so sor byed// rlung sems 'dres nas rtsa la brten// nyi khri stong phrag drug brgya rgyu// gyen rgyu thur sel las gnyis byed// skyed byed rtsa chen bzhi dag
nas// 'gyu 'gul 'phrig dang yang zhing bskyed// las kyi rlung byas shes rig gsal// shes rab rnams kyi ngo bor rgyu// ro rkyang kun 'dar shel sbug dang/ khog stong gsal shes chen por gnas// gsal mi

gsal rnams rlung gi rkyen// rtsa nang gsum nas thig le byung// don dam thig le g.yon nas byung// kun rdzob thig le g.yas nas byung// dbus nas rang bzhin thig le'o// rig pa ye shes thig le'i tshul// kun

rdzob rgyu yis sprul sku 'grub// pha ma'i khu khrag thigs pa dag/ rtsa nas rgyu zhing phung po brten// gnas pas lus kyi gzi mdangs bskyed// don dam 'od kyi thig le ni// nyung 'bru tsam la rang gsal zlum// rlung
gis bskyod dus 'gyu ba ste// zag med rtag chad mtha' las 'das// rang bzhin ngo bo ka dag la// gzhi nas ye shes gsum lta bu// stong pa zang thal gsal ba dang// rig pa zang thal gsum du gnas// dbus

kyi rtsa nas rgyu lam byed// ces gsungs nas sna tshogs gcer grol chen por lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ lam gang nas rgyu zur tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// kye ma bcos klong yangs kun tu bzang// ye shes sems dpa' bdag med

dpal// lam gyi rgyu tshul gsungs na yang// 'khor lo ro rkyang la sogs pa'i// rtsa rnams de ltar yod pa ni// rtsa yi mtshan nyid go ba la// lus kyi mtshan nyid ma go zhing// lus kyi mtshan nyid ma shes na// gnas

pa'i mtshan nyid yongs mi go/ gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma go na// 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid yongs mi shes// phyi rabs rnams kyis mi go bas// chags tshul 'khor tshul bka' stsol cig/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams spro
nyan 'tshal// zhes pa ston pas gsan dgongs te// 'khor la thugs rjes snang zhing gzigs// gsang chen nges pa'i tshig 'di kun// gnyis med ye shes thugs klong nas// mi 'gyur gsang ba'i
bum par dril// thun mong ma yin ljags la bkram// skye med klong nas 'gag med du// brjod med tshig 'di rang grags gsungs// mA nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// lhun grub ye shes

rig pa 'di// brten pa lus kyi gnas lugs ni// rang dbang can du 'khor ba dang// rang dbang med par 'khor tshul gnyis// rang dbang can gyi 'khor tshul ni// 'od zer mthing ga phyi ru thon// ljang gu nang du

log pa ste// ye shes khong gsal chen por gnas// de ni chos sku lhun grub yin// rang bzhin thugs rje skye ba med// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i 'khor lugs so// rang bzhin 'gro don byed pas na// sprul pa sku yi
'khor lugs so// me tog la sogs brdzus skyes te// dag pa'i mngal du dran bzhin 'jug/ de rnams rang dbang can yin no// rang dbang med pa'i 'khor tshul ni// dge ba can ni yar la 'khor// sdig pa can
ni mar la 'khor// sdig pa can gyi mar 'khor ni// rlung dang rnam shes yul snang 'di// las kyi dbang gis gzugs snang shar// dbang po kun ldan phyogs med du// zas dang gos dang skyabs gnas

'tshol// bar ma dor ni yid kyi gzugs// shes pa yang yang phyad phyod can// stong gsum se gol gcig la 'khor// sdug bsngal tshor ba mang po myong// de la skye ba rnam bzhi ste// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher

skyes// brdzus skyes skye dang bzhi yin no// ma yi mngal du 'di lta ste// bar do'i rnam shes 'khyam po rnams// sngon gyi las ngan dbang dag gis// dbyar gyi sha la sbrang phung ltar// la la'i srog chags ltar du

snang// pha ma'i 'dod sred rten 'brel 'dzom// bsod nams mthun cing las 'brel ldan// rgyu rkyen phun tshogs mngal du 'jug/ 'jug sgo dag dang ma dag gnyis// lnga dus mtshan ma sbyor ba la// nyon mongs lnga

dang yid drug dang// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid do// ye shes rang ngo ma shes te// der 'dzin dri mas 'byung ba 'dus// de las lus grub rga shi'i bar// 'khor bar 'khyams shing 'byung ba 'dus// chos nyid bar
do ngo ma shes// der 'dzin dug lnga dug gsum rgyas// yul drug dag gi 'dzin pa yis// pho mo sbyor ba byed pa la// der 'dzin skyes pa'i ye shes rtsal// rig pa yid du 'gyu ba de// pha ma'i bde ba sra

snyam dus// bar do'i rnam par shes pa de// bshar lam zhugs nas mngal du ni// yi ge a yi tshul du thim// chu la chu bzhag tshul du song// mngal gyi rgyas 'thum byung tshor 'gags// bde ba chen po'i ngang du
gnas// sems yid lha khang khyim tshud bsam// rnam shes rlung dang rgyu rkyen bzhi/ khrag dang 'o ma 'dres ltar song// zhag ni bdun phrag dang po la// srub byed rlung gis rab bsrubs te// nyi zla

ga'u'i tshul de dag/ mer mer zho rlon lta bur gyur// nyung 'bru brgya yi tshad tsam chags// 'byung ba lnga yi byed las so// bdun phrag gnyis par nur nur po// zho dang khrag 'dres tshul du 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi yi

yi ge dang// rang bzhin yi ge bzhi bcu ni// rta rnga bcu cha tsam du chags// thig le nyung 'bru'i cha tsam mo// 'byung ba sa yi byed las yin// bdun phrag gsum la me yis bskyed// gor gor po ni zho bzhin

chags// rang bzhin yi ge tsa yi tshul// rnam pa brgyad du snang bar 'gyur// thig le nyung 'bru'i bcu cha tsam// bdun phrag bzhi la rlung gis gtor// tar tar dngul chu lta bur snang// yangs 'bru phyed kyi tshad du

nges// rtsa rnams rags pa rab tu bskyed// bdun phrag lnga la chu yis bsdus// mkhrang 'gyur ston pa nyung 'bru tsam// de dus rtsa 'dab bcu drug chags// rtsa yi rtse mor thig le ni// nya yi mig tsam gcig tu

chags// de la brten nas lta ba yi// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhi ma chags// bdun phrag drug tu me rlung gis// smin byas nyung 'bru gnyis cha tsam/ khyab 'jug nya yi tshul du chags// rtsa dkar rtse la thig le ni// nya

mig tsam pa shar ba'o// de la brten te snying ga ru// chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhi ma chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bdun pa la// 'byung ba bzhi char 'dus pa yis// nyung 'bru gsum gyi cha tsam bskyed// mer mer rus

sbal lta bu ste// chu yis bshig cing sa yis mnan// me yis sdud cing rlung gis gtor// yang gcig 'byung bzhi 'dus pa yis// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gcig yi ge dang// lte ba dag nas bskyed pa yi// ro ma rkyang ma kun

'dar ma// rta rnga tsam yang yar chad nas// snying gar 'khril nas mgrin pa ru// longs spyod 'khor lo'i tshul du chags// de nas rtsa gsum rtse mo la// thig le nya mig tsam du 'gyur// brten nas spyi bo'i bde chen

chags// de la brten nas mig gnyis chags// 'byung ba'i dwangs ma ye gsal bzhi// snying gi dkyil du 'gyur med bzhugs// zhag ni bdun tshan brgyad pa la// chus bsdus sran ma bcu cha tsam// de dus snying gi

dwangs ma lnga// rtsa chen lnga ru phyir shar te// nang gi don snying rnam lnga chags// thig le'i dwangs ma snyigs ma chags// snying rtsa yar song lce chags so// de la gyes nas mgo bo chags// rtsa chen bzhi ni snying du
'dus// mcher ba'i rtsa las mchu chags te// de la brten nas lus chags so// de nas lag pa g.yas pa chags// de nas mkhal rtsa g.yon pa chags// mkhal rtsa yar song snyan gnyis chags// de nas rkang pa
g.yas pa chags// de nas mchin rtsa mchin pa chags// mchin rtsa yar song mig gnyis chags// de nas lag pa g.yon pa chags// rlung gi mdangs la glo ba chags// glo rtsa yar song sna gnyis

chags// de nas rkang pa g.yon pa chags// de nas smad kyi nang khrol chags// lus kyang rus sbal mkhyid gang ba'o// zhag ni lnga bcu nga drug ste// bdun tshan brgyad du lus rnams bskyed// 'khor lo bzhi yi rtsa

'dab dang// rang bzhin yi ge spyan dang bcas// lus kyi sha rus thams cad ni// cha rnams tshang bar chags pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag dgu pa la// 'khor lo bzhi la rtsa chen brgyad// rnam shes rmi lam lta bur

chags// 'byung ba sa yis sra bar byas// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu pa la// lus la srin bu'i grong khyer dang// phyi rol sha lpags bar rnams kun// rtsa yi dra ba dra phyed kyis// thams cad 'brel ba'i rnam par
chags// gong gi de dag thams cad kun// rim gyis bskyed cing rim gyis chags// gal te pha ma skyon can nam// dbang po ma tshang lus skyon zhugs// de la chags lugs 'khrug pa'o// 'khor lo bzhi la spyan

gnyis gnyis// thabs shes tshul du spyan brgyad chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gcig la// ma la mig glo'i nad byung ste// mgo na skyug bro dang ga 'gag/ rtsa rnams re thag lta bur chags// gzugs kyang rus

sbal lta bu ste// mtho gang tsam du rags par chags// 'byung ba bzhi po 'dus pa yis// rlung gis phye zhing chu yis bsdus// sa yis bzung zhing me yis smin// rtsa gsum 'khor lo bzhi la sogs// lus kyi rten
'brel thams cad tshang// zhag ni bdun tshan bcu gnyis la// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi// rtsa mdud thams cad rdzogs par chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gsum la// las kyi rlung yang 'jug par
byed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bzhi la// pha yi sa bon rus pa chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bco lnga la// ma yi sa bon sha rnams bskyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu drug la// sha rus dwangs ma rkang mar
chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bdun la// lpags pa sbris ma thams cad chags// zhag ni bdun tshan bco brgyad la// lus kyi yan lag gsal bar dod// zhag ni bdun tshan bcu dgu la// nya sul thams cad

sbrul ltar 'khril// zhag ni bdun phrag nyi shu la// rtsa rnams dra ba'i tshul du g.yogs// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gcig la// me khams snying ni bra bo tsam// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gnyis la// lcags khams glo ba
gangs ri chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gsum la// shing khams mchin pa nags ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer bzhi la// mcher pa sa khams lpags ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer lnga na// ku
ya dar gyi yol ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer drug la// klad pa zho phor lta bur chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer bdun la// rgyu ma 'dom pa gsum du chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer

brgyad la// rgyu ma khugs dang tshil bu dang// yan lag rags par chags pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer dgu la// pho ba rang gi snyem pa gang// zhag ni bdun phrag sum cu la// grod pa rang gi byin pa tsam// zhag

ni bdun phrag so gcig la// long kha rang gi lag ngar tsam// zhag ni bdun khrag so gnyis na// lte ba sprul pa'i rtsa kha 'byed// ma yi zas skom bu la phan// zas kyi dwangs ma pho bar song// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor

lo nas// srub byed rlung gis dwangs snyigs phye// dwangs ma me yi khams las ni// mkhris pa rang gi khyor gang chags// snyigs ma bad kan chu yi khams/ khyor ba gang ni pho bar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag so
gsum la// rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyis ni/ khams kyi nus pa skyed par byed// brten pa sa yi khams kyis ni// lus zungs thams cad gso bar byed// klad pa chu yis lus zungs sdud// g.yo ba rlung gis

lus khod snyoms// dro ba me yis lus rnams smin// zhag ni bdun phrag so bzhi la/ khams kyi dwangs ma 'char ba de// snying ni me yi khams yin pas// de gyes pa las lce chags te// ro yi myong byed tshor bar
byed// glo ba lcags kyi khams yin pas// dwangs ma rna ba rnams gnyis kyis// sgra yi don ni tshor bar byed// mchin pa shing gi khams yin pas// dwangs ma mig gnyis gzugs brnyan 'char// mcher pa sa yi

khams yin pas// dwangs ma sna yis dri rnams tshor// mkhal ma chu yi khams yin pas// dwangs ma rdo rje pad+ma yis// bde ba thams cad myong bar byed// bdun phrag de ni so lnga la// rtsa yi lam rnams dod par

byed// bdun phrag de ni so drug la// rlung dang rnam shes 'phrad par byed// 'dun phrag de ni so bdun la// bde sdug myong tshor drag po skye// bdun phrag de ni so brgyad la// lus kyi stobs rnams skyed par

byed// bdun phrag de ni so dgu la// rnam shes byung tshor phyi la 'breng// bdun phrag de ni bzhi bcu la// skye ba snga phyi thams cad dran// de ltar bdun phrag bzhi bcu la// zla ba dgu dang zhag po brgyad// spyir na zla

dgu ngo bcu la// mngal du btsog pa'i 'du shes shar// 'phul byed rlung gis mar la 'das// mgo mjug log nas phyir la 'thon// de ltar mngal gyi rgya dang bral// sngar gyi bag chags srab tu song// phyis kyi
nyer len ngo ma 'phrod// shes pa sngar bas mi gsal zhing// rtsa rlung kun gyi stobs ma skyes/ khams kyi dwangs snyigs ma phye bas// nad gdon mi mthun phyogs rnams sdang// de nas khams kyi zas zos
pas// dngas mas khams kyi nus pa bskyed// snyigs mas lus kyi stobs bskyed nas// rim gyis lus rnams skyed par 'gyur// de ltar rdzogs ldan mi lus la// rus dum sum brgya drug cu

yod// sha la spar tshad lnga bcu yod/ khrag ni rang gi snyim pa drug/ rtsa ni nyi khri chig stong yod// nya sul chen po drug yod do// klad pa rang gi snyim pa gang// rgyu ma rang 'dom gsum yod de// skra ni brgyad khri bzhi

stong yod// ba spu bye ba gcig yod do// so ni sum cu so gnyis yod// sgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod// rtsib ma bcu drug la sogs te// 'dom gang gru bzhi lus la rdzogs// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
'di// sbubs nas thon te sprul pa'i sku// 'byung ba lnga las lus grub ste// thabs shes gnyis ni 'du 'bral med// bdun tshan rnams ni rtags tshad de// zla ba dgu ni theg dgu ste// zla ngo bcu ni sa

rnams bgrod// sgyu ma lus kyi chags gnas lugs// 'khrul med khyod kyi blo la zhog/ ces gsungs nas cog bzhag dang dwangs kyi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi
rgyud las/ lus kyi grub tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ zab rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang
gsol pa// kye dang po'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// ye grol brjod pa bral ba'i mchog/ lus kyi chags lugs gsungs na yang// rtsa yi gnas lugs ma gsungs pas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol
cig/ zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// rig mdangs 'khor rnams nyon// spyir na rtsa ni bsam mi khyab// hril gyis bstan na 'di ltar ro// ma rig gnyis snang 'dzin pa yis// ye shes rtsal yang 'byung bzhir
'dus// 'byung bzhi las kyi lus su grub// lus dang mnyam du rtsa rnams grub// rtsa dang dus mnyam thig ler grub// de grub sku dang ye shes grub// thams cad dbyer med lhun grub yin// de yang lus chags

dus mtshungs su// 'byung bzhi'i lus kyi rtsa rnams grub// spyir ni ba spu'i grangs dang mnyam// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis 'dus// bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis su// de yang bsdus pas 'dus pa'o// de bsdus

'khor lo bzhi ru 'dus// lte bar skyed byed drug cu bzhi// snying gar dran pa sum cu gnyis// ro 'dus brgyad gnyis bcu drug gnas// rnam bkod sum brgya drug cu gnas// spyir na 'khor lo bzhi po la// rtsa yi

grangs ma bshad pa ni// bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// de ni bsdus pa'i grangs can no// 'khor lo bzhi po de yi dbus// rtsa gsum drang por ka bar gnas// shel spug can ni zhor la ste// oM AHhUM gsum
yang rtsa nang gnas// dag pa sku gsum 'char gzhi byed// rtsa gzhan 'byung lnga'i rten yin no// ro ma chu yi dwangs mas bskyed// rkyang ma sa yi dwangs mas bskyed// kun 'dar ma ni rlung gis

bskyed// ro mas lte ba'i g.yon ngos nas// byang sems 'babs pa'i rten gzhi byed// rkyang mas snying gi rtse g.yon nas// mgrin pa'i rtsa nas gnyis su gyes// rtse chung gnyis nas 'thon nas ni// dar skud ba men
rwa 'dra yi// rtsa ni mig gi 'bras la zug/ ye shes snang ba 'char ba'i lam// kun 'dar ma ni dbus na gnas// rtse mo gsum ni yar song bas// g.yas g.yon rna ba gnyis la zug/ dbus ma tshangs pa'i gnas

su zug/ rang bzhin yi ge 'od dang bcas// rlung lnga ye shes rnam lnga dang// thig le 'od 'bar tshul du gnas// de ni rtsa spyi'i rnam bshad yin// da ni so so'i rtsa gnas bshad// dang po skyed byed 'khor lo
yis// srid pa chags pa'i gzhi ma byed// bde ba chen po'i rnal du 'jog/ mi 'gyur thems su gsum gyis 'jug/ lus mi 'gyur ba rtsa yi thems// ngag mi 'gyur ba yi ge'i thems// yid mi 'gyur ba rlung

gi thems// rtsa yid rlung ni lus ngag yid// de rnams lte ba dag nas bskyed// rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi na// rang bzhin yi ge de dang mthun// 'od kyi gong bu rang bzhin sku// kun tu bzang po so gnyis
dang// kun tu bzang mo so gnyis rnams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// de la thams cad skyed byed zer// sgron ma'i spyan dang 'byung bzhi'i spyan// sa dang ya yis mtshan nas gnas/ khyad par lus

rdzogs smin pa'i rtsa// grangs can nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// thig le'i spyan rtsa bcu drug yod// sgron ma'i rtsa ni bcu gnyis yod// kun la yi ge re re gnas// lte bar 'byung ba'i sa bon ni// yab yum sa bon hrIHdang

ni// yi ge su ser tshul du gnas// dbu ma ro ma rkyang ma gsum// dkyil drang ka ba'i tshul du gnas// lte bar rtsa 'dab drug cu bzhi// ljon shing yal ga gyes 'drar gnas// dran byed 'khor lo lte ba nas// sor

brgyad yar 'chad snying ga nas// rtsa rnams yal ga sum cu gnyis// rang bzhin yi ge 'od thig mthing tshul// 'khor lo lte bar khams dkar po// yab yum yi ge ma dang hUM// 'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du gnas// rtsa

yig 'di lhag a ru gnas/[ \u0f7f]khaHtsaHtaHphaHyAHsaHtaHkaHg+haHdz+haHteHd+haHraH/ de rnams kun bzang yab yum yin// ro 'dus mgrin pa'i rtsa yig ni// rtsa 'dab bcu drug yi ge re// dbus su me yig raM dang ni// yab
yum yi ge ri dang rtsa// 'od kyi gong bu'i tshul du gnas// rtsa yig rnams ni 'di ltar ro// ra rAHli lAHe AHa A+aiHa aHa aHa AH/ rtse mo rnams bkod rtsa yig ni// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu yod// de
bsdus sum cu rtsa gnyis te// rang bzhin yi ge re re ste// dbus su yi ge ya ljang dang// yab yum yi ge ha dang ra// 'od kyi gong bu tshul du gnas// rtsa yig rnams ni 'di ltar ro// pha phAHphi phIHmi

mIHba bAHba bIHnya nyAHnyi nyI:kha khAHga gAHtsa tsAHtsha tshAHda d+haHtha thAHsa sAHna nAHa aHAH/ rtsa 'dab thams cad gdugs rtsibs ltar// rtsa yi gtso bo gsum las gyes// nus pa spyi gtsug 'asngom pa yis// dbang po sgo

lnga dag la don// byed las so sor byed pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi la mi the ba'i// gsang bas bde ba myong bar byed// rnam par bkod pa'i 'khor lo ni// rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// lte ba'i rtsa mdud thig le

la// 'byung bzhi'i dwangs ma khu khrag ljang// yi ge ya dang sa ru gnas// rlung gi dwangs ma yaM gnas so// de ltar rang lus 'di nyid la// rtsa dang yi ge'i gnas su rdzogs// zhes gsungs nas/ sngo sgom yid dpyod
dang bral nas/ mngon sum gcer grol du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ rtsa'i gnas tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///
sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// mi g.yo 'gyur med kun tu bzang// blang dor bya bral rtsol med pas// rtsa yi gnas lugs gsungs na yang// g.yo ba rlung gi
gnas lugs rnams// phyi rabs rnams kyis mi go bas// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ma 'khrul dag pa'i blo yis 'dzin// ces pa ston pas gsan dgongs te// zhal mdangs 'od kyis 'dzum bstan
nas// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// ye shes rlung gis ma khyab med// de la rnam grangs mang na yang// las rlung ye shes rlung gnyis so// ye shes rlung ni sems dang

'dres// sems ni las rlung dag dang 'dres// rlung sems gnyis su med pas te// kun 'dus rlung gis las byed do// rlung ni rtsa gsum nang nas 'gyu// lnga stong bzhi brgya sa rlung ste// me chu gnyis kyang de tsam

mo// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya 'gyu// byed pa'i las ni gnyis yin te// gyen rgyu thur du gshang gci 'phen// snang srid thams cad rlung la brten// rlung ni thams cad byed las so// 'degs pa'i nus stobs ldan

pas na// sa la rlung gis khyab pa'o// chu la rlung gis khyab pa'i phyir// 'bab pa'i rtsa la shugs ldan pa'o// rlung gis me la khyab pa'i phyir// 'bar ba'i nus rtsal ldan pa'o// rlung la rlung gis khyab pas na// 'gro
ba'i rtsal shugs ldan pa'o// mkha' la rlung gis khyab pa'i phyir// bkrag mdangs yon tan kun 'byung 'char// spyir na rtsa rlung rig pa gsum// tha dad bshad kyang gcig tu 'dus// rig pa med na sems mi
'byung// sems 'di med na rlung mi 'byung// sems gcig byung nas ye shes grub// ye shes rtsal las 'gag med 'char// rtsa rlung thig le rig pa sems// thams cad dbyer med ro gcig
'dus// ma shes so sor bzung ba yis// ming med ming du song ba bzhin// ye shes lnga las 'byung ba lnga// dug lnga nyon mongs la sogs pa// gcig la sna tshogs bzung bas 'khrul// yang dag don gyi char ma
nye// thams cad rig pa rlung gi rtsal// dbyer med ro gcig ngo shes na// rang sems rig pa'i ngo bor grol// mkha' la sprin dengs ji bzhin no// zag bcas lus kyang mi snang bar// ye shes klong du 'tshang

rgya'o// ye shes rtsal gyi lus nyid la// rlung gnas spyi dang bye brag gnyis// bsam 'das bshad kyang lnga ru 'dus// 'degs byed rlung ni 'od dkar tshul// snying nas mcher rtsa'i nang la thon// lus kun khyab par
de gnas so// lhu tshigs bzhi la khyab par gnas// sha rus pags pa'i stobs rnams bskyed// bkrags dang gzi mdangs skyed pa'i rlung// 'od ser tshul du snying nang nas// phyir thon mkhal rtsa'i nang nas
ni// mgo mjug lus khyab smen dbrag nas/ khrag dang chu ser bkrag mdangs skyed// mi mnyam drod dang 'beb pa'i rlung// snying nang 'od dmar tshul du gnas// mchin rtsa'i nang nas phar thon nas// lus kyi

mgo mjug kun khyab ste// pho ba'i nang na lhag par gnas// zas rnams 'ju zhing lus drod bskyed// dwangs snyigs 'byed byed rlung ljang gu// 'od dang bcas pa snying nang gnas// glo ba'i nang sod lus kun khyab/

khyad par kha sna gnyis la gnas// zas rnams dwangs snyigs gnyis phyes nas// dwangs mas phung khams skyed par byed// snyigs ma dri chen dri chur phyai// bshang ba'i lam nas phyir dor ro// snying rje med pa las rlung

ni// mthing ga'i 'od can snying nang gnas// rig pa dag dang gnyis med pa// de ni sreg pa'i rtsa la zhugs// dbyer med gcig tu gnas pa'o// bye brag 'khor lo rlung gnas ni// dang po lte ba skyed byed du// rlung

gi dbyings ni 'od ma'i gzhu// chad zung 'od kyi gong bu ltar// rab tu rgyas te thig les brgyan// spyan gyi rnam pa srog 'dzin rlung// snying rje'i rlung ni chad zung 'og/ byi'u leb ma'i mig ltar gnas// de yi g.yas

su me mnyam rlung// bye ba'i kha rlang lta bur gnas// g.yon du khyab byed lbu ba 'dra// gzhu rgyud dkyil na dwangs snyigs rlung// lcags tshags spyan gyi rnam par gnas// srid pa lte ba'i rlung dbye'o// dran pa 'dus

pa'i rlung lnga ni// tsit+ta rin chen zur brgyad tshul// dbus su srog 'dzin rlung zhes pa// thig le sran gong lta bur gnas// de yi 'og tu las kyi rlung// chan grub tshul du gnas pa'o// de rtser thig le sku yi
tshul// kun la khyab par gnas pa'o// de yi g.yas su dwangs snyigs rlung// sku yis gang ba'i thig le gnas// de yi g.yon du khyab byed rlung// thig le yab yum tshul du gnas// mi mnyam rlung

gi thig le dang// thig phran tshul du gnas pa'o// shar rlung dkar te 'gyu bar byed// lho rlung ser te rab tu thim// ye shes lnga ldan khra bo ste// byang rlung ljang la rab tu g.yo// nub rlung 'bar te rab tu

dmar// dran pa tsit+ta'i gnas tshul lo// mgrin pa ro 'dus rlung lnga bshad// ce spyang lce 'dra'i rlung gzugs te// thig le spyan mig dbu brtsegs pa// srog 'dzin pa yi rlung zhes so// de 'og las rlung nya mig
ltar// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi thig les brgyan// sgra tshon brgyangs 'dra g.yo med gnas// g.yas su me dang mnyam pa'i rlung// thig le lnga brtsegs dar phyar 'dra// g.yon du dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'i

rlung// thig le thig phran spungs pa 'dra// gong du kun tu khyab byed rlung// thig le dra ba ris su gnas// rtse mo rnam bkod rlung lnga ni// 'khor lo rtsibs lnga mu khyud lnga// lte bar srog 'dzin rlung zhes pa// thig le
zhal gsum phyag drug gnas// las kyi rlung ni de yi 'og/ thig le zhal gsum phyag drug pa// me rlung nang du bzhugs par gnas// phyogs mtshams brgyad du thig le brgyad/ re thag 'then 'drar gnas
pa'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni g.yas dag la// thig le rma bya'i mdongs 'dra gnas// g.yon pa dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung// thig le nya mig lta bur gnas// ltag par rtsibs ni g.yas g.yon la// kun tu

khyab par byed pa'i rlung// thig le za 'og gur khyim gnas// lhag ma'i rlung rnams rtsibs mchan la// smig rgyu lug rgyud tshul du gnas// sa rlung ser po lte bar gnas// dran par chu rlung dkar po gnas// ro

'dus me rlung dmar po gnas// rtse mor rlung gi rlung gnas so// de ltar skyed byed rtsa bzhi nas// 'gyu dang 'gul dang 'phrig pa dang// yang g.yo bskyod pa'i bdag nyid du// lnga zhing lus kyi rlung dang
bcas// gsal tig mdangs dang bcas pa'o// zhes gsungs nas rang gsal skyon gyis ma bsgribs par gting gsal chen po ting 'dzin la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab
'byams kyi rgyud las/ g.yo ba rlung gi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// rgya rgya rgyaH///// sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye bde stong bdag nyid kun tu
bzang// rig stong dbyer med ye shes dpal// rlung gi gnas lugs gsungs na yang// thig le gnas lugs ma gsungs pas// bkod pa thig le'i gnas lugs de// ston pa rgyal pos bka' stsol
cig/ ces pa ston pas gsan cing dgongs// 'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ kye ho/ ye shes rang rtsal lus 'di nyid// rtsa yi dra ba thig les khyab// thig le yig 'bru sku ye shes// rtsa re'i nang

na rlung re gnas// rlung yang ye shes thig le rnams// nyung 'bru tsam gyis thams cad khyab// pho la thig le dngos su 'bab// mo la snyoms 'jug khams rgyas dus// sna bug g.yas su 'bab pa'o// kun rdzob thig

le de dag ni// 'byung ba lnga yi dwangs ma yin// yum chen sde lnga dngos yin te// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srog yin no// de la ye shes thig le gnas// don dam kun rdzob thig le gnyis// dbyer med gcig gi rang

bzhin no// klad pa rkang mar rus pa rnams// rtsa dang chu rgyus zhag tshil bu// pha yi thig le dkar pos bskyed// sha khrag chu ser spu lpags rnams// ma yi thig le dmar pos bskyed// de nas lus kyi rtsal rdzogs te/

kha mig rna ba can du byon// bye brag thig le'i gnas lugs ni/ khyad par 'khor lo bzhi yi dbus// pha ma'i thig le nyung 'bru tsam// dngul chu rgya skyegs tshul du gnas/ kha dog lnga ldan ye shes gzugs// yig

'bru sku yi tshul du'o// ba spu'i bu ga tshun chad kyi// grangs can grangs med bsam 'das pa// pha ma gnyis kyi thig les khyab// thig le ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// 'byung ba lnga 'dus dwangs ma yin// 'das ma 'das

kyi srog yin no// sku dang thig le gnyis su med// rang lus kun la khyab par gnas// ngo sprod ma yengs 'di yid zhog/ phyi ltar 'byung ba lnga yin te// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' 'o// nang ltar yum chen lnga yin

te// mA ma kI dang sangs rgyas spyan// gos dkar chos dbyings dam tshig sgrol// gsang ba ltar na mkha' 'gro lnga// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rin chen dang// pad+ma las dang chos dbyings so// yang gsang ltar na ye shes

lnga// me long mnyam nyid sor rtog dang// bya grub chos dbyings ye shes so// phyi ltar 'khor lo lnga yin te// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang// lte ba gsang gnas bde byed do// nang ltar thig le lnga yin te// gzhi

gnas thig le kun rdzob rgyu// don dam spros med rang byung 'bras// mi 'gyur thig le rang gsal lo// gsang ba ltar na yi ge lnga// ma dang ha ri ni sa'o// yang gsang ltar na kha dog lnga// dkar dmar ser ljang

mthing ga'i mdog/ sku lnga ltar yang lhun grub ste// mngon par byang chub chos longs sprul// ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin no// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yin te// rdzogs pa chen po'i phyag rgya dang// chos nyid don gyi phyag rgya

dang// dam tshig 'phro 'du'i phyag rgya dang// gnyis med las kyi phyag rgya dang// phrin las kun grub phyag rgya'o// phyi ltar phung po lnga yin te// gzugs phung rnam shes tshor ba dang// 'du shes 'du byed phung
po'o// nang ltar nyon mongs dug lnga ste// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod phrag dog/ nang ltar phrin las lnga yin te// zhi rgyas dbang drag thams cad dag/ de ltar yin pa'i yon tan gyis// rgyu

yi thig le ma spangs sgrubs// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog dang// rtsol bral kun khyab 'di yi khyad// thig le rang byung rang gnas pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i ngo bo yin// rang gsal rdo rje mkha' 'gro

ste// rang grol rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// gsal 'tsher pad+ma mkha' 'gro ste// zlum po las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// rgyu yi thig le spang gyur na// gsang sngags dam tshig kun nyams nas// bskal pa 'bum khrir na

rag spyod// de phyir thig le ma nyams bsrung// thig le sgrub pa'i rdzas la gnag/ sgyu ma'i thig le nyams gyur na// mkha' 'gro 'bum sdes ngu skad 'don// mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad 'byung// thig le ma nyams
bsrung gyur na// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// dbang du 'du bar the tshom med// 'khor 'das kun gyi srog yin te// de phyir thig le ma nyams par// mtshan ldan ma la bde ba bskul// rtsa btsal byin

gyis brlab pa dang// sbyor dang phab bzlog 'dren 'grems dang// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le sbyang// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bsgom// dbang po 'dod yon thams
cad kun// phyi ru mi 'bul nang du 'bul// sprul sku chags pa'i yul dang bral// 'dzin pa med par spyod pa'o// de ltar mi shes blun po rnams// yid dam phyi nas sgom pa dang// ye shes phyi ru 'tshol ba

dang// thig le spong dang shes rab bral// tshogs mchod 'dod yon phyi ru 'bul// blta bsgom spyod gsum phyi nas 'tshol// sangs rgyas gzhan nas re ba rnams// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed kyang// bye ba dgu

khri'i srid mthar yang// bsod nams bsags kyang ga la grol// ci phyir ye shes rang gsal 'di// rang la rang chas yod pa'i phyir// zhi khro rigs brgya rang las grub// mkha' 'gro sde lnga rang las grub// dpa'

bo sde lnga rang las grub// rig pa'i rtsal shugs ma 'gags pas// thabs kyi rang bzhin pho ru snang// shes rab rang bzhin mo ru snang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// snang stong gnyis med chos kyi

sku// zung 'jug spros dang bral gyur te// rtsa rlung thig le bde chen sku// zhi khro rigs brgya mkha' 'gro grub// phyag rgya chen po'i sa la gnas// lta ba chos nyid skye med la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang shar// gang

ltar brtag pa de ltar snang// sgom pa rang gsal 'dzin med la// ma bcos bzhag na bde ba che// spyod pa rang snang nges med la// ma 'gags thabs kyi rol pa shar// gang ltar byas pa de ltar grol// lta spyod
zung 'brel bde stong la// sa lam gcig chod stan gcig ste// yon tan thams cad de la tshang// snang srid thams cad chos sku'i zhing// sngi ltar byas kyang bde ba che// ma bcos kun grol mnyam pa

nyid// rang lus rgyal ba'i da la ru// sku dang ye shes thig le rlung// sku gsum rang la rang chas gnas// de phyir rang la rang longs spyod// mkha' 'gro'i srog jags dam pa rnams// rang la ye nas mi gnas

na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par ga la 'gyur// rang la gnas pa rang gsal gdab// de phyir rtsa rlung bde stong spyad// lhag med sangs rgyas thun mong 'grub// ces gsungs nas ka dag bya bral chen po'i ngang la
lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las// thig le'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rgya
rgya rgyaH sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ye shes gsum ldan kun tu bzang// thugs rjes kun khyab rol pa'i rje// thig le'i gnas lugs gsungs na yang// rig pa ye shes gnas lugs

sam// sku mdog lha grangs sngi lta bu// bzhugs tshul mtshan nyid sngi lta bu// ston pas rig mdangs 'khor la gsungs// zhes pa ston pas gsan dgongs te// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// dag pa ye shes

gnas lugs ni// gong du rgyas par bshad na yang// bzhugs tshul zhal phyag bshad kyis nyon// chos sku ye shes chen po de// tsit+ta rin chen zur brgyad du// sa bon yi ge'i tshul mdangs can// rtsa rnams dwangs
ma kun 'dus pa// rgya mtsho gser gyi nyi ma can// ye shes tshul du chos skur bzhugs// mtshan ma'i lus sam zhal phyag med// rang gi snying gi dkyil dag na// seng chen snol ba'i khri steng na// rig pa
kun tu bzang po mthing// yid byed kun tu bzang mo 'di// dkar gsal tshul du ye nas bzhugs// de mdangs snang mdzad yab yum dkar// 'khor lo bsnams shing seng steng 'gying// shar du rdo rje mi

bskyod mthing// sangs rgyas spyan dang gnyis su med// sa snying byams pa mai tri la// lA s+ya ma dang mA les bskor// shar phyogs tshom du drug tu bzhugs// rin 'byung yab yum rta mchog gdan// nam snying kun tu

bzang po dang// gIrti nIrti gnyis bzhis bskor// rang gi snying gi lho na bzhugs// snang mtha' yab yum pad gdan dmar// spyan ras gzigs dang 'jam dpal dang// puSh+pe d+hU pe bzhis bskor nas// tshom bu'i

sku drug nub tu bzhugs// don grub yab yum ljang gu la// phyag rdor sgrib pa rnam par sel// A lo ke dang gan+d+he ma// tshom bu'i sku drug byang du bzhugs// shar sgor rnam rgyal lcags kyu gnyis// lho sgor gshin rje
zhags pa ma// nub sgor rta mgrin lcags sgrog ma// byang sgor bdud rtsi dril bu gnyis// spyi bor brgya byin sku mdog dkar// ltag par lha min thags bzang ljang// srog rtsar shAka thub ser po

dang// gsang bar byol song thub pa mthing// lte bar kha 'bar dmar po dang// rkang mthil a ba nag po bzhugs// de ltar bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rnams// chos sku ye shes zang thal le// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs

rjer ldan// stong pa ye shes snying po can// gsal ba 'od kyi snying po can// rang byung rig pa'i snying po can// sgrib g.yogs med pa zang thal le// phyogs mtshams med par khyab gdal le// gsal 'grib med

par dngas sang nge// ngo lkog med par rjen cer re// stong gsal khyab pa chen por bzhugs// de yang lnga ldan chen po ste// stong pa ye shes snying po can// yang dag sa ru de sangs rgyas// thig le nyag gcig sku ru

bzhugs// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur// 'od zer snying po'i sku ru bzhugs// rang byung rig pa'i snying po can// rig stong lhun grub chen por bzhugs// 'gag 'grib med de zang thal le// ye shes chen
po'i rang bzhin du// rang bzhin lhun grub sku ru bzhugs// chos sku rnam dag chos dbyings su// gzugs sku'i zhing khams yongs su rgyas// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa ste// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba

'dra// sos ka'i smig sgyu thang bkram 'dra// sku dang ye shes 'od dang gsum// 'du 'bral med par bum pa'i sku// thog ma'i ka dag ye shes lnga// dbyer med sku la gsal yul lnga// rlung lngas bskyod pas 'byung ba

lnga// 'byung ba de yi dwangs ma lnga// de la phung po dwangs snyigs lnga// ye shes mkha' 'gro shes rab lnga// de yang gzhi gnas ye shes lnga// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de yang gzhi lam 'bras gsum

ste// gzhi gnas ye shes lnga nyid ni// gzhi yi rig pa gcer bu 'di// 'khor 'das ma grub dri med khyab// skyon gyis ma gos dkar mdangs ldan// de ni ma phye kun la snyoms// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin// de

la yon tan rdzogs pa'i dbugs// 'od zer ser po'i tshul du gnas// blo yi bye brag so sor shar// de ni sor rtog ye shes yin// rang rtsal drod ldan dmar por ldan// gang shar bya btsal med par grub// bya ba

grub pa'i ye shes so// 'gag pa med pa'i stong ldan ni// 'od zer ljang gu'i tshul du gnas// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su 'dus// kun kyang chos nyid stong pa yin// rang rtsal nyid las ma 'das te// de ni

chos dbyings ye shes yin// mi 'byung mthing gar rang gsal lo// lam dang sbyar na 'di ltar ro// rig pa'i ye shes zang thal 'di// dri med me long g.ya' dag ltar// gsal la sgrib med sang nge ba// yengs pa
