med par sgom pa ni// me long ye shes 'jug pa'i lam// che chung 'pho 'gyur mtho dman med// brjod bya'i tshig rnams kun dang bral// bla ma nyid kyis ngo sprad nas// rig pa tshad phebs srang la
tshud// phyogs lhung med par bsgom pa ni// mnyam nyid ye shes 'jug pa'i lam// ngo bo mnyam nyid de nyid la// gsal ba ma 'gags so sor snang// gang shar 'dzin med bsgom pa ni// sor rtog ye shes 'jug

pa'i lam// da ltar 'char tshul ngo shes pa// dka' thub tshad med mi dgos te// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa ste// bya grub ye shes 'jug pa'i lam// bsgom bya sgom byed nyid dang bral// thams cad rang grol

lhun grub rtsal// ma bsgoms 'khor 'das rang srog chod// chos dbyings ye shes 'jug lam mo// de ni lam dang sbyar ba'o// 'bras bu ltar du bshad pa na// de ltar 'byung lnga'i dwangs ma de// ye shes rig pa

zhes kyang bya// phyi ltar 'byung lnga nang phung po// gsang ba dwangs ma lnga ru snang// yang gsang ltar na yi ge lnga// bla med ltar na mkha' 'gro lnga// du ma sna tshogs phye gyur kyang// rig pa'i ye shes nyid la
rdzogs// thams cad ye shes rang yin pas// rang byung ye shes rig pa'o/ khams gsum sems can thams cad la// snying po ye shes gsum phye na// rig pa rtog med chos kyi sku// rig pa 'gag med longs sku

ste// cir snang sprul pa'i sku yang yin// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad kun// lus sems gnyis la tshang ba'o// sku gsum ye shes gsum dang ldan/ khyad par rin chen zur brgyad kyi// sku dang ye shes 'od

dang gsum// sku ni mi 'gyur mi g.yo ba// zhi ba'i sku ni nyung 'bru tsam// mtshan dpe'i tshad ni phul thag tsam// sna tshogs gcer grol nyid du ste// thabs shes gnyis med yab yum tshul// yab kyi cha 'dzin sems

dpa' brgyad// yum gyi cha 'dzin sems ma brgyad// sgo ba yab yum thub pa drug/ kun bzang rigs lnga yab yum bcu// bzhi bcu zhe gnyis bum sku'i tshul// lnga ldan tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// de rtsal klad

pa dung khang dang/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// b+hud+d+ha he ru smug nag pa// dbu gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// rang gi klad pa'i dkyil na bzhugs// badzra he ru mthing nag pa// dbu gsum phyag drug

yum dang 'khril// rang gi klad pa'i shar na bzhugs// rat+na he ru ser nag pa// dbu gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// rang gi klad pa'i lho na bzhugs// nub na pad+ma he ru ka/ dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug

pa// yum dang gnyis med 'khril nas bzhugs// byang na karma he ru ljang// zhal gsum phyag drug yum dang 'khril// kun kyang phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin// gsal 'tsher gcer grol nyid du bzhugs// shar na

kau rI dkar mo ste// lho na tsau rI ser mo dang// nub na pra mo dmar mo dang// byang na be tA nag mo dang// shar lho puk+ka dmar ser dang// lho nub g+has ma ljang nag dang// nub byang tsan+d+ha ser skya

dang// byang shar sma sha mthing nag pa/ khrag 'thung yab yum bcu la bskor// klad nang mngon sum nyid du bzhugs// de yi phyi rol 'khor rtsibs la// shar na sid+ha smug nag dang// lho na byA g+h+ri stag mgo

dmar// nub na sr-i la wa mgo nag/ byang na shwa na spyang mgo mthing// shar lhor gr-i D+ha rgod mgo dang// lho nub kang ka dmar nag pa// nub byang kha khwa bya mgo nag/ byang shar hu lu 'ug mgo mthing// yul gyi phra
men brgyad po des/ khrag 'thung rnams la bskor nas bzhugs// shar sgor rta mgo lcags kyu dkar// lho sgor phag mgo zhags pa ser// nub na seng mgo lcags sgrog dmar// byang sgor sbrul mgo dril bu

ljang// de ltar klad pa'i dkyil na gnas// drag po'i lha tshogs sum cu bzhugs// phyi rol dbang phyug nyer brgyad ni// byang shar nas bzung 'di bzhin no// srin mo smug nag g.yag mgo dang// tshangs pa sbrul
mgo ser mo dang// lha chen dkar ljang gzig mgo dang// rtog 'dod sre mgo sngon mo dang// dga' ba ser mo pha wang mgo/ gzhon nu dred mgo dmar mo dang// brgya byin dom mgo dkar mo dang// zhi ba dmar
mo chu srin mgo/ bdud rtsi dmar mo sdig pa'i mgo/ zla ba dmar mo khra yi mgo/ be con wa mgo ljang nag dang// srin mo stag mgo dmar mo dang// za ba ljang nag bya rgod mgo/ dga' ba dmar mo rta yi

mgo/ stobs chen dmar mo khyung gi mgo/ srin mo khyi mgo ser mo dang// 'dod pa dmar mo pu shud mgo/ nor srung ljang gu sha ba'i mgo/ rlung lha sngon mo spyang mgo dang// mi mo dmar mo skyin gyi mgo/ phag mo

nag mo phag gi mgo/ rdo rje dmar mo khwa yi mgo/ sna chen ljang nag glang chen mgo/ chu lha sngon mo sbrul gyi mgo/ sgo ma bzhi ni 'di lta ste// rdo rje dkar mo khu byug shar// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo lho// rdo rje dmar mo

seng mgo nub// rdo rje ljang nag sbrul mgo byang// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// he ru drag po'i lha tshogs las// rang byung sku yi rtsal du shar// sku ni nyung 'bru tsam pa la// mkhyen dpyod ma 'gags thugs

rje'i spyan// phul thag tsam gzigs phyi nang med// zang thal gcer grol chen por bzhugs// rgyu rkyen las 'das ye shes ni// dwangs ma lnga yi rang bzhin te// ye shes ngo bor zang thal le// rtog med ye shes

khyab che'o// 'od kyi mtshan nyid dngos po bral// 'byung lnga'i dngas ma kha dog lnga// ma 'dres rang gsal nyid du ste// sku la ye shes 'od du byung// rig pa'i sku ni bum sku 'dra// ye shes bum nang mar me 'dra// 'od
zer mar me'i 'od dang 'dra// gnas tshul 'od kyi gong bur bzhugs// sku dang ye shes 'od dang gsum// gsum brtsegs tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rang rig ye shes ngo sprad na// sna tshogs snang ba

rnam snang ste// rig sku mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// dgos 'dod 'byung bas rin chen 'byung// thugs rjes kun snang snang mtha' yas// shes bya rang grub don yod grub// rig pa gsal stong de bzhin bya// mi 'gyur
ston pa rdo rje'i rigs// yon tan kun tshang rin chen rigs// 'khor skyon ma gos pad+ma'i rigs// rang rtsal shugs ldan las kyi rigs// spros pa'i mtha' 'bral dbyings ye shes// snang ba kun gsal me long

ste// ma 'dres kun mnyam mnyam pa nyid// snang stong thabs shes so sor shar// sor rtog ye shes rang ngo shes// chos rnams 'bad med rtsol ba bral// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// rang rig 'od lngar lhun grub

bo// yul lnga dag dang sbyar ba na// snang bzhi ma grub gsal ma 'gags// ye shes snang stong gzugs kyi yul// sgra rnams ma 'gags rna bas thos// thos pa'i mtshan nyid grag stong dang// sgra grag rang stong rna ba'i

yul// sna yi yul du dri sna tshogs// gang ltar snang ba rang bzhin stong// drir 'dzin stong pa sna yi yul// lce yi yul du ro sna tshogs// gang ltar bro yang bzung yul stong// ro snang stong pa lce yi yul// lus la reg

bya gang snang yang// 'dzin byed shes pa rang bzhin stong// sems la bde sdug gang shar yang// rang shar rang grol nyid du ste// shar grol dus mnyam yid kyi yul// bde sdug thams cad dran stong yul// thams

cad phyi nang gcer graul yul// 'byung ba lnga dang sbyar ba na// cir yang ma grub nam mkha' 'dra// gsal ba sems kyi sna tshogs g.yo// rang rtsal rdzogs pa'i rlung dang 'dra// ye shes 'char bas me dang 'dra// yon

tan skye bas chu dang 'dra// ngo bo brtan pas sa dang 'dra// rang rig ye shes zang thal 'di// rlung lnga dag dang sbyar ba na// drod dang ye shes gnyis med pa// me dang mnyam pa'i rlung yang yin// 'khor 'das srog
'dzin rig pa 'di// srog 'dzin sa yi rlung zhes bya// 'byung ba'i dwangs snyigs rig pas 'byed// dwangs snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung yang yin// 'khor 'das kun la rig pas khyab// kun la khyab pa'i rlung yang

yin// rig pas 'khor ba'i srog bcad nas// myang 'das sa ru skyel bas na// snying rje med pa'i las rlung ngo// dwangs ma lnga dang sbyar ba na// stong gsal ngang gnas nam mkha'i dwangs// rig rtsal 'gyu ba rlung gi

dwangs// rang bzhin bag dro me yi dwangs// nyon mongs dri dag chu yi dwangs// rig mdangs kha dog lnga dang ldan// 'byung ba sa yi dwangs ma yin// gsang ba thig le'i yig 'bru rnams// mkha' 'gro yab yum ngo

sprad na// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas khang// rtse mo rnam par bkod pa na// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu yi// lte ba rtsa mdud dbus dag na// 'byung ba chu yi dwangs ma mchog/ pha ma'i rgyu grub thig le

dkar// ye shes rang 'od lnga dang ldan// yi ge ha dang ra ru gnas// de yang lhun grub bum pa'i sku// dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod khrag/ rdo rje dpa' bo ra yi tshul// dkar

gsal 'khril sbyor ldan par gnas// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu la// thig le yig 'bru ha ra las// rdo rje DA ki yab yum ni// phyag mtshan kha dog gtso mo 'dra// sum brgya drug cu 'od skur gnas// mgrin pa ro

'dus 'khor lo na// rtsa 'dab bcu drug rtsa bdun na// 'byung ba sa yi dwangs ma mchog/ pha ma'i khu khrag las grub pa// thig le yi ge ri dang tsa// ye shes kha dog lnga ldan de// rang bzhin rat+na DA ki dngos// yab
yum phyag g.yas rin chen la// g.yon pa thod pa zhabs brkyang bskum// ser gsal rin chen gdan la bzhugs// rtsa 'dab bcu drug ri dang tsa// gtso bo yab yum 'dra bar gnas// snying ga dran pa rnam bkod

na// rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis te// lte ba'i rin chen zur brgyad na// pha ma'i thig le ye shes mdog/ mthing ga ye shes rang 'od lnga// ma dang hU~M gi tshul du gnas// rang bzhin bum sku zhal phyag tshul// kun

bzang yab yum 'khril sbyor bzhugs// rus rgyan zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum ste// rtsa 'dab sum cu so gnyis la// ma hUM thig le yig 'brus brgyan// gtso mo 'dra bas gang bar gnas// lte ba skyed byed drug cu

bzhi/ rtsa mdud dbus kyi lte ba la// 'byung gzhi'i dwangs ma pha ma'i rgyu/ kha dog lnga ldan thig le dmar// yi ge hri ni 'od kyi sku// pad+ma DA ki 'khril sbyor can// brkyang bskum pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// rtsa mdud

drug cu rtsa bzhi la// thig le hri ni 'od kyi sku// gtso mo 'dra bas gang bar gnas// gsang gnas bde ba myong byed na// rtsa 'dab nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi// lte ba'i rtsa mdud dbus nyid na// pha ma'i khu khrag thig le

ljang// ye shes rang mdangs lnga ldan pa// sa yi yi ge 'od kyi sku// las kyi DA ki yab yum ljang// ral gri thod pa g.yas g.yon bsnams// rgya gram gdan la 'khril sbyor bzhugs// rtsa 'dab nyer brgyad thig le

ni// sa yi rnam pa gtso mo 'dra// thams cad gang bar gnas pa'o// bzhi brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis la// DA ki zhal sbyor bsam mi khyab// grangs las 'das pa'i rtsa nang na// thig le yi ge brgyad tshul la// DA ki
yab yum brjod med gnas// kun gyi ngo sprod zhib rgyas rnams// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// sems dpa' rtsal gyis ma 'ongs ston// ces gsungs nas/ rdzogs rim thig le nyag gcig klong du lhan ner
bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ sku dang ye shes zhal phyag rdzogs par rang lus dkyil 'khor ye rdzogs su bzhugs tshul ngo sprod bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye lhun grub ma bcos kun tu bzang// ye grol 'gag med thugs rje'i
bdag/ dag pa ye shes bzhugs tshul rnams// legs par ston pas gsungs na yang// ma dag nyon mongs gnas tshul rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor lo bka' stsol cig/ de skad bskul ba ston pas gsan// kye

ho sems dpa'i rdo rje nyon// ma dag nyon mongs zhes pa 'di// rlung chen glo ba'i grong khyer na// ma rig pa dang sems dang yid// rnam pa gsum du gnas pa ste// ma rig pa zhes 'thom pa des// rang rig gshis

la sgrib par byed// sems kyis ye shes nyid la sgrib// yid kyis rig snang ngo la sgrib// de las nyon mongs bag chags dang// kun gzhi nyid dang 'dzin rtog byung// gzung 'dzin lam sgo lnga ru byung// nyon mongs
sdug bsngal lnga la spyod// gcig la mthong snang brjod 'das byung// gnas lugs rang rtogs ma shes pas// gti mug mun pa lta bur 'thibs// ma grub cha la med bzhin du// sems can rang chas zhe sdang

byung// rang gzhan sgrib med nga rgyal te// brag ri lta bur shin tu mtho// bde ba'i don sgrib 'dod chags rgyas// rang kha me lce bzhin du 'bar// gzhan la phrag dog 'gran sems skyes// de la brten nas nyon

mongs ni// brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong byung// bag chags 'thug po'i sbubs su 'thums// sngar zhen bag chags rmi lam 'dra// phyis 'byung bag chags rgyu 'bras 'dra// da lta'i bag chags gar sbyin 'dra// las
rnams thams cad mtshams sbyor zhing// 'go ba bla ste 'gog par dka'// phung khams 'di la brten byas nas// nyon mongs du ma'i rten gnas byed// sgo lnga'i lam dod snang yul bzung/ khams gsum 'khor
bar 'khor zhing 'khyams// gzung 'dzin thag pas dam du bsdams// the tshom dbang gis rgyu 'bras log/ gangs dkar nag por mthong dang mtshungs// zhes gsungs nas/ 'khrul yul gnyis med rig stong
chen por lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ ma dag nyon mongs kyi gnas tshul bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems
dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye/ kun khyab dgongs gsal kun tu bzang// rang shar 'dzin grol lhun grub la// gnas lugs de ltar yin pa na// ye shes gting gsal chen po de// lam mchog gang la zhugs pa
yin// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas gsan nas lan gsungs pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// snying nang gnas pa'i ye shes dai// spyi lam rtsa bzhi yin pa ste/ khyad par ka

ti shel bug can// rtsa ni dar dkar skud dang 'dra/ khrag dang chu ser de la med// snying gi rtse nas mar zug nas// sga 'dab g.yas nas yar gyes te// rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon gnyis nas yar// sna 'dab g.yas

gnyis nas klad par zug/ klad rgya'i nang nas mig la 'brel// rtsa sna rgyal mo gnyis la zug/ rgyal mo rgyang zhags chu sgron no// dar dkar skud pa lta bu ste// snying nang ye shes lam zhugs 'char// ye shes de yi

rang 'od ni// tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo la thon// gnyis kyi cha 'dzin snang ba ston// kun la yod pa'i ye shes de// me long dkyil 'khor dwangs pa la// gang bstan rkyen de 'ong ba bzhin// rnam dag stong pa'i nam mkha'

la// don gyi snying po tshom bu lnga// ma bskyed ye rdzogs gnad kyang snod kyis gsal// snang bar nus pa 'gyu byed rlung// ro rkyang gnyis po rlung gi lam// kun 'dar ma ni byang chub lam// shel bug can gyi sgron
ma'i lam// 'od dang zer du rab snang ste// dper na nya yi mig gis ni// gser gyi brag rgyud cha phra ba// bzo bo mkhas pas legs brgyus ltar// mu tig 'phreng ltar yul la thon// de ni dag pa'i ye shes
lam// bdag gis yang dag bstan pa'o// ma dag 'khor ba'i rtsa lam ni// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can la// nyon mongs ma rig shas che ste// brten ni gzugs phung lus la brten// glo snying gnyis kyi bar

shed na// srog rtsa dmar po bya ba ni// sog sbug tsam pa gcig gi nang// rig pa ma yin gzhi yis khyab// sems zhes bya ba chags sdang can// yid ces bya ba rtog pa can// gsum du 'dus pa'i ma rig pa// dug

lnga dug gsum bcas pa rgyu// rtsa de sgal tshigs g.yon pa nas// rtse'u chung g.yas g.yon dag nas rgyu// dbugs zhes rlung gi rta la zhon// sgo ni kha dang sna ru rgyu// de las nyes pa sna tshogs 'char// nyon mongs

'khor ba'i rmang rdo byed// rtags ni mtshan mo glau sprid dus// 'od zer dmar po 'phro ba 'dra// ma dag lam gyi 'jug sgor bshad// ces gsungs nas/ rang shar rang grol gyi ngang du bcos med lhug par lhan ner
bzhugs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ lam gang la rgyu ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya
sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye dang po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang// yin lugs 'gag med thugs rje can// lam gyi rgyu tshul gsungs na yang// ye shes 'char ba'i sgo gang lags// ston pa nyid
kyis bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pas gsan dgongs te// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// ye shes 'char ba'i sgo nyid ni// lus bcud dwangs ma kun 'dus pa'i// tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo la

gsal// 'khor dang myang 'das snang ba ston// dar skud ba man rwa 'dra kha/ rtsa ba 'phra la kha phye ba// a 'bras dkyil du zug pa des// nam mkha' dwangs pa'i dbyings su blta// ye shes snang ba lhug par

'char// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma dang// dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma dang// shes rab rang byung sgron nyid dang// rgyang zhags chu+u yi sgron ma rnams// 'dis ni mngon sum mthong ba ste// da lta gtan la dbab tu

rung// yid dpyod mun yugs tshig dang bral// mig gnyis rgyang zhags chu sgron yin// gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid du sdud// don rnams snang ste rig par byed// shes rab rang byung sgron ma nyid// theg pa kun gyi the

tshom gcod// rang snang 'dzin de chos rnams sdud// bag chags 'brel rgyun 'di yis gcod// dbyings kyi dwangs ma 'di yis sdud// chos nyid mngon sum snang ba mthong// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma nyid// 'khor
'das bsre ba'i mtshams sbyor byed// tsak+Shu la brten 'ja' 'od 'char// rlung gis bkrags mdangs gzi mdangs bskyed// bsgyur cing ye shes snang ba ston// 'dis ni las kun byed pa'o// dag pa dbyings kyi

sgron ma yis// rnal 'byor nyams kyi sa bon 'debs// 'od snang zhing khams nyid du 'char// sgron ma'i mtshan rtags med bshad kyang// mngon sum mthong ba 'di nyid do// snang ba kun gyi 'char byed sgo// rkyen

gyis ma bsgribs rgyal mo che// mig gi dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas// nyi ma'am ni shel mdangs ltar// rang 'od rang chas nyid du 'char// chos kyi mtshan nyid ye shes lnga/ kha dog ma 'dres mtshan nyid ldan// sku dang

ye shes snang ba ni// rang bzhin snang ba ma 'gags shar// rig pa'i rang sku lha khang 'dra// sgron ma bzhi ni mthongs kha 'dra// rang rig ye shes mar me 'dra// sgron ma bzhi ni 'od zer 'dra// bzhi yang

gnyis 'dus gnyis kyang dbyings// rgyang zhags sgo phye gzugs rnams 'dzin// shes rab rtsal gyis don kun khrims// thig les dbyings dang gnyis med 'dres// 'od snang goms pas rim gyis 'char// tsak+Shu ye shes 'char
ba'i sgo// 'di las gzhan zhig yod ma yin// ces gsungs nas/ gsal la ma 'gags rkyen gyis ma bsgribs gting gsal du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud
las// ye shes 'char ba'i sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa/ kye/ bya btsal bral ba'i kun tu bzang// brdal ba chen
po dbyings rig dpal// sgo la shar ba'i ye shes de// yul ni gang du snang ba lags// de skad ston pas gsan dgongs nas// 'dzum pa'i mdangs phyung lan 'di gsungs// a ho sems dpa' rdo
rje rtsal// yul ni ye shes sgron ma de// stong nyid dbyings kyi nam mkha' la// rig mdangs 'od phung nam mkha'i khams// kun khyab bag chags dbugs la brten// ye shes rig pa dbyings la sbyor// bdag
rkyen gzhan rkyen 'byung ba'i rkyen// gsum bral dus gsum lhug par 'char/ khyad par nam mkha' gsal dwangs la// dbyar ma ston dang dgun chung dpyid// rlung dang bsir bu khu rlangs med// 'dzin pa med

pa'i bar snang la// ye shes lnga yi rang mdangs 'char// zhe 'dod med pa'i sgron ma ni// dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma la// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma shar// gnyis med gcig gi rang mdangs las// thig le sku
dang ye shes nyid// 'khrul snang dag pa'i zhing khams ni// ngo bo rang bzhin gnyis med pa// stong gsal 'gag pa med pa ru// rdzogs ldan chos sku'i snang ba mthong// sgrib byed bral ba'i mkhar

bltas pas// dbyings kyi nang du lu gu rgyud// rnam par bzhugs shing mi 'dral 'char// lnga ldan 'od kyi mu khyud mdzes// yul bral sgyu ma gzugs kyi sku// rig stong gsal ba chos longs sprul// 'pho 'gyur

med par lhang nger 'char// rang rig rang gsal ngo mtshar che// 'diltar su yis mthong ba'i mi// thog ma'i kun tu bzang po dang// skal pa dag ni mnyam pa'o// lta ba rang byung ye shes ltos// bya btsal bral ba

ngo mtshar che// lta ba'i mtshon ma rang sar grol// sgom pa dbyings rig rang ngo bzung// rdo rje lug rgyud ngo mtshar che// snang ba gsal la ngos gzung med// spyod pa sgron ma gnyis ldan spyod// spang blang bral ba

ngo mtshar che// gcer bu zang thal dgag sgrub bral// 'bras bu sku gsum rang ngor rdzogs// yid dpyod ka dag ngo mtshar che// chos zad dang po'i sangs rgyas so// phyi dbyings nam mkha' stong pa la// nang
dbyings rig pa ye shes shar// gnyis med snang ba'i gzhi ma ste// sgron ma bzhi ni lam du 'dod// snying po'am ni 'bras bu ste// dngos med mthing gi mthong la ltos// dbyings rig 'du 'bral med pa yi//
rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// tsak+Shu rgyal mo'i sgo la thon// rig stong mngon sum bden pa de// rkyen bral klong du lhun grub 'char// 'khor 'das sus kyang byas med pa'i// gsal dag
'gyur med rang dbyings la// phyi nang med pa ngo mtshar che// gsal stong rgya cher ngos gzung med// skye 'gag med pa'i so ma nyid// rig pa dbyings la lhug par gdal// gcer mthong rang gsal ngo mtshar
che// ye stong kun gyi 'byung gnas la// rig pa ka dag 'od zer 'bar// kun la yod pa'i 'od po che// dkyil 'khor sUr+ya dwangs pa la// rang mdangs 'od zer shar ba ltar// rnam dag stong pa'i

nam mkha' la// don gyi snying po ma 'dres pa// goms pa'i stobs kyis rim gyis ni// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma skyes rdzaugs pa'i tshul du gsal// 'od phung nam mkha'i mtha' dang mtshungs// bag

chags gzugs la rab brten nas// thig le stong pa'i ye shes ni// dag pa dbyings kyi ngang la sbyor// rang snang ye shes 'od po che// sgron ma stong pa kun gyi gzhi// yul snang thams cad rnam par dag/ 'di ni

yid dpyod ma yin par// mngon sum rang thog phebs pa'o// ci phyir mngon sum zhes pa de// sgo dang yul dang rig pa gsum// 'du 'bral med par snang ba'o// chos nyid mngon sum snang ba 'di// mthong ba tsam

gyis shes pa dang// shes pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang// rtogs pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// grol ba tsam gyis phyir mi zlog/ ces gsungs nas/ sus kyang ma byas mngon sum gyi snang ba rang grol du lhan ner
bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ yul 'char sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa'

rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// kye ho/ kun byed rgyal po kun tu bzang// ma nor don ston chos kyi dbyings// 'di ltar 'khor 'das chos rnams la// theg pa'i dbye ba du tsam yod// ston pas 'khor
la bshad du gsol// ces pa ston pas gsan nas ni// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// kye ho rdo rje sems dpa' rtsal// sa lam chig chod kun bzang ngas// ye shes rnam gsum bstan pa dang// gdul bya
ma dag drang ba'i phy-ir// ston pa rnam pa gsum du byung// gnas kyang rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dul zhing rnam pa gsum du bshad// 'khor yang rnam pa gsum yin te// bstan pa dag kyang rnam pa gsum// bco

lnga'i tshul du gnas pa yin// chos sku'i ston pa rig stong dang// chos sku'i gnas ni 'og min nyid// chos sku'i 'dul zhing nam mkha'i khams// chos sku'i 'khor ni rig pa'i mdangs// chos sku'i bstan pa rnam pa

bzhi// ma hA a nu a ti dang/ a ti chen po rnam bzhi'o// longs sku'i ston pa gangs chen mtsho// longs sku'i gnas ni khang bu brtsegs// longs sku'i 'dul zhing snang ba rnams// 'dod pa'i longs spyod khyab
tshad yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor ni 'di lta ste// mos spyod bzhi yi sa las rab 'das nas// dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa gnon te// sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas rnams yin// 'dul zhing snang ba
gsal bas khyab tshad de// bstan pa kr-i ya u pa yo ga'o// sprul sku'i gnas ni nges med bya rgod ri// ston pa rabs bdun shAka thub la sogs pa// 'dul zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam gling

ste// 'khor ni lha mi mu stegs bstan gso rnams// dbang po sems gyur thugs rje'i byin rlabs nas// dge slong pho mo dge bsnyen pho mo bzhi/ ma nges sna tshogs sprul sku'i 'khor yin te// bstan pa nyan thos rang
rgyal byang sems gsum// sku gsum ston gnas 'khor bstan bshad pa yin// ma rig lus can 'khrul pa'i sems can la// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas pa yin// gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong chos
kyang bshad// chos sgo bsam 'das de snyed kyang// sde snod gsum gyis 'dul ba yin// 'dod chags gnyen por 'dul ba dang// gti mug gnyen por mdo sde dang// zhe sdang gnyen por mngon pa rnams// kun

kyang nyi khri chig stong ste// dug gsum cha snyoms sde snod gsum// cha snyoms nyi khri chig stong gsungs// 'dul ba'i snang ngo tha dad pas// yod ni gcig las med pa la// byung ni theg pa dgu ru byung// mthong ni snang
ba dgu ru mthong// de yis gang byas las 'bras kun// rdzogs chen nga yi so nam yin// theg brgyad dman pa so so yi// grub mthas phyogs tsam ma gtogs pa// nga nyid rdzogs par ga la mthong// dper na
dmus long glang bltas 'dra// yin ni chos nyid nga yin te// byung ni theg pa so sor byung// 'dus ni skye 'gag med par 'dus// bsgribs nas sdom pa dam tshig bsrung// gnang bkag gcig la mi tshe

zad// dmyal khams bco brgyad de la tshang// rdzogs chen gang zhig rgyu 'bras lci// mu stegs chad pa logs na med// spros la dga' ba'i gang zag la// spros pa can gyi chos kyis 'dul// nyan thos rang rgyal byang
sems gsum// gang zag dbang po dman la bshad// kr-i ya u pa yo ga gsum// gang zag dbang po 'bring la bshad// ma hA a nu a ti gsum// gang zag dbang po rab la bshad// gang zag yang rab thod

rgal la// a ti yang rab thod rgal bstan// de kun blo yi rim par sbyar// nges par yang dag chig chod la// sa lam snying po rtsol sgrub rnams// spang blang dbye ba med par gdal// sems kyis byas pa'i theg pa
dgu// nyams len yod med kha bzung nas// theg dman kun gyis 'di mi go/ dper na rgya kham mig dag tu// ras yug btsud bzhin brgyal zhing sngangs// rdzogs chen dgu ka nyams su len// dam tshig bsrung

med rtogs gyur kyang// chos spyod bcu yi chon thag 'then// mdo rgyud bka' yi phul thag khrol// man ngag lung gi lam du khyair// slob pa gsum gyi srog shing 'dzugs// ma yengs mi zhen rtogs pa'i rgyan// mu
stegs pa'ang khyad mi gsod// sangs rgyas kun kyang phud mi bkur// rang bzhin ston pa gsum gyi chos// rgyud lung mtho dman sngags mtshan nyid// mi 'gal sdom tshig srog phyir bsrung// ma zhen

ma bcings ma spangs khyer// chos nyid chen po'i skyo grogs yin// theg brgyad rang rang phyogs la zhen// yun ring bskal pa bye ba khrir// ka dag chos nyid nga mi mthong// slar yang lus ngag yid gud nas// ngan

'gror nyen yang cung zad che// tshogs thob gnas skabs bde ba tsam/ kha lta can gyi tshig skam res// theg pa brgyad la skur btab pas/ khri phrag bskal pa bye ba ru// dmyal ba'i gnas su skyes nas kyang// dbang

po mi tshang sdug bsngal 'byung// lce la rmos dor dgu brgya btsugs// lus la mtshon gyi char pa 'bebs// des na theg pa khyad mi gsod/ kha lta smad la don lta bstod// nyan thos ting 'dzin rgyud la bsgom// de

yis gong 'og zab mi zab// chos kyi ro zhes bogs yang che// de bzhin dgu ka rgyud la 'gal// ma spangs klong yangs nga yi ngang// rim pa dgu dang brgya khri stong// 'byed pa'i phyogs can nga mi rtogs// 'ching

ba'i sa lam bgrod 'dod pa// tshe gcig sangs rgyas dais mi thob// a nu man chod lam chod kyang// sa mdo rnam pa gsum spyod de// bskyed pa'i sa dang spyod pa'i sa// sgrub pa'i sa dang gsum du bstan// skyed

pa'i sa ru sems bzhi bskyed// spyod pa'i sa ru sems spyod bcu// sgrub pa'i sa ru sgrub 'dod pa// gzhan snang tsam du bstan pa las// rang snang dag pa ngas ma bstan// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong// rdzogs

chen rgyu 'bras las 'jog tsam// don la spyod spong byas ma byas/ khyad par nyi rdul tsam yang med// dge tshul nyis brgya lnga bcu dang// dge slong lnga brgya lnga bcu sogs// bsrung dus grangs dang don mi shes// sdom

pa mi thub bsrung thabs med// rtog pa'i steng du yang rtogs bsnan// 'khrul pa'i steng du yang 'khrul bsnan// zhags thag steng du 'breng zhags bsdam// rdzogs chen bsrung bya kun las 'das// ma nor klong chen

bsrung bya bral// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor lam dang// mthong sgom lam dang mthar phyin lam// nges par rdzogs chen lam las grol// bsod nams 'bras bu thob pa med// drang ba'i lha la brten pa tsam// lam

la theg brgyad mi 'bor te// rang la chos sku tshol mi byed// rgyu 'bras ngang nas rtsol sgrub med// 'di ltar ston pa nga nyid kyis// 'dul zhing bstan pa rnam pa gsum// tshig dang brda yi chos rnams kun// dbyer

med ma rig dag tu 'khrul// nga la so sor bcos pas 'khrul// nga yi rang sems the tshom 'khrul// chos nyid re ba che byed dang// 'khor bar dogs pa che ba dang// sangs rgyas gzhan nas re ba 'khrul// dgu ru
mthong zhing rang ma shes// sbrang ma tshang 'tshol lta bur 'khrul// rtsol ba bya byed 'ching ba yis// glang chen 'dam bying lta bur 'khrul// 'bad pa re ba'i stobs kyis 'khrul// nad la sman log song

bzhin 'khrul// de ma yin la der bzung bas// smig sgyu chu ru mthong bzhin 'khrul// med par yod pa'i blo skyes pa// grogs po thag ring shi bzhin 'khrul// rtsol bsgrubs log par song ba ni// bu chung spu gri rtse

bzhin 'khrul// rang byung ye shes mtshan nyid med// bzang ngan phyogs char blta na 'khrul// bdag ma yin la bdag tu 'dzin// sems 'dzin lta sgom yod na 'khrul// 'od la gzhal yas khang mthong ba// phye ma

lheb dang mar me bzhin// dngos grub re stobs bslus pa yis// spre'u khron par tshud pa bzhin// rang byung ye shes bdag med la// gang zag dbang pos bdag tu bzung// snang ngor gang 'thad de bstan pas// de

kun nga yi thugs rjer 'khrul// klong chen don gyis go bar gyis// rgyas po chen po bsam yas kyang// dgu ru nges par dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs so// theg pa spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las// rnam
grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// a ho/ kun rdzogs chen po kun tu bzang/ khyab gdal chen po 'ub chub
dpal// dbye ba zur tsam gsungs na yang// dang po lha mi lta log gi/ grub mtha' gang yin rdzogs tshul gang// ma spangs rgyan tshul gang ltar lags// ston pas rig mdangs 'khor la gsungs// de skad
gsol pa ston pas gsan// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams gson// nga yi theg pa rim dgu yang// bshad lugs 'khor dang myang 'das so// 'khor ba nyid la grub mtha' ni// blo yis bsgyur dang ma bsgyur

ro// ma bsgyur ba la rnam pa gnyis// phyal ba nyid dang rgyang 'phen no// rgyu 'bras ngo ma shes pa de// phyal ba nyid du bzhag pa yin// ngo shes phyi ma rgyang du bzhag/ tshe 'di'i bzo sman phan pa sgrub// rgyang 'phen pa

zhes bshad pa yin// blos bsgyur lam log ma log yin// log pa mu stegs mur thug gnyis// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba'o// ngo bo logs pa'i shes rab kyis// phyin ci log la zhen pa'o// nges tshig lta ba ngan la
mu// spyod pa ngan la stegs pa'o// dbye ba sum brgya drug cu dang// 'jig tshogs ri bo drug cu dang// grangs can dag dang nyer lnga dang// phyi yi bdag 'dzin nyi shu dang// bye brag bdag 'dzin bcu dag

dang// tir thi ke drug sgyur lta bzhi// bsdu na rtag chad gnyis su 'du// bgrang tshul dus gcig phung ba'o// grub mtha' chad pa 'di lta ste// rgyu chad 'bras chad nam mkha' 'dra// thams cad phyal ba nyid du
'dod// rtag pa sems nyid thig le'i tshul// dkar dwangs snum 'dril snying nang na// ye nas mi 'gyur yod par blta// 'bras bu dbang phyug 'khor du skye// de lta 'dod gzhung so sor yod// e ma
sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// grub mtha' thams cad gang zag blo// dngos po'i gshis la de ma nye// sgrib pas gol bas sdug btsir kyang// shes rab mi ldan phung bar nges// ma rig ma rtogs log lam mo// phyi
nang rtag chad yin min rnams// mi 'gal dbyings kyi ngang du lhung// rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i bdag nyid grub// der zhen rtog pa mi mnga' bas// sems nyid blang dor der 'dzin med// mu stegs chad pa rdzogs

chen rgyan// ma spangs klong grol ngang na bde// mi skye 'gag med sna tshogs 'char// sum brgya drug cu rdzogs chen rgyan// klong chen ma spangs rang grol dang// bdag gzhan gnyis snang 'khor ba dang// rigs drug
mu stegs rtag chad rnams// rgyu gcig nga yi klong na 'phyo// kun gyi bdag nyid rdzogs chen rgyan// ma spangs ye grol phyam brdal dang// klong na gsal bas gdags gzhi med// gzhi la mi gnas rang shes
bde// mu stegs bdud chen lta ba de// gang zag nyid kyis log par brtag/ dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs dang// rtag chad gnyis su nga mi gnas// mtha' bzhi mu bzhi rang grol dang// ma spangs ye grol
klong na chub// rig pa phyogs med kun 'byams la// rtag chad gnyis zhen phyogs 'dzin bdud// a ho/ a ti chen pa ngas bkrol nas// rtag chad rang shar rang sar grol// mu stegs ma spangs ma bcings

par// rdzogs chen mdzes pa'i rgyan du'o// gcig ma rtogs na mang po dka'// rig pa g.yo ba rgyu rkyen bral// ma skyes skye med chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas ma bcos klong/ khams gsum sku gsum

rang bzhin grol// ma chad ma rtag byed pa med// ma yal ma zhi spros pa med// rig pa ma bsgribs gsal ma yal// mkha' la rang byung snang srid gang// 'bras bu lhun grub sku gsum klong// rtag pa shar grol ma

spangs rgyan// chad pa ma spangs ye stong rgyan// bsgrim lhod med pa'i rig pa bde// ma bcos rnal du kun rdzogs bde// skye 'jig mtha' med bya bral klong chen dang// gser gling lta bu dbye bsal med pa'i

klong// 'ja' tshon lta bu thams cad bkra ba'i klong// phyi nang med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i klong// phyogs ris med pa bu chung lta bu'i klong// rtag chad med pa bar snang lta bu'i klong// 'pho 'gyur med pa ri rgyal lta

bu'i klong/ kha gting med pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i klong// rab 'byams nga yi klong na kun kyang 'phyo// rig pa ngang dwangs mtha' bzhi ma spangs kyang// 'khor 'das rgyu 'bras tha snyad nga yi rol// 'gro ba rigs drug skye
gnas bzhi po yang// chos dbyings ngang du skye zhing ngang du grol// snang ba rgya yan rig pa rang dag bde// mtha' yi mu med go las shugs la chod// g.yang sa med pa'i rig pa gcer bu+u la// rtsol ba
med par sku gsum lhun rdzogs pas// mtshan nyid ma 'gags sna tshogs cir yang shar// dbang pos cer mthong mngon sum chos dbyings grol// ji ltar lta ba log yang nga nyid rang// mu stegs rang grol rdzogs
chen rgyan du che// zhes gsungs te/ chos nyid kyi ngang nas theg dgu 'ub chub ste lhan ner bzhugs so// mu stegs lta log ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems

dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho phyogs ris med pa'i kun bzang klong// snang 'gag bral ba'i yangs pa can// nyan thos dbye ba grub mtha' yang// ma spangs rdzogs tshul gang ltar lags// ston pas lan du

bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rjes rtsal// nyan thos theg pa 'di lta ste// ngo bo nges tshig dbye bsdu'o// ngo bo chos kyi bdag lta yis// rang gi zhi bde sgrub pa'o// nges tshig rang don nyan cing thos// dbye na

bzhi ste nyan thos pa// sprul pa rang rgyud zhi bkrod dang// grub mtha' dag la mthar 'dzin no// bsdu na mdo sde bye brag gnyis// spyi yi 'jug sgo bden pa bzhi// mdo sde pa yi lta ba ni/ kha thon thos bsam sgo

gsum dang// shes rab rnam gsum mthar phyin pas// sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod// bye brag pa yi 'dod gzhung ni// phung po khams dang skye mched la// g.yag rnga ne'u seng tshul du 'dod// rang gi blo yis

bltas gyur na// rdul dang rdul phran bzhin du 'dod// de yi rnam pa cha gzhigs nas// stong pa nyid du blos sgom mo// nyan thos spyi yi sgom pa ni// bden pa bzhi nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'bras bu bzhi nyid 'dod
pa'o// 'gog pa kun 'byung spang bar 'dod// byams pa'i bstan la 'bras bu thob// 'gog pa rgyun du zhugs pa ste// rab tu dga' nas bdun tshun thob// kun 'byung bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu ni// lan cig phyir
mi ldog pa ste// sa brgyad man chad thob pa'o// lam bsgoms sa bcu mthar phyin te// nyan thos gnyis la gtsor byed do// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// nyan thos spang dgag mdo sde kun/ phyogs cha bdag
bzung gcig gis bcings// ye klong nga yi don la bsgribs// lta dgongs ma log klong 'byams nga// de yis gtan la babs pa dka'// nga nyid brtag dka' brjod mtha' bral// dpe dang gtan tshigs tsam

gyis brjod mi nus// brjod med don nyid klong brdal ngang na brdal// nyan thos sde gnyis ma spangs ga la yin// nga yi rol pa tsam du 'gag pa med// phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba yangs pa'i klong// ma 'gags
shar ba'i rang byung ye shes nyid// rgyu dang rkyen bral snang 'gag med pa'i sku// rtogs pa'i klong chen rab 'byams don rtogs na// skad cig ye grol ka dag nga rang nyid// chos can dkar nag spros

pa'i mtshan ma bral// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs nam mkha'i gza' skar bzhin// nyon mongs ma spangs nga y-i klong na 'phyo// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba nga la 'dus// rgyud drug sems can nga yi rang bzhin yin// snang

ba thams cad ma spangs nga yi rgyan// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la// kun kyang spong 'geg bden gnyis spong mi byed// 'jug sgo bden bzhi ma spangs nga yi rgyan// nga yis bstan pa'i sku gsum
bstan pa la// la las spong ba'i yul du mthong// la las dgag dang la las sgrub// la las sbyang dang la las dgag/ la las stong dang la las chad// la las blang dang la las dor// mthong snang re dang lam

stegs re// lam stegs re la grub mtha' re// grub mtha' re la phyogs zhen re// a ti chen po'i klong chen nga// rtsol med bya bral sdug bsngal bral// so ma rang grol ma bcos pa// mthong ba'i rtsol ba zhen

spangs te// thams cad nga yi lam stegs yin// dper na shing sdong rtse mo la// rtsa ba ma grub rang sar rdzogs// gcig la mthong yul dgu ru zhen// klong chen nga la nyan thos rdzogs// dper na rgyal khang rtse mo

la// 'og thog ma grub rang sar rdzogs// nyan thos bden bzhi bye brag pa// ma spangs rang grol a ti'i rgyan// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// 'od zer ma bsgrubs rang sar rdzogs// mun pa ma spangs rang
sar grol// a ti klong chen bde yan la// nyan thos ma bsgrubs rang sar rdzogs// spong 'gegs ma spangs rang sar grol// spyod lam bcos sdom med pa'i klong// snang srid chos skur brdal ba'i klong// dam
tshig bsrung mtshams bral ba'i klong// 'bras bu spang thob re med klaung// dper na nam mkha'i khams nyid du// snod bcud ma bsgrubs rang sar rdzogs// mtha' brgyad ma spangs rang sar grol// a ti brdal

khyab chen po la// nyan thos ma bsgrubs rang bzhin klong// sa bcu ma bsgrubs ye nas non// phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye thob yin// sprul pa'i rdzu 'phrul ye klong yin// rnam rtog skyon yon ga la lta// mi spang kho rang gzhi
med yin// ma 'gags chu rlabs mkha' sprin bzhin// lan tsha chab rom btab pa bzhin// nga la rdzogs shing nga la thim// klong chen nga yis 'gag pa med// nyams len ma 'dres thad dkar gsal// gang byas
yangs par grol ba yin// ji ltar chos sku'i zhing khams kyang// skye med nga yi klong na yangs// rang bzhin dag pa'i zhing khams kyang// rang gsal nga yi klong na yangs// thugs rje sprul
sku'i zhing khams kyang// klong khyab 'gags med klong na yangs// mi gnas rig pa'i klong du 'das// ji ltar sa lam brtsis pa'i chos// rtsol bas sdug bsngal chos min gyi// chos rnams mi zad

yongs rdzogs pa// a ti nga yi sbubs na rdzogs// nyan thos spong 'geg bskal par sbyangs// snying po rig pa thob dus med// cer mthong rang grol nga nyid la// bskal pa'i spang 'geg 'ub chub bo// 'bras bu
ston la rag lus pa'i// nyan thos 'dus byas lta ba ni// ngan pas rang bcings ma grol bar// yul sems se gol gcig tsam kyang// ma bral rtog pa 'gags par 'dod// a ti kun rdzogs brdal yangs
nga// ye nas yul sems gnyis mi 'gag/ yul sems gnyis su nga mi zhen// yul sems gnyis su nga mi gnas// bral bar gyur kyang dbyer mi phyed// phyogs 'dzin mdud pas bcings pa'i nyan thos ni// a
ti klong chen nga yis bkrol bas na// yod med gnyis su mnyam pa'i mnyam nyid la// yul sems gnyis kar ma 'gags rang shar bas// yul sems gnyis kar ma zhen rang grol cing// ji ltar byas kyang rang

shar rang grol klong// a ti chen po ma bsgrubs ye grub ste// nyan thos ma spangs rdzogs chen spyi phud rgyan// ji ltar sbyang bgrod byas kyang rig pa'i klong// ji ltar spong 'geg bcings kyang rang grol

klong// nyan thos rang grol ye rdzogs rgyan du ho// zhes gsungs nas/ sa bcu ye bgrod rang lugs rang rnal gyi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/
nyan thos rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// e ma/ mnyam nyid ro gcig kun tu bzang// ngo mtshar rmad byung spyi dpal
mes// rang rgyal theg pa gsung du gsol// ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// kye ho gzhon nu sems dpa' rtsal// rang rgyal 'jug sgo rten 'brel te// bcu gnyis nyid kyi grub mtha' lta// gang zag bdag tu

med pa la// chos kyi bdag tu yod par blta// tshul khrims nyis brgya lnga bcu srung// sgom ni mi rtog chos nyid sgom// phyi nang rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnams// goms nas mtha' ru phyin pa dang// 'bras bu mthar

phyin tshad du 'dod// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// nga ni klong chen yangs pa ste// zla ba mkha' las ma 'phags par// chu nang kun tu khyab pa ltar// nyan thos rang rgyal khas len gnyis// sdug bsngal kun
'byung 'gog pa lam// rten 'brel bcu gnyis lugs zlog rnams// rang las byung ba'i snang ba la// spong 'gegs spyad pas sdug cing btsir// de yis klong yangs gtan mi phebs// sems dang chos la
dbyer med pas// thams cad rang grol a ti dang// blang dor med pas gtan la phebs// lo ka chos brgyad dbang mi gtong// nyan rang a ti nga yi rgyan// sdom pa dam tshig bsrung
mtshams bral// rten 'brel bcu gnyis nga yi rgyan// mi 'gyur 'gyur med chags med lam// ye nas ma bslad rab 'byams klong// dus gsum ji ltar lhag ge lhag/ ji ltar me yi rang bzhin la// tsha ba

ma bsgrubs rang sar rdzogs// grang ba ma spangs rang sar grol// brdal khyab nga la chig chod de// sa bcu ma bsgrubs ye nas non// nyan thos ma spangs rang sar grol// 'das pa'i klong la rang bzhin med//

ma 'ongs klong chen 'od du gsal// da lta'i klong chen gzhi ma grub// brjaud mtha' mu yis spros dang bral// rang rgyal gang spyad nga yi rgyan// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med mnyam// mnyam pas gong 'og
rim pa med// ye rdzogs thig le chen po yin// slob dpon med par rang rtsal gnas// rang rgyal bdud chen lta ba ni// lta ba rang gis rang nyid bcings// rang bzhin med pa'i yul stong la// shes pa gtad
nas 'dzin char 'dod// bcu gnyis don la 'jug zlog byed// klong chen khyab gdal a ti nga// ye nas rten 'brel bcu gnyis te// ma 'gags ma zhen mi gnas pas// mtha' ma spang bar rang grol lo//
yod par 'dzin la phyogs cha 'dod// a ti yod med mnyam pa la// 'jug zlog rang shar rang grol bas// rang rgyal ma spangs a ti ma bsgrubs pas// spang blang med pa rdzogs chen rgyan du'o// zhes

gsungs nas/ blo'i bzhag thabs ji bzhin pa'i ngang du lhan ner bzhugs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ rang rgyal ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu
dgu pa'o//// yang gcig sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// kye kun gyi spyi gzugs rgyal ba'i gtso// ye nas sangs rgyas bdag nyid dpal//
byang chub sems dpa'i grub mtha' rnams// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ces pa ston pas gsan dgongs te// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni// 'jug sgo

don dam kun rdzob gnyis// sdom pa brgyad cu rtsa lnga srung// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom// lam ni sa lam spyad par 'dod// 'bras bu drod skye bzod pa dang// rtse mo 'jig rten chos mchog go/ sa bcu
rim gyis thob 'dod ste// de ni byang chub sems theg go// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// bskal pa gsum dang grangs med du// rtsol sgrub sbyangs pa'i theg pa de// mi rtsol lhun grub a tir rdzogs// byang
sems 'jug sgo gnyis kyi sdom// a ti mi 'jug klong du grol// ma spangs rgya 'byams ngang na bde// byang sems theg pa a ti'i rgyan// rgyu 'bras drang lung thams cad rdzogs// ma skyes dag pas

sgrib dang bral// bgrod pa'i lam bral gol sa med// ye nas lhun grub sbyang bgrod bral// sdom pa brgyad cu rtsa lnga rdzogs// byang sems bsrung byas dam par sdom// a ti ye bsrungs klong du grol// lta spyod ma
spangs sbubs na bde// mdo sde'i theg pa a ti'i rgyan// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de// don dam kun rdzob gtan tshigs kyi// rang snang 'char sgo chos nyid la// sbyang bgrod rtsol bas gol zhing
bsgribs// gcig la gnyis bzung gtan mi phebs// a ti ye klong khyab gdal nga// stong nyid sgom de ma spangs rdzogs// dmigs gtad sgom des bskal par bsdams// ye klong cer mthong ngang du grol// ma

nor dbyer med ngang na bde// stong sgom ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// lta ba blta ru med pa la// don dam kun rdzob ma spangs rgyan// sgom pa bsgom du med pa la// phyogs 'dzin sgom de ma spangs rgyan// spyod

pa spyad du med pa la// brgyad cu rtsa lnga ma spangs rgyan// 'bras bu thob tu med pa la// chos mchog la sogs a ti'i rgyan// dam tshig bsrung du med pa la// don dam kun rdzob ma spangs rgyan// phrin las btsal du
med pa la// sbyang bgrod gnyis po ma spangs rgyan// sa lam bgrod du med pa la// sa bcu man chad ma spangs rgyan// a ti yin lugs rang shes la// theg dman thams cad ma spangs mdzes// zhes gsungs nas/

'gyur med chen po'i ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse/ klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ sprul sku'i bstan pa gsum ma spangs rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// sa ma ya/
rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye 'gyur med chen po kun tu bzang// mtshan ma yongs grol so ma'i ngang// longs sku'i bstan pa sde gsum gyi// kr-i ya'i dbye ba
bstan du gsol// ston pas bka' stsal sems dpa' nyon// kr-i ya'i theg pa 'di lta ste// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba yod min med pa min// gcig min tha mi dad par 'dod// sgom pa lha drug bdag

bskyed nas// mdun bskyed rje khol tshul du sems// spyod pa gza' skar dus bzang la/ khrus dang gtsang sbra dkar gsum spyod// 'bras bu mi tshe bdun nyid kyis// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'dod// spa?r

ba nya sha sgog btsong dang// chang dang bud med spangs byas nas// ting nge 'dzin la zhen che'o// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// la dgu lung dgu brgal byas kyang// dag pa gtsang sbras nga mi mthong// rang gsal
kun 'byung a ti nga// gzhan du ltos med brdal khyab dang// sangs rgyas pha yul theg pa'i dur// yongs bsrungs dag par nga la rdzogs// mi sdug mi snyan nga yi rol// spangs bsgyur bskyed pas

sbyangs shing bsdams// klong chen nga yi sbubs su grol// spangs pa kun kyang klong na bde// kr-i ya ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// ji ltar skar tshogs sprin rlung rnams// ma spangs rol rtsal nam mkha'i rgyan// ji

ltar theg pa'i grags mang yang// sha chang sgog btsong gtsang sbra rnams// a ti nga yi rol rtsal rgyan// chu bran rgya mtshor 'dus nas ni// chu sna 'di yin dbyer mi phyed// a ti klong chen brdal ba la// theg pa 'di

yin phyogs mi 'byed// blos brtag tha snyad nga la thim// phyogs zhen dmigs 'dzin sdom pa la// ches zad ka dag chen por grol// 'di yin 'di min med pas bde// kri ya ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// kri ya rdo
rje 'dzin 'dod na// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs te// gzung 'dzin bkrus pas dag tu re// a ti chen po'i bdag nyid ni// gzung 'dzin ye dag rang rig dpal// gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i rdzogs chen

yin// ji ltar chu nyid ngo bo la// rlan pa ma grub ldan pa'i klong// skam pa ma grub rang grol ngang// de ltar a ti klong brdal la// kri ya ma bsgrubs rang bzhin klong// gzung 'dzin ma spangs rang grol rgyan// ji

ltar bsgoms kyang klong gi rtsal// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje'i rtsal// kri ya gdos 'dzin brdal ba'i rtsal// ma rig ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// 'char sgo 'khrul rtog nga yi rtsal// snang rig yid sems nga yi

rtsal// 'khrul lugs thams cad klong gi rtsal// gzugs dang yan lag klong gi rtsal// grub mtha' kun dang lta sgom spyod// 'gyu tshad rig tshad rtags tshad dang// dgra gnyen phyogs ris kha dog dang// theg pa
dgu dang bcu gcig sogs// klong yangs ngang nas rtsal du shar// de la zhen na mdud pas bcings// ma bcos rang grol a ti yang// mkha' klong rnam dag chos dbyings su// gzhi rlung rig pa'i ngo

bor thim// rtsal rnams zer gyi klong du thim// stong gsal 'od 'bar klong du thim// zhen pa ma spangs klong du thim// rig pa gang snang shar grol dang// rang bzhin ngo bo'i klong yangs yin// ma rig 'char sgo
'khrul snang tshogs// gang shar thog tu rang bzhin grol// bzang ngan theg pa'i spang len kun// klong gi rang grol yangs pa'i dbyings// skyid sdug gson gshin yin min dang// re dang dogs dang rtag chad

dang// rig tshad dran tshad 'gyu tshad dang// bsam tshad snang tshad shar tshad dang// dug lnga dug gsum bag chags sam/ rnam rtog kun brtags grub mtha' dang// mtshon byed bya btsal dgag sgrub rnams// gang
shar skyes pa'i thog tu grol// stong pa kun 'byung stong pa'i rgyan// thol byung rig pa rig par grol// wal byung dran rtog rig par grol// dper na sbrul gyi mdud pa bzhin// 'ching mkhan grol

mkhan ga la yod// rnga ma'i mdud pa rang grol bzhin// kri ya ma spangs rang grol rgyan// thams cad ka dag klong du grol// stong dang snang ba dbyer mi phyed// mkha' la 'ja' tshon thim pa ltar// snang rig stong

gsal dbyer mi phyed/ kha char mtsho la thim pa 'dra// nyan thos a ti dbyer mi phyed// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa 'dra// rang rgyal byang sems a ti gsum// mar dang mar ni bsnol ba ltar// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs

rje dang// dug gsum sku gsum dbyer mi phyed/ khrag dang chu gnyis bsres pa ltar// ma rig ye shes dbyer mi phyed// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul ga la yod// rtogs dang ma rtogs ga la yod// sangs rgyas sems can

ga la yod// the tshom can gyi grub mtha' kun// a ti chos zad ka dag klong// sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi re rdzogs// 'khrul rmongs theg chung tshig gis bsdams// a ti don gy-i thog tu grol// theg pa'i phyogs

zhen blos btags yin// ma spangs ma 'dres ngang na bde// blos btags tha snyad rol par mdzes// mtshan ma'i spyod pa gzigs mor che// kri ya ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// blo yi yul la nges pa med// blo yul

ma zad sangs mi rgya// a ti ma rtogs gang zag la// yA na brgyad kyi lta sgom rnams// drang ba'i don du bshad pa tsam// gnas skabs tsam gyi bde 'bras yin// spong sgyur sbyongs thabs blo sna tshogs// yid smon
sangs rgyas nam zhig bslu// bsgrubs pa'i bud+d+ha sangs mi rgya// a ti klong chen kun shong la// gnas lugs rang snang rtsis gdab med// 'gro yin 'gro min rang grol klong// sdod kyin lab kyin rang grol
klong// za yin 'thung gin rang grol klong// gsang chen bka' 'di sus go ba// kun bzang ngang las gzhan mi 'da'// nyan thos sdug bsngal kun 'byung zer// nga gtan 'bebs pa'i chos min no// sdug bsngal

bde chen ka dag tu// klong chen nga yis gtan la phebs// spong 'geg rang grol phan tshad bzhag/ kri ya mi rtag sdug bsngal zer// nga gtan de yis phebs pa yin// dbyer med lhun grub rol pa ru// klong chen nga
yis nges par 'bebs// snang ba skye med rang sar grol// a ti klong chen nam mkha' la// theg dgu de'i rtsal snod bcud tsam// blang dor re dogs bral nas ni// dgu kha nyams blangs gtan la phebs// bya ba
gtsor byed kri ya ste// dag pa mtha' bzhi'i mdud pas bsdams// snang ba dag pa rigs gsum lha// gzugs rnams 'jam dpal sgra spyan ras// dran rtog phyag rdor nyid du blta// bdag dang yon bdag rdzas
ting 'dzin// dag pa gsum gyi mdud pas bsdams// rje khol gong 'og tshul du blta// a ti bzang ngan gnyis mi dgag/ mi gnas mi zhen rgyar ma chad// mnyam nyid phyam brdal yin pa
la// bzang ngan lta ba phyogs 'dzin bdud// a ti bzang ngan bral ba la// gnyis ka rang shar rang grol bas// a ti ma bsgrubs kri ya ma spangs par// dgag sgrub bral ba rdzogs chen rgyan du mdzes// zhes

gsungs nas/ phyogs 'dzin zhen med rjen par lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ kri ya ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste rtsa gcig pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya
rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// u pa'i grub mtha' dbye ba rnams// a tir rdzogs tshul gsung du gsol// ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor nyon nga
yis bshad// u pa ya la bzhi yin te// lta ba ting 'dzin spyod pa dang// 'bras bu dag dang bzhi nyid do// lta ba yo ga dag dang mthun// don dam skye 'gag med par 'dod// ting 'dzin yo ga dag dang

mthun// mngon par byang chub lnga nyid do// spyod pa kri ya dag dang mthun// bza' dus khrus gtsang gtso bor byed// 'bras bu mi tshe lnga bdun nas// rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang sa thob// u pa re dogs theg pa

yin// a ho nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// rdzogs chen ye brdal gting mthal med pa la// sa lam chig chod lta spyod brtson 'grus rnams// ma spangs ma bsgrubs ye grol ngang du rdzogs// u pa ya ni theg

pa spong sgrub bsdams// a ti re dogs spang thob rang sar grol// gzhi shar rang grol dbyings kyi ngang na bde// u pa ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// a ti ma bsgrubs dug lnga rgyan du mdzes// yangs so che'o
rig pa mkha' mnyam thugs// spang thob med do thig le nyag gcig klong// rang sar grol lo rtogs dang ma rtogs med// gnyis su med par grol ba'i chos nyid de// theg 'og rnams la mi srid srid pa'i

chos// rna phrug brag la 'dzegs pa'i bde blag de// srog chags gzhan la mi srid kho la srid// rig pa byar med klong du grol ba de// theg dman rtsol sgrub can la mi srid de// rnal 'byor mkha' mnyam bya bral
klong na bde// ye sangs rgyas pa'i rig pa yul med de// 'khor bar 'khyams par mi srid ye klong brdal// yul can rdzas blo 'dod pa'i u pa de// mkha' la rang grol rten med klong du rdzogs// thig le nyag

gcig gra zur med pa la// gnyis su snang ba mi srid srid pa'i thabs kyang babs// gcig dang tha dad 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i sems// gcig tu grol lo bya bral klong du grol// rang byung ye shes rgyu rkyen med pa
la// dug lnga 'char ba mi srid srid pa'i babs// de la spong 'geg byed pa'i u pa de// rang byung rang grol ye shes sbubs su grol// lhun grub phyogs med mtha' dang bral ba la// phyogs lhung rgya
chad mi srid srid pa'i babs// phyogs lta'i mtha' la zhen pa'i u pa de// phyogs med grol lo lhun grub klong du grol// mngon mtshan med pa'i rig pa 'gag med la// snang ba 'char bar mi srid srid pa'i
babs// snang ba rtag chad the tshom u pa de// rang sar grol lo nges med klong du grol// gzugs sogs snang ba snang thog rang sar grol// dbye bsal med do lhun grub klong du grol// 'du 'bral med pa thig

le'i klong du grol// cir yang 'char ro nges med klong du grol// sgra ru grag go thos pa rang sar grol// dran rtog thams cad de ru rang sar grol// snang grag mthong thos sgo lnga rang sar grol// rang zhal rang gis
mthong bas yul gzhan med// dag pa gsum dang lha drug gtsang sbra sogs// gnyis su med do yul sems mnyam par grol// bcu gcig rdo rje 'chang sogs sa theg kun// ma bsgrubs chig chod a ti nga yi

rgyan// mnyam nyid gcig la cir yang 'byung ba'i dbyings// yon tan thams cad skyed par byed pa'i gzhi// thams cad bya byed med par grol ba'i klong// u pa ya zhes mdud can lta ba de// spyod pa kri ya ltar
'dod 'og rjes 'breng// lta ba yo ga'i rjes 'jug gong la snyeg/ gong 'og gnyis la lta byed zhags pas bsdams// gong 'og gcig tu shes kyang mnyam pa'i rig pa la// gnyis 'dzin kha brag lta ba phyogs
'dzin bdud// a ti mtho dman med pa'i chos nyid la// lta spyod gong 'og gnyis ka ma 'gags te// gnyis ka rang sar ma zhen rang grol te// u ba ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// a ti ma bsgrubs klong
brdal rol par mdzes// kri yog sde gsum u+u pa phyi rgyud kyis// mi tshe bgrangs nas sangs rgyas sa 'dod des// lus ngag yid gsum bya byed rtsol bas bcings// yang dag don la rgyang rings mthar mi

phyin// nga ni ye klong nyid 'dug ring du phyin/ mdun du bzhag nas rgyab tu 'tshol byed na// bya bral ngang las ring zhing don mi 'grub// dus dang grangs la ltos pa'i theg dman rnams// mkha' la shar ba'i 'ja'

tshon 'dzin pa ltar// thug pa'i mtha' med zin pa'i dus med pas// nan gyi rang sems byar med rtsol bas bcings// a ti kun spang spyi phud yang rtse nga// rtsol sgrub med pas chos nyid bde brdal bas// 'bad

pas 'grub tu re ba lam stegs tsam// bong 'theng zhon nas mtsho mtha' skor dang mtshungs// ka dag nga nyid mthong ba'i dus med pas// re ba byas kyang rang sngo tshi chad de// sol ba'i mdung shing dkar por ga la
'gyur// e ma/ a ti klong chen rdo rje'i mkhar rdzong dang// byar med nam mkha'i dbyings las ci yang byung// ma byas ma btsal cir yang byar med pas// lta ba nyams mi nga zhing the mi tshom// sgom pa

'dus med 'dus ma byas pa'i klong// spyod pa rang byung bde yan ma bkag nga// blo bcos rnam rtog mtho dman dgrar mi blta// nyams myong rig pa gang shar gang dgar mthong// rgyu rkyen med pa'i dug lnga mdog

ma bsgyur// brtul zhugs dge sdig spang len nga la med// 'bras bu ye grub cir snang 'bras bur shar// dam tshig gnyen po rgyu rkyen gzhan mi brten// phrin las ci byas brtul zhugs klong du rdol// sa lam chos
dbyings grol ba chos kyi dbyings// u pa ye rdzaugs ma spangs blo bder gnas// byar med gcig la lhun rdzogs bde 'byams dang// 'gro drug theg dgu nga yi klong las shar// dus gsum sangs rgyas a ti
dbyings kyi rgyan// ces gsungs so// rdo rje mkhar rdzong gi nang du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ u pa ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste rtsa gnyis
pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// rgyu la ma ltos kun tu bzang// rkyen dang ye bral klong brdal dpal// yo ga'i grub mtha' bshad du
gsol// ston pas lan du bka' k+p+ral pa// e ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// yo ga'i grub mtha' 'di lta ste// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba 'od gsal stong nyid las// rdo rje dbyings su sangs rgyas

'dod// sgom pa mngon byang lnga ru bskyed// ye shes spyan drangs mchod bstod bzlas// spun grogs tshul du bsgom pa'o// spyod pa yon tan lnga longs spyod// 'bras bu mi tshe lnga gsum gyis// 'thug po bkod pa thob
par 'dod// yo ga nyid kyi grub mtha' 'o/// e ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// ma rtogs theg pa 'og ma bas// gzhan du rtog cing rtsol bas bslad// yul sems bden gnyis dgag sgrub mkhan// mi
mthun spang zhing gcig phyir 'breng// yo ga ting 'dzin gsum rtsol nas// blang dor byas nas 'bras bu re// a ti chen po klong chen nga// thams cad chos nyid brdal ba la// dam bca' spong len la sogs
kyi// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du ga la yod// dam yang bdal ba chen por bca'// gtan tshigs chos nyid phyogs med la// rig pa mkha' yan lhun grub pas// 'di la spang rgyu ci yang med// blang bar bya ba yod ma

yin// spang blang med pas yo ga rdzogs// gang ma spangs pa'i kun grol dbyings// sa lam bgrod pa'i thabs chen po// dbyings su sbyor ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyang// klong chen nga las

mngon sangs rgyas// ma byon slad kyi sangs rgyas kyang// klong chen nga las mngon sangs rgyas// da lta'i rgyal ba grangs mang kyang// klong chen nga yi sbubs na brdal// nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi mes// nga

ni theg pa kun gyi dur// 'khor 'das kun gyi yab chen po// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam po che// 'khor ba'i chu bo sgrol ba'i gru// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skem pa'i me// ji tsam theg pa'i rnam grangs kyang// nga yi klong
las yongs ma 'das// ji tsam sa lam gnas nas kyang// nga yi klong las gar ma phyin// theg dgu ma 'dres so sor bkra// yo ga ma spangs a ti'i rgyan// a ti ma bsgrubs lhun 'byams bde// bgrod med rtsol

bral rig pa'i klong// byar med lhun rdzogs skye med sgo// a ti mnyam pa'i chos nyid du// 'khor 'das ma spangs lhun grub pas// spyir phyib chen po dbyer med pas// spyir phyib pa 'di gzhan na med// rang snang
dbyer med brdal ba che// gcig la kun rdzogs a ti la// nam mkha' lta bu'i rig pa shar// gang yang gnyis med klong na bde// a ho// ye grol chen po lta ba phyogs med klong// gser gling lta bu dbye bsal

med pa'i ngang// ye klong chen po sgom pa phyogs med klong// byed rlung lta bur thams cad dbyings su thims// gang shar chen po spyod pa phyogs med klong// chu long lta bu dal ba'i klong na 'babs// ye grub chen po

'bras bu phyogs med klong// yul ljongs lta bu ma 'dres gcig tu gsal// dper na 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgya na// 'dod yon rnam sprul bsam mi khyab pa nyid// ji tsam che yang gling las g.yos pa med// ma

g.yos slar yang 'dzam gling rgyan du che// thig le nyag gcig a ti chen po la// theg dman ma spangs yo ga'i spyod 'bras rnams// gser dngul 'phra man bsras pa'i rdzas lta bu// gcig las ma 'dres yongs su

rdzogs pa'i rgyan// kun khyab chen po a ti klong chen rdzogs// bshigs pas mi shigs phyogs med rdo rje'i mkhar// rig stong ngang nas gang ltar byas kyang bde// zhes gsungs nas/ rang byung rang shar gting

mtha' mu med kyi ngang la bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ yo ga ma spangs rdzogs pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o// longs sku'i bstan pa gsum pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya
rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho// yongs rdzogs lhag med kun bzang rje// chos sku'i bstan pa chen po'o// ma hA grub mtha' rdzogs tshul te// ston pa'i thugs kyi

klong nas khrol// zhes zhus ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun nyon cig/ ma hA'i theg pa 'di ltar ro// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// lta sgom spyod dang 'bras bu'o// ngo bo skyed pa'i gzhi yin
no// ma ni chos nyid ha dag pa// yo ga khyab cing 'dus pa ste// nges pa'i tshig tu yid la zung// dbye na sgrub pa gtso che dang// sa lam gtso cher 'dod pa dang// rnam grol gtso che ma hA'o// sgrub pa

gtso cher 'dod pa ni// 'jam dpal sku dang pad+ma gsung// yang dag phur pa rta mgrin dang// yon tan bdud rtsi ma mo dang// rig 'dzin dmod pa mchod bstod sogs// phra mo'i sgrub pa grangs med do// sa lam

gtsor ston sgyu 'phrul te// rnam grol gtsor ston mdo rtogs so// lta ba lha dang gzhal yas dang// rig pa spros bral nyid du blta// sgom pa ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum// spyod pa thabs kyis dbye ba na// spyad bya lnga

dang mi spang lnga// dang blang lnga dang shes bya lnga// bsgrub bya lnga la spyod pa'o// dam tshig lus ngag yid gsum bsrung// 'bras bu 'di'am bar do la// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa// phyi ma nges par thob pa

ste// 'di rnams sgrub pa gtso cher 'dus// ma hA'i grub mtha' de ltar ro// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// a ti klong chen rab 'byams nga nyid la// ma hA sgrub brgyad rdzogs tshul 'di lta ste// kun gzhi ye shes
snying po khyab gdal ngang// ma bcos spros med chos nyid ka dag la// sku yi lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// 'khor 'das snang stong dbyer med klong du

'byams// rang sems dri med rnam dag sa lam bcad// snang stong grag stong dran stong so ma'i klong// gsung gi lha rnasam ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// chos sku sems su
yang dag gnas lugs te// rang bzhin spros bral rnal 'byor sku gsum rdzogs// ma bkag rang byung ma 'dres rang bzhin grol// thugs rje lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen

po'i rgyan// ma rig rnam rtog nyon mongs dug mtsho'i nang// rang byung rig pa'i rtsi bcud thig les gzhom// ma spangs mi gnas 'dod yon rnam dag brdal// bdud rtsi'i lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma

hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// nga bdag phyogs cha gzung 'dzin ling+ga la// rang rig ye shes phur pa zang thal btab// rtog pa thal byung gcer bu cog bzhag spangs// phur pa'i lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye

nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// ma gcig kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings// snying po rig pa'i ye shes ji lta ji snyed mkhyen// ma nor ma bcos kun khyab ye shes klong// ma mo'i lha

rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// thabs shes kun ldan ye stong bdag nyid rig/ mi sgom mi yengs rig pa dbyings na 'phyo// brjod med lug rgyud g.yo med rang grol
klong// rig 'dzin lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// 'khor 'das chos kun ye grol pha mtha' yas// 'dzin med rang grol gza' gtad 'khrul pa

zhig/ lha 'dre rang snang rang grol chig chod klong// mchod bstod lha rnams ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// srid rtsa nyes rgyu ha la bdag rtog dug/ rtsa bral snying po'i sngags

kyis dug rang bsad// dug lnga ye shes lnga ru rang grol klong// dmod pa'i lha rnams ma bsgrub ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// sgyu 'phrul yongs rdzogs sems nyid chos kyi sku// snang
srid gzhir bzhengs 'khor 'das dbyer med rdzogs// gsang ba snga med byang chub snying por brdal// 'khor 'das yongs rdzogs thig le nyag gcig klong// sa lam gtso che ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma
spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// ma 'gag rol pa sna tshogs rtsis gdab bral// rang bzhin med grol skye med dbyings su dag/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rang byung ye shes ngang// bde gshegs dgongs pa rtsis

gdab rjod med klong// rnam grol gtsor 'don ma bsgrubs ye nas rdzogs// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// 'khor 'das chos rnams rang rig sems kyi klong// gdod nas rang byung brdal ba chen po'i

spubs// 'di ltar nges pa'i phyam brdal chen po la// nyi shu rtsa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol// mi bsrung blo yi a ti nga mi 'dod// bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu a ti nga mi bsgrub// 'di'am bar do phyi ma'i dus re med//

'khor lo tshogs chen sa ni ye gnon yin// ces gsungs nas/ brdal khyab cir mi dgongs su lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ ma hA ma spangs rdzogs tshul gyi
le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// e ma ston pa kun bzang dpal// a nu'i grub mtha'
rdzogs tshul gang// ston pas rig mdangs 'khor la gsung// gsan nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// a nu'i grub mtha' bzhi yis ston// lta sgom spyod dang 'bras bu'o// lta ba snang yul kun tu bzang mo'i
mkha'// rig pa rang shar kun bzang rol// gnyis med ye sangs rgyas par 'dod// sgom pa ma 'gags rtsal las lha// ma bskyed dran rdzogs chu nya'i tshul// spyod pa rgyud lung nyer gcig gis// sems can kun

gyi don byed de// 'bras bu tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob// de na a nu'i theg pa'o// a ho// sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ theg pa'i yang rtse ati klong chen po// ri rgyal lta bu kun gyi rtser gyur pas// ri
bran thams cad 'og tu non pa ltar// lta sgom theg pa kun gyi rtser gyur pas// a nu phyi nang kun bzang mkha' rol rnams// a ti chen po kun bzang yangs pa'i klong// rang skad ston pas theg
dman klong du thim// dper na rtsal gsum ldan pa'i seng ge yis// wa sogs gcan gzan zil gyis gnon pa ltar// a ti rang rtsal rig pa yul med shar// mtshan ma rang grol klong yangs phyam brdal
bas// a nu la sogs theg pa phyogs zhen can// yul dang yul can 'dod kun klong du grol// de bzhin rig pa ti la mtha' bral klong// bya bral lhun grub rdzogs chen shar grol la// grol dang ma grol gnyis

med rgyan du che// dper na 'dab chags rgyal po khyung chen de// mngal na gnas kyang klu rnams zil gyis gnon// sgo nga'i nang du 'dab gshog tshad du phyin// sgong rgya ral nas phyi rgya rlabs kyis chod// 'dab

chags gzhan la ci ste ga la rigs/ khyung chen rang la rigs te mkha' la bde// a ti chen po klong chen brdal khyab pa// rang skad ston kyang theg dgu zil gyis gnon// kun bzang klong du sa lam sbyang bgrod

grol// 'khor ba'i klong na lus rgya ma bral kyang// gol sa g.yang chod ka dag klong na yin// theg dman gzhan la ma spangs rgyan mi mdzes// ci phyir spang len mdud pas bsdams pa'i phyir// a ti klong chen ti

la'i klong na bde// a nu ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan du mdzes// rtogs dang ma rtogs med par grol ba dang// 'di dang phyi ma med par mnyam pa dang// phung po lhag ma med par yal ba dang// sku gdung ring
bsrel ma bsgrubs grub pa dang// mnyam nyid ngang la rgyun chad med pa dang// dug lnga ma spangs dbyings kyi rgyan nyid dang// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por shar ba dang// theg dman dgu po a ti'i so nam
tsam// zla bdun tsam gyis zad pa'i sar gnas rnams// theg dgur brgyud nas grol bar 'dod pa dang// shin tu sbyang dang spang dang bsgyur 'dod pa// ga la rigs te klong chen nga la bde// ci bde thams cad

bde chen chos sku'i klong// klong chen 'di la ma brdal gang yang med// chos nyid rang bzhin rdo rje snying po'i sku// bag chags las la snying po'i rtsal rdzaugs pas// skye shi'i bar do med par rang yal te// rig pa
gcig po kun dang dbyer med cing// rgyun chad med par sprul pa 'byung ba dang// thogs pa med par kun la 'jug pa dang// byar med rlung zhon rnal 'byor spyod yul ni// dman pa'i theg pa kun la mi 'tsham

ste// a ti klong chen nga la rigs pa yin// skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul rang shar la// rgyu 'bras mtshan mar 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo// a ti rgyu rkyen med par bstan pa ni// 'og ma rnams la mi rigs sbubs che
ste// klong chen yangs pa nga la rigs pa yin// sangs rgyas sems can dgongs spyod dbyer med la// 'khor 'das gnyis su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo// a ti gnyis su med par ston pa ste// gzhan
la mi rigs a ti'i rgyan du mdzes// rtogs dang ma rtogs med par grol ba dang// rtogs nas grol bar 'dod pa snyem pa'i dgra// a ti mnyam nyid gcig tu bstan pa de// gzhan la mi rigs a ti'i rgyan du
mdzes// mtshon pa thabs kyi khyad par ma spangs par// brjod du med la bden 'dzin bslu+u ba'i tshig/ a ti don dam dbyer med bstan pa de// 'og ma rnams la mi rigs a ti'i rgyan// rdzogs chen ye brdal
gting mtha' med pa la// thug pa med ces zer ba mun pa'i klong// a ti mu med chig chod bstan pa de// gzhan la mi rigs a ti'i rgyan du mdzes// 'byung la 'gro drug theg dgu thams cad kyang// dbyings la

dbyings shar cho 'phrul yin pas na// de yi rgyan yin bdag dang mthong mdzes bral// yo ga mdud pa can gyi lta ba de// don dam snang la rang bzhin med pa la// kun rdzob tsam snang lha dang lha mo yang// mtshan ma
ye med mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// lha dang lha mor 'dzin pa mchog 'dzin bdud// gnyis kar rang shar gnyis kar rang grol bas// yo ga ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// ma hA mdud pa can gyi lta ba
ni// thabs kyi mchog gyur lhag pa'i kun rdzob la// shes rab mchog gyur lhag pa'i don dam pas// gnyis med mchog gyur bden pa mchog tu blta// dbye ru yod kyang mnyam yang mnyam nyid la// dbyer
med spyod yul bral ba phyogs 'dzin bdud// a ti mnyam pa ris med chos nyid la// gnyis kar rang shar gnyis kar rang grol bas// ma hA ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// a nu mdud pa can gyi lta ba

ni// phar snang shes pa kun tu bzang mo'i klong// tshur snang yul ni kun tu bzang po'i yul// gnyis su med pa bde ba chen por blta// gnyis dang sdug bsngal mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// gnyis med bde chen yid

dpyod re ba'i bdud// a ti rgya chad med pa'i chos nyid la// gnyis kar rang shar gnyis kar rang grol bas// a nu ma spangs rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyan// rdzogs chen a ti'i rnal 'byor brdal ba na// 'jug sgo

gzhan du mi blta thams cad rang gi klong// thams cad rang du shes pas gol sa shugs kyis chod// gol sa chod pas g.yang sa ga la yod// g.yang sa nyid kyang rig pa'i klong chen dang// sems kyi mdud pa de ni
ma grol bar// 'phags pa'i lam logs 'tshol ba ni// spyang mo dong nas 'bros pa bzhin// thar du re ste ga la thar// 'dod na gang 'dod mtha' yin te// yod par 'dod na rtag pa'i mtha'// med par 'dod
na chad pa'i mtha'// rtag chad gnyis kyi mdud pa de// rnal 'byor 'ching bar byed pa'i sgrog/ de yi mdud pa ngang gis 'grol// a nu la sogs lam gzhan gyis// bkrol bas khrol ba ma yin

te// zhen pa'i thag pas slar yang 'ching// a ti klong chen rab 'byams nga// mtha' la skyon du mi blta ste// 'ching grol gnyis su ga la 'byed// mtha' gnyis ma spangarang grol bas// gnyis med tsam du mi
gnas shing// gnyis ka ltar yang rang shar bas/ mtha' bzhi ma spangs rgya yan klong// mu bzhi kun 'byams yangs pa'i rtsal// 'ching grol gnyis med rang sar bde// gcig bde gnyis bde kun kyang bde/
khams gsum sems can kun kyang bde// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun kyang bde// rang snang chos sku'i klong na bde// chos sku 'pho 'gyur med pa la// 'khor 'das chos kun ci bder bzhugs// de la nges pa

med pa'i phyir// byed spyod cir yang ma 'gags pas// nga yi klong na ci bder spyod// spyod yul gang yin ma 'gags pas// ci la nyam nga med pa dang// gang la thogs pa med pa'i phyir// gang zhig gang la gang

gis 'ching// spu gris spu gri ji ltar gcod// chu yis chu gnyis ji ltar brlan// mkha' la mkha' nyid ji ltar 'jog/ me yis me nyid bli ltar bsreg/ 'ching grol nyid kyang rig pa'i klong// sa le sbram bzhin

'gyur ba med// gcig shes kun grol ti la nyid// theg dgu ma spangs nga yi rtsal// a ti ma bsgrubs nga yi rol// mtho dman brjod bral nga yi rgyan// ces gsungs nas/ kun rdzogs rgyal po mi g.yo ba'i ngang
la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ a nu ma spangs rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/
de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang gsol pa// e ma ho// nyag gcig zang thal kun tu bzang// med pa phyal ba lhun grub che// a ti'i grub mtha' bdag la ston// ces gsol ston pas

bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// rdzogs chen a ti'i grub mtha' ni// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'o// lta ba snang srid 'khor 'das kyi// chos rnams thig le nyag gcig sku// rang byung bya btsal med

par 'dod// sgom pa kun khyab nam mkha' la// cir yang 'char ba'i nor bu ltar// snang bzhin ma grub nges pa med// bcos slad med pa sa le sbram// rang gsal chen por 'dod pa yin// spyod pa spyad rgyu med pa
ste// 'bras bu tshe gcig lus gcig la// ka dag zad pa'i sar grol 'dod// sems sde klong sde man ngag sogs// rang rang grub mtha' phyogs res bcings// theg brgyad thams cad khyad bsad nas// nga ni
rtsol ba bral lo zer// phyogs zhen de yis sangs mi rgya// lta ba sgom med bstan pas thos// sgom pa ye sgom bstan pas thos// spyod pa spang blang med pas thos// dam tshig bsrung mtshams med
pas thos// lam la rtsol bgrod med pas thos// chos nyid gang yang yin pas thos// don la de ltar gnas gyur kyang// theg dman thams cad skrag cing rgyal bar byed// dge sdig gnyis bden rgyu 'bras
byung// dge bcu rtsol ba spang mi dgos// nyan rang byang sems theg dman la/ khyad gsod dge sdig med do zer// gtan tshig rigs drug sdug bsngal ltos// yid smon byed pa sems kyi bdud// theg dman

rnams la kha 'phen cing// rgyu 'bras phyal bar 'jog pa na/ khams gsum sems can bsad pa bas// theg pa spang smad sdig pa che// yang dag nga la sgro btags yin// gang la gang 'tshams ston byed pa// dbang
po'i rim par sbyar nas gsungs// mtho dman med par ngas ma gsungs// theg dgu skas kyi gdang bzhin brten// spong 'geg rtog bsgyur bden gnyis spyod// gtsang sbra ting 'dzin byin rlab byed// rtsol sgrub
dam tshig ye shes bskyed// sgrub bsnyen phrin las mchod bstod bskul// kun la 'bras bu re re dang// bden pa mthong tshul yon tan yod// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i kha lta ste// chad pa'i mu la cung tsam
rtogs// nyams len med ces tha mal sdod// nyams len ma 'dres drod tshad thob// a ti chen po nga nyid la// nyan rang theg pa so thar dang// nyams len kun kyang ma spangs yang// chen po nga la bkag pa

med// klong yangs nga la gnas pa med// gang yang ma spangs yangs par brdal// ma bcos mkha' 'dra kun la shar// mtho dman phyogs ris nga la byed// 'dod blo'i chos chen ma zad na/ kha lta mtho yang sangs
mi rgya// chen po nga yis gtan la 'bebs// 'khor ba ru nas nga yis bzlog/ theg pa 'og mas gong ma 'degs// rtsa bas rtse mo 'degs bzhin no// mar la mar bsnan dbye bsal med// sangs rgyas sems

can logs na med// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta sgom spyod// dam tshig sa lam rtsol sgrub med// de yis ka dag sgrub la phebs// rgyu 'bras zhib kyang 'gal ba med// byar med klong du gang yang shong// rtsol sgrub mi
bde bya mi dgos// rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras med par 'khrul// de ni chos nyid mkha' dang 'gal// ji bzhin chos nyid don mi 'byor// chos nyid ye grol don dang 'gal// e ma ho/ theg dgu ye rdzogs 'di lta

ste// sdug bsngal mi skye spang mi dgos// nyan thos ma spangs rdzogs pa chen// ma rig rten 'brel dbang po 'gegs// stong nyid chos sku skye 'jig bral// rang rgyal ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// rang byung rnam dag
chos nyid sbyang// sbyang bsgyur dmigs pa skul mi dgos// sems tsam ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// kri ya gtsang sbra byi dor grub// ye nas dag pas bya ba bral// kri ya ma spangs rdzogs chen
rgyan// u pa yo ga cho ga rtsol sgrub spyod// ye nas lhun grub bya mi dgos// u yog ma spangs rdzogs chen rgyan// ma hA a nu ting 'dzin gsum// dag pa sgom bsgrub ye grub yin// ma hA a nu rdzogs chen

rgyan// sems sde klong sde man ngag sogs// kun kyang mtho dman med pa la// theg 'og khyad bsad rang che brjod// de yis 'di la gtan mi phebs// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta sgom spyod// chen po nga nyid mnyam

nyid dang// mtho dman dbye ba'i gdags gzhi bral// rtsol med rgyu 'bras zhib mos 'bebs// kun gyi yang rtse chen po nga// dgu ka ma spangs nyams su len// phyogs zhen rgya mdud sdom pa len// lta ba'i yang
rtse thod rgal 'gro// gshis ni skye med thig le yin// rtsal ni 'gag med rol pa yin// ngo bo gnyis med rang grol yin// e ma ho/ gcig la kun rdzogs ma spangs rang sar grol// sangs rgyas sku dang sems

can nyon mongs lus// ji ltar snang ba thams cad rig pa'i rgyan// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes bdud rtsi ste// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa byang chub lam du dngas// dug gsum sku gsum klong du gtan sprugs te// skye shi

rtsad gcod khams gsum yongs su grol// gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bya byed kun snang kun// nyid la nyid 'dzin nyid la nyid spyod pas// rtsa ba byang chub rig pa'i klong du grol// rang byung rig pa ye nas chos sku

ste// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyang de yi sku// phyi nang gsang ba theg mchog ji snyed kyang// byang chub sems nyid de yi yon tan te// rang rig ma rtogs chos rnams logs na med// sems nyid klong du ma grol
chos med pas// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mkha' la mdud pa bor// phyogs su btsal ba sems kyi mdud pa ste// a ti lta ba phyogs ris med pa la// bltas kyang skyon med rang byung rol pa yin// ma bltas skyon med
mtshan ma rang sar grol// gnyis med lta ba rang byung rol pa yis// lta ba zang ngan 'byed pa'i mdud pa bor// nga yi sgom pa dmigs gtad med pa la// bsgoms kyang skyon med rang byung rol pa yin// ma

bsgoms skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byung spyod pa yis// spyod pa ched du btsal ba'i mdud pa bkrol// klong chen 'bras bu spang thob med pa la// bsgrubs kyang skyon med rang byung
rig pa yin// ma bsgrubs skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// gnyis med rang grol rang byung 'bras bu yin// 'bras bu gzhan 'dod re ba'i mdud pa bkrol// klong chen bsrung mtshams bral ba'i dam tshig
la// bsrungs kyang skyon med rang byung rol pa yin// ma bsrungs skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byung dam tshig gis// srung nyams skyod yon 'byed pa'i mdud pa

bkrol// a ti'i phrin las bya btsal med pa la// btsal kyang spyod med rang byung rol pa yin// ma btsal skyon med mtshan ma rang sar grol// rang grol gnyis med rang byung phrin las kyi// phyogs su 'byed par
'dod pa'i mdud pa bkrol// a ti sa lam sbyang bgrod med pa la// sbyang bgrod byas pas skyon med rol par shar// ma bgrod ma sbyangs skyon med rang sar grol// gnyis med rang grol rang byung sa lam
gyis// mtho dman gong 'og 'dzin pa'i mdud pa bkrol// klong chen mdud bkrol mtha' yi mun gsal bas// 'gro ba rigs drug sangs rgyas nyid du gsal// phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad rgyar mnyam
pas// ya tha sangs rgyas med de rang du gsal// ma tha dmyal ba med de rang du dag/ 'gro drug sdug bsngal mdud pa der bkrol nas// byang chub sems la bdag gzhan mtho dman med// mtho dman med pa'i

mnyam nyid rig pa'i mkhar// kun la khyab pas gdal ba chen po'i rdzong// gnyis su med pa mi 'gyur rdo rje'i 'obs// rdo rje'i mkhar rdzong theg pa'i spyi phud yin// ye nas de yi klong du rang grol bas// 'dod

'byung cir yang 'char ba'i yon tan yin// ye klong brdal ba de yi ngo bo la// skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pas 'bras bu'o// rgyud dang gdams ngag thams cad nga yi klong// gcig rdzogs kun rdzogs skyon yon mtha'
dag rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po a ti kun gyi phud// dbyings rig ti lar gang la dbye bsal med// sa dang lam dang theg pa'i bye brag kun// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs thig le gcig gi rgyan// thig le gcig la

dbye bsal ngang gis bral// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i klong na bde bar bzhugs// bya bral bde ba kha yan klong na bde// kun kyang ro gcig mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// skye med rol pa 'ub chub chen po e// theg
dgu ma 'dres ma spangs rdzogs pas te// gong na gzhan med spyi dpal chen por theg/ 'khor 'das thams cad brdal ba chen po'i klong// nyid las nyid shar rol pa 'byams pas chen// rtsol ba bya bral ti la'i
sbubs na rab// ka dag zad pa yid dpyod bral bas 'byams// theg dgu zil gnon yangs dog med pa'o// zhes gsungs nas// mi zad ka dag gi klong du lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong
chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ a ti rdzogs tshul gyi le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/[ xxx ]de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa//
kye ho// nyag gcig cha shas ti la che// gzhon nu bum sku kun bzang mchog/ a ti chen po'i grub mtha' gang// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ zhus pa'i lan du 'di skad gsungs// a ti
chen po'i klong brdal la// gtad med zang thal lta ba dang// dmigs gtad zhen med sgom pa dang// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa dang// 'bras bu re dog med par zad// bzhi yis bsdams te bstan pa la// lta
ba gtad med nyid la gsum// mnyam nyid 'dzin grol phyogs med zla// 'khor 'das chos kun cir snang yang// snang stong chos nyid dbye ba med// chos can ma yin chos nyid gcig/ logs nas 'byung ba'i re cha

med// yod med med min 'dzin pa grol// bden rdzun tha dad gnyis chos dag/ chos rnams rang byung rang shar klong// chos med gtad med nyid snang ba// snang na rang snang rang stong ngo// snang dang stong pa ye nas
mnyam// chos can chos nyid mnyam par brdal// yod med mtha' gnyis rang chod klong// rang dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'dzin med// rdzun dang bden par gdod nas mnyam// ci phyir rig pa dri med 'di// ngo bo
phyogs lhung gang yang med// de phyir gtad med zang thal te// dper na ga pur sman dug bzhin// ye nas mnyam nyid rang ngo'i sbubs// chos rnams mnyam nyid mtha' grol bas// lha mi rang rgyud bzung bas
'khrul// chad dang stong par bzung bas log/ theg dman snang ba dgrar ltas gol// byang sems sgrin pos sbyong bas bsgribs// mtha' dbus stong par sgro 'dogs 'byams// sngags rnams phyi nang dag snang
du// bsgyur bas chos min gting ma rtogs// mdor na phyogs 'dzin lta ba'i bdud// rdzogs chen theg dman khyad gsod bral// thams cad phyam brdal phyogs ris med// gtad med zang thal lta ba la// chos

min rtog pas phyogs 'dzin grol// ka dag klong du brdal ba che// phyogs ris med par la bzla ba// chos can dngos po'i snang ba la// rtog pas 'di yin med par brdal// yod pa'i phyogs su ma ltung ste// cir
yang snang bas med mtha' bral// gnyi ga'i phyogs nas rig snang stong// gnyis med phyogs su de ma lhung// ye grol phyogs su rgya ris bral// yang dag don du la bzla'o// dmigs gtad zhen med sgom pa

la// bdag 'dzin blo bral sgo 'khrul zhig/ yin min blo bral klong brdal lo// bdag 'dzin bral bas nga bdag sgom// ngo bo stong pas rtsa ba stor// rang bzhin gsal yang gzhi rtsa bral// mtshan nyid 'gyu dran

'dzin chags zhi// gang yang ma grub bsgom bya stor// spang dang bsgrub bya'i snang ba zhig/ dmigs gtad kun bral klong yin no// 'khrul pa nga bdag gshis med grol// snang ba byed mkhan ma grub pas// snang
tshul bden rdzun 'khrul pa zhig/ gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa ye med dang// bsgrub bya 'di yin bsgrub tu med// thams cad klong chen brdal ba nyid// phyogs med yul med rang snang grol// yul med
blo dang de bral te// thams cad phyam gcig rig stong grol// spyod pa blang dor med pa la// gtad med zang thal lta ba yis// yin dang min gyi phyogs zhen grol// dmigs gtad zhen med bsgom pa yis// theg
