dgu chos min grogs su 'char// blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis// yin min dge sdig ci spyad kyang// chos nyid klong nas 'das pa med// dge bcu pha rol phyin pa drug/ chos spyod bcu sogs 'di blang bya// mi

dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// rnam smin sdig che 'di spang bya// mtshan ma ye med gzhi dag pas// blang dor gzung 'dzin ming yang med// yin min gnyis kyi chos blo 'das// de ltar lta sgom chos nyid kyi// klong
las 'phyo ba ye med pas// mi dge bcu dang mtshams med sogs// ma spangs chos med lhun gyis grub// dge bcu chos spyod tshogs chen gnyis// ma btsal chos min lhun gyis grub// sku dang zhing khams ye shes

sogs// ma grub lhun rdzogs klong chen po// 'khor 'das kyis bsdus chos phyam gcig/ skye ba med las thams cad skyes// yod nas snang ba ga la yin// skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med// med pa nyid kyang rang snang
phyir// snang shar dus mnyam de ru mnyam// stong rig dus na de ru mnyam// gnyis ka'i dus na de ru mnyam// mnyam nyid mtha' mu rang grol lo// 'bras bu snang bzhi rim shar nas// gdeng bzhi dag gis chos
zad pas// zag bcas mi snang zla bdun gyis// 'ja' 'od lhag med 'grub pa'o// e ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// lta ba phyin ci ma log par// a ti chen po'i klong chen la// ma rig ma spangs rig pa'i
sku// dbyings chen rnam dag thig ler rdzogs// gcig rdzogs ti la gnyis rdzogs brdal// 'khor 'das chos rdzogs thams cad klong// gcig byung ka dag gnyis byung rol// sgron ma bzhi gzhung lug rgyud
rdzogs// sku dang zhing khams thams cad byung// gcig skyes ti la stong nyid dbyings// gnyis byung rig pa dbyings dang 'dres// yid kyi rnam shes thams cad skyes// gcig med ma rig yid sems med// ma dag

nyon mongs thams cad med// phyogs ris zhen 'dzin mdud pa med// de bzhin a ti chen po la// byas pa'i chos ni ka nas dag/ bya dang byed pa med pa'o// a ti klong chen nga nyid la// dam tshig bsrung du med pa
ste// ye nas bsrung dang bral ba'o// med pa phyal ba lhun grub che// nyag gcig zang thal nyid du'o// gsang sngags kun gyi dgongs pa che// a ti chen po'i klong chen de// nam mkha' gcan gzan seng ge
yis// 'ug pa wa tshogs zil gnon ltar// rang rig gtan phebs dman mnan nam// ri bo mchog gis ri bran zir mnan nas// rgya mtsho chen pos chu bran zil mnan nam// dpag bsam shing

gis shing phran zil mnan nam// glang chen rta mchog dud 'gro zil gnon ltar// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen nga nyid kyis// 'khor 'das theg dgu sbubs su zil gyis mnan// rang byung rang la thim pa'i sku

gsum rig pa'i don// skye med dbyings la sgom med chen po ni// bsgom bya sgom byed yin min gnyis dang bral// 'dzin pa med par rang grol te// sbrul dang rnga ma'i mdud pa bzhin// rang grol rang sangs chen
po'o// de bzhin phyogs cha yid 'dzin rnams// rang grol rang sangs chen po'o// a ti chen po nga nyid la// re dang dogs pa ga la yod// re dogs gnyis po ltung ba'i rgyu// 'khor dang 'das pa ga la
yod// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// ma spangs klong du rang sar grol// bsgrub med sgrub dang bral ba'o// byas med byung ba med pa'o// 'gag med khyab gdal 'ub chub bo// 'gyur med klong yangs chen
po'o// chos med sangs rgyas 'khrul med do// gnas med ye shes med pa'o// med pa'i 'chal ba ga la yin// ma spangs bkra zhing 'dzin med yin// gang shar rol pa gang snang grogs// dper na nags kyi me

chen la// rlung chen byung ba grogs bzhin no// klong chen rol par 'khor 'das rgyan// 'di ni a ti'i grub mtha' 'o// zhes gsungs nas// ka dag yangs pa chen po'i ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun
gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ a ti chen po'i grub mtha' ste// rtsa bdun pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ gtad rgya/ sems

dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho// sku lnga'i bdag nyid sangs rgyas mes// re dogs mtha' grol kun tu bzang// 'di lta bu yi klong chen de// ston pa'i slob dpon ji lta bu// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol

cig/ de skad zhus pa'i lan nyid du// ston pas rang byung 'di skad gsungs// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// spyir na bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni// phun sum tshogs pa 'di ltar ro// klong chen bka' babs sgrub rgyud
zin// dbang rnams yongs rdzogs dam tshig gnas// lta ba thag chod rgyu 'bras zhib// bsgom pa'i snang shes nyams len brtson// spyod pa tshul khrims man ngag can// gsang sngags rdo rje'i mtha' drug
rdzogs// thos pas rgyud grol snying rjer ldan// 'gro 'dul thabs mkhas rdzu 'phrul ldan// dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas kyis// byin brlabs snyan brgyud tshig brgyud dang// thugs brgyud bka' babs
gzhan sel med// rgyal ba'i sras su rjes su gnang// so thar 'dul khrims shel ltar gtsang// de nyid bcu mkhyen 'dod chos mkhas// skyo dub med cing snying rje 'byongs// theg chen 'gro ba'i don

la brtson// gsang sngags nang gi cho ga mkhas// bsnyen bsgrub mthar phyin nus rtsal rdzogs// ka dag don gyi phu thag 'brus// snang gzhi tshad 'khyol bde dang ldan// klong chen don la shin tu mkhas// tshe 'di zang
zing don mi gnyer// slob ma brtag mkhas theg dgu sbyangs// chags zhen chung zhing 'dzin pa med// de rnams ldan pa'i bla ma de// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu ste// bdag gzhan don gnyis de yis 'grub// gang

gis 'brel la yon tan 'byung// de bsten skad cig rdzogs sangs rgyas// de las log pa'i snga ma ni// chos la mkhas g.yar tha mal sdod// 'dul khrims med par khyim pa'i tshul// nyes byas rgyu 'bras rnam smin

lci// byams pa ma 'byongs rang don sgrub// gdul bya'i 'gro don bstan srol stor// sngags sgrub sgom bzlas rtags ma thon// rgyud sgrub cho ga'i gnad mi shes/ kha lta'i rbad khams 'ur du 'don// chags sdang ma

spangs 'khor bar ltung// chos kyi rgyus chung mkhas drung gzhol// blun po nya ma mgo skor byed// gdams ngag yod zer lkog tu ston// da rung snying po'i don la tshom// 'gro don nye ring phyogs cha byed// yul dang
bstun pa'i chos mi shes// de yang bzang bzang 'dra yang ngan pa ste// de 'dra'i mi gtsang bum pa la// brten bya'i slob dpon ma yin pas// dam pa chos kyi 'brel thag chod// da lta ngo mtshar gus brten
yang// nam phugs skyon gcig cis kyang yod// dam nyams gnyis ka dmyal bar 'gro// de bas snying po'i don 'dod na// bla ma mtshan ldan brtson 'grus kyis// yon tan tshang ba btsal la brten// de ni lhag

med gsungs pa'o// de ni klong chen 'di nyid kyi// 'chang 'dzin ston pa'i bla ma'o// zhes gsungs nas/ rang grol rtog pa'i gdeng gi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams
kyi rgyud las/ bla ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus

pa// kye/ kun mkhyen brdal ba chen po'i dpal// rgyu rkyen rtsol ba med pa'i phyir// klong chen 'di nyid bstan bya'i yul// slob ma'i mtshan nyid gang lta bu// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas lan

du bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// slob ma dam tshig ldan gyur pa// klong chen ston yul snod dag yin// klong chen 'di ni thun mong min// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse yin// theg pa'i bcud mchog
bdud rtsi 'di// gar byung snod du blug pa na// snod chag bcud 'bo don mi 'grub// dmyal bar ltung bas snod brtag go/ dang po snod kyi mtshan nyid ni// dad pa che zhing chos la mos// brtson

'grus che zhing sgrub la brtson// shes rab che bas tshig don go/ 'dzin chags chung zhing tshe 'di spong// phu dud che zhing bla ma mchod// blo che gsang sngags spyod pa shong// g.yeng ba chung bas chos la gnas// dam

tshig dag srung nyes skyon med// sgrub la brtson zhing sdug sran che// dad dang snying rjes 'gro la phan// gtong phod che bas rtsa gsum mnyes// rgyud dul nyon mongs bags kyis chung// sdig chung rnam smin dag la

'dzem// dbang po rno zhing gsang sgo thub// 'gyur med skyo shas blo sna thung// sdug sran snying rus zhe bcad che// bla ma nyid dang 'bral mi phod// 'di ni klong chen snod mchog yin// de la lo bcu'i khangs nyid
du// brtag cing gdams pa rim gyis sbyin// gnas skabs gdams pa chud mi gson// mthar thug bka' babs gzhan don 'grub// de las log pa'i slob ma ni// lcam char phyir yang che zhing dang med
mi// dpal spel kyang zhing mi thub ngo brag grags kyang che// brtag long med par btsan thabs 'dod// dam tshig mi bsrung rang tshig rngam// chags sems snod sems sgro skur can/ kha yang gting thung ngo
dga' che// gdams pa mgo skor thabs kyis 'bru// ma brtags slob ma kha dred can// gdams ngag chud zos mkha' 'gro'i snying// rang rgyud pa la lta gsang 'chad// nyams pa'i gang zag snod med la// klong
chen mi bstan mchog tu gsang// don la blang dor mi gnas kyang// mi ma yin kyang bka' srung rnams// thugs khros dus min 'chi bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro chos bdag thams cad kyis// 'phral la bar chad mi
rung 'jug/ tshe 'dir shis dkon ngan song gnas// kun gyis smod cing dma' sar 'bebs// de yi kha rlangs grib ma phog/ mkha' 'gro 'khrug cing ngu bar 'gyur// snod ngan stobs che shin tu brtag/ me thigs
gcig gis yul mkhar phung// sbal pa smas ma ji bzhin no// brtag pa sna tshogs sgo nas bya// mi nor srog sogs 'bul nas blta// mi nor rin chen gus ldan 'bul// phongs med 'bul la don rgyud
bstan// de yis don grub dgos pa yod// ces gsungs nas/ sna tshogs gcer grol gyi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i yang rtse klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ slob ma snod ldan mi ldan btag
pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// de lta bu yi klong chen de// bsten zhing rtsol ba'i gnas mchog
gang// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsan dgongs bka' stsal pa// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// klong chen nyams len gnas mchog ni// lung stong mi skad med pa'i sa// dge

sbyor 'phel ba'i dgos pa'o// ri rtse shes pa shin tu gsal// dur khrod skya shas shin tu che// shin tu dben sar nyams snang 'phel// dwangs shing mtho bas dbyings rig gsal// bkra shis gangs rgyud ri 'dab

bzang// gnam sa pad 'khor kha sbyor 'dra/ sngar yang grub thob rkyen thub pa// mi rgaud med cing 'bru sogs med// rgyab ri mtho la byang ri mdud// g.yas pa dar dkar yol lta bu// g.yon pa phyogs nas skyong ba

'dra// mdun na rin chen spungs pa 'dra// mda' ni phyag rgya bsnol ba 'dra// tsha grang snyoms shing gzhi bdag 'jam// nyi ma rtag cing so thub sa// nye ring ran cing rab tu btsan// smad kha phye ba skyil krung

'dra// nags sam ri bo tshang tshing du// klong chen ston pa'i sa gnas so// yon tan dge sbyor ngang gis 'phel// mthar thug dbyings rig brtan pa thob// de las logs pa'i gnas nyid ni// shar ri mtho ba tshe la
gnod// nub ri har na bkra mi shis// mdun ri mdud tshugs bar chod mang// tsha grang ma snyoms nad ru 'jug/ gzhi bdag rtsub pas bar chod 'ong// mi rgod rgyu bas sems mi phebs// 'bru tshogs dkon na

khams 'dus mod// gzhan yang sa dgra sna tshogs la// rten 'brel thabs kyis bcos shing spangs// yon tan ldan pa'i sa cha ru// sgrub khang che 'bring chung ba gsum/ sems can blo dang sbyar la brtsig/ yang dag
rten 'brel ka dag kyang// gnas skabs rten 'brel zhib par sngang// zad pa mthong ba'i grogs su 'gyur// de rnams 'dzom dus slob ma yis// yon ni gser dngul 'bru sman mi// gus pas phul la snyan pa

yis// lo bdun lnga'am gsum nyid nas// klong chen 'di zhu'i zhu ba ni// lnga bdun bar du dbul bar bya// de nas bla mas gnang ba sbyin// slob dpon rtsa gsum sgrub pa yis// zhi khro nyid kyi bsnyen bsgrub
brtsam// slob mas sbyor ba tshang bar bsag/ de yis don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ gnas dang zhu 'bul le'u ste sum cu
pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho mi 'gyur lhun grub kun tu+u bzang// phun sum tshogs pa'i nyes spangs pa// yo byad
grogs gnyis ji ltar bsag/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas lan du 'di skad gsungs// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// yo byad 'byor grogs 'di lta ste/ khams kyi rten so yo byad dang// 'tsho
ba zas kyi yo byad dang// nad zlog sman gyi yo byad dang// bar chad dgra zlog yo byad dang// dam can bskang ba'i yo byad dang// sgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad dang// mthun rdzas thams cad tshang bar
bsags// zas kyi yo byad 'dab tu bsham// dam bcas srid tshogs bgos pa yod// mchod rdzas ma rul ma rnying pa// mdangs dang ldan pas rtsa gsum dgyes// bskang rdzas ma nor ma khyag cing// ma nyams ma

rnying ro dang ldan// dam can thugs dam bskangs pa'o// bsgrub rdzas mang zhing tshan che bas// byin brlabs tshan che sprin ltar 'thibs// g.yog 'khor sha tsha blo gsal zhing// mi bslu gsang thub nga lo

yangs// mched grogs du yod bsags pa'o// rdo rje rgyal thebs rdo rje bya ba dang// rdo rje spyan ma khrims pa dang// rdo rje karma las mkhan dang// rdo rje byan mo phyag bde mo// rdo rje ging chen sgo ra ba// rdul phyags
skyes bu la sogs bsag/ las rgya mdzes sdug yid 'ong ba// blo che nad med rigs bzang zhing// bcu drug lo lon gsang thub pa// mtshan ldan reg na bde ba 'phel// nad bzlog re skong 'bras bu thob/ khyad

par grogs kyi mtshan nyid kyang// dam tshig gtsang zhing nyes ltung med// dag snang che bas kun dang mthun// dug lnga chung bas nyon mongs 'gags// blo brtan khog yangs spob pa mtho// rkyen dbang mi 'gyur
dgos pa yod// ngang rgyud ring zhing mched la brtse// mi 'bral phan thogs dgos pa yod// de ltar grogs rnams 'dzom pa na// gnas skabs yon tan ri la chags// mthar thug yon tan zad pa thob// mtshan

nyid mi ldan de las zlog/ ma rungs dam log grogs brten na// dge sbyor sel byed bar chod 'gro// rab tu brtag pa gal che'o// sgrub 'go 'dzugs pa'i lo dag ni/ byi ba 'brug dang rta dang phag khyad par 'di
bzhi dag la shis// dbang dang gdams pa'i 'bras bu 'grub// zla ba stag sprel phag sbrul bzhi// dus rdzogs 'bras bus 'byin phyir 'jug/ tshes grangs yar gyi gcig la zhugs// yang na gsum brgyad nya
sogs bzang// zla ba zad dang lo zad dus// sgrub dbang 'don par shis pa yin// sdig sgrib mi dge bde ba'o// skar ma rgyal dang nab so dang// she sa bre nag mgo sogs bzang// gza' ni phur sogs dar

dus bzang// dus ni nyi shar nam langs 'asngug/ dbang la nam gung nyin gung ngo// bstan pa'i rtse rgyal 'di nyid de// gtsor ston nyams su len pa'o// ma hA'i rgyud dang a nu'i lung// a ti'i man ngag la sogs

pa// ma spangs kun la mkhas pa'o// zhes gsungs nas/ khyab gdal chen po'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ sgrub rdzas grogs mched brtag btsal gyi
le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgyaH de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// kye chos nyid chen po kun

bzang klong// ka dag ngang dag rdo rje che// gang zag phyi rabs blun rmongs la// yid ches gdams pa'i lo rgyus rnams// ma dag yid gnyis sel ba'i phyir// rang mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de nas ston

pas bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// a ti bkod pa chen po yi// klong chen yang zab bka' 'di la// lo rgyuso na gyis ma bshad na// blun rmongs tshig phyir 'breng ba rnams// yid gnyis the tshom

skyon du 'gyur// des na lo rgyus bkrol te bstan// chos sku rang gi ngo bo yis// rgyal bas dgongs pa rtsal gyis gsungs// longs sku rang gsal chen po ru// brda tsam bstan pa tsam gyis gsungs// sprul sku gang

la gang 'dul du// tshig gi sdeb sbyor mkhas pas gsungs// 'dul zhing phung po lnga yi don// gnas ston 'khor bstan dus dag ni// phun sum tshogs pa lnga lngas bstan// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud rnams ni// phun

sum tshogs pa lnga ldan yin// bshad thabs bzhi yis gang 'tshams ston// a ho phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid ni// chos dbyings spros dang bral ba ste// mtshan nyid ma grub tshig mtha' zad// ston pa phun

sum tshogs pa ni// ma spros mi spros yid tshig bral// zhal phyag nyid du ma grub bo// 'khor ni chos nyid rol par shar// rang grol rang byung gsal ba'o// bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// don ldan rang byung rang

shar ba// rgyu rkyen gang gis ma bslad pa// kun khyab klong chen nga nyid do// dus ni thog ma tha ma med// lnga ldan chen po bkrol zhing bstan// spyi gzhi sku gsum bshad pa na// chos sku'i gnas ni chos kyi

dbyings// chos sku'i ston pa kun bzang nga// chos sku'i 'khor ni rang rig la// chos sku'i bstan pa a ti nga// chos sku'i dus ni 'das pa'o// longs sku'i gnas ni stug po bkod// longs sku'i ston pa gangs chen

mtsho// longs sku'i 'khor ni zhi khro'i tshogs// longs sku'i bstan pa kri yog gsum// longs sku'i dus ni da lta'o// sprul sku'i gnas ni kun khyab zhing// sprul sku'i ston pa sangs rgyas stong// sprul sku'i 'khor ni

khams gsum mo// sprul sku'i bstan pa dbang bzhi'o// sprul sku'i dus ni ma nges pa'o// lam gyi phun sum tshogs pa ni// gnas mchog phun sum tshogs pa ni// rang lus 'dom gang gru bzhi yin// snying nang rin
chen gzhal yas khang// rtsa rnams 'dus pa'i 'khor lo ni// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kun// 'di la brten nas 'tshang rgya'o// ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// rang shes rig pa'i rgyal po ste// 'khor
'das chos rnams thams cad kun// mkhyen pa'i bdag por bzhugs pa'o// zhu 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang// sku lnga ye shes 'od lnga dang// shes rab rlung

sogs lnga tshan rnams// rnam dag rol pa sna tshogs so// bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa ni// phyi nang rten 'brel kun tshang zhing// rtsa rlung thig le'i yon tan no// dus tshod phun sum tshogs pa ni// spyir ni rang lus

khyad par du// dbyar ma ston dang dgun chung dang// nyin mtshan dus bzhi la sogs pa// na bun 'tshub ma ser bu med// nam mkha' dwangs shing gsal ba'o// de ltar lnga lngas ston pa yang// gang zag gcig gi
rgyud nyid la// gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru// dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa bstan// zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru// gza' gtad med pa'i lta ba bstan// 'dod chags 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru// blang

dor med pa'i spyod pa bstan// nga rgyal 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru// gol sgrib med pa'i ka dag bstan// phrag dog 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru// spang thob med pa'i 'bras bu bstan// thams cad lnga lngas 'ching zhing
bshad// rgyud 'di gang la babs pa'i mi// rim gyis yon tan bshad cing bstan// ma dag sems can spro ba bskyed// lus ngag yid gsum bya rtsol spangs// 'khrul pa'i phyogs su mi gtong zhing// lus slod ngag
bsdams sems spro yang// yid ches thag chod the tshom bral// byin rlab 'jug cing gdams pas grol// ces gsungs nas/ gsal stong lhun grub tu bzhugs so// theg pa chen po'i spyi phud klong chen rab
'byams kyi rgyud las/ lo rgyus bstan pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho// gzhi rdzogs chen po kun tu
bzang// snang srid dbang sgyur rgyal po che// dbang gi rim pa ma lus par// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// e ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// dbang la rnam pa bdun

yin te// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// thob pa'i yon tan ma thob skyon// dbang nyid brtan pa'i dam tshig go/ dang po dbang gi ngo bo ni// rang byung rol pa chen po'i dbyings rums su// 'khor 'das chos
rnams thams cad dbang gi dkyil// rang rig bdag 'dzin bral ba'i gnas nyid du// dbang bzhi byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun 'bab// srid pa'i rtsa ba bdag 'dzin sangs pa'i dbang// phyi nang kun brtags ye
grol ngo bo yin// nges tshig las ldan bu la dbang bas dbang// snang srid sems su shes pa don gyi dbang// srid bcud lha ru grol ba sems kyi dbang// thams cad rang 'dzin spang bas yang dag
dbang// gnyis med zang thal rtogs pas ye shes dbang// de nyid ngang du mi g.yo rang gi dbang// thams cad ka nas dag pa ngo bo'i dbang// yul sems ngo bo rgyas pa rang bzhin dbang// snod

bcud yongs su grol ba thugs rje'i dbang// gzhi snang rang sar dag pa sku gsum dbang// cir snang rig par shes pas dbang yin no// dbye ba la'ang spyi dang bye brag gnyis// spyir na rtogs pa ye shes dbang
bskur dang// ma rtogs rgyu mtshan dbang bskur gnyis yin no// bye brag ma rtogs rgyu mtshan dbang bskur ni// mtshan ma rdzas la brten nas dbang bskur dang// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la brten pa
dang// yab yum b+ha ga'i dbang bskur gsum yin no// mtshan ma rdzas kyi dbang yang rnam gsum ste// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dbang gi bskur thabs dang// rin chen bum pa'i dbang gi bskur thabs dang// sha

khrag gtor ma'i dbang gi bskur thabs so// rdul tshon dbang la rnam pa bzhi yin te// theg pa bcu gcig dbang mchog dang// pho brang gtso bo'i dbang gi bskur thabs dang// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lha yi dbang

bskur dang// tsa ka li yi dbang gi bskur thabs so// yab yum b+ha ga'i dbang yang rnam gsum ste// yab yum phyag rgya'i sgo nas dbang bskur dang// yab yum b+ha ga rdo rje'i dbang bskur dang// yab yum byang
sems dkar dmar dbang bskur ro// rtog pa ye shes dbang bskur yang// dbye na rnam pa gsum du bskur bar bya// sems can snang ba phyi ltar bskur// bsgom pa sems 'dzin nang ltar bskur// ngo sprod nyi shu

rtsa gcig gis// gsang ba'i dbang du bskur bar bya// phyi ltar theg pa bcu gcig dbang// nang ltar zhi khro gnyis kyi dbang// ngo sprod la yang rnam gsum ste// dpe dang don dang rtags dang gsum// mtshon pa'i

dbang du bskur bar bya// rig pa ye shes ngo sprod kyis// gsang ba'i ye shes ngo sprad bya// rig pa rkyang pa'i ngo sprod kyis// gzugs sku'i zhing khams dbang bskur bya// de ltar dbye na bsam yas kyang// bsdu na
rnam pa bzhi yin no// snang srid sems su shes pa yis// spros bcas bum pa'i phyi dbang bskur// srid bcud lha ru grol ba yis// spros med nang gi gsang dbang bskur// gnyis med zang thal shes pa
yis// shin tu spros med shes rab dbang// thams cad ngar 'dzin sangs pa yis// rab tu spros med tshig dbang bskur// dmigs med zang thal rtogs pa yis// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang thob nas// bya btsal
kun las 'das pa'o// ma rtogs tshig re don re bstan// rtogs pa ye shes dbang mchog gis// cir snang rig par shes pa'i dbang// rig pa dgag sgrub med pa'i dbang// dbang bzhi dus gcig rdzogs pa
yin// de yang don la bkrol te gsungs// gcig grol gnyis grol thams cad grol// bkrol bas rang byung gzhan du med// rang byung dbang chen rang las byung// don gyi dbang mchog dkyil
'khor la// gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs thams cad rdzogs// don dbang ye shes mtshon pa la// gcig med gnyis med thams cad med// de don rtogs pa'i dbang chen la// gcig byung gnyis byung thams cad
byung// stong pa ye shes dbang chen la// gcig skyes gnyis skyes thams cad skyes// rtags na dbang mchog de ltar bskur// 'di rnams dbang gi spyi chings yin// ma nor ma 'khrul nyams su longs// zhes
gsungs nas/ dmigs med zang thal chen po'i rig pa rtsal gy-i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// sa ma ya/
rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho// 'gyur med chen po kun tu bzang// dbang gi rim pa gsungs na yang// gong du gsungs la 'bral med pa'i// thob pa'i yon tan
ma thob skyon// brten pa'i dam tshig ji lta bu// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// kye ho// dbang don 'khor rnams legs par nyon// dbang mchog ma thob skyon rnams
ni// ji ltar rdza so ma btang spyad// de ma thag tu 'jig pa ltar// gsang sngags yon tan log par 'char// mnyen pa skya ba med pa ltar// sdug bsngal chu bo sgrol mi nus// brag skam so nam byas pa
bzhin// dbang bzhi'i 'bras bu sm-in mi 'gyur// sems la chos nyid gnas gyur kyang// dbang gis smin par ma byas na// rnal 'byor dngos grub ga la thob// dbang mchog rim pa de dag kun// thob pa'i yon

tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes snang ba chen po la// thogs pa med par grol bar 'gyur// rang snang zhing khams rgyas pa dang// thun mong dngos grub sna tshogs 'thob// bar ma do la rang ngo shes// chos nyid rnams
la brtan pa thob// zhag grangs nyer gcig 'das pa dang// sprul pa sku yi stobs 'gyed nus// mthar phyin 'bras bu sdug bsngal grol// gsang sngags dngos grub dbang las 'byung// dbang brtan pa yi dam

tshig bshad// gsang sngags spyi yi dam tshig dang/ khyad par dbang bzhi'i dam tshig ni// sa ma ya ni 'bum sde sogs// dbye na brjod kyis mi lang yang// mdor bsdus sku dang gsung dang thugs// rnal 'byor

lus ngag yid la sbyar// dmigs pa bla ma rdo rje mched// bsrung ba'i yul gyis rnam par dbye// sdom pa lus ngag dbang du 'dus// de yang bsrung bya srung byed gnyis// bsrung ba'i rgyu dang gsum yin no// bsrung
bya rdo rje slob dpon yin// srung byed bu slob snod ldan yin// bsrung rgyu sku gsung thugs gsum yin// de yang lus ngag yid gsum gyis// mi dge'i las rnams kun spangs te// dkyil 'khor gsum

dang 'bral mi bya// rdzogs pa chen po'i don nyid la// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig dang// ye bsrungs chen po'i dam tshig dang// bsrung mtshams bral ba'i dam tshig dang// mnyam pa nyid la bye brag med// med dang

phyal ba lhun grub che// nyag gcig zang thal nyid du'o// snang ba yul gyi dam tshig dang// rtogs byed lta ba'i dam tshig dang// spyad rgyu nges pa'i dam tshig dang// bsrung mtshams bcas pa'i dam tshig bzhi// lam

zhugs rnams kyis bsrung bar bya// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang rig snang ba'i don rtogs na// dam tshig rgyal po zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kun la dam tshig med// sems can
dus na skyon yon byung// yang dag rig pa'i don rtogs nas// nyams dang ma nyams gnyis las 'das// bsrung dang ma bsrungs phyogs las 'das// ye bsrungs chen po'i don la ltos// bsrungs pa'i yon tan

brjod las 'das// ma bsrungs na raka dmyal bar skye// de ltar man ngag ston pa'i slob dpon la// rang lus dang ni rin chen rdzas// shin tu dkon pa dag gis brten/ khu bo pha dang ma dang mig/ bu dang chung ma
nor gyi mchog/ sgo gsum zol sogs med pa yis// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul// dbang bskur thog ma tha ma ru// dka' ston ma byas dngos grub med// sdig pa ma sbyangs lam mi bgrod// dga' ston
chen pos mchod pa yis// bla ma dang ni de yi 'khor// de bzhin rang gi rdo rje'i spun// gcig dag gnyis dag gsum dag nas// brgya stong grangs med dag la ni// tshogs kyi dga' ston sus byas pa// legs
pa thams cad 'grub pa dang// nyes pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// chos skyong rdo rje'i spun la sogs// tshogs mchod yon gyis ma mnyes na// nad mang tshe thung bar chod

'byung// thun mong dngos grub med pa dang// mchog la ring du song ba dang// tshe 'phos yi dwags gnas su skye// bla ma dang ni dbang mchog gi/ gsang dang gzhug las 'gal ba na// na raka sdug bsngal myong bar
'gyur// bka' dang ma 'gal yon tan ni// chos sku kun tu bzang po 'grub// phrin las bzhi po thogs pa med// de phyir snga ma'i bka' bzhin sgrubs// zhes gsungs nas/ bsrung nyams med pa'i dam tshig chen

po la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ dbang thob pa'i yon tan dang/ ma thob pa'i skyon dang/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya
rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho// skye med 'gag med kun tu bzang// dbang gi rim pa de ltar na// nyams len sngon du 'gro ba rnams// rig
mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ gsan dgongs ston pas bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// ma yengs 'khrul med blo la zung// skal bzang thar pa 'dod pa'i mi// dben zhing nyams dga'i
gnas nyid du// chos dang mthun pa'i grogs dang 'grogs// sems sbyang bdun po sngon du gtad// dkon mchog skyabs song sems bskyed la// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mi rtag bsam// 'gro la snying rje byang
sems bsgom// bsod nams tshogs bsags sdig pa sbyang// de la dgos ched rnam pa gnyis// gnas skabs tshe 'dir blo zlog cig/ ci byas chos su 'gro ba dang// mthar thug rang dang gzhan gyi don// rgya chen

'grub pa'i dgos pa yod// de yang lus ngag yid gsum la// dang po lus kyi sngon 'gro ni// rigs drug spyod pa sna tshogs spyad// rdo rje skyil krung dang bcas te// lus sbyangs sems la phan pa'o// lus kyi zhen

log sdig pa 'dag/ ngag gi sngon 'gro rigs drug gi/ sgra dang zhi khro 'byung ba'i sgra// rnam pa sna tshogs brjod par bya// ngag gis hU~M zhes brjod pa la// rgyas gdab pa dang rtsal nyid sbyang// gnyen btsal lam du

zhugs par bya// de ltar ngag sbyangs sems la phan// ngag gi zhen log ngag sgrib 'dag/ sems kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni// dus gsum blo rtog sna tshogs dang// dug lnga dug gsum lha'i dkyil 'khor// rigs drug
sdug bsngal blo la blang// 'dus pa thams cad mi rtag par// kun kyang 'jig pa'i cho 'phrul bsgom// de rnams bsgom pa'i mkhan po ni// sems la thug gam ma thug brtag/ sems su thug na dge sdig gang che
brtag/ de nas sems 'di gang dang 'dra// 'dra dpe mang du bsdur bar bya// de nas lus ngag yid gsum po// gtso bo gang yin thag kyang bcad// de nas sems kyi byung sa btsal// ma rnyed chos kyi sku dang

'phrad// de nas sems kyi gnas sa btsal// ma rnyed longs spyod sku dang 'phrad// de nas sems kyi 'gro sa btsal// ma rnyed sprul pa'i sku dang 'phrad// de ltar sems kyis 'dus byas pas// zhen log bar chad
zhi ba dang// sgrib pa skad cig gol sa med// chos kyi skur grol gnyis med 'da'// de nas rnal du dbab pa la// lus kyi rnal 'bebs mi 'gul bas// phung khams rgyas pa'i dgos pa yod// ngag gi rnal
'bebs mi smra zhing// brjod med 'char ba'i dgos pa yod// sems kyi rnal phebs 'phro 'du bcad// zhen 'dzin grol ba'i dgos pa yod// mthar thug dgos pa lus dal bas// sprul pa'i sku la reg pa
yin// ngag dal longs skur reg pa yin// sems dal chos skur reg pa yin// thun mong 'byung ba mi 'khrug cing// mthar thug lus ngag yid gsum gyi// 'dzin pa rang dag dgos pa'o// de nas
sor 'dug bya ba ni// nang tshang can gyi gdan stengs su// rkang pa rdo rje'i skyil krung bca'// lag pa gnyis po mnyam gzhag bsnol// lus po mda' snyug bzhin du bsrang// dpung pa rgod gshog bzhin du

brgyangs// masnging pa gzhu mo bzhin du bkug/ lus khog phrag pa gzigs ltar bstod// mig dang sna rtse sems rtse bstun// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs par bya// theg pa kun gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud
las/ sngon 'gro'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho// thag chod chen po kun tu bzang// sngon 'gro'i rim pa gsungs na
yang// nyams len dngos gzhi gsung du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// nyams len dngos gzhi 'di lta ste// gzhi ni khregs chod lam thod rgal// 'bras bu sku gsum
yongs rdzogs so// blo yi rim pa rnam gnyis kyis// don gyi ngo bo nyams su blangs// dmigs pa yul can lam rnams la// sgom dang bsgom bya'i thabs rnams bstan// rig pa rang snang blo rnams la// brtag
pa'i thabs rnams gcig tu bstan// de kun sdom tshig rnam gnyis kyis// rim pa bye brag gnyis phye nas// skyes bu rnams kyi blo la 'jug/ 'di kun snang ba rang nges so// dmigs pa yul can blo rnams la/

khegs chod gdams pa bstan pa ni// rim pa bye brag 'di lta bu/ khregs chod nyid du nyams su blang// chos nyid 'bad rtsol dang bral ba'i// lus sems bya bral ngang du bzhag/ chos nyid rang thog ngo sprad
pas// rnam rtog ye shes chen por 'char// chos nyid rang sar grol ba yis// snang ba nyid la dgag sgrub med// lus sems bya bral chos nyid ni// bya ba med pas ye grol yin// bya byed spangs pas bde ba
rnyed// grol ba rang byung gzhan las min// bya ba bral ba gzhir gzhag go/ 'khor 'das bya byed nam bral tshe// rdzogs chen nyid las gzhan min no// a ho// byang chub sems la btsal du ye nas med// ji
bzhin ngang la ma bcos gang dgar thong// bdag gzhan yul can ye nas med pas na// mnyam pa ris med rig pa gang dgar thong// rtag tu de dang 'du 'bral med pas na// gnyis su yul med ris med gang
dgar thong// bya bral lhun rdzaugs 'di las gzhan med pas// gzhi gzhag brdal ba'i sku de kha yan thong// mtshan nyid ma 'gags sna tshogs cir yang 'char// dbang po gcer mthong cir snang chos nyid
gsal// snang ba rgya yan rig pa gang dgar bde// ma bcos rnal 'dug rig pa khong klod bde// shes pa bag yangs byar med skyes bu bzhin// grim lhod med par lus sems gang dgar
bzhag/ sus kyang ma bcos rang gis rang nyid gsal// rtsol sgrub med par chos nyid bde gdal bas// ye nas yin pas bcos su ga la yod// gcig pur ma bcos klong na rang grol bde// gtad med phyogs
bral nges par 'dzin pa med// 'dzin med rang shar kun bzang rol pa yin// tshogs drug zil gnon snang ba rgya yis gdab// phyi nang 'du 'phro byar med chen po'i klong// cir yang ma yin cir yang yin pa'i
phyir// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bya bral chos// 'khor 'das theg pa kun la dbang bsgyur bas// byar med lhug pas thams cad zil gyis gnon// mtha' ru gyur pa'i yul gzhan logs na med// byar
med gcig gis klong las gar ma g.yos// bya bral kun tu bzang po'i sa nyid la// 'khor ba kun bzang mya ngan 'das pa bzang// kun bzang klong na 'khor 'das ye nas med// snang ba kun bzang stong pa kun

tu bzang// kun bzang klong na snang stong ye nas med// skye shi kun bzang bde sdug kun tu bzang// kun bzang klong na bde sdug skye shi med// bdag gzhan kun bzang rtag chad kun tu bzang// kun bzang klong na

bdag gzhan rtag chad med// 'ching grol med pas dgag sgrub ye nas bral// gtad med phyogs bral chen po 'di yin te// skye med 'gag med bya bral lhun rdzogs dang// thog babs shugs byung gcar phog yan pa ste// klong rdol rang

shar 'gro drug gtan pa bcom// snang ba sems su ye nas ngo sprad pas// snang ba snang ba'i steng du grol ba nyid// sems nyid stong pa dngos med ngo sprad pas// shes pa 'gyu ba 'gyu dang shar thob grol// stong pa chos sku ka dag ngo sprad

pas// snang shes gnyis med chos sku gdal bar grol/ gcig shes pas ni kun grol chen po'i phyir// grol ba de dang de nyid steng du grol// grol ba rang byung ma rtogs gzhan na min// dbang po'i sgo rnams thams cad ma bcos

par// cog gis bzhag pas rang bzhin grol ba'i gnad// de las ma bsgyur 'gyur med bcos su med// rnal ma so ma lhug pa rang yan te// phyi 'da' kha yan klong du gnas pa nyid// ma yengs ma 'dzin ngang du rang sar zhog/ dbang

po'i sgo rnams dgag par mi bya zhing// lus ngag bya ba spyad par ga la bya// gnyid sogs spang zhing blang bya ga la yod// dbyings la dbyings shar dbyings kyi klong du grol// mkha' la grol lo mnyam pa nyid du grol// dbyings su grol lo
bzang ngan med par grol// klong du grol lo mtho dman med par grol// gcig tu grol lo skye shi med par grol// gcig gi dbyings su 'bad med rtsol med grol// mi gnas rang dag ma spangs rang sar grol//
mi mnyam grol yang mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// grol ba'i dus na rang grol rang sa zin// grol dang ma grol dbyings na ye med pas// ji ltar grol yang rang sa rang la grol// kun kyang ro gcig
mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// lugs zlog med par dbyings su grol ba'o// chos nyid klong du grol lo dbye bsal med// rtsol ba med par grol lo sgrub tu med// nges pa med par grol lo gza' gtad

med// lhun gyis grub par grol lo phyogs ris med// mtshan ma thams cad rang sar grol ba'i phyir// byang chub sems la grol dang ma grol med// nam mkha'i klong na ji ltar byas kyang grol// lhun grub klong la
gang ltar byas kyang grol// kun kyang 'dra'o gzhan med ye nas grol// spang blang med de rang sar rang shar grol// phyogs gcig phyogs med 'dod pa kha gting med// mnyam dang mi mnyam tsam gyi mtha' las
grol// rgyu rkyen gnyis la ye nas mi gnas shing// 'bras bu re dang dogs pa med pa'i phyir// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi mtha' las rang grol lo// bzang ngan med par lhun rdzogs bde bar gnas// mtho dman
med par mnyam pa'i dbyings su grol// mdor na lus ngag yid gsum rang so la// yid byed rtog pa phyir ma 'phros// dbang po'i tshogs drug yul rnams la// shes shing dpyod pa'i yul ma 'gyus// rang snang mi
rtog chen po la// rang gsal rtog med nyams myong skye// cog bzhag gcer bzhag rang sar bzhag/ chos nyid rang sar grol ba'i gnad// de ltar snang shes thams cad kun// chos nyid chen po'i klong yangs

las// blang bar bya ba gang yang med// gzhag par bya ba cung zad med// gang du med pa'i chos nyid klong// cir snang rang gi chos nyid las// bcos ma'i chos nyid ga la yod// ji ltar byas kyang mi rtog skye// spang

blang med par rang snang ngo// spang med spang ba'i chos dang bral// spang ba mi dmigs spang bya med// shes pa yul la snang ba'i tshe// snang ba de nyid rang snang ste// shes pa mi bsgrim kha yan du// chos nyid klong du yan
par bzhag/ dug lnga'i rtog pa ci skyes kyang// nga yi rig pa rtog med yin// rang rig rtog pa kun dang bral// ye nas gol bas bskyar gzhi med// rang gis grol bas gnyen po med// yongs su grol bas 'bad
pa med// mtha' grol yin pas mu bzhi 'gag/ gcig grol yin pas du ma stongs// gcig grol gnyis grol thams cad grol// chos nyid klong yangs e ma ho// a ho rig mdangs 'khor rnams nyon// dang
po thog ma khregs chod kyis// lta ba gtan la dbab par bya// 'khor ba'i lam rgyun gcad 'dod pas// bya byed rdzogs pas rdzogs pa'o// mtha' dang bral bas dbus mi gnas// yongs su rdzogs pas mtha'
dbus med// lhag ma med pas cha shas min// gcig tu ma yin gnyis mtha' zad// du mar mi gnas gcig mtha' zad// mtha' yang mi gnas rang sangs nyid// brjod du med pa'i tshig gi

gzhi// dngos bral stong pa snying po'i don// phyogs su ma lhung ngo mtshar che// 'di shes 'khor ba'i lam rgyun 'gags// lta ba blta ru med de gcer grol dang// sgom pa bsgom rgyu med de rang babs klong// spyod

pa spyod rgyu med de bdag 'dzin grol// 'bras bu thob rgyu med de rgyu 'bras zad// chos sku mtshan ma'i yul dang bral// longs sku gzung 'dzin yul dang bral// sprul sku chags pa'i yul dang bral// rtog med rang
sangs rnyog pa med// 'dzin med rang grol phyogs ris med// snang ba rtog med mkha' la rol// skye med chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// yang dag chos la sgro btags med// bsam 'das brjod med ngo bo ni// rnam
rtog phyogs su ma ltung ba// mi rtog sku la yang dag blta bar bya// bsgom med sgom bral nyid kyi ngo bo bzung// 'da' med bsrung mtshams bral ba'i dam tshig bsrung// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med
pas// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes bsgom// rang snang yid spyod dag pa la// blo 'das rang rig ngang la spyod// spang thob med pa'i 'bras bu la// re dogs med pa'i rgyu 'bras yal// gzugs snang thams cad

stong pa nyid// stong pa thams cad gzugs snang ngo// stong dang mtshan ma med par yongs shes na// spros med dag pa'i ye shes yin// blo shes rtog pas byang chub tshol mi byed// gang zhig de ni pha rol phyin/

khregs chod nga yi lta ba la// ngo bo rang thog phab pa yin// rig pa ye shes snang med las// bem po'i snang bas ngas mi sgrib// stong pa'i chos nyid yul med pas// stong pa nyid la nga mi gnas// mtshan mar 'dzin

pa'i dngos dag pas// 'dzin pa'i chos la nga mi gnas// shes rab chen po rang byung bas// sde snod chos la nga mi gnas// nga la dge dang sdig med pas// 'khor ba'i chos la nga mi gnas/ khraigs chod gzhi yi lta

ba la// thams cad nga yi ngo bor rdzogs// nga ni stong pa'i tshig dang bral// nga la mun pa'i chos med pas// nga ni ye nas skyon dang bral// nga la 'byung ba'i bdud med pas// nga ni sna tshogs rkyen dang bral// nga la

rtag pa'i mtha' med pas// nga ni yid ches chos dang bral// nga la 'dzin pa'i tshig med pas// nga ni chad pa'i phyogs dang bral// nga la dngos po'i yul med pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chos las grol// nga la

'dzin rtog med pa yis// nga ni dge sdig gnyis dang bral// nga la phyogs lhung med pa yis// nga ni 'khrul pa'i sems dang bral// nga la byas pa'i chos med pas// nga ni rang byung lhun gyis grub// rang byung ye shes
lta ba la// nga la dpyod pa'i yul med do// nga la snga rabs 'das pa med// nga la phyi rabs 'byung ba med// nga la da lta'i snang ba med// nga la las dang bag chags med// nga la ma rig pa yang
med// nga la yid kyang yod ma yin// shes rab 'khor ba gnyis ka med// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis ka med// rig pa nyid kyang yod ma yin// ye shes su yang snang ba med// rang byung ye shes srog med
pas// dge sdig gnyis las 'das pa'o// rang byung ye shes gzhi med pas// snang ba'i rtog pa chod pa'o// nga la 'du 'bral gnyis med pas// ye shes sku nyid mngon par snang// nga la gzugs snang mtha' dang

bral// yul snang kun las 'das pa'o// nga rang byung ye shes rtsis med pas// gzungs 'dzin gnyis las 'das pa'o// nga la rang byung ye shes phyi nang med// skyon dang yon tan gnyis las 'das// nga rang byung
ye shes ka nas dag/ yin min gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// nga la rang byung ye shes chos med pas// mtha' gnyis las ni 'das pa'o// nga la rang byung ye shes 'gyu byed med// shes rab kun las 'das

pa'o// nga la skye dang 'chi med pas// 'gag pa'i chos ni yongs su rdzogs// nga la phyi dang nang med pas// gsal ba'i chos ni yongs su rdzogs// nga la stong dang dngos med pas// snang ba'i chos rnams yongs su
rdzogs// nga la dmigs pa'i yul med pas// mthong ba'i chos ni yongs su rdzogs// nga la lus dang sems med pas// rang snang chos ni yongs su rdzogs// nga la bdag dang gzhan med pas// rig pa'i chos lnga

yongs su rdzogs// nga la byed pa'i rgyu med pas// bsam gtan chen po yongs su rdzogs// nga la phyi yi yul med pas// rang snang yul ni yongs su rdzogs// nga la phyogs dang ris med pas// gsang ba'i chos ni
yongs su rdzogs// nga la snang ba 'gag med pas// dbyings kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs// nga la gcig dang gnyis med pas// thig le'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs// nga la mun pa'i snang med pas// mngon

par snang ba'i chos rnams rdzogs// nga la bdag gzhan rtog pa med// stong pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs// nga la dri ma gnyis med pas// gsal ba'i chos lnga yongs su rdzogs// nga la sku lnga rang snang

bas// zhing khams chos rnams yongs su rdzogs// nga la spro bsdu gnyis med pas// ye shes don rnams yongs su rdzogs// chos sku'i snang ba 'gag med pas// nga la ye shes yod ma yin// nga la skye ba nyid med

pas// yi ge a ni ye nas med// nga la 'gag pa'i gnas med pas// yi ge A+oM ni ngang gis med// nga la 'du 'bral gnyis med pas// yi ge hU~M ni shin tu zad// sku yi snang ba sna tshogs pas// yi ge'i ming ni rang
gis stong// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum ldan pas// stong pa'i phyogs cha med pa'i ye shes ltos// a ti khregs chod lta ba la// gsod byed las kyi ma dag na snang ba chen po gsal// sems

can thams cad bsgral na rang snang ma dang 'phrad// rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad na rgyu 'bras rtsa gsum 'byong// dge ba'i rgyud thag bcad na lu gu rgyud dang nye// phyi nang bya ba btang na snang ba rgya yis theb// sems

'dzin lta sgom med na chos sku'i dngos po yin// gsal la ngos gzung med na longs sku'i rang bzhin yin// bya byed kun dang bral na sprul sku'i rang bzhin yin// gcig pur dal bar bsdad na rtsa gsum lus la

'byung// thad ka grogs su shes na cog bzhag gcig gi ngang// de la rgyun du gnas na de la ci zhig bya// snang ba chen po kun la yang dag gnas// gsang ba sngags kyi khregs chod de nyid do// a ti khregs chod lta

ba la// srog ma bcad na dge mi 'phel// chos ma spangs na sangs mi rgya// bstan la snubs na zhing mi rgyas// dmyal ba yi dwags ma mchod na// dngos grub dag pa 'byung mi nus// sdug bsngal dang du ma blangs
na// bde ba gtan la phebs mi srid// thams cad skye bar ma gyur na// skye ba med pa'i don mi rtogs// nyon mongs med na shes rab med// 'khor ba spel na sangs rgyas thob// snying rje med na thugs rje
'char// gti mug med na ye shes med// ma rig med na rig pa med// rtsa ba med na rtse mo med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi slob dpon ni// dmyal ba yin par shes par bya// srog rnams bcad na dge ba

'phel// sangs rgyas pas ni dmyal ba bzang// sbubs su lhung na bde sar sleb// bsdad cing phyin na 'gro sar sleb// kun bzang nya gsher gnyis su med// gzhi med rtsa bral nam mkha'i snying po ltos/ khregs

chod lta ba'i brda tshig go/ rdzogs chen a ti chen po la// 'khrul pa las zlog khregs chod ni// rtog pa med par chos kyi sku// mtshan ma med pa rang sar grol// 'gyur med a ti'i ngo bo la// bya dang byed pa'i chos
med do// a ti rtse mo chen po la// gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs thams cad rdzogs// rdzogs chen a ti'i ngo bo la// phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams rdzogs// dge ba byar med sdig pa spang du med// dge sdig

gnyis dang bral ba'i rig pa chos kyi sku// dge ba mi bya byas na sangs rgyas min// sdig pa mi spang spangs na sangs rgyas 'grub mi 'gyur/ khams gsum sems can bsad na mngon sangs rgyas par 'gyur// pha ma
bsad na ye shes mthong bar 'gyur// srog gcod sdig tu ga la 'gyur// srog bcad sdig tu gyur na sangs rgyas med par 'gyur// srog gcod spangs na sangs rgyas rgyab kyis phyogs// dus gsum sangs rgyas
srog bcad grol bar 'gyur// srog ma bcad na sangs rgyas 'byung mi 'gyur// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor rang rdzogs pas// yi dam lha la mchod pa mi 'bul lo// 'bul na 'bul mkhan
bcings par 'gyur// mchod pa phyag rgya la sogs rgyal ba'i sku la sgrib// phyag rgya bsgyur na rin chen rlag par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bris na rang gi de nyid yal// sangs rgyas dgongs pa bya byed bral
ba'o// bsam gtan ting 'dzin la sogs gsal nyid du 'gro// 'di dus ma bsgoms pas kyang chog/ 'bras bu thob la the tshom med// rig pa tshad la pheb pa'i rtags// rang snang ci la bcug kyang tshad// bem po

kun kyang 'gul bar nus// rlung gi 'gyu ba'i tshad zin dang// lus kyi rdul phran mthong ba dang// cir snang gzugs sku rdzogs pa dang// de la yab yum 'khril ba dang// lnga lnga yab yum sbyor ba dang// kun kyang
mu khyud zlum po la// rnal 'byor lus kun 'od du gsal// 'gro dang 'ong dang 'dug par snang// thams cad rig pa tshad la phebs// lus ni tshad du phebs pa yis// bar snang 'od kyi skar khung gsal// de la
'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs// 'khril zhing 'khril ba'i snang ba 'dzin// rang lus dngos po rang dag nas// zang thal dri med 'od kyi lus// dbus su yi ge a dang bcas// smin phrag 'od zer 'dom gang
tshad// thor tshugs rlung gis gang bar snang// rang gi lag pa'i sor mo la// 'od zer phreng ba rnam par 'khrigs// mgo bo thod pa'i gzhal yas nas// he ru ka rnams brjid par gsal// de dus rang lus tshad
la phebs// sku gsum zang thal nyid du gsal// 'di ltar su la bstan pa'i mis// rig pa tshad phebs snang ba yin// 'di ltar tshad la sus thebs pa// sku gsum rtogs pa'i rang snang 'das// kye ho sems
dpa' rdo rje nyon// chos rnams zad pa'i snang ba bstan// rig pa tshad la phebs gyur nas// blo yi chos rnams zad pa yin// yin kyang snang ba gtan la phebs// sangs rgyas grangs las 'das pa yis// lung
rnams gcig tu dril nas bstan// tshig gi rgyal po 'di dag kun// rnal 'byor rnams kyis yid la zhog/ mi rtog ye shes las byung ba'i// ma btsal bzhag pa'i man ngag gis// ye yod dang po'i sangs rgyas

rnyed// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba yis/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun thag bcad// de tshe nga yi snang ba dag/ rtag pa'i rtags tshad chos rnams zad// chos rnams zad nas 'khor ba stongs// 'khor ba stongs pa'i

rtags tshad ni// rigs drug gzugs rnams mi snang ngo// gzugs 'dzin med pa'i blta ba ni// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba yin// 'di yi mtshan nyid sus rig pa// stong gsum kun kyang nyung 'brur tshud// rgya mtsho
chen po hub kyis thebs// ri rab kun kyang srang la 'jal/ khams gsum po ni rting nas zlog/ srid pa thams cad gdar sha bcad// sems can ma lus srog bcad nas// sangs rgyas rnams dang
dbyer mi phyed// kun tu bzang po'i byang chub sems// mi snang mi 'gyur lam rig gsal// blo bral 'di la 'dis pa'i mis// brjod med rang dag rnyed pa'o// 'di ni yon tan bsam las 'das// dpag med

sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam// chos dbyings zad pa'i snang ba la// lta ba bya ba gtan nas med// blta ba med phyir snang ba zad// kun bzang chos nyid yangs pa che// de bzhin sgom pa nyid kyang med// bsgom pa

med phyir dran pa 'gags// spyod pa zhes ni brjod du med// spyod pa med phyir lus 'byung zad// zad pa 'di la mtha' brten nas// med de mi snang snang ba med// lta dang srid pa'i bdag po kun// chos nyid zad
pa'i yul snang la// 'di la skrag cing sngangs pa ni// 'jig rten mthun pa'i gzugs phung nas// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid dang bral// 'khor ba'i dpung la mngon par zhen// des na rig snang yul la

ltos// rig snang 'di la su 'dris pa// thog ma'i kun tu bzang po dang// skal pa nyid ni mnyam pa'o// de phyir chos rnams zad pa'o// chos rnams zad pa'i snang ba ni// thams cad rang gi rig par 'dus// rig

pa dgag sgrub nyid dang bral// chos rnams thams cad rang rig yin// rang rig ngo bo rjen pa yin// dpe bral mtshon du med pa yin// 'di ltar chos nyid brjod med la// tha snyad tshig gi gzhi mar shar// tshig

brjod rim pa rnam dag pas// da lta brjod med rang la gnas// de phyir tshig mtha' zad pa'o// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba la// rtags ni rang la 'char ba yin// tshad ni gzhan

la gsal ba yin// zad ces ming ni tha snyad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtags tshad ni// dpe yi ye shes rnams la gsal// rtags kyi ye shes rtags tshad ni// thig le stong pa'i sgron mar gsal// don gyi ye shes
rtags tshad ni// mngon sum gsal ba'i snang bar gsal// mi rtog bsam gtan rtags tshad ni// yan lag 'du byed rnams la gsal// sgra don shes pa'i rtags tshad ni/ 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul nyid la

gsal// 'khrul pa rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// rmi lam bya byed nyid la gsal/ bag chags 'thug po'i rtags tshad ni// gang zhen yul gyi rkyen la gsal// ma 'khrul ye shes rtags tshad ni// sprin med nam mkha'i

mdangs la gsal// ye shes 'od kyi rtags tshad ni// men shel snying po'i 'od la gsal// thig le rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// dra ba mig tshag bar du gsal// rnal 'byor goms pa'i rtags tshad ni// rig pa tshad
la phebs dus gsal// spros med yang dag rtags tshad ni// snang srid phyag rgya'i zhing du gsal// rig pa rtsal dbang rtags tshad ni// gzhi bskyed lus ngag brda la gsal// dbang srog dam tshig

rtags tshad ni// 'di ldan ye bsrungs nyid la gsal// tha snyad grub mtha'i rtags tshad ni// thig le spros bral ngang du gsal// theg pa rang spyi'i rtags tshad ni// rig pa mkha' lding nyid la gsal// dran pa nyid

kyi rtags tshad ni// sgo lnga'i shes pa nyid la gsal// bsam pa rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// yul rkyen grol ba'i dus su gsal// rtog pa nyid kyi rtags tshad ni// dran pa yengs pa'i dus su gsal// 'dzin pa kun
gyi rtags tshad ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gsal// ma rig pa yi rtags tshad ni// yod med gnyis kyi mtshams su gsal// nyon mongs rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// glo bur rkyen gyi dus su gsal// 'gyu byed
yid kyi rtags tshad ni// gang bsams yul gyi snang bar gsal// bdag 'dzin blo yi rtags tshad ni// 'gyu byed 'gyu lam mtshams su gsal// shes rab chen po'i rtags tshad ni// yul rkyen chod ba'i mtshams su
gsal// rtags med rang gsal rtags tshad ni// phra rags bral ba'i mtshams su gsal// dngas ma lnga yi rtags tshad ni// 'byung ba dag pa'i mtshams su gsal// 'byung 'jug ldog dang gnas pa yis// rnal
'byor mngon shes grub pa yin// skad dang brda la brten pa yis// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar shes// 'di ni sems can don kun byed// 'di med don mi nus pa yin// de phyir sgra la goms par bya// so so'i
skad la brten pa ni// 'di nyid rang gis dus gsum brtag/ ye shes rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// rang snang yul snang rgyas dus gsal// chos kyi sku yi rtags tshad ni// gnod pa'i rkyen rnams bral dus

gsal// longs sku nyid kyi rtags tshad ni// chos nyid ma bu 'phrad dus gsal// sprul pa sku yi rtags tshad ni// 'khor 'das mi phyed mtshams su gsal// bla ma'i man ngag rtags tshad ni// 'byung ba dengs pa'i
mtshams su gsal// snying po don gyi rtags tshad ni// thig le 'dus pa'i dus su gsal// dbyings kyi rgyan tshogs rtags tshad ni// gnad phebs bar do med dus gsal// 'khrul snang bral ba'i rtags tshad
ni// rnam rtog yul zhen bral dus gsal// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rtags tshad ni// dbyings la nyin mtshan med na gsal// dbyings na rig pa tshud pa'i rtags// thig le sran 'bru 'gro 'ong gsal// phung po
bor nas sangs rgyas tshad// snying po bcud du dril dus gsal// thig le ched du phyin pa'i tshad// thig le bse phub tsam la gsal// snod bcud smin pa'i rtags tshad ni// thig le mu khyud bskor dus
gsal// rig pa sku ru smin pa'i tshad// thig le sku ru snang dus gsal// bar do'i snang ba med pa'i tshad// thig le skur bcas shar dus gsal// sku gsum lam du rdzogs pa'i tshad// thig le sku
lngas brgyan dus gsal// 'byung ba rang dag song ba'i rtags// phung po 'od gsal grol dus gsal// chos nyid zad sar sleb pa'i rtags// 'phel rnams thams cad zad dus gsal// lus kyi bde drod rtags
tshad ni// res 'jog bral ba'i dus su gsal// gsung rnams rang sgra'i rtags tshad ni// srid pa gzhi bzhengs bar la gsal// rang snang mi 'gyur rtags tshad ni// 'byung ba zad pa'i dus su

gsal// ye shes thugs kyi rtags tshad ni// snang ba bzhi bzhag dus su gsal// dgongs pa rnams kyi rtags tshad ni// rig pa srang la tshud dus gsal// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtags tshad ni// 'du shes gsum dang
bral dus gsal// chos nyid mi g.yo'i rtags tshad ni// mnyam pa nyid kyi dus su gsal// lhag mthong nyid kyi rtags tshad ni// bla ma'i gdams ngag nyid la gsal// 'bad med rang grol rtags tshad ni/ khregs
chod thod rgal mtshams su gsal// lus gnad ye shes rtags tshad ni// 'dus stangs rnams kyi dus su gsal// lta sgom rang grol rtags tshad ni// blo 'dzin dri ma dag dus gsal// yid ches goms pa'i
rtags tshad ni// nyams myong mthar phyin dus su gsal// sku gsum 'bru yi rtags tshad ni// chos rnams zad pa'i dus na gsal// thugs rje'i gzhan don rtags tshad ni// ye shes mkhyen pa'i dus na gsal/ kha

dog dbyibs zad tshad 'dzin pa// phyi nang gnyis kyi mtshams su brtags// de ltar rtags rnams rgyas pa yis// don rnams kun la yid ches 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang chen nga yis bshad// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba

yis// yul snang thams cad gcer grol nyid// stong pas stong pa'i tshad zin te// grub mtha'i zhen pa dus cig chod// 'khor 'das gnyis su med pa'o// 'byung ba thams cad rang sar dag/ chu yi snang ba dri ma

med// kun khyab chen po'i stong pa nyid// me yi snang ba rang byung bas// rang snang chen po'i stong pa rnyed// rlung gi snang ba rang sangs pas// bskyod pa chen po'i stong pa rnyed// nam mkha'i snang ba ye sangs

pas// dag pa yul gyi stong pa rnyed// de ltar chos nyid stong pa nyid// dran pa chen po ngo sprad pas// stong gsal gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// ye nas med pa'i stong nyid la// 'byung ba zad pa'i 'od snang

gsal// bya byed bral ba'i stong nyid la// sku gsum mtshon pa'i 'od snang gsal// 'byung ba zad pa'i stong nyid la// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i 'od snang gsal// rgyun du gsal ba'i stong nyid la// rang gsal gzhag
pa'i 'od snang gsal// mtha' mi gnas pa'i stong nyid la// rang rig sgrib bral 'od snang gsal// rnal 'byor 'od snang goms pa yis// 'byung bzhi thams cad bag la zha// thams cad stong
gsal ngang la rdzogs// chos rnams zad pa'i snang ba 'di// stong gsal 'gag pa med pa ste// dri ma kun las 'das pa'o// 'od zer dkar po'i tshul du shar// yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i brda// 'od zer

ser po'i tshul du shar// chos rnams ma btsal bzhag pa'i phyir// 'od zer dmar po'i tshul du shar// bya ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir// 'od zer ljang gu'i tshul du shar// mi 'gyur kun la khyab pa'i phyir/ kha

dog mthing ga'i tshul du shar// de ltar sku yi gsal cha yis// rig pa dri ma med pa mthong// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma yis// rig pa thig le nyag gcig mthong// ye shes lnga yi gsal cha yis// rig pa nyid

kyis gsal cha mthong// 'od zer lnga yi gsal cha yis// rig pa nyid kyi kha dog mthong// snang ba bzhi yi gsal cha yis// rig pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mthong// shes rab lnga yi gsal cha yis// rig pa rang snang
tshul du mthong// rig pa nyid la su goms pa// 'dis ni rang lus rang sar dengs// de yi tshad la gang goms pa// chos rnams kun kyang zad pa'o// 'di dus nyams kyi 'phel zad ste// snang nyams snang yang
'dzin pa med// chos rnams zad ces tha snyad btags// nyams lus dbang po rtog tshogs dang// tshig gi 'khrul zhen thams cad zad// zag pa'i phung po mi snang bar// rang sangs nyid du sangs rgya'o// zhes

gsungs nas/ ka dag brjod bral gyi ngang la lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ snang bzhi rtags tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya
rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang// snang bzhi'i rtags tshad de ltar na// de yi rgyab brten ji lta bu// rig mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas
gsan te bka' stsal pa// a ho rig mdangs 'khor rnams nyon// de yi rgyab brten dgu yin te// dang por mi 'gul gsum du bstan// lus ni sku gsum bzhugs stangs las// skad cig tsam yang mi 'bral
bya// de ltar lus nyid ma 'gul bas// rtsa mig rlung sems mi 'gul lo// gzigs stangs gsum las 'gul mi bya// rtsa gnad sgo yi khyad par gyis// rig pa sgron mar 'char ba'o// rtsa ma 'gul na mig gi
'gul// sgron ma mi 'gul gnad du che// sems ma 'gul bas rtog mi 'byung// dbyings rig 'du 'bral med pa ste// mi 'gul gsum la gzhi bcas pas// rlung sems gnad la phebs pa'o// kye ho sems
dpa' rdo rje rtsal// gnyis pa sdod pa gsum du bstan// phyi nang bskyod pa'i rlung zad pas// dbyings rig 'gro 'ong med par sdod// phung po bskyod pa'i rlung zad pas// lus ni mi 'gul sdod

pa'o// gsang ba 'gyu byed rlung zad pa// sems rtog mi 'gyur sdod pa'o// tshad ni rmi lam bzung ba ste// lus ngag yid gsum rtags tshad bzung// rab la rmi lam dbyings su thim// 'bring du rmi lam mngon shes

'char// tha ma rmi lam ngo yang shes// chos nyid mngon sum snang ba'i dus// lus ni rus sbal snod bcug 'dra// ngag ni lkugs pa smra mi 'dod// sems ni mi 'phro gar gtang dod// nyams snang gong 'phel dus
nyid du// lus la rgyan dang byi dor bral// ngag ni don med cal col te// sems ni khams gsum zlog re skan// rig pa tshad la phebs dus su// lus ni 'byung lnga thogs med 'gro// ngag la kun nyan chos su
'ongs// sems ni yid ches gdeng ldan no// chos rnams zad pa'i snang ba'i dus// lus la gshed mas ya nga med// ngag ni zungs zad lad mo brag cha 'dra// sems ni bag chag skad cig yal// bar snang na bun

ci bzhin 'gyur// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// gsum pa thob pa gsum gyis ni// zag bcas phung po rang yal te// skye ba nyid la rang dbang thob// phung po'i snang ba rang 'gags te// rdaus bcas mi snang ba
ru 'gyur// gal te sems can don byed na// rang gi lag sor gtad pa yis// snang ba rang log don rnams 'grub// rig pa rang bcug grol 'gul 'gyur// 'asngug pa nyid la rang dbang thob// lag sor nyid
la rig pa gtad// skad cig mi snang bud+d+ha'o// rlung sems nyid la dbang thob pas// rlung gi yon tan thams cad thob// sdig can 'pho dus rig pa bcug/ rang dang mnyam por bud+d+ha'o// bems po rnams
la thogs pa med// mngon shes phyogs med dus gsum shes// gsum gsum dgu yis rgyab brten no// zhes gsungs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ rgyab brten bstan pa'i le'u ste
so dgu pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang gsol pa// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang// rgyab brten man ngag de ltar na// gdeng chen ji lta bu ru bzla// rig
mdangs 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' la sogs 'khor rnams nyon// gdeng ni yar mar gnyis gnyis bzhi// rtags tshad rnam grangs mang bshad pa// 'di ru mi

'du med pa'o// dkon mchog yon tan la sogs la// brod pa skye rgyu rdul tsam med// ye nas rig pa sangs rgyas pas// bskyar nas grol rgyu+u nga la med// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin pa yis// gdeng chen de nyid
lon pa'o// de nyid don rtogs gyur pa'i phyir// myang 'das gzhan nas ga la re// gdeng chen dam pa chod pa'o// dmyal ba la sogs rigs drug gi/ sdug bajal myong tshul thos na yang// 'khrul

med sdug bajal dang bral bas// ya nga med pa'i gdeng chos so// 'khor bar 'khyam mkhan med pa'i phyir// 'khor bar ltung dogs ga la yod// ltung mkhan ma grub gdeng chos so// mi 'gyur lta ba'i gdeng chen

bzhis// mi zlog ye shes tshad kyang bzung// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// gdeng chen de lon rnal 'byor ni// sus ma rnyed pa'i nor bu rnyed// sus ma mthong ba'i snang ba mthong// chos can thams cad dum
bur chod// chos nyid rang rig sbar gyis zin// sangs rgyas bas kyang jar sangs rgyas// yang dag rdzogs pa'i yang sangs rgyas// sprul pa rnams kyang der sangs rgyas// gdeng chen 'di lan rnal 'byor
pa// rigs rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// dpal ldan tshogs kyi bdag po yin// he ru ka yi dbang rnams rdzogs// rnal 'byor 'byung bzhi rang dengs nas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas

kun gyi ye shes ni// gang gi phyogs su mi ltung ngo// zhes gsungs nas// brdal ba chen por lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byam kyi rgyun las/ gdeng chen bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi
bcu'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/[ xxx ]de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa/ kye ma ston pa kun tu bzang// de ltar nyams su blang ba la// snang ba bzhi ni gang
ltar rdzogs// 'bras bu thob tshul ji lta bu// rig mdangs 'khor la bstan du gsol// ston pas gsan dgongs bka' stsal pa// kye ma rig pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dang por rdzogs tshul 'di ltar ro// chos

nyid mngon sum snang ba ni// rig pa lug rgyud ngo bor rdzogs// lu gu rgyud dang ma bral na// sgom pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor rdzogs// rang snang chos nyid rol pa ste// lta ba rgyun gyi rnal 'byor rdzogs// zang thal mngon

sum ma bral na// spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor rdzogs// rang rig rgyu rkyen med pa la// 'bras bu lhun grub chen por rdzogs// bsam med chos sku spros bral la// ma 'gags theg dgu thams cad rdzogs// nyams

snang gong 'phel snang ba la// rig snang thams cad dbyings su rdzogs// spros bral sku lnga'i rang mdangs rnams// bar snang stong pa'i yul du rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi lus nyid ni// rtog pa med pa'i ngang du

rdzogs// 'dzin med dag pa chen po la// rdo rje sems sogs sku rnams rdzogs// sgra la goms pa'i rnal 'byor la// lus kyi rtags rnams mngon du rdzogs// 'od la 'dris pa'i rnal 'byor la// sa rdo ri brag rang
dag rdzogs// thig le goms pa'i rnal 'byor la// nyag gcig rtsad gcod sku rnams rdzogs// sgrub tu med pa'i phrin las la// bya ru med pa'i mchod pa rdzogs// chos nyid mi 'gyur snang ba la// lha

dang bral ba'i rig pa rdzogs// stong pa nyid kyi 'od snang la// bde ba zag med thig le rdzogs// yang dag don gyi chos sku la// rtog pa med pa'i ye shes rdzogs// 'gyur med rang gsal ngo bo la// rtog med
mnyam pa'i thig le rdzogs// rnam dag thig le lug rgyud la// brjod med lam gyi nyams len rdzogs// gsal stong dag pa'i ye shes la// mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams rdzogs// nyams snang rim gyis 'phel ba
la// mtshan ma can gyi chos rnams rdzogs// zhe 'dod med pa'i sgom pa la// btang snyoms med pa'i ting 'dzin rdzogs// spang thob med pa'i lta ba la// rtog pa med pa'i mthong ba rdzogs// bcos slad med

pa'i spyod pa la// byas pa med pa'i byung ba rdzogs// rig pa tshad phebs snang ba la// lhun grub chen po'i ngang du rdzogs// bsam dang bral ba'i chos sku la// 'gag pa med pa'i longs sku rdzogs// mtshan ma med
pa'i chos nyid la// thams cad 'dren pa'i sprul sku rdzogs// phyir mi ldog pa'i sku gsum la// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rig pa rdzogs// yang dag sangs rgyas lam mchog la// sbyang du med pa'i dkyil 'khor
rdzogs// skye ba med pa'i yig 'bru la// 'du 'bral med pa'i lha tshogs rdzogs// nub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan la// 'gyur ba med pa'i sgron ma rdzogs// rtog pa med pa'i ye shes la// gsal 'grib med pa'i

'od gsal rdzogs// sa la mi gnas sku mchog la// btang snyoms ye shais dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bya btsal bral ba'i chos nyid la// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'phro 'du rdzogs// rtog pa lam gyi sangs rgyas la// bya ba

rgyu yi sangs rgyas rdzogs// grol ba 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas la// smin pa rtags kyi sangs rgyas rdzogs// bya byed bral ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'dzin med zhi khro'i lha tshogs rdzogs// kun la khyab pa'i ye shes
la// rang gsal chos nyid rtog med rdzogs// 'dzin med chos nyid rang gsal la// rtog med chos rnams ma 'dres rdzogs// ma bcos shar grol gdal ba la// sa bcu rtags dang rim pa rdzogs// ye shes snang
ba lam me la// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul thams cad rdzogs// chos nyid ye klong chen po la/ khregs chod ngang du thod rgal rdzogs// sku la goms pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'gro drug gzugs snang longs skur

rdzogs// rig pa nyid la su goms pa// 'di ni chos rnams zad par rdzogs// chos rnams zad pa'i snang ba la// snang stong dbye bsal med par rdzogs// rang rig yin phyir snang ba rdzogs// rang byung yin phyir
gzhi yang rdzogs// snang ba yin phyir yul yang rdzogs// rang grol yin phyir rang rig rdzogs// rang snang yin phyir lam kun rdzogs// rang rig yin phyir shes bya rdzogs// rang khyab yin phyir

'bras bu rdzogs// rang sangs yin phyir rgyu rkyen rdzogs// rang rtogs yin phyir chos nyid rdzogs// rang byung yin phyir rgyud lung rdzogs// rangs rdzogs yin phyir phrin las rdzogs// rang ye thob phyir
dbang rnams rdzogs// rang dag yin phyir dam tshig rdzogs// rang shes yin phyir gdams ngag rdzogs// rang bzhin yin phyir bsam gtan rdzogs// rang chas yin phyir dus gcig rdzogs// zhes gsungs nas
lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ snang gzhi rang sar rdzogs tshul le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems
dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// de lta bu ru rdzogs na'ang// 'bras bu thob med thob tshul rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ ston pas gsan dgongs bka' k+p+ral pa// kye ho rig mdangs 'khor rnams
nyon// 'bras bu thob tshul 'di ltar ro// shes su med pa'i chos sku shes// brjod du med pa'i man ngag la// gzung du med pa'i rig pa zin// bshad du med pa'i chos nyid la// thob tu med pa'i 'bras

bu thob// yi ge med pa'i rgyud chen la// bshad du med de rtsal yang rdzogs// chos kun ma bslabs pa la shes// ma bsgoms ye nas ting 'dzin thob// lung dang rig pa du gcig rdzogs// sngags dang phyag rgya
dkyil 'khor lha// mchod dang dbang dang dam tshig ni// ma btsal cog bzhag chen por thob// 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta rnams// skad cig cha la dus gsum rdzogs// sa dang lam dang tshogs rnams ni// bgrod
sbyangs bsag med skad cig thob// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu ni// ji ltar gnas pa'i tshul na rdzogs// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// snyog med rang sar nyid na bde// chos sku longs sku sprul sku

gsum// ma skyes rdzogs pa'i tshul na thob// lta ba sgom pa spyod pa gsum// ma brten 'khor ba'i tshul du rdzogs// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// ye rdzogs lhun grub chen por gnas// snang dang stong

dang dbyer med ni// ma byas ye rdzogs nyid du gnas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// nam mkha' ye rdzogs tshul du thob// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// rgya ru med pa'i sangs rgyas thob// 'da' ru med pa'i myang
'das thob// dri ma med de ka nas dag/ thog mar byung bas rgyud pa zab// lta dang bral bas rtsis las 'das// dug gi rgyu rkyen bde ba che// brjod pa'i rgyu med smra bsam 'das// ye nas rang rig rnam par
dag/ zag pa zad pas rdos bcas med// gnyis kyi 'phel med ngo bo nyid// chos dang bral bas mtha' las 'das// rtog med gsal bas 'gyu ba sangs// bem rig gnyis med tshogs gnyis
rdzogs// 'gran pa'i zla med cog bzhag rang// ngo lkog mtshan ma gdod nas med// 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas// yongs la khyab pas sems gcig po// 'grub mtha' rdzogs pa'i spyi phud yin// thog ma
bar dang mtha' ma grub// de ltar 'bras bu 'khrul med gzhi// rang rig ye nas 'od zer gsal// sku gsum ye nas ma bskyed rdzogs// 'bras bu rang gnas chen po'o// a ho rig mdangs 'khor rnams
nyon// ye rdzogs ye yin sku gsum la// chos kyis de la bcos su med// grub mtha' ye nas skyon dang bral// dug lngas ye nas gos pa med// 'khor 'das 'du 'bral ga la yod// mngon sum gsal bas

brjid re che// snang ba sna tshogs lhun re sdug/ chos sku ngo sprod dang re spro// ngo bo zang thal yangs pa che// rang bzhin kun khyab gdal ba che// thugs rje kun 'byung skyed re che/ khyab pa ye mdangs bkrag re 01ngas

mang ste// rnam pa lnga ru 'dus pa'o// ngo bo ka dag sangs rgyas dang// rang bzhin lhun grub sangs rgyas dang// thugs rje kun khyab sangs rgyas dang// 'bras bu rgyu dag sangs rgyas dang// mtshan ma yongs grol

sangs rgyas so// de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'dus// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// ngo bo sku ru rgyas pa dang// rang
bzhin 'od du rgyas pa dang// thugs rje zer du rgyas pa'o// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// sku dang gsal dang 'asnga' dang 'od// mngon sum gsal na rgyas pa'o// thog mar ma rig pa yi sems// rig

pas bskyed pa'i lus sems 'di// ye shes nyid kyi ngo bo ste// 'byung lnga ye shes lnga la thim// lhag ma med par sangs rgyas so// de yi thugs rje'i cha tsam las// gzhan don dpag med 'byung ba'o// theg pa kun
gyi spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu sku gsum lhun grub kyi le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/[ xxx ]rgya rgya rgya: de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa/

kye ho// lta sgom spyod pa'i bdag nyid kun tu bzang// ye rdzogs chen po'i 'bras bu bstan gyur kyang// da rung lta sgom spyod pa'i don ma bstan// klong chen yangs pa'i thugs kyi sgo phye la// blta dang mi blta kun
bzang yangs pa'i klong// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa rab gsal ba// 'dus pa'i tshogs la klong nas dgrol du gsol// zhes zhus ston pas bka' k+p+ral pa// kye ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal sogs
nyon// bsam gyis mi khyab brgyad khri bzhi stong dang// gsung rab cu gnyis sde snod rgyud kun k+p+rogs// theg pa'i khyad par grub pa'i mtha' rnams kun// kun bzang chos kyi dbyings chen klong nas

bkrol// lta ba'i klong chen rab 'byams la bzla ba// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang// spyi dang khyad par lta ba'i bye brag rnams// ye klong chen po'i don la bsgribs gyur cing// sangs rgyas lta dgongs
phyin ci ma log pa// de yis don la dbab par rab tu dka'// brtag par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad bral// dpe dang gtan tshigs lung rig kun gyis kyang// 'di zhes mtshon par tshig tu brjod dang
bral// brjod med don nyid klong chen rab 'byams don// chos nyid skye med klong yangs 'khyil ba'i sku// ngang ngam shugs kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis rtogs// kun tu bzang po'i chos kyi dbyings klong

nas// bkrol zhing bshad pa lta ba'i klong chen 'di// las dang skal ldan rnams kyis rtogs par gyis// chos nyid klong rdol lta ba ye klong che// 'khor 'das thams cad rig pa'i byang chub sems// yul nyid rnam

spangs sgro skur bral ba'i klong// sems nyid stong pa ngos bzung kun tu bral// med pa ma yin rol pa 'gag pa med// rang bzhin skye ba med cing brjod dang bral// skye med rol pa gnyis med gnyis su med// de

nyid spros pa'i mtha' rnams kun dang bral// phyogs ris med pa lta ba yangs pa'i klong// ma 'gags shar ba rang byung ye shes nyid// rgyu dang rkyen bral rtag pa chen po'i sku// rtogs pa'i klong chen rab 'byams
don rtogs na// skad cig grol 'gyur yang sangs rgyas 'gyur zhing// rang bzhin ka dag spros pa'i mtshan ma bral// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan bzhin// thams cad mnyam nyid klong du ro

gcig go/ rnam par dag pa'i de nyid ye shes don// 'di ltar sangs rgyas ye nas rnam par dag/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba che// nyon mongs lnga nyid ye shes lnga po ste// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su

rab rtogs pas// ngo mtshar rmad byung sdug bsngal zug rngu zhi// klong chen rab 'byams a ti yo ga'i lung// kun kyang rab gsal theg pa kun gyi don// lta ba'i mthar thug dgongs pa'i zhe phugs ni// mtha' yi
mun gsal klong chen yangs pa'o// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ lta ba rgya mtsho klong rdol ba'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas

yang sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal gyis gsol pa// kun tu bzang po rab 'byams klong chen yangs// ye nas dngos po'i gzhi nyid dag pa la// sgom dang mi bsgom tha snyad kun las grol// sgom pa'i don nyid klong nas
dgrol du gsol// zhus pa'i lan du ston pas dka' k+p+ral pa// de nyid don rtogs klong nas kun kyang gsal// sgom dang mi bsgom tha snyad kun dang bral// rang bzhin 'od gsal ngang gis ma

g.yos kyang// rang sems dri med 'od gsal snying po'i don// ma nor ma bcos spros dang bral// blo yi bzhag thabs ji bzhin nyid du bde// zab mo klong yangs 'khyil pa'i don nyid la// bying rmugs rgod dang
'phro ba kun spangs shing// smrar med klong du bstim pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mtshon dang ma mtshon med pa'i thag chod de// sgom dang bsgom par bya ba ma rnyed pas// bying rgod rnam rtog dgra bo gsad mi

dgos// rtog pa'i klong du 'dris pa sgom pa'i mchog/ sgom pa klong du gyur pa pha rol phyin// rnam par mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das// gzung dang 'dzin spangs byang chub sems nyid don// ji bzhin gtan la
phab la mnyam par bzhag/ yul gyis mi 'phrog ma bcos lhug pa de// sgom pa'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i dpe// lus ngag sems kyi sdug bablal las grol zhing// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa'i don rtogs

na// drod rtags cho 'phrul kun kyang shugs las 'byung// gol sgrib ma spangs rang sar dag 'gyur zhing// klong chen rab 'byams klong du gyur pa'i tshe// de nyid rgyal ba kun dang rab mnyam zhing// bde gshegs

sku gsung thugs dang mnyam par 'gyur// byang sems drang por gnas dang brtan cing goms// de nyid bogs dbyung bsgom par bya ba dang// mkha' la nyi shar sngi bzhin gsal ba ste// snang ba'i thugs phrad gang

gang de de nyid// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma rang grol shes par bya// sems nyid cog bzhag dran med rang sar bzhag/ rgya mtsho bzhin du rab zab g.yo 'gul med// chu bo'i rgyun bzhin rig pa rgyun 'chad med// rdo

rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'pho 'gyur med// dbang po rno rtul rim dang cig char du// nyams su jangs pas sgom pa'i bye brag kun// kun bzang thugs kyi klong nas bkrol zhing bstan// sgom pa klong yangs khyab gdal
chen po'o// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen yangs pa'i rgyud chen las// sgom pa'i don klong nas bkrol ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ de nas sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal

gyis gsol// rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho kun tu bzang// chos dbyings dag pa'i ye klong chen po la// bya dang mi bya lus ngag spyod pa'i don// byar med lhug pa'i don nyid bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// lta ba ye klong chen po'i don rtogs nas// ji bzhin bsgom pa'i ngang la gnas gyur pas// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa kun bzang klong// yangs pa chen po bya btsal kun bral kyang// lta ba'i rtsis zin spyad
na kun kyang bzang// dbyings dang ye shes ngang las ma g.yos kyang// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i mdzad spyod bsam mi khyab// spyod pa ji snyed bsam yas de snyed kun// thabs kyis kun spyod gdeng
gis zin par spyad// ched du byar med don la bkag med kyang// bya ba med pas grol ba sgrol bar bya// kun 'khol kun spyod bdag nyid chen por spyad// 'di la brtul zhugs la sogs jags rnams med// bya

ba med pas las rnams kun kyang bral// lhun grub blang dor med de rang byung klong// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing// dus dang rnam pa kun tu shugs phyung spyad// ya nga'i spyod pa la sogs kun kyang

spangs// ched du byar med don la ma bkag kyang// 'gal ba'i spyod pa kun kyang rnam par spangs// smyon pa lta bu'i brtul zhugs rab spangs zhing// lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa rtsol dang bral// sbyang bgrod spyod pas
'ching 'gyur ci byar yod// 'on kyang dge ba'i chos spyod kun la yang// ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs kyis grol bar 'gyur// spyod pa spyad du yod pa'i dngos gzhi la// med pa'i phyogs 'dzin ma spangs pa
yis spyod// spyad du med pa chen po'i dngos gzhi la// yod pa'i phyogs 'dzin ma spangs pa yis spyod// spyad du yod med gnyis ka'i dngos gzhi la// gnyis med phyogs 'dzin ma spangs pa yis spyod// gnyis

med spyod pa spyad pa'i dngos gzhi la// gnyis ka'i phyogs 'dzin ma spangs pa yis spyod// mdor na gang snang gang shar dngos gzhi la// phyogs 'dzin ma spangs shugs 'byung spyod par grol// klong yangs 'ub chub
brdal khyab chen po'i ngang// spyir khyab chen po sa bcu 'dus pa'i klong// gcig tu 'dus pas mtho dman yongs kyis med// mtho dman med pas yangs dog med pa yin// mtha' dbus bral bas phyi nang med
par spyod// skye 'gag med pas dus gsum spyod pa'i klong// dus gsum med pas skye shi med par 'byams// bl-i snyed shar kyang g.yo ba rdul tsam med// rgyal ba kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa'o// zhes gsungs

nas rang las tha dad med pa'i sku gsum gyi klong na sku ngo bo nges med du sangs rgyas/ gsung lhun grub grag stong du sangs rgyas/ thugs skye med ka dag tu sangs rgyas so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams

kyi rgyud las/ spyod pa rgya mtsho brdal ba chen po'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgyaH de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// ston pa nyid la yang zhus pa// kye kye ston pa kun tu
bzang// lta sgom spyod 'bras de lta na// a ti chen po 'di nyid la// sems can jo yi khyad par gyis// gol sa yod med ston pas gsungs// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyan spro'o// zhus pas gsan dgongs
bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje rtsal// lta sgom rnams kyi gol sa ni// stong pa nyid la a 'thas na// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhir gol// dngos po can du 'thas pa na// gzugs
khams gnas rigs bcu bdun dang// bems po lta bur go bar 'gyur// lu gu rgyud kyi snang ba la// rtag pa can du 'dzin pa na// chags pa chen pos bcings par 'gyur// 'gro drug gnas su de gol lo// spyod

pa dag la gol sa gsum// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// smyon pa tho co spyod pa na// nam mkha' lta bur mtha' yas gol// don la myang med kha chos che// mu stegs lta bur gol bar 'gyur// chos spyod rgyu
'bras mi brtsi na// tha mal skye bor gol ba'o// sgom pa dag la gol sa gsum// btang snyoms bdag med bsgom pa na// stong snang mun snang nyid du gol// ting 'dzin yig 'bru sgom byed na// chags bzung
'khor ba'i gnas su gol// mi rtog stong pa bsgom byas na// chad pa mu stegs lta bur gol// de sogs gol rgyu bsam yas kyang// gol sa rtag chad gnyis su 'dus// don la gol sgrib med na yang// lam
pa'i rnal 'byor nyid la ni// gnas ngan grogs ngan yul ngan gsum// gol sa che ba gsum du bshad/ kha ngan khong gyong rang rgyud ngan// dug lnga dug gsum lo 'dab rgyas// de rnams rang rgyud gol sa
yin// nyams su len par byed pa la// bar chad bdun gyis 'khyer bas na// bdud kyi gol sa thams cad gcad/ rtsa ba bdudabazhi chod pa na// gol sa thams cad chod pa'o// chos sku gzung 'dzin phyogs bral
la// mtshan ma'i bdud dang gol sgrib bral// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ gol sa bcad pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/
sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho ston pa kun tu bzang// gong ltar gdams pa bstan na yang// snang ba bzhi po ma rdzogs shing// gal te gdams pa'i gnad yod kyang// bya ba le los g.yengs pa
rnams// nyams su len long med pa ru// bar chad rkyen gyis 'chi ba na// 'di la 'chi rtags bslu ba'i thabs// bar do'i gdams pa bstan du gsol// gsan dgongs ston pas bka' stsal pa// kye ho sems

dpa' rdo rje nyon// bar do zhes bya chos spyi'i skad// 'di ru chos kun ma 'dus med// de la bar do'i dbye ba dang// chos nyid sa mtshams snang lugs so// de la dbye ba bzhi yin te// dang po skye gnas bar do

dang// 'chi kha sdug bsngal bar do dang// chos nyid zhi khro'i bar do dang// srid par 'khyams pa'i bar do'o// gnyis pa chos nyid bar do ni// rang lus 'dom gang gru bzhi 'di/ khams rnams dang ni phung po
dang// skye mched rnams dang dbang po dang// yul dang yul can nyon mongs rnams// ji ltar gnas pa gtan la dbab// 'di dag shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snang ba thams cad dbang sgyur nus/
khams la rnam pa gnyis yin te// yul gyis bsdus pa phyi yi khams// sems kyis bsdus pa nang gi khams/ khams kyi rnam pa de dag kyang// yul kun 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'o// phung po rtog pa dang bcas
pa// dngos po thams cad gcig tu sdud// rtog pa med pa'i phung po 'di// bsam gtan gcig 'dus ting 'dzin ni// skye mched gzung 'dzin gnyis yin te// gzung ba'i skye mched bcu gnyis dang// 'dzin pa'i
skye mched bcu gnyis so// dbang po gzugs kyi cha 'dzin dang// shes rab cha 'dzin dbang po'o// yul la dngos po'i yul dang ni// dngos po med pa'i yul gnyis so// yul can thams cad rnam par dag/ dag

ces bya ba chos zad do// nyon mongs pa ni drug yin te// ma rig gti mug zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog go/ 'chi kha ma yi chos nyid ni// 'chi rkyen nad kyis 'byung ba 'khrugs// lus ngag yid
gsum sdug bsngal te// 'dzin chags zhen pa'i mtsho rdol nas// lus sems bral gyis dogs pa yis// sdug bsngal shin tu rags pa ste// ban bun dang ni lang long dang// shes pa gcig tu mi gnas

pa'o// chos nyid bar do'i chos nyid ni// phung po med cing zag bcas bral// zhi ba'i sku dang khro bo'i sku// ye shes 'od dang kha dog dang// thig le mched dang 'byung snang dag/ snang ba thams cad bde chen

zhing// rang snang dag par kun snang ste// cir snang chos nyid gzhal yas so// srid pa bar do'i chos nyid ni// sha khrag rang gi gzugs bral nas// sgyu ma yid kyi gzugs can des// chos nyid bden pa'i don ma

mthong// 'od snang kun la bred sngangs nas// stong gsum kun tu yid kyis rgyu// bya sgro rlung gis khyer ba bzhin// phyad phyod yad yud snyoms shing 'jug/ ban bun lang long rmi lam 'dra// sa gcig mi tshugs tshig
pa za// gar sleb la sogs rigs drug 'od// so so'i dmigs pa snang ba'o// sa mtshams skye gnas bar do ni// ma la skyes nas 'chi rkyen gyi// nad kyis btab pa tshun chad do// 'chi kha'i bar do nad thebs

nas// nang dbugs chad pa tshun chad do// chos nyid bar do dbugs chad nas// lhun grub snang ba shar ba'o// srid pa bar do'i sa mtshams ni// lhun grub snang ba yongs thim nas// mngal du tshud pa tshun chad
do// snang lugs gdams pa'i gnad bzhi bstan// rang bzhin skye gnas bar do la// shes bya'i gras thag gcad par bya// 'chi kha ma yi bar do la// gdams pa rnams la gsal yang gdab// chos nyid zhi khro'i
bar do la// rang snang kun la yid ches bya// srid par 'khyams pa'i bar do la// las kyi 'phro mthud zhen chags spangs// dang po skye gnas bar do yi// shes bya'i gras thag bcad pa la// mtshan
nyid ldan pa'i bla ma brten// thos pas phyi yi sgro 'dogs bcad// bsgom pas nang gi sgro 'dogs bcad// shes byas yul gyi gras thag bcad// 'dus pas sems kyi gras thag bcad// snang sems gnyis med
gras thag bcad// gsang bar khregs chod gtan la dbab// yang gsang thod rgal gtan la dbab// rtags tshad gdeng dang ldan par bya// zhes gsungs nas lhan ner bzhugs so// theg pa'i spyi phud klong chen

rab 'byams kyi rgyud las/ bar do spyi'i rnam gzhag bstan pa da nga/ skye shi bar do'i gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sems dpa' rdo rjes yang zhus pa// kye ho ston
pa kun tu bzang// skye gnas bar do de ltar na// 'chi kha'i bar do ji ltar 'char// ston pas lan du bka' stsal pa// a ho sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// 'chi kha ma yi bar do la// dang po 'chi ba brtag cing
bslu// ma zlogs gdams pa'i gsal yang gdab// 'chi rtags phyi nang gsang gsum ste// phyi yi 'chi ltas mtshan ma ni// mi mthun phyogs rnams thog tu 'byung// dbang po mi gsal tshig pa za// nor dang

longs spyod god pa dang// rang sems phyad phyod rmi lam 'khrug/ dge sbyor mi nus 'dug mi tshugs// rmi lam ngan zhing bred sngangs 'byung// gdams ngag mi gsal log lta skye// sngar spyod 'gyur zhing chags sdang

rags// bar chad zhugs pa'i rtags yin no// nang du 'byung ba'i pra 'gyur bas// de phyir nang gi tshe gzugs brtag/ spyi gtsug ral nag mi gsal dang/ kha dog sna tshogs yan lag med// drag po dbang dang zhi
